T02bsu049_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ,
T02bsu049_u:5: sarvairarhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravairniḥkleśairvaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñairājñairājāneyairmahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyairapahṛtabhārairanuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptairekaṃ pudgalaṃ
T02bsu049_u:7: (Vaidya 2) tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayate sma - pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitā niryāyuriti //
T02bsu049_u:8: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat - kimayamāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira ātmīyena svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:10: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya imamevarūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - yatkiṃcidāyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakā bhāṣante deśayanti upadiśanti udīrayanti prakāśayanti saṃprakāśayanti, sa sarvastathāgatasya puruṣakāro veditavyaḥ tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitaḥ, tatra dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāste tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti dhārayanti, tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtya dhārayitvā yadyadeva bhāṣante, yadyadeva deśayanti, yadyadeva upadiśanti,
T02bsu049_u:13: tathāgatadharmadeśanāyā eva āyuṣman śāriputra eṣa niṣyandaḥ yatte kulaputrā upadiśantastāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na virodhayanti //
T02bsu049_u:15: yadbhagavānevamāha - pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ niryāyuriti /
T02bsu049_u:17: katamasyaitadbhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti? nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaduta bodhisattva iti /
T02bsu049_u:18: tamapyahaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yaduta prajñāpāramitā nāma /
T02bsu049_u:20: bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ vā bodhisattvadharmaṃ vā avindan anupalabhamāno
T02bsu049_u:23: anuśāsiṣyāmi? api tu khalu punarbhagavan sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne upadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na
T02bsu049_u:24: viṣādamāpadyate, nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati,
T02bsu049_u:25: notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, eṣa eva bodhisattvo
T02bsu049_u:30: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvayatā evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yathā asau śikṣyamāṇastenāpi bodhicittena na manyeta /
T02bsu049_u:33: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā
T02bsu049_u:34: acittatā, tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
T02bsu049_u:36: subhūtirāha - sacedāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā, api nu te yukta eṣa paryanuyogo bhavati yadāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha - asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti?
T02bsu049_u:37: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kā punareṣā āyuṣman subhūte acittatā? subhūtirāha - avikārā āyuṣman śāriputra avikalpā acittatā //
T02bsu049_u:38: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhvāyuṣman subhūte
T02bsu049_u:39: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi /
T02bsu049_u:41: samyaksaṃbodherupaparīkṣitavyaḥ, avirahitaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ
T02bsu049_u:43: (Vaidya 4) prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
T02bsu049_u:45: pratyekabuddhabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
T02bsu049_u:47: bodhisattvabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
T02bsu049_u:50: ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabodhisattvadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:52: anuttarāyām api samyaksaṃbodhau śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
T02bsu049_u:54: tatkasya hetoḥ? ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabuddha dharmā upadiṣṭāḥ, yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yogamāpattavyam //
T02bsu049_u:55: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo 'haṃ bhagavan etadeva bodhisattvanāmadheyaṃ na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi, prajñāpāramitām api na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi so 'haṃ bhagavan etadeva bodhisattvanāmadheyamavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan prajñāpāramitām api avindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:57: syāt, yo 'haṃ vastvavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇa āyavyayaṃ kuryāṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti /
T02bsu049_u:58: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam
T02bsu049_u:61: evaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam /
T02bsu049_u:62: sacedbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na
T02bsu049_u:63: viṣādamāpadyate, nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati,
T02bsu049_u:66: avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ, sthito
T02bsu049_u:68: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na
T02bsu049_u:75: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi abhisaṃskāre caran prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti, nāpi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate, nāpi prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayate /
T02bsu049_u:76: aparipūrayamāṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ na niryāsyati (Vaidya 5) sarvajñatāyāmaparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhṇan
T02bsu049_u:85: / evaṃ hyatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
T02bsu049_u:86: ayaṃ ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāparigṛhīto nāma samādhirvipulaḥ puraskṛtaḥ apramāṇaniyato 'sādhāraṇaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:87: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sāpi sarvajñatā aparigṛhītā, na hi nimittato
T02bsu049_u:89: sacennimittato grahītavyā abhaviṣyat, na ceha śreṇikaḥ
T02bsu049_u:91: tatra hi śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ sarvajñajñāne adhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ
T02bsu049_u:94: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
T02bsu049_u:108: so 'tra sarvatra śraddhānusārī sarvajñajñāne dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya evamadhimukta iti /
T02bsu049_u:110: nāpi sa kaściddharmo ya upalabdhaḥ, yaṃ gṛhṇīyānmuñcedvā /
T02bsu049_u:112: iyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā yadrūpaṃ na parigṛhṇīte
T02bsu049_u:117: tasmādiyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā //
T02bsu049_u:118: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evamupaparīkṣitavyamevamupanidhyātavyam -
T02bsu049_u:119: katamaiṣā prajñāpāramitā? kasya caiṣā prajñāpāramitā? kiṃ yo dharmo na vidyate nopalabhyate, sā prajñāpāramiteti? sacedevamupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ evamupanidhyāyan nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
T02bsu049_u:120: nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati, notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
T02bsu049_u:122: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā
T02bsu049_u:123: veditavyaḥ? yadā rūpameva virahitaṃ rūpasvabhāvena, evaṃ yadā vedanaiva
T02bsu049_u:124: saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva, yadā vijñānameva virahitaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena, yadā prajñāpāramitaiva virahitā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena, yadā sarvajñataiva virahitā sarvajñatāsvabhāvena //
T02bsu049_u:136: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tra śikṣiṣyate, sa niryāsyati sarvajñatāyām? āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evametadāyuṣman śāriputra,
T02bsu049_u:138: yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tra śikṣiṣyate, sa niryāsyati sarvajñatāyām /
T02bsu049_u:139: tatkasya hetoḥ? ajātā hyanirjātā hyāyuṣman śāriputra sarvadharmāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:140: evaṃ carata āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñatā āsannībhavati /
T02bsu049_u:141: yathā yathā sarvajñatā āsannībhavati, tathā tathā sattvaparipācanāya kāyacittapariśuddhirlakṣaṇapariśuddhiḥ buddhakṣetraśuddhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:143: evaṃ ca punarāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvajñatāyā āsannībhavati //
T02bsu049_u:154: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti carati, nimitte carati /
T02bsu049_u:155: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati /
T02bsu049_u:168: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati /
T02bsu049_u:169: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - ya evaṃ carati, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
T02bsu049_u:170: sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatīti, nimitta eva sa carati /
T02bsu049_u:172: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathaṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati
T02bsu049_u:174: śāriputrametadavocat - sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati, na rūpanimitte carati, na rūpaṃ nimittamiti carati, na rūpasyotpāde carati, na rūpasya nirodhe (Vaidya 7) carati, na rūpasya vināśe carati, na rūpaṃ śūnyamiti carati, nāhaṃ carāmīti carati, nāhaṃ bodhisattva iti carati /
T02bsu049_u:175: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu
T02bsu049_u:176: / sacenna vijñāne carati, na vijñānanimitte carati, na vijñānaṃ nimittamiti carati, na vijñānasyotpāde carati, na vijñānasya nirodhe
T02bsu049_u:177: carati, na vijñānasya vināśe carati, na vijñānaṃ śūnyamiti carati, nāhaṃ carāmīti carati, nāhaṃ bodhisattva iti carati /
T02bsu049_u:178: sacetpunarnāsyaivaṃ bhavati - ya evaṃ carati, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatīti /
T02bsu049_u:180: sa hi caraṃścarāmīti nopaiti, na carāmīti nopaiti, carāmi ca na carāmi ceti nopaiti, naiva carāmi na na carāmīti nopaiti, cariṣyāmīti nopaiti, na cariṣyāmīti nopaiti, cariṣyāmi ca na cariṣyāmi ceti nopaiti, naiva cariṣyāmi na cariṣyāmīti nopaiti /
T02bsu049_u:182: ayamucyate sarvadharmānupādāno nāma samādhirbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya, vipulaḥ puraskṛto
T02bsu049_u:184: anenaiva samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
T02bsu049_u:185: buddhānubhāvena āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha - vyākṛto 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, yo 'nena samādhinā viharati /
T02bsu049_u:186: sa tam api samādhiṃ na samanupaśyati, na ca tena samādhinā manyate -
T02bsu049_u:187: ahaṃ samāhitaḥ, ahaṃ samādhiṃ samāpatsye, ahaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadye, ahaṃ
T02bsu049_u:188: samādhisamāpannaḥ, iti, evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃvidyate //
T02bsu049_u:189: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamenāyuṣman subhūte samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:190: samyaksaṃbuddhairvyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? śakyaḥ sa samādhirdarśayitum? subhūtirāha - no hīdamāyuṣman śāriputra /
T02bsu049_u:192: hetoḥ? tam api hi sa kulaputraḥ samādhiṃ na jānāti, na saṃjānīte /
T02bsu049_u:193: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman subhūte vadasi? āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman śāriputra vadāmi /
T02bsu049_u:194: tatkasya hetorna jānāti na saṃjānīte? avidyamānatvena tasya samādhestaṃ
T02bsu049_u:196: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:201: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate //
T02bsu049_u:202: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo (Vaidya 8) mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate?
T02bsu049_u:203: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate //
T02bsu049_u:204: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:205: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ katamasmin dharme śikṣate? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra
T02bsu049_u:207: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi te śāriputra dharmāstathā saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā aśrutavanto
T02bsu049_u:209: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - kathaṃ tarhi te bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:210: saṃvidyante? bhagavānāha - yathā śāriputra na saṃvidyante, tathā saṃvidyante evamavidyamānāḥ
T02bsu049_u:214: te tān kalpayitvā dvayorantayoḥ saktāḥ tān dharmānna jānanti na paśyanti /
T02bsu049_u:216: kalpayitvā dvāvantāvabhiniviśante abhiniviśya tannidānamupalambhaṃ niśritya atītān dharmān kalpayanti, anāgatān dharmān kalpayanti, pratyutpannān dharmān kalpayanti te kalpayitvā nāmarūpe 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:218: te tānasaṃvidyamānān sarvadharmān kalpayanto yathābhūtaṃ mārgaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti /
T02bsu049_u:219: yathābhūtaṃ mārgamajānanto 'paśyanto na niryānti traidhātukāt, na budhyante bhūtakoṭim
T02bsu049_u:220: tena te bālā iti saṃjñāṃ gacchanti /
T02bsu049_u:222: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśante //
T02bsu049_u:223: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:224: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate? bhagavānāha - evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyām api na śikṣate
T02bsu049_u:225: / evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate
T02bsu049_u:226: / evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
T02bsu049_u:228: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan evaṃ
T02bsu049_u:229: paripṛcchet - kimayaṃ māyāpuruṣāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate, sarvajñatāyā
T02bsu049_u:230: āsannībhaviṣyati, sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyatīti? tasya bhagavan evaṃ
T02bsu049_u:231: paripṛcchataḥ kathaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ syāt? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tena hi subhūte tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi /
T02bsu049_u:234: bhagavānetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte anyā sā māyā,
T02bsu049_u:235: anyattadrūpam, anyā sā māyā, anyā sā vedanā /
T02bsu049_u:236: anyā sā saṃjñā, anye te saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:237: anyā sā māyā, anyattadvijñānam? subhūtirāha - na hyetadbhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:238: na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadrūpam /
T02bsu049_u:240: na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyā sā vedanā,
T02bsu049_u:241: anyā sā saṃjñā anye te saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:242: vedanā saṃjñā (Vaidya 9) saṃskārā eva bhagavan māyā, māyaiva vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:243: na bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadvijñānam /
T02bsu049_u:245: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte atraiṣāṃ saṃjñā samajñā
T02bsu049_u:249: tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena māyāpuruṣeṇeva śikṣitavyaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:250: tatkasya hetoḥ? sa eva hi bhagavan māyāpuruṣo dhārayitavyo yaduta pañcopādānaskandhāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:251: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ rūpamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
T02bsu049_u:252: yacca rūpaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:253: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā uktāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:254: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ vijñānamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
T02bsu049_u:255: yacca vijñānaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:256: mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
T02bsu049_u:258: bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pāpamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti, utrasiṣyanti saṃtrasiṣyanti saṃtrāsamāpatsyante
T02bsu049_u:259: atha cetsubhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti, notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante //
T02bsu049_u:260: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kāni punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni? bhagavānāha - ya enaṃ pāramitāsu avavadanti anuśāsati /
T02bsu049_u:266: imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
T02bsu049_u:268: imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyānīti
T02bsu049_u:269: / yacca bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti bhagavannucyate, tatra bodhisattva iti
T02bsu049_u:270: bhagavan kaḥ padārtha? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:272: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saktatāyāṃ śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:273: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nubodhanārthena asaktatāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
T02bsu049_u:274: bodhyarthena tu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
T02bsu049_u:275: subhūtirāha - yatpunarbhagavānevamāha - bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti, kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate?
T02bsu049_u:278: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - mamāpi bhagavan pratibhātiyenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
T02bsu049_u:280: pratibhātu te śāriputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
T02bsu049_u:284: etāsāmevamādyānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti, tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
T02bsu049_u:285: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
T02bsu049_u:290: yad api tadbhagavan bodhicittaṃ sarvajñatācittamanāsravaṃ cittamasamaṃ cittaṃ asamasamaṃ cittamasādhāraṇaṃ
T02bsu049_u:293: hetoḥ? tathā hi tatsarvajñatācittamanāsravamaparyāpannaṃ tat, yad api tatsarvajñatācittamanāsravamaparyāpannam
T02bsu049_u:296: tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
T02bsu049_u:297: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ? subhūtirāha -
T02bsu049_u:299: śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam?
T02bsu049_u:300: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā
T02bsu049_u:301: nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā? śāriputra āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:302: subhūtirāha - tadyadi āyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā, tatkathamāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha - asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti? śāriputra āha - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:303: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi //
T02bsu049_u:304: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate, mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ sa sattvaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:306: tasmātsa mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
T02bsu049_u:307: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃnaddha iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate, kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo
T02bsu049_u:308: mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho bhavati ? bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - aprameyā mayā sattvāḥ
T02bsu049_u:311: na ca te santi yairye parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
T02bsu049_u:313: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:316: yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākaro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyamabhinirmimīte
T02bsu049_u:318: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tatra kenacitkaściddhato vā mṛto vā nāśito vā antarhito vā?
T02bsu049_u:320: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bodhisattvo (Vaidya 11) mahāsattvo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayati /
T02bsu049_u:321: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:322: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśamevaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ śrutvā notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, iyatā ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho veditavyaḥ atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, tathā asaṃnāhasaṃnaddho batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:325: tatkasya hetoḥ? akṛtā hi subhūte sarvajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā /
T02bsu049_u:327: 'pi sattvā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ, yeṣāṃ sattvānāmarthāya ayaṃ
T02bsu049_u:331: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan rūpamabaddhamamuktam /
T02bsu049_u:337: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:341: / rūpatathatāpi āyuṣman subhūte abaddhā amukteti vadasi /
T02bsu049_u:344: atha katamattadāyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yadrūpamabaddhamamuktamiti vadasi? evaṃ katamā sā vedanā, katamā sā saṃjñā, katame te saṃskārāḥ? katamattadāyuṣman subhūte vijñānaṃ yadvijñānamabaddhamamuktamiti vadasi? katamā sā āyuṣman
T02bsu049_u:345: subhūte rūpatathatā yā rūpatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi? evaṃ katamā sā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā? katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte vijñānatathatā yā vijñānatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputrametadavocat - yadāyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpaṃ tadabaddhamamuktam /
T02bsu049_u:347: vedanā, yā māyāpuruṣasya saṃjñā, ye māyāpuruṣasya saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:349: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
T02bsu049_u:350: evaṃ yā māyāpuruṣasya vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā /
T02bsu049_u:351: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya vijñānatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
T02bsu049_u:355: ayaṃ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya mahāsaṃnāho 'saṃnāhaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:357: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (Vaidya 12) mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ san mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:359: kathaṃ vā tatsaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ? kuto vā tanmahāyānaṃ niryāsyati?
T02bsu049_u:360: kena vā tanmahāyānaṃ saṃprasthitam? kva vā tanmahāyānaṃ sthāsyati? ko vā anena mahāyānena niryāsyati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - mahāyānamiti subhūte aprameyatāyā etadadhivacanam /
T02bsu049_u:362: yad api subhūte evaṃ vadasi - kathaṃ vā tatsaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ? kuto vā tanmahāyānaṃ niryāsyati? kena vā tanmahāyānaṃ saṃprasthitam? kva vā tanmahāyānaṃ sthāsyati? ko vā anena
T02bsu049_u:367: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niryāsyati, api tu khalu punarna kutaścinniryāsyati /
T02bsu049_u:371: nāpi kaścittena mahāyānena niryāto nāpi niryāsyati nāpi niryāti /
T02bsu049_u:372: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaś ca niryāyāt, yena ca niryāyāt, ubhāvetau dharmau na vidyete nopalabhyete
T02bsu049_u:373: evamavidyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati? evaṃ hi subhūte
T02bsu049_u:374: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati //
T02bsu049_u:375: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāyānaṃ mahāyānamiti bhagavannucyate
T02bsu049_u:377: yathā ākāśe aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmavakāśaḥ, evameva bhagavan asmin yāne aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmavakāśaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:378: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāyānamidaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
T02bsu049_u:380: naivāsya nirgamo dṛśyate, nāpyasya sthānaṃ saṃvidyate /
T02bsu049_u:381: evamasya bhagavan mahāyānasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate, nāpyaparānta upalabhyate, nāpi madhya upalabhyate /
T02bsu049_u:384: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:387: atra śikṣitvā bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvajñatā anuprāptā, anuprāpsyate anuprāpyate ca
T02bsu049_u:388: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo
T02bsu049_u:390: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - nāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānamavocam /
T02bsu049_u:394: api nu khalu punarbhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti, aparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti, madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti /
T02bsu049_u:396: rūpāparyantatayā hi bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā, evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:401: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti nopaiti, idam api na vidyate nopalabhyate /
T02bsu049_u:402: evaṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvadharmamanupalabhamāno nāhaṃ bhagavan taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasyaitannāmadheyaṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti /
T02bsu049_u:405: so 'haṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ taṃ dharmamanupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ dharmaṃ katamena dharmeṇa katamasmin dharme 'vavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi? buddha iti bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:412: evamasvabhāvānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamattadrūpaṃ yadagrāhyamanabhinirvṛttam? katame te vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ? katamattadvijñānaṃ yadagrāhyamanabhinirvṛttam?
T02bsu049_u:413: evameteṣāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yā asvabhāvatā, sā anabhinirvṛttiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:417: anabhinirvṛttitaḥ sarvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā
T02bsu049_u:419: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ deśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate, nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ
T02bsu049_u:420: na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
T02bsu049_u:421: evaṃ veditavyam - caratyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:426: tatkasya hetoḥ? yasmin hi samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imān dharmān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:427: tasmin samaye na rūpamupaiti, na rūpamupagacchati, na rūpasyotpādaṃ samanupaśyati, na rūpasya nirodhaṃ samanupaśyati /
T02bsu049_u:428: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
T02bsu049_u:429: na vijñānamupaiti, na vijñānamupagacchati, na vijñānasyotpādaṃ samanupaśyati, na vijñānasya nirodhaṃ samanupaśyati /
T02bsu049_u:430: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam /
T02bsu049_u:436: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu049_u:437: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam, yo vijñānasyāvyayo na tadvijñānam /
T02bsu049_u:441: evaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ tasmin samaye na rūpamupaiti, na rūpamupagacchati, na rūpasyotpādaṃ samanupaśyati, na rūpasya nirodhaṃ samanupaśyati evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
T02bsu049_u:443: vijñānamupagacchati, na vijñānasyotpādaṃ samanupaśyati, na vijñānasya nirodhaṃ samanupaśyati
T02bsu049_u:444: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam /
T02bsu049_u:449: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu049_u:450: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam, yo vijñānasyāvyayo na tadvijñānam /
T02bsu049_u:454: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tena hi yathāhamāyuṣmataḥ subhūterbhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, tathā bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:455: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ kiṃ bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati? yāni vā tāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo duḥkhānyutsahate pratyanubhavitum? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ
T02bsu049_u:456: śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantam nāpi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo
T02bsu049_u:458: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi āyuṣman śāriputra duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ janayitvā śakyo 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kartum /
T02bsu049_u:460: sarvasattvānāmantike mātṛsaṃjñāṃ pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā strīpuruṣeṣu
T02bsu049_u:461: evametāḥ saṃjñāḥ kṛtvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati /
T02bsu049_u:462: tasmānmātṛsaṃjñā pitṛsaṃjñā putrasaṃjñā duhitṛsaṃjñā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike yāvadātmasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā /
T02bsu049_u:463: yathā ātmā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyaḥ, evaṃ sarvasattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyā iti /
T02bsu049_u:464: evaṃ ca sarvasattveṣu saṃjñā utpādayitavyā - mayaite sarvasattvā na
T02bsu049_u:467: na ca mayaiteṣu cittapradoṣa utpādayitavya antaśaḥ śataśo
T02bsu049_u:469: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittamutpādayitavyam sacedevaṃcitto vihariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī cariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī vihariṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:470: punaraparamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - yathā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvamātmā na vidyate nopalabhyate, evaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ
T02bsu049_u:471: sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /
T02bsu049_u:473: sacedevaṃcittaścariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī cariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī vihariṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:474: yadapyāyuṣman śāriputra evamāha - anutpādo bodhisattvo iti /
T02bsu049_u:477: śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattva evānutpādaḥ, utāho bodhisattvadharmā apyanutpādaḥ? subhūtirāha - bodhisattvadharmā api āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte
T02bsu049_u:483: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte sarvajñatādharmā evānutpādaḥ, utāho pṛthagjano 'pyanutpādaḥ? āha - pṛthagjano 'pyāyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:484: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte pṛthagjana evānutpādaḥ, utāho pṛthagjanadharmā apyanutpādaḥ? āha - pṛthagjanadharmā āpyāyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:485: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ, bodhisattvadharmā apyanutpādaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:487: 'pyanutpādaḥ, pṛthagjanadharmā apyanutpādaḥ, nanvāyuṣman subhūte anuprāptaiva ayatnena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvajñatā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:488: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptimicchāmi, nāpyabhisamayam /
T02bsu049_u:490: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate,
T02bsu049_u:491: utāho utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate? āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anutpanno dharma utpannaḥ, utāho anutpanna eva
T02bsu049_u:492: dharmo 'nutpannaḥ? āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte utpāda eva dharmo
T02bsu049_u:493: 'nutpādaḥ, utāho anutpādo dharma utpādaḥ? āha - utpādo dharmo 'nutpādo
T02bsu049_u:494: dharma ityāyuṣman śāriputra na pratibhāti jalpitum /
T02bsu049_u:495: āha - anutpādo 'pi te āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti jalpitum /
T02bsu049_u:504: tathā hyāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripraśnīkriyate,
T02bsu049_u:505: tatastata eva niḥsarati, dharmatāyāś ca na calati, tāṃ ca dharmatāṃ na virodhayati /
T02bsu049_u:508: te yato yata eva paripraśnīkriyante, tatastata eva niḥsaranti, dharmatāṃ ca na virodhayanti, dharmatāyāś ca na vyativartante /
T02bsu049_u:510: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:512: prajñāpāramitaiva āyuṣman śāriputra sārvayānikī, sarvadharmāniśritatayā sarvadharmāniśritapāramitā ca /
T02bsu049_u:513: iti hi yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmevaṃ deśyamānāyāmevamupadiśyamānāyāṃ na bhavati cittasya avalīnatvam, na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam, na bhavati dhaṃdhāyitatvam, na bhavati cittasyānyathātvam, veditavyamayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti // (Vaidya 16)
T02bsu049_u:514: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:515: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati? yadi hyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati, evaṃ sa virahitaḥ
T02bsu049_u:517: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati, evaṃ sa virahito
T02bsu049_u:519: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte manasikāreṇāvirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, avirahita eva prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:520: evaṃ sati sarvasattvā apyavirahitā bhaviṣyanti prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
T02bsu049_u:521: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvasattvā api hyavirahitā manasikāreṇa viharanti //
T02bsu049_u:522: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra
T02bsu049_u:524: artha eva tvāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:532: anena āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃrūpeṇa manasikāreṇa icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ viharantamanena vihāreṇeti //
T02bsu049_u:536: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt catvāriṃśatā trāyastriṃśatkāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
T02bsu049_u:537: catvāraś ca lokapālā viṃśatyā cāturmahārājakāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
T02bsu049_u:539: pañca ca śuddhāvāsānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇānyabhūvan
T02bsu049_u:542: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:543: imānyārya subhūte saṃbahulāni devaputrasahasrāṇi asyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇāni āryasya subhūterantikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śrotukāmāni bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmupadeśamavavādānuśāsanīṃ ca /
T02bsu049_u:544: tatkathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam, kathaṃ
T02bsu049_u:545: śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ yogamāpattavyam? sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tena hi kauśika upadekṣyāmi te buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā buddhādhiṣṭhānena /
T02bsu049_u:548: ye tvavakrāntāḥ samyaktvaniyāmam, na te bhavyā
T02bsu049_u:552: abhavyā hi te punaḥ punaḥ saṃsaraṇāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum /
T02bsu049_u:556: viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyāḥ //
T02bsu049_u:557: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - sādhu sādhu subhūte, sādhu khalu punastvaṃ subhūte, yastvaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmutsāhaṃ dadāsi /
T02bsu049_u:558: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kṛtajñairasmābhirbhagavan bhagavato bhavitavyaṃ nākṛtajñaiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:559: tatkasya hetoḥ? paurvakāṇāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike 'smadarthe bhagavān yathā brahmacaryaṃ bodhāya caran pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva san, yaiḥ śrāvakairavavadito 'nuśiṣṭaś ca pāramitāsu, tatra bhagavatā caratā
T02bsu049_u:561: evaṃ bhagavan asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigrahītavyā anuparivārayitavyāśca, saṃparigrahītavyāḥ saṃparivārayitavyāś ca /
T02bsu049_u:562: tatkasya hetoḥ? asmābhir api hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītā anuparivāritāśca, saṃparigṛhītāḥ saṃparivāritāś ca kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante //
T02bsu049_u:563: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma - tena hi kauśika śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /
T02bsu049_u:564: śūnyatāyāṃ kauśika tiṣṭhatā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /
T02bsu049_u:565: tena hi kauśika (Vaidya 18) bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena bhavitavyam
T02bsu049_u:567: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
T02bsu049_u:577: na manaḥsaṃsparśe, na manaḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sthātavyam /
T02bsu049_u:597: iti hi samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgānīti, iti hi mārgāṅgānīti na sthātavyam
T02bsu049_u:599: iti hi sakṛdāgāmiphalamiti, anāgāmiphalamiti, arhattvamiti na sthātavyam /
T02bsu049_u:624: srotaāpannāḥ saptakṛto bhavaparamā iti na sthātavyam /
T02bsu049_u:626: sakṛdāgāmyapariniṣṭhitattvātsakṛdimaṃ lokamāgamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti na sthātavyam
T02bsu049_u:627: anāgāmī dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam anāgāmī anāgamya imaṃ lokaṃ tatraiva parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
T02bsu049_u:629: arhannihaiva anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
T02bsu049_u:631: pratyekabuddho 'tikramya śrāvakabhūmimaprāpya buddhabhūmiṃ parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam
T02bsu049_u:634: sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvāpya aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhatvaniyatān kṛtvā buddhabhūmau sthitvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvāsyati ityevamapyanena na sthātavyam //
T02bsu049_u:636: pṛthagjanabhūmimatikramya śrāvakabhūmimatikramya pratyekabuddhabhūmimaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvāpya aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhatvaniyatān kṛtvā buddhabhūmau sthitvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena
T02bsu049_u:637: parinirvāsyati ityevamapyanena na sthātavyam, tatkathaṃ punaranena sthātavyaṃ, kathaṃ śikṣitavyamiti? atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra kva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ? āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - na kvacidāyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:640: sa naiva saṃskṛte dhātau sthito nāpyasaṃskṛte dhātau sthito na ca tato vyutthitaḥ //
T02bsu049_u:641: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evameva āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam, evaṃ śikṣitavyam - yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kvacitsthito nāsthito na viṣṭhito nāviṣṭhitaḥ, tathā sthāsyāmītyevamanena śikṣitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:642: yathā tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti, tathā śikṣiṣye iti, yathā tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti, tathā śikṣiṣye iti, yathā tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti susthito 'sthānayogeneti evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyamevaṃ śikṣitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:643: evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti //
T02bsu049_u:644: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhūt - yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣabhāṣitāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni, tāni vijñāyante jalpyamānāni na punaridaṃ vijñāyate yatsubhūtiḥ sthaviro bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayatyupadiśati /
T02bsu049_u:645: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - na vijñāyate na vijñāyate idaṃ devaputrāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:648: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ punarevaitadabhūt - uttānīkariṣyati bata ayamāryasubhūtiḥ
T02bsu049_u:652: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena punar api teṣāmeva devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate (Vaidya 20)
T02bsu049_u:653: sma - tena hi devaputrāḥ yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptukāmaḥ
T02bsu049_u:655: yaḥ sakṛdāgābhiphalaṃ prāptukāmaḥ, sakṛdāgāmiphale sthātukāmaḥ, yo
T02bsu049_u:659: yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāptukāmo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthātukāmaḥ, sa nemāṃ kṣāntimanāgamya............. //
T02bsu049_u:660: atha khalu punar api teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - kiṃrūpā asya āryasubhūterdhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ? atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - māyānirmitasadṛśā hi devaputrā mama dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te
T02bsu049_u:662: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - kiṃ punarārya subhūte māyopamāste sattvā na te māyā? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān
T02bsu049_u:665: iti hi māyā ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram,
T02bsu049_u:666: iti hi svapnaś ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
T02bsu049_u:671: sakṛdāgāmiphalamapi, anāgāmy api anāgāmiphalamapi, arhann api arhattvam
T02bsu049_u:678: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - samyaksaṃbuddho
T02bsu049_u:679: 'pyārya subhūte māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti vadasi? samyaksaṃbuddhatv api māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi? subhūtirāha - nirvāṇam api devaputrā
T02bsu049_u:680: māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi, kiṃ punaranyaṃ dharmam /
T02bsu049_u:681: te devaputrā āhuḥ - nirvāṇamapyārya subhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi? āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - tadyadi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt, tamapyahaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadeyam /
T02bsu049_u:682: iti hi devaputrā māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
T02bsu049_u:683: iti hi svapnaś ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram //
T02bsu049_u:684: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputraḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākoṣṭhilaḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākātyāyanaḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśapaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:685: anye ca mahāśrāvakā anekairbodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhamāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayante sma - ke 'syā āyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti? atha khalvāyuṣmānānandastān sthavirānetadavocat - te khalvāyuṣmanto veditavyā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā (Vaidya 21) mahāsattvāḥ, dṛṣṭisaṃpannā vā pudgalāḥ, arhanto vā kṣīṇāsravāḥ, ye 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti //
T02bsu049_u:686: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavirastān sthavirānetadavocat - nāsyā āyuṣmantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ kecitpratyeṣakā
T02bsu049_u:688: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi - atra na kaściddharmaḥ sūcyate, na kaściddharmaḥ paridīpyate, na kaściddharmaḥ prajñapyate /
T02bsu049_u:689: tadyathaivātra na kaściddharmaḥ sūcyate, na kaściddharmaḥ paridīpyate, na kaściddharmaḥ prajñapyate, tathaivāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyā na kaścitpratyeṣako bhaviṣyati atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - asya dharmaparyāyasya āryeṇa subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇasya pūjārthaṃ yannvahaṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya
T02bsu049_u:691: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasyāṃ velāyāṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimabhyavākirat
T02bsu049_u:692: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya śakraṃ devānāmindramanuvyāharaṇāyaitadabhūt - na khalu punarimāni puṣpāṇi mayā trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pracaranti dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi, yānīmāni śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa abhyavakīrṇāni /
T02bsu049_u:694: naitāni puṣpāṇi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātāni, yāni śakreṇa devānāmindreṇābhyavakīrṇāni,
T02bsu049_u:696: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataḥ subhūteścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:700: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yattvaṃ kauśika evaṃ vadasi -
T02bsu049_u:701: anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇi, naitāni manonirjātāni, nāpi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātānīti /
T02bsu049_u:703: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyamāryaḥ subhūtiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:704: tāṃ ca nāma padaprajñaptiṃ nirdiśati, tāṃ ca na virodhayati, tāṃ
T02bsu049_u:706: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametadārya subhūte, evam etat
T02bsu049_u:707: evaṃ cātra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yathā āryasubhūtirupadiśati /
T02bsu049_u:711: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na srotaāpattiphale śikṣate, na sakṛdāgāmiphale, na anāgāmiphale, nāhartve
T02bsu049_u:712: śikṣate, na pratyekabuddhatve śikṣate, na buddhatve śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:713: yo nāsu bhūmiṣu śikṣate, sa buddhatve sarvajñatve vā śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:714: yo buddhatve sarvajñatve vā śikṣate, so 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:715: yo 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate, sa na rūpasya vivṛddhaye
T02bsu049_u:717: evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu049_u:718: sa na vijñānasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate, na parihāṇāya /
T02bsu049_u:719: yo na rūpasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya /
T02bsu049_u:720: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu049_u:721: yo na vijñānasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya, sa na rūpasya parigrahāya śikṣate notsargāya
T02bsu049_u:722: (Vaidya 22) evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu049_u:724: notsargāya, nāpi kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate, notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:726: notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate, sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate, notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:727: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate, sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati //
T02bsu049_u:728: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
T02bsu049_u:729: notpādāya nāntardhānāsya śikṣate, sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate, notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:730: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmān subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate, sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati //
T02bsu049_u:731: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evametadāyuṣman śāriputra, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:732: ya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
T02bsu049_u:733: notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate, sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate, notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:734: sarvabuddhadharmāṇām api na parigrahāya śikṣate, notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:735: evaṃ cāyuṣman śāriputra śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
T02bsu049_u:737: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:738: prajñāpāramitā ārya śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto
T02bsu049_u:739: gaveṣitavyāḥ? śāriputra āha - prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena
T02bsu049_u:741: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kasyaiṣa ārya śāriputra
T02bsu049_u:743: prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate? āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśika anubhāvo veditavyaḥ
T02bsu049_u:744: tathāgatasyaitadadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate /
T02bsu049_u:745: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - kasyaiṣo
T02bsu049_u:746: veditavyaḥ, kasyaitadanuṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate iti? tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśika anubhāvo veditavyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:748: yad api kauśika evaṃ vadasi - prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto
T02bsu049_u:749: gaveṣitavyeti? prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpādgaveṣitavyā nāpyanyatra rūpādgaveṣitavyā /
T02bsu049_u:750: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārebhyaḥ na vijñānādgaveṣitavyāḥ, nāpyanyatra vijñānādgaveṣitavyā
T02bsu049_u:751: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
T02bsu049_u:753: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:785: kathaṃ punaḥ kauśika ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
T02bsu049_u:786: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi kauśika yato nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate, tataḥ kauśika anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:787: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:788: punaraparaṃ kauśika yasmātsarvadharmā anantā aparyantāḥ, na teṣāmanto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate, tasmātkauśika anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta
T02bsu049_u:790: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
T02bsu049_u:792: vijñānasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
T02bsu049_u:793: anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu049_u:795: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sattvasyānto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vopalabhyate /
T02bsu049_u:797: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā? sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - na hi kauśika gaṇanāyogena vā gaṇanābahutvena vā sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu049_u:798: śakra āha - kathaṃ tarhīdānīmārya subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta (Vaidya 24) prajñāpāramitā? sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkaṃ manyase kauśika katamasyaitaddharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ
T02bsu049_u:799: sattva iti? śakra āha - naitadārya subhūte dharmasyādhivacanaṃ na adharmādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
T02bsu049_u:803: anārambaṇametannāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
T02bsu049_u:804: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkiṃ manyase kauśika kācidatra sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā? śakra āha - no hīdamārya subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:806: yatra kauśika na kācitsattvaparidīpanā kṛtā, tatra kā sattvānantatā?
T02bsu049_u:808: gambhīranirghoṣeṇa svareṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān api vitiṣṭhamānaḥ sattvaḥ sattva iti vācaṃ bhāṣeta, api nu tatra kaścitsattva utpanno va
T02bsu049_u:809: utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā, niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā? śakra āha - no hīdamārya subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:812: subhūtirāha - anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa evaṃ sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:813: evaṃ ca punaḥ kauśika sattvānantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā //
T02bsu049_u:814: atha khalu sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇāstrirudānamudānayanti sma - aho dharmaḥ, aho dharmaḥ, aho dharmasya dharmatā /
T02bsu049_u:816: sthavireṇa subhāṣiteneha sūcyate deśyate prakāśyate prabhāvyate /
T02bsu049_u:817: tathāgataṃ taṃ vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadyāgreṇa dhārayiṣyāmo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhaviṣyati, yo 'pi ca anena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihariṣyati atha khalu bhagavāṃstān sendrakān sabrahmakān saprajāpatikān sarṣinaranārīgaṇānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:818: yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyāmantarāyaṇamadhyagato 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito 'bhūvam, tadāhaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate
T02bsu049_u:820: samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti /
T02bsu049_u:821: atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
T02bsu049_u:823: yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñatāyā āhārikā anuparigrāhikā ceti //
T02bsu049_u:827: atha khalu bhagavān ye tatra devaputrāḥ parṣadi saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāścābhūvan, yāś ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ
T02bsu049_u:828: saṃniṣaṇṇāścābhūvan, tān devaputrān saṃnipatitān saṃniṣaṇṇāṃś ca viditvā,
T02bsu049_u:829: tāś ca sarvāścatasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāś ca viditvā,
T02bsu049_u:830: kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān brahmakāyikāṃś ca devaputrān ābhāsvarāṃś ca parīttaśubhāṃś ca akaniṣṭhāṃś ca devaputrān sākṣiṇaḥ
T02bsu049_u:832: mahābrahmapramukhāṃś ca brahmakāyikān devaputrānābhāsvarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - yo hi kaściddevaputrāḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
T02bsu049_u:833: vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
T02bsu049_u:834: pravartayiṣyati, na tasya māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraprekṣiṇyo 'vatāragaveṣiṇyo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
T02bsu049_u:835: nāpi tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo
T02bsu049_u:837: nāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati //
T02bsu049_u:838: punaraparaṃ devaputrāḥ ye devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T02bsu049_u:839: saṃprasthitāḥ, yaiś ca devaputrairiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā nodgṛhītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā na pravartitā, te devaputrāstaṃ kulaputra vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante, tasya ca kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ
T02bsu049_u:840: paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasyāntikācchroṣyanti, śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:841: na ca khalu punardevaputrāstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasya araṇyagatasya vā vṛkṣamūlagatasya vā śūnyāgāragatasya vā abhyavakāśagatasya vā pathi gatasya vā utpathagatasya vā aṭavīgatasya vā
T02bsu049_u:842: mahāsamudragatasya vā tatra tatropasaṃkrāmato vā caṃkramyamāṇasya vā sthitasya vā niṣaṇṇasya vā vipannasya vā bhayaṃ vā bhaviṣyati,
T02bsu049_u:844: atha khalu catvāro mahārājāno bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yadimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan pravartayan
T02bsu049_u:845: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yānatraye sattvān vinayati, na ca sattvasaṃjñāmutpādayati
T02bsu049_u:846: vayaṃ bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati //
T02bsu049_u:847: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - aham api bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati //
T02bsu049_u:849: - aham api bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
T02bsu049_u:850: saṃvidhāsyāmi, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati //
T02bsu049_u:851: (Vaidya 26) atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yadimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan pravartayan sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imān yato dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān pratilabhate parigṛhṇāti, kiṃ punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:852: sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ
T02bsu049_u:854: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kauśika udgṛhītāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:855: punaraparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ dhāritāyāṃ vācitāyāṃ paryavāptāyāṃ pravartitāyāṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti /
T02bsu049_u:856: tān kauśik sarvān śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
T02bsu049_u:858: sādhu bhagavanniti śakro devānāmindro bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
T02bsu049_u:859: bhagavānetadavocat - tatra kauśika ye mama dharmaṃ vigrahītavyaṃ maṃsyante, vivaditavyaṃ maṃsyante, virodhayitavyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:863: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:864: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetatkauśika bhavati - ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
T02bsu049_u:865: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati
T02bsu049_u:866: svādhyāsyati, tasyaivaṃ tānyutpannotpannānyadhikaraṇāni punarevāntardhāsyanti, na sthāsyanti
T02bsu049_u:867: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:868: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ
T02bsu049_u:869: parigṛhṇāti, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpnoti pravartayati deśayati upadiśati uddiśati svādhyāyati /
T02bsu049_u:870: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika maghī nāmauṣadhī sarvaviṣapraśamanī /
T02bsu049_u:871: tatra āśīviṣeṇa jantunā bubhukṣitena āhārārthinā āhāragaveṣiṇā kaścideva prāṇakajāto janturdṛṣṭo bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:873: atha sa prāṇakajāto yena sā madhī nāmauṣadhī tenopasaṃkramet, tenopasaṃkramya tiṣṭhet /
T02bsu049_u:874: atha sa āśīviṣastasyā oṣadhyā gandhenaiva pratyudāvarteta /
T02bsu049_u:875: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasyā oṣadhyā bhaiṣajyaguṇaḥ sa tādṛśo yastasyāśīviṣasya tadviṣamabhibhavati
T02bsu049_u:877: evameva kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati, tasya kauśika yāni tānyutpannotpannānyadhikaraṇāni vigrahā vivādā virodhā
T02bsu049_u:878: bhaviṣyanti, te prajñāpāramitāyāstejasā balena sthāmataḥ prajñāpāramitābalādhānena kṣipraṃ tata evoparaṃsyanti upaśamiṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:880: yato yata evotpatsyante, tatra tatraiva nirotsyante antardhāsyanti, na vivardhiṣyante na sthāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:882: hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā hi rāgādīnāṃ yāvannirvāṇagrāhasyopaśamayitrī, na vivardhiketi /
T02bsu049_u:883: catvāraś ca tasya mahārājānaḥ (Vaidya 27) śakraś ca devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāpatiḥ sarve ca buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāś
T02bsu049_u:884: ca rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati
T02bsu049_u:885: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyatiḥ uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
T02bsu049_u:886: ayaṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇaḥ parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati //
T02bsu049_u:887: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati, sa ādeyavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati, mṛduvacanaś ca bhaviṣyati, mitavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati, aprakīrṇavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati, na ca krodhābhibhūto
T02bsu049_u:890: prajñāpāramitā paridamayati, prajñāpāramitā pariṇamayati, na krodhaṃ vardhayati, na mānaṃ vardhayati /
T02bsu049_u:891: sa nopanāhaṃ parigṛhṇāti, na vyāpādaṃ parigṛhṇāti, nānuśayaṃ dhārayati /
T02bsu049_u:892: evaṃ carato 'sya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā smṛtirmaitrī cotpadyate /
