T02bsu049_u:1183: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika candramaṇḍalamāgamya sarvā oṣadhīḥ tārā yathābalaṃ yathāsthāmamavabhāsayanti, nakṣatrāṇi ca yathābalaṃ
T02bsu049_u:1185: samyaksaṃbuddhasya atyayena saddharmasyāntardhāne tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanutpādāt yā kāciddharmacaryā samacaryā asamacaryā kuśalacaryā loke prajñāyate prabhāvyate, sarvā sā bodhisattvanirjātā
T02bsu049_u:1188: punaraparaṃ kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇaṃtāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ manasi kurvatāṃ samanvāharatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā tannidānaṃ bahavo dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:1189: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - katamaiḥ punarbhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti ? bhagavānāha - na te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti, na viṣeṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti, na śastreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti, nāgninā kālaṃ kariṣyati, nodakena kālaṃ kariṣyanti, na daṇḍena kālaṃ kariṣyanti, na paripakrameṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1190: utpannotpannāścaiṣāmupadravā rājato vā rājaputrato vā rājamantrito vā rājamahāmātrato vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharatāṃ vā svādhyāyatāṃ vā punarevāntardhāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1191: teṣāṃ ca enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ punaḥ punaḥ samanvāharatāṃ vā svādhyāyatāṃ vā ye tatropasaṃkrāmeyuravatāraprekṣiṇo
T02bsu049_u:1192: 'vatāragaveṣiṇo rājāno vā rājaputrā vā rājamantriṇo vā rājamahāmātrā vā,
T02bsu049_u:1193: na te 'vatāraṃ lapsyante yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītatvāt /
T02bsu049_u:1194: upasaṃkrāntānāṃ ca teṣāṃ rājñāṃ vā rājaputrāṇāṃ vā rājamantriṇāṃ vā,
T02bsu049_u:1197: tatkasya hetoḥ? iyaṃ hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvasattvānāmantike maitropasaṃhāreṇa maitracittatayā karuṇopasaṃhāreṇa karuṇacittatayā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu049_u:1198: tasmāttarhi kauśika ye 'pi te vyālasarīsṛpakāntāramadhyagatāḥ, teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo
T02bsu049_u:1199: 'vatāragaveṣiṇaḥ, te 'pi teṣāṃ kauśika avatāraṃ na lapsyante sthāpayitvā
T02bsu049_u:1201: atha khalvanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāmupālambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ śataṃ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
T02bsu049_u:1202: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro dūrata eva āgacchatastānanyatīrthyān parivrājakān dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ cittāni vyavalokya evaṃ cintayāmāsa - ime khalu anyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā upālambhābhiprāyā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
T02bsu049_u:1203: yannvahaṃ yāvanmātro mayāṃ bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśa udgṛhītaḥ, tāvanmātraṃ smṛtyā samanvāhareyaṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ pravartayeyam,
T02bsu049_u:1206: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro yāvanmātro bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśaḥ udgṛhītaḥ, tāvanmātraṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma, svādhyāyati sma,
T02bsu049_u:1208: atha te 'nyatīrthāḥ parivrājakā dūrāddūrataraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva dvāreṇa tenaiva mārgeṇa punareva niṣkrāntāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:1210: kimatra kāraṇaṃ yena ime 'nyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā dūrāddūrataraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva dvāreṇa tenaiva mārgeṇa punareva
T02bsu049_u:1211: niṣkrāntāḥ? atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:1212: śakreṇa śāriputra devānāmindreṇa teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāmupālambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ cittāni vyavalokya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā smṛtyā samanvāhṛtā svādhyāyitā pravartitā, teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ nivartanārtham, yathā asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā ete 'nyatīrthyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:1217: hetoḥ? nāhaṃ śāriputra teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāmekasyāpi śuklaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi
T02bsu049_u:1218: sarve te śāriputra upālambhābhiprāyāḥ pratihatacittā upasaṃkramitukāmā abhūvan //
T02bsu049_u:1219: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasya etadabhūt - imāstathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāstathāgatasya
T02bsu049_u:1221: ime ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:1225: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃścaturaṅgabalakāyamabhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma
T02bsu049_u:1226: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - māro batāyaṃ pāpīyāṃścaturaṅgabalakāyamabhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
T02bsu049_u:1227: yaścāyaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ, nāyaṃ rājño bimbisārasya
T02bsu049_u:1228: caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ, nāpi rājñaḥ prasenajitaścaturaṅgasya
T02bsu049_u:1229: balakāyasya vyūhaḥ, nāpi śākyānāṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ, nāpi licchavīnāṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ, yo 'yaṃ māreṇa pāpīyasā abhinirmitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:1230: samanubaddho dīrgharātraṃ māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavato 'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī, sattvānāṃ ca viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:1231: yannvahamimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāhareyaṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ pravartayeyamiti /
T02bsu049_u:1232: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma svādhyāyati sma pravartayati sma /
T02bsu049_u:1233: yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindra imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma svādhyāyati sma pravartayati sma, tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyāṃstenaiva mārgeṇa punareva pratyudāvṛttaḥ //
T02bsu049_u:1234: atha khalu trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyāni māndārapuṣpāṇyabhinirmāya vihāyasā antarīkṣagatā yena bhagavāṃstenābhyavakiranti sma, yena bhagavāṃstena tāni divyāni māndāravapuṣpāṇyabhiprakiranti sma, evaṃ codānamudānayanti sma - cirasya bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmupāvṛtteti punareva ca divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenābhyavakiranti sma, abhiprakiranti sma /
T02bsu049_u:1236: ye kecidbhagavan sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyante bhāvayiṣyanti,
T02bsu049_u:1237: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti, na teṣāṃ māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraṃ lapsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1238: na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena (Vaidya
T02bsu049_u:1239: 40) samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti, ye imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti, śrutva
T02bsu049_u:1242: pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāste bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyanti, yeṣāmiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsamāgamiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:1243: kaḥ punarvādo ye enāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
T02bsu049_u:1246: tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi sarvajñatā gaveṣitavyā yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:1247: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan yāni kānicidratnāni mahāratnāni, sarvāṇi tāni mahāsamudraprabhāvitāni, sarvāṇi tāni mahāsamudrādgaveṣitavyāni, evameva bhagavan sarvajñatāmahāratnaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmahāsamudrādgaveṣitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:1248: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:1249: atonirjātaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatāmahāratnaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitāmahāsamudrāt
T02bsu049_u:1250: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - na bhagavan dānapāramitāyā
T02bsu049_u:1254: na bhagavan dhyānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣate, na nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati /
T02bsu049_u:1255: api tu prajñāpāramitāyā evaikasyā bhagavān varṇaṃ bhāṣate, nāmadheyaṃ ca parikīrtayati /
T02bsu049_u:1257: prajñāpāramitāyā evāhamānanda varṇaṃ bhāṣe nāmadheyaṃ ca parikīrtayāmi, nānyāsāṃ pāramitānām
T02bsu049_u:1259: hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā hi ānanda pūrvaṃgamā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām /
T02bsu049_u:1260: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitānāmadheyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:1261: labhate? āyuṣmānānanda āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:1262: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ śīlamapariṇāmitā kṣāntirapariṇāmitaṃ
T02bsu049_u:1263: vīryamapariṇāmitaṃ dhyānam? tatkiṃ manyase ānanda apariṇāmitā prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate? ānanda āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:1264: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase tvamānanda acintyā sā prajñā yā kuśalamūlāni sarvajñatāpariṇāmena pariṇāmayati? ānanda āha -
T02bsu049_u:1267: paramācintyā sā bhagavan prajñā, yā kuśalamūlāni sarvajñatāpariṇāmena
T02bsu049_u:1268: pariṇāmayati bhagavānāha - tasmāttarhi ānanda paramatvātsā prajñā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate, yayā sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmitāni kuśalamūlāni pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante /
T02bsu049_u:1269: tasmāttarhi ānanda sarvajñatāpariṇāmitakuśalamūlatvātprajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyikā /
T02bsu049_u:1270: anena yogena antargatāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmeva ānanda ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇādhivacanametadyaduta prajñāpāramiteti /
T02bsu049_u:1271: tasmāttarhi ānanda prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parikīrtitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parikīrtitā bhavanti
T02bsu049_u:1272: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda mahāpṛthivyāṃ bījāni prakīrṇāni sāmagrīṃ labhamānāni virohanti /
T02bsu049_u:1276: evameva ānanda prajñāpāramitāsaṃgṛhītāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhante /
T02bsu049_u:1279: tasmāttarhi ānanda prajñāpāramitaiva pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyakā
T02bsu049_u:1280: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - na tāvadime bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarve guṇāḥ parikīrtitāḥ, yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parigṛhṇīte prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvā
T02bsu049_u:1285: na khalu punaḥ kauśika kevalaṃ yaḥ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati, tasyaiva kevalamamī guṇā bhaviṣyanti yo 'pi kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā
T02bsu049_u:1286: sthāpayiṣyati saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt, mā saddharmāntardhānam
T02bsu049_u:1287: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
T02bsu049_u:1288: tāṃ caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati apacāyiṣyati puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:1289: pūjayiṣyati, tasyāpyahaṃ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā enān
T02bsu049_u:1291: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - aham api bhagavaṃstasyāpi kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā
T02bsu049_u:1292: dhārayiṣyati sthāpayiṣyati saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt, mā saddharmāntardhānam
T02bsu049_u:1293: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
T02bsu049_u:1294: tāṃ caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:1296: patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:1297: / kaḥ punarvādo yaḥ enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyati udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati apacāyiṣyati puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:1298: patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:1300: tasya khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyato bahūni devaputraśatānyupasaṃkramiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1303: te ca devaputrā dharmaṃ śṛṇvantastasya dharmabhāṇakasya pratibhānamupasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante
T02bsu049_u:1304: yadāpi sa dharmabhāṇako na jalpitukāmo bhaviṣyati, tadāpi tasya te devaputrāstenaiva dharmagauraveṇa pratibhānamupasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante, yathā tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bhāṣitumeva chando bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:1305: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //
T02bsu049_u:1306: punaraparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇasya catasṝṇāṃ parṣadāmagrato nāvalīnacittatā bhaviṣyati - mā khalu māṃ kaścitparyanuyuñjīta upālambhābhiprāya iti /
T02bsu049_u:1308: tathā hi tasya prajñāpāramitā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karoti /
T02bsu049_u:1309: sa upālambhān api prajñāpāramitāvihārī na samanupaśyati, upālambhakarān api prajñāpāramitāvihārī na samanupaśyati, yo 'pyupālabhyeta tam api na
T02bsu049_u:1310: samanupaśyati, tām api prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati /
T02bsu049_u:1311: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā anena paryāyeṇa na kaścitparyanuyogo bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:1312: sa ca notrasiṣyati, na saṃtrasiṣyati, na saṃtrāsamāpatsyate /
T02bsu049_u:1313: imān api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati
T02bsu049_u:1314: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati
T02bsu049_u:1315: punaraparaṃ kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā priyo bhaviṣyati mātāpitṝṇāṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaśramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ hitānāṃ ca,
T02bsu049_u:1316: pratibalaś ca bhaviṣyati, śaktaś ca bhaviṣyati utpannotpannānāṃ parapravādināṃ sahadharmeṇa nigrahāya, paraiś ca pratyanuyujyamānaḥ
T02bsu049_u:1318: imān api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti, yaḥ kulaputro
T02bsu049_u:1319: kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //
T02bsu049_u:1320: yatra khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṃgamaṃ sthāpayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
T02bsu049_u:1321: tatra kauśika ye keciccāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi tatra āgantavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1323: tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1324: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryāvāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya (Vaidya 43) svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:1326: evaṃ ye kecitkauśika trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1327: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1328: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśya uddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1329: ye 'pi kecitkauśika yāmeṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1330: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1331: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1332: ye 'pi kecitkauśika tuṣiteṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1333: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1334: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1336: devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1337: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:1339: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1341: 'pi kecitkauśika paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1343: tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1344: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1345: evaṃ ye 'pi kecitkauśika rūpāvacareṣu deveṣu devaputrā yāvanto brahmaloke brahmakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1346: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1347: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1348: mā te 'tra kauśika evaṃ bhūdyathā brahmakāyikā eveti /
T02bsu049_u:1352: evaṃ ye 'pi kecitkauśika mahābrahmāsu parīttābheṣvapramāṇābheṣvābhāsvareṣu parīttasubheṣvapramāṇaśubheṣu śubhakṛtsneṣvanabhrakeṣu puṇyaprasaveṣu bṛhatphaleṣvasaṃjñisattveṣvabṛheṣvatapeṣu sudṛśeṣu sudarśaneṣu /
T02bsu049_u:1354: kecitkauśika akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T02bsu049_u:1356: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1357: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1358: evaṃ ca kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā cittamutpādayitavyam - ye keciddaśasu dikṣu aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyā amanuṣyāḥ, te itaḥ pustakātprajñāpāramitāṃ paśyantu vandantāṃ namaskurvantu udgṛhṇantu dhārayantu paryavāpnuvantu pravartayantu deśayantu upadiśantu uddiśantu svādhyāyantu /
T02bsu049_u:1359: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvā upadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva svabhavanāni gacchantu - teṣāmidaṃ dharmadānameva dattaṃ bhavatviti /
T02bsu049_u:1360: mā te 'tra kauśika evaṃ bhūt - ye asminneva cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ, te eva kevalaṃ tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyanta iti /
T02bsu049_u:1362: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ, te 'pi
T02bsu049_u:1365: pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1366: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1367: tasya khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā gṛhaṃ vā layanaṃ vā prāsādo vā surakṣito bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:1368: na ca tasya kaścidviheṭhako bhaviṣyati sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākena /
T02bsu049_u:1369: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigrahīṣyati - yatra hi nāma evaṃ mahaujaskā devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā āgantavyaṃ maṃsyante //
T02bsu049_u:1370: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ punarbhagavan sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā evaṃ jānīyāt - iha devā vā nāgā vā yakṣā vā gandharvā vā asurā vā garuḍā vā kinnarā vā mahoragā va manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā āgacchanti imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrotuṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ namaskartumudgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayituṃ
T02bsu049_u:1372: devānāmindrametadavocat - sacetkauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatra
T02bsu049_u:1373: udāramavabhāsaṃ saṃjānīte, niṣṭhā tena kulaputreṇa vā (Vaidya 45)
T02bsu049_u:1374: kuladuhitrā vā tatra gantavyā - iha devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā gandharvo vā
T02bsu049_u:1375: asuro vā garuḍo vā kinnaro vā mahorago vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā āgata
T02bsu049_u:1377: punaraparaṃ sacetkauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatra amānuṣaṃ gandhaṃ ghrāsyatyanāghrātapūrvam, ghrātvā ca tadgandhaṃ
T02bsu049_u:1378: niṣṭhā tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra gantavyā - iha devo vā
T02bsu049_u:1379: nāgo vā yakṣo vā gandharvo vā asuro vā garuḍo vā kinnaro vā mahorago vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā āgata iti, upasaṃkrānta iti //
T02bsu049_u:1380: punaraparaṃ sacetkauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatra amānuṣaṃ gandhaṃ ghrāsyati anāghrātapūrvam, ghrātvā ca tadgandhaṃ niṣṭhā tena kulaputreṇa
T02bsu049_u:1381: vā kuladuhitrā tatra gantavyāḥ, - iha devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā gandharvo vā asuro vā garuḍo va kinnaro vā mahorago vā manuṣyo vā[amanuṣyo vā]āgata
T02bsu049_u:1383: punaraparaṃ sacetkauśika kulaputro va kuladuhitā vā caukṣasamudācāro bhaviṣyati, śucisamudācāro bhaviṣyati, tasya tayā caukṣasamudācāratayā śucisamudācāratayā te devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā āgantavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1384: ye ca tatra devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā āgatā bhaviṣyanti, te tasya tayā caukṣasamudācāratayā śucisamudācāratayā āttamanaskāḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:1385: yāś ca tatra alpaujaskā alpaujaskā devatā adhyuṣitā bhaviṣyanti, tāstato 'pakramitavyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:1387: tatkasya hetoḥ? teṣāmeva hi mahaujaskānāṃ mahaujaskānāṃ devānāṃ nāgāna yakṣāṇāṃ gandharvāṇāmasurāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ kinnarāṇāṃ mahoragāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ mamanuṣyāṇāṃ vā śriyaṃ ca tejaś ca gauravaṃ ca asahamānā eva tā alpaujaskā alpaujaskā devatā tato 'pakramitavyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:1389: yathā yathā khalu punaḥ kauśika te mahaujaskā mahaujaskā devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā abhīkṣṇamupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante, tathā tathā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasādabahulo bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:1390: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigrahīṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:1391: tena khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tasya dharmanetrīsthānasya parisāmantake 'śuciracaukṣasamudācāro na pracārayitavyaḥ tasyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:1393: punaraparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā na kāyaklamatho na cittaklamatha utpatsyate
T02bsu049_u:1394: sa sukhameva śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati, sukhaṃ ca prakramiṣyati, suptaś ca san na pāpakān svapnān drakṣati, paśyaṃś ca punastathāgatānevārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān drakṣyati, stūpāneva drakṣyati,
T02bsu049_u:1396: śabdāṃś ca śṛṇvan pāramitāśabdāneva śroṣyati, bodhipakṣāneva dharmān drakṣyati,
T02bsu049_u:1399: tathā abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ ca dharmacakrapravartanaṃ drakṣyati, bahūṃś ca bodhisattvāneva drakṣyati imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃgāyamānān prajñāpāramitāsaṃgītiratān - evaṃ sarvajñatā parigrahītavyā, evaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ viśodhayitavyam,
T02bsu049_u:1401: udāraṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmabhisaṃbodhiśabdaṃ śroṣyati - amuṣyāṃ diśi amuṣmin digbhāge amuṣmin lokadhātau amuko 'sau nāmnā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakāṇāṃ śatairbahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakasahasrair
T02bsu049_u:1402: bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakaśatasahasrair bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakakoṭībhir bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakakoṭīśatair bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakakoṭīsahasraiḥ bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakakoṭīśatasahasrairbahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayatīti /
T02bsu049_u:1403: yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imānevaṃrūpān svapnān drakṣyati, sa sukhameva svapsyati, sukhaṃ ca pratibhotsyate, ojaḥprakṣiptaṃ ca kāyaṃ sukhaṃ ca pratisaṃvedayiṣyati, laghu ladhveva ca pratisaṃvedayiṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:1406: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika bhikṣoryogācārasya samādhervyutthitasya manasikārapariṣyanditena cittena na balavatyāhāre
T02bsu049_u:1407: gṛddhirbhavati, mṛdukā cāsya āhārasaṃjñā bhavati, evameva kauśika tasya
T02bsu049_u:1408: kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā na balavatyāhāre gṛddhirbhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:1411: - yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogānuyuktatvāttasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā tathā hyasya amanuṣyāḥ kāye oja upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:1412: imān api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti //
T02bsu049_u:1413: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṃgamaṃ sthāpayet pūjayennodgṛhṇīyānna dhārayenna vācayenna paryavāpnuyāt na pravartayenna deśayennopadiśennoddiśenna svādhyāyet, ayameva tataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
T02bsu049_u:1414: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya adhyāśayataḥ
T02bsu049_u:1416: parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet, arthamasyā vivṛṇuyāt,
T02bsu049_u:1417: manasānvavekṣeta, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta,
T02bsu049_u:1420: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
T02bsu049_u:1423: - panaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayet, ayameva tataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
T02bsu049_u:1424: tasmāttarhi kauśika imān dṛṣṭadhārmikān viśiṣṭān guṇān parigṛhītukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā iyameva prajñāpāramitā abhiśraddhātavyā (Vaidya 47) avakalpayitavyā adhibhoktavyā /
T02bsu049_u:1425: prasannacittena bodhāya cittamutpādya satkṛtya adhyāśayena śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā, parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā, arthato
T02bsu049_u:1426: vivaritavyā, manasānvavekṣitavyā, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta /
T02bsu049_u:1427: antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā sthāpayitavyā pūjayitavyā saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt, mā saddharmāntardhānam /
T02bsu049_u:1428: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
T02bsu049_u:1429: arthikānāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca saṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāmi, mama ca pareṣāṃ ca kalyāṇasattvānāṃ buddhanetrīmahācakṣuravaikalyatā bhaviṣyatīti /
T02bsu049_u:1430: sadā ca satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā
T02bsu049_u:1432: patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:1437: punaraparaṃ bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma - sacetkauśika ayaṃ te jambūdvīpaḥ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ dīyeta, iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā likhitvopanāmyeta, tata ekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo
T02bsu049_u:1438: 'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ katamaṃ tvaṃ kauśika bhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāḥ?
T02bsu049_u:1439: śakra āha - sacenme bhagavan ayaṃ jambūdvīpaḥ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ dīyeta, iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:1445: tatkasya hetoḥ? uktaṃ hyetadbhagavatā - dharmakāyā buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:1446: mā khalu punarimaṃ bhikṣavaḥ satkāyaṃ kāyaṃ manyadhvam /
T02bsu049_u:1448: eṣa ca tathāgatakāyo bhūtakoṭiprabhāvito draṣṭavyo yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:1451: api tu khalu punarbhagavan itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto nirjātāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante
T02bsu049_u:1452: tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayaiva prajñāpāramitayā pūjitayā teṣām api tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇā pūjā kṛtā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:1454: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāmahaṃ yasmin samaye divye svake āsane niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi, tadā mama devaputrā upasthānāyāgacchanti /
T02bsu049_u:1455: yasmin samaye na niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi, atha tasmin samaye yanmamāsanaṃ tatra devaputrā mama gauraveṇa tadāsanaṃ namaskṛtya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva prakrāmanti /
T02bsu049_u:1456: tatkasya hetoḥ? iha hi kila āsane niṣadya śakro devānāmindro devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatīti /
T02bsu049_u:1460: na tu tāni pratyayabhūtāni, na kāraṇabhūtāni jñānasyotpādāya /
T02bsu049_u:1461: evameva bhagavan sarvajñajñānahetukā tathāgataśarīreṣu pūjā kṛtā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:1462: tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām
T02bsu049_u:1465: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvātpūjāṃ labhante
T02bsu049_u:1466: tiṣṭhatu khalu punarbhagavan ayaṃ jambūdvīpastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:1469: tiṣṭhatu bhagavan dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ
T02bsu049_u:1471: paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ, eko bhāgaḥ kṛtvā sthāpyeta, iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dvitīyo bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta /
T02bsu049_u:1473: sthāpitayoryaste bhāgo 'bhipretastamekaṃ bhāgaṃ gṛhāṇeti, tatra imāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām /
T02bsu049_u:1477: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni pūjāṃ labhante
T02bsu049_u:1480: tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām
T02bsu049_u:1481: na khalu punar me bhagavaṃsteṣu tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam /
T02bsu049_u:1483: api tu khalu punarbhagavan itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto nirjātāni tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante yaduta prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvāt /
T02bsu049_u:1484: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan anarghaṃ maṇiratnamebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ syāt /
T02bsu049_u:1485: tadyathā - tadyatra yatra sthāpyeta, tatra tatra manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraṃ na labheran
T02bsu049_u:1486: yatra yatra vā amanuṣyagṛhītaḥ kaścidbhavet puruṣo vā strī vā, tatra tatra tasmin maṇiratne praveśitamātre so 'manuṣyastato 'pakrāmet /
T02bsu049_u:1487: vātenāpi bādhyamānasya dhamyamāne śarīre tanmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta /
T02bsu049_u:1491: tasya tad api pittaṃ nigṛhṇīyāt, na vivardhayet, upaśamayet /
T02bsu049_u:1492: śleṣmaṇāpi parigṛddhe sarvato bādhyamāne śarīre sthāpyeta, tasya tam api
T02bsu049_u:1494: sāṃnipātikenāpi vyādhinā duḥkhitasya śarīre sthāpyeta, tasya tam api sāṃnipātikaṃ vyādhiṃ nigṛhṇīyāt, na vivardhayet, upaśamayet /
T02bsu049_u:1496: uṣṇe cāpi vartamāne yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe sthāpyeta, sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ śītalo bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:1497: śīte cāpi vartamāne yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe sthāpyeta, sa pṛthivīpradeśa uṣṇo bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:1498: yasmiṃś ca pṛthivīpradeśe āśīviṣā anuvicareyuḥ, tathā anye 'pi kṣudrajantavaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:1499: tatrāpi pṛthivīpradeśe dhāryeta, sthāpitaṃ vā bhavet, te 'pyāśīviṣāste ca kṣudrajantavastato 'pakrāmeyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:1500: sacedbhagavan strī vā puruṣo vā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭo bhavet, tasya tanmaṇiratnaṃ daśyeta, tasya sahadaṃśanenaiva maṇiratnasya tadviṣaṃ pratihanyeta vigacchet /
T02bsu049_u:1501: ebhiścānyaiś ca bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:1502: yeṣām api keṣāṃcidbhagavan akṣiṣvarbudaṃ vā timiraṃ vā akṣirogo vā paṭalaṃ vā
T02bsu049_u:1503: bhavet, teṣāṃ ca tanmaṇiratnamakṣiṣu sthāpyeta, teṣāṃ sthāpitamātreṇaiva te 'kṣidoṣā nirghātaṃ praśamaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:1504: etaiś ca anyaiś ca bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:1505: yatra codake sthāpyeta, tadapyudakamekavarṇaṃ kuryātsvakena varṇena /
T02bsu049_u:1506: sacetpāṇḍareṇa vastreṇa pariveṣṭya udake prakṣipyeta, tadudakaṃ pāṇḍarīkuryāt /
T02bsu049_u:1507: evaṃ sacennīlena pītena lohitena māñjiṣṭhena eteṣāmanyeṣāṃ vā nānāprakārāṇāṃ vastrāṇāmanyatamena vastreṇa tanmaṇiratnaṃ veṣṭayitvā vā baddhvā vā udake prakṣipyeta, tena tena vastrarāgeṇa tattatsvabhāvavarṇaṃ tadudakaṃ kuryāt
T02bsu049_u:1509: ebhir api bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet //
T02bsu049_u:1510: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kiṃ punaḥ kauśika devaloka (Vaidya 50) eva tāni maṇiratnāni santi, uta jāmbūdvīpakānām api manuṣyāṇāṃ tāni maṇiratnāni santi? śakra āha -
T02bsu049_u:1512: api tu khalu punarjāmbudvīpakānām api manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni santi /
T02bsu049_u:1513: tāni tu gurukāṇi alpāni parīttāni guṇavikalāni, na taistathārūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatāni
T02bsu049_u:1514: tatteṣāṃ divyānāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopayānti, sahasratamīmapi,
T02bsu049_u:1517: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamante nopayānti /
T02bsu049_u:1518: yāni khalu punardeveṣu, tāni laghūni sarvākāraguṇaparipūrṇāni /
T02bsu049_u:1519: yatra ca karaṇḍake tanmaṇiratnaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavati utkṣiptaṃ vā, tata uddhṛte 'pi tasmin maṇiratne karaṇḍakāt spṛhaṇīya eva sa karaṇḍako bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:1521: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā ete guṇāḥ sarvajñajñānasya ca /
T02bsu049_u:1522: yena parinirvṛtasyāpi tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante
T02bsu049_u:1524: yathā ca bhagavan sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā
T02bsu049_u:1527: yathā ca bhagavan rājapuruṣo rājānubhāvānmahato janakāyasya akutobhayaḥ pūjyaḥ, evaṃ sa dharmabhāṇako
T02bsu049_u:1529: yathā ca dharmadeśanā dharmabhāṇakāś ca pūjāṃ labhante, evaṃ tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
T02bsu049_u:1531: tasmāttarhi bhagavan tiṣṭhatu trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ, ye 'pi bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ, te 'pi sarve tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇāścūlikābaddhā eko bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta, iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:1533: tatra cenmāṃ bhagavan kaścideva pravārayedanyatareṇa bhāgena, pravāryamāṇo 'nayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ -
T02bsu049_u:1534: yaste bhāgo 'bhipretaḥ tamekaṃ bhāgaṃ parigṛhṇīṣveti, tatra imāmevāhaṃ bhagavaṃstayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorbhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitām /
T02bsu049_u:1535: na khalu punarbhagavan mama teṣu tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam /
T02bsu049_u:1537: api tu khalu punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitā sarvajñatā,
T02bsu049_u:1539: tasmāttarhi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pūjitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjā kṛtā bhavati //
T02bsu049_u:1540: punaraparaṃ bhagavan ye 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanta
T02bsu049_u:1541: etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, tān dharmatayā draṣṭukāmena
T02bsu049_u:1542: kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
T02bsu049_u:1545: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:1546: ye 'pi te kauśika abhūvannatīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ, te 'pi kauśika imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:1547: (Vaidya 51) ye 'pi te kauśika bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, te 'pi kauśika imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya
T02bsu049_u:1550: aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, te 'pi kauśika buddhā bhagavantaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ aham api kauśika etarhi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ //
T02bsu049_u:1551: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:1555: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, tena sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samyak prajānāti saṃpaśyati //
T02bsu049_u:1556: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmeva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati nānyāsu pāramitāsu?
T02bsu049_u:1557: bhagavānāha - sarvāsu kauśika ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati /
T02bsu049_u:1558: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva atra pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ vā dadataḥ, śīlaṃ vā rakṣataḥ, kṣāntyā vā saṃpādayamānasya, vīryaṃ vā ārabhamāṇasya, dhyānaṃ vā samāpadyamānasya, dharmān vā vipaśyataḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitaivātra pūrvaṃgamā /
T02bsu049_u:1559: na ca kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ viśeṣaḥ, na ca nānākaraṇamupalabhyate /
T02bsu049_u:1560: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jambudvīpe nānāvṛkṣā nānāvarṇā nānāsaṃsthānā nānāpatrā nānāpuṣpā nānāphalā nānārohapariṇāhasaṃpannāḥ, na ca teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ chāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate, api tu chāyā chāyetyevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gacchati, evameva kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:1561: sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ na viśeṣaḥ, na ca nānākaraṇamupalabhyate /
T02bsu049_u:1562: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāguṇasamanvāgateyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:1568: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya
T02bsu049_u:1571: saṃprakāśayet, arthamasyā vivṛṇuyāt, manasānvavekṣeta, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta, antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā dhārayetsthāpayetsaddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
T02bsu049_u:1573: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca anugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
T02bsu049_u:1574: evamimaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā evaṃmahārthikā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā, evaṃmahānuśaṃsā,
T02bsu049_u:1575: evaṃmahāphalā, evaṃmahāvipākā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā, evaṃ bahuguṇasamanvāgateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā, aparityajanīyā mayā prajñāpāramitā,
T02bsu049_u:1576: rakṣitavyā mama prajñāpāramitā, gopāyitavyā mama prajñāpāramitā,
T02bsu049_u:1578: svayameva caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyetpuṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ yo vā anyaḥ
T02bsu049_u:1579: saṃpūjya parasmai cārthikāya chandikāya kulaputrāya kuladuhitre vā yācamānāya dadyādupanāmayenniryātayetparityajet, antaśaḥ pustakagatām api
T02bsu049_u:1581: katarastayorbhagavan kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet - yo vā parityāgabuddhiryo vā na parityāgabuddhiḥ? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - tena hi kauśika tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi /
T02bsu049_u:1583: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śarīraṃ satkṛtya paricareddhārayet satkuryādgurukuryānmānayet pūjayedarcayedapacāyet svayameva /
T02bsu049_u:1584: yo vā anyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīraṃ svayaṃ ca satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyet, parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet, dadyāt saṃvibhajet vaistārikī pūjā bhaviṣyatīti sattvānāṃ cānukampāmupādāya /
T02bsu049_u:1585: katarastayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet? kiṃ yaḥ svayaṃ ca pūjayet parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeddadyāt saṃvibhajet, kiṃ vā yaḥ
T02bsu049_u:1586: svayameva pratyātmaṃ pūjayet? śakra āha - yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svayaṃ ca
T02bsu049_u:1588: saṃprakāśayeddadyātsaṃvibhajet vaistārikī pūjā bhaviṣyatīti sattvānāṃ cānukampāmupādāya, ayamevānayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā
T02bsu049_u:1591: evametatkauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā udgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt pravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśetsvādhyāyet, parasmai cārthikāya chandikāya kulaputrāya kuladuhitre vā yācamānāya dadyādupanāmayenniryātayetparityajedantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā /
T02bsu049_u:1592: ayameva kauśika tayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ (Vaidya 53) kuladuhitrorvā parānugrahakaraḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parityāgabuddhistannidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
T02bsu049_u:1593: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yatra yatra bhājanībhūtāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā syuḥ asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:1594: tatra tatra gatvā tebhyaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt,
T02bsu049_u:1595: ayameva kauśika tataḥ kulaputrātkuladuhiturvā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //
T02bsu049_u:1596: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ye jambūdvīpe sattvāstān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayet pratiṣṭhāpayet,
T02bsu049_u:1597: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha - bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata /

T02bsu049_u:2031: yastaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kṣiprābhijñataraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadedanuśiṣyāt, ayaṃ tataḥ paurvakātkulaputrātkuladuhiturvā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //
T02bsu049_u:2032: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - yathā yathā bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:2033: bodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, tathā tathā prajñāpāramitāyāmavavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ, tathā tathā prajñāpāramitāyāmavodyamāno 'nuśiṣyamāṇastathatāyā āsannībhavati tathatāyā āsannībhavan yeṣāṃ paribhuṅke
T02bsu049_u:2037: (Vaidya 68) tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetadbhagavan bhavati - yadbodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ //
T02bsu049_u:2038: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kauśika yastvaṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmutsāhaṃ dadāsi anugṛhṇīṣe
T02bsu049_u:2040: evaṃ ca kauśika tvayā karaṇīyam - ya āryaśrāvakaḥ sarvasattvānāmanugrahaṃ kartukāmaḥ, sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutsāhaṃ vardhayati anugṛhṇīte
T02bsu049_u:2042: tatkasya hetoḥ? ataḥprasūtā hi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2043: yadi hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā etadbodhicittaṃ notpādayeran, na caite bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau śikṣeran, na ṣaṭpāramitāsu śikṣeran,
T02bsu049_u:2045: yasmāttarhi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaśikṣāyāmāsu ṣaṭpāramitāsu śikṣante,
T02bsu049_u:2050: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayate sma - yacca khalu punaḥ ārya subhūte bodhisattvasya
T02bsu049_u:2051: mahāsattvasya anumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, yacca sarvasattvānāṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu,
T02bsu049_u:2052: bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, idameva tato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu agramākhyāyate,
T02bsu049_u:2056: evamukte āyupyān subhūtiḥ sthaviraṃ maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yatpunarayaṃ maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśadiśi loke sarvataḥ sarvatra gatayā aprameyāprameyeṣu asaṃkhyeyāsaṃkhyeṣu aparimāṇāparimāṇeṣu acintyācintyeṣu anantāparyanteṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu atīte 'dhvani ekaikasyāṃ diśi ekaikasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau aprameyāprameyāṇāyāmasaṃkhyeyāsaṃkhyeyānāmaparimāṇāparimāṇānāmacintyācintyānāmanantāparyantānāmanupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2057: paryāttabāṣpāṇāṃ marditakaṇṭakānāṃ svapahṛtabhārāṇāmanuprāptasvakārthānāṃ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanānāṃ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittānāṃ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptānāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhitaḥ, etasminnantare yasteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaśca, yāni ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni, buddhaguṇasaṃpatpratisaṃyuktāni
T02bsu049_u:2059: evamabhijñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni parijñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni praṇidhānapāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni sarvajñajñānasaṃpatpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni, yā ca hitaiṣitā, yā ca mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ, yā ca anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ, yacca anuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhisukham, yā ca sarvadharmaiśvaryapāramitā, yaś ca aparimeyo 'nabhibhūtaḥ sarvābhibhūtaḥ paramaṛddhyabhisaṃskāraḥ, yacca anāvaraṇamasaṅgamapratihatamasamamasamasamamanupamamaparimeyaṃ tathāgatayathābhūtajñānabalam, yadbuddhajñānabalam, balānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2060: yadbuddhajñānadarśanam, yā ca daśabalapāramitā, yaś ca caturvaiśāradyaparamasukhaparipūrṇo 'dhigamaḥ, yaś ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2065: dharmadānasaṃpravāraṇam, ye ca tatra dharmadeśanāsu buddhadharmeṣu pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu (Vaidya 70) śrāvakadharmeṣu vā vinītāḥ śikṣitā adhimuktā niyatāḥ saṃbodhiparāyaṇāḥ, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni,
T02bsu049_u:2066: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2067: samyaksaṃbodhau, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni, ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtāḥ pratyekabodhau, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni, yacca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, śīlamayaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2068: puṇyakriyāvastu, bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, yāni ca śaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi
T02bsu049_u:2069: kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca aśaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni, yaiś ca pṛthagjanaistatra dharmakuśalamūlānyavaropitāni, teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2070: bhagavatāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ upāsakānāmupāsikānām,
T02bsu049_u:2071: yacca dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, bhāvanāmayaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2072: puṇyakriyāvastu, yaiś ca tatra teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatāṃ devairnāgairyakṣairgandharvairasurairgaruḍaiḥ
T02bsu049_u:2073: kinnarairmahoragairmanuṣyāmanuṣyairvā yaiś ca tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni, yaiś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvāpayatām api kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni, yaiś ca tatra teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānām api kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni, buddhaṃ ca bhagavantamāgamya dharmaṃ cāgamya saṃghaṃ cāgamya manobhāvanīyāṃś ca
T02bsu049_u:2074: pudgalānāgamya teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni, tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ niravaśeṣāniravaśeṣamanavaśeṣamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā
T02bsu049_u:2075: agrayā anumodanayā anumodeta, śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttarayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodeta /
T02bsu049_u:2076: evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta - anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /
T02bsu049_u:2078: yairvastubhiranumodeta, yairārambaṇairyairākāraistaccittamutpādayet, api nu tāni vastūni tāni vā ārambaṇāni te vā ākārāstathopalabhyeran yathā nimittīkaroti? evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - na tāni bhadanta subhūte vastūni tāni vā ārambaṇāni te vā ākārāstathopalabhyante yathā nimittīkaroti /
T02bsu049_u:2079: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:2081: nimittīkuryāt tatkathamasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso na bhavet? tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rāgo 'pyasaṃvidyamānaṃ vastu anitye nityamiti duḥkhe sukhamiti anātmanyātmeti aśubhe śubhamiti vikalpya saṃkalpya utpadyate, saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsaḥ athāpi yathā vastu yathā ārambaṇaṃ yathā ākārastathā bodhistathā cittam,
T02bsu049_u:2083: yadi ca yathā vastu yathā ārambaṇaṃ yathā ākārastathā bodhistathā cittam,
T02bsu049_u:2084: tatkatamairvastubhiḥkatamairārambaṇaiḥ katamairākāraiḥ katamaṃ cittamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati? katamadvā anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu kva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T02bsu049_u:2086: (Vaidya 71) atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - nedamārya subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitasya
T02bsu049_u:2089: hetoḥ? yad api hi syāttasya śraddhāmātrakaṃ premamātrakaṃ prasādamātrakaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2091: avinivartanīyasyedamārya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyamupadeṣṭavyam
T02bsu049_u:2092: yo vā kalyāṇamitropastabdho sattvo mahāsattvo bhavet, so 'tra nāvaleṣyate na saṃleṣyate na vipatsyati na
T02bsu049_u:2093: viṣādamāpatsyate, na vipṛṣṭhīkariṣyati mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhīkariṣyati,
T02bsu049_u:2095: evaṃ ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayitavyam
T02bsu049_u:2096: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yena maitreya cittenānumodya yatpariṇāmayati,
T02bsu049_u:2098: tatkatamattaccittaṃ yena pariṇāmayati anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye? katamadvā taccittamanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu yatpariṇāmayatyanuttarāyai
T02bsu049_u:2099: samyaksaṃbodhaye? kathaṃ vā śakyaṃ cittena cittaṃ pariṇāmayituṃ yadā dvayościttayoḥ samavadhānaṃ nāsti, na ca taccittasvabhāvatā śakyā
T02bsu049_u:2101: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - mā khalvārya subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante? kathaṃ cārya subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tadanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayitavyam? kathaṃ ca anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu parigṛhṇatā anumodanāsahagataṃ cittaṃ pariṇāmayatā tadanumodanāsahagataṃ cittaṃ suparigṛhītaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavati?
T02bsu049_u:2102: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamārabhya maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - iha maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvasteṣāmatītānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāṃ paryāttabāṣpāṇāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2103: marditakaṇṭakānāmapahṛtabhārāṇāmanuprāptasvakārthānāṃ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanānāṃ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittānāṃ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptānāṃ daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi ekaikasmiṃś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau aprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhitaḥ, etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2104: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kuśalamūlāni pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni, yaś ca teṣāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2105: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ kuśalamūlābhisaṃskāraḥ, yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho
T02bsu049_u:2107: yā ca mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:2108: yaś ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirdharmo deśitaḥ, ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣitā adhimuktāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni, ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvāvyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2109: samyaksaṃbodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni, ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtāḥ pratyekabodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni
T02bsu049_u:2110: kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni
T02bsu049_u:2111: śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca aśaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni,
T02bsu049_u:2112: yaiś ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni, yaiś ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyairvā sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni, yaiś ca tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni, yaiś ca teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāpayatsu
T02bsu049_u:2113: parinirvṛteṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni
T02bsu049_u:2114: kuśalamūlāni, tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodeta
T02bsu049_u:2115: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayate, pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
T02bsu049_u:2116: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - sacedārya subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati, tasmiṃścitte na cittasaṃjñī bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2117: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati, yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti /
T02bsu049_u:2118: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati
T02bsu049_u:2120: yatpariṇāmayati, taccittaṃ saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati
T02bsu049_u:2121: / evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati
T02bsu049_u:2124: taccittaṃ samanvāhriyamāṇameva kṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇamityevaṃ saṃjānīte, niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇatamityevaṃ saṃjānīte /
T02bsu049_u:2126: yenāpi cittena pariṇāmyate, tasyāpi cittasya saiva dharmatā /
T02bsu049_u:2127: yair api dharmaiḥ pariṇāmyate, teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmatā /
T02bsu049_u:2128: yeṣv api dharmeṣu pariṇāmyate, teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmateti /
T02bsu049_u:2132: punaraparam ārya subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yathā atītānāmevamanāgatānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2135: parinirvāsyanti, yāvacca saddharmo nāntardhāsyati, etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni, yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho
T02bsu049_u:2136: vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ, yā ca hitaiṣitā, yā ca mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ, ye ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti, ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣiṣyante 'dhimokṣayiṣyanti pratiṣṭhāsyanti, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vyākariṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2137: samyaksaṃbodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
T02bsu049_u:2138: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikān pudgalān vyākariṣyanti pratyekabodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2139: pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni
T02bsu049_u:2140: kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca aśaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni, ye ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti, ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:2141: kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti, ye ca tiryagyonigatā api sattvāstaṃ dharmaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2142: śroṣyanti, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti, ye ca sattvāsteṣu
T02bsu049_u:2143: buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāyatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni, tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya
T02bsu049_u:2145: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
T02bsu049_u:2146: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati, tasmiṃścitte na cittasaṃjñī bhavati
T02bsu049_u:2147: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2148: sa yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ cittamiti, evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2149: atha yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati taccittaṃ saṃjānīte - idaṃ taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati
T02bsu049_u:2150: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2151: sacetpunarbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaccittaṃ pariṇāmayati taccittamevaṃ saṃjānīte evaṃ samānvāharati, taccittaṃ samanvāhriyamāṇameva kṣīṇaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2152: kṣīṇamityevaṃ saṃjānīte, niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇatamityevaṃ saṃjānīte /
T02bsu049_u:2156: yair api dharmaiḥ pariṇāmyate, teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmatā /
T02bsu049_u:2157: yeṣv api dharmeṣu pariṇāmyate, teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmateti /
T02bsu049_u:2161: (Vaidya 74) punaraparamārya subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2162: chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu trisāhasra mahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānāṃ yāpayatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2164: parinirvānti, yāvacca saddharmo nāntardadhāti, etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2165: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni, yaś ca teṣāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2166: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ, yā ca hitaiṣitā, yā ca mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ, yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti, ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣante 'dhimokṣayanti pratitiṣṭhanti, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni, yāṃś ca te
T02bsu049_u:2167: buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vyākurvanti anuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2168: samyaksaṃbodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
T02bsu049_u:2169: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikān pudgalān vyākurvanti pratyekabodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2170: pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni
T02bsu049_u:2171: kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca aśaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamulāni, ye ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, ye ca devānāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā vā taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, ye ca tiryagyonigatā
T02bsu049_u:2172: api sattvāstaṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, ye ca teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāyatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca
T02bsu049_u:2173: kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamulāni, tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya
T02bsu049_u:2175: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
T02bsu049_u:2176: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati, tasmiṃścitte na cittasaṃjñī bhavati
T02bsu049_u:2177: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati - yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti /
T02bsu049_u:2178: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati
T02bsu049_u:2179: atha yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati taccittaṃ saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati
T02bsu049_u:2180: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2181: sacetpunarbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaccittaṃ pariṇāmayati, taccittamevaṃ saṃjānīte evaṃ samanvāharati - taccittaṃ samanvāhriyamāṇameva kṣīṇaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2182: kṣīṇamityevaṃ saṃjānīte, niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇatamityevaṃ saṃjānīte /
T02bsu049_u:2186: yair api dharmaiḥ pariṇāmyate, teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ (Vaidya 75) saiva dharmatā /
T02bsu049_u:2193: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante abhisaṃbudhyante ca,
T02bsu049_u:2194: yāvacca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāḥ parinirvāsyanti parinirvānti ca, yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca, etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni, yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho
T02bsu049_u:2195: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ, yā ca hitaiṣitā, yā ca mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ, yaiś ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirdharmo deśito deśayiṣyate deśyate ca, ye ca tasmin
T02bsu049_u:2196: dharme śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca, adhimuktā adhimokṣayiṣyanti adhimokṣayanti ca, sthitāḥ sthāsyanti tiṣṭhanti ca, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni
T02bsu049_u:2197: kuśalamūlāni, ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni, ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni
T02bsu049_u:2198: kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni
T02bsu049_u:2199: śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca aśaikṣāṇyanāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni,
T02bsu049_u:2200: yaiś ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante
T02bsu049_u:2201: 'varopyante ca, yaiś ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragairmanuṣyāmanuṣyairvā sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni
T02bsu049_u:2202: avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca, yaiś ca tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ sa
T02bsu049_u:2203: dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca, śrutvā ca kuśalamūlāni
T02bsu049_u:2204: avaropitānyavaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca, yaiś ca sattvaisteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvṛteṣu parinirvāsyatsu parinirvāyatsu ca
T02bsu049_u:2205: kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca, teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2206: yāni kuśalamūlāni, tāni sarvāṇyakato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamagrayā anumodanayā anumodeta, śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodeta /
T02bsu049_u:2207: evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta
T02bsu049_u:2209: tasya kathaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati? sacetpariṇāmayan evaṃ samanvāharati - te dharmāḥ kṣīṇā niruddhā vigatā vipariṇatāḥ, sa ca dharmo 'kṣayo yatra pariṇāmyate ityevaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ (Vaidya 76) samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:2210: sacetpunarevamupaparīkṣate - na dharmo dharmaṃ pariṇāmayati, ity api pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:2211: evaṃ bhadantaṃ subhūte pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2212: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate /
T02bsu049_u:2214: jānāti, na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti, ity api pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
T02bsu049_u:2216: sacetpunarbodhisattvastaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ saṃjānīte, na pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T02bsu049_u:2217: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāmabhiniviśate /
T02bsu049_u:2219: puṇyābhisaṃskāro viviktaḥ śāntaḥ, yadapyanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tad api viviktaṃ śāntamiti pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:2220: sacedevam api na saṃjānīte - sarvasaṃskārāḥ śāntā viviktā iti, evamiyaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad api tatteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kuśalamūlam yādṛśa eva sa pariṇāmastādṛśameva tatkuśalamūlam, yenāpi tatpariṇāmitaṃ tad api tajjātikaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ tannikāyaṃ tatsvabhāvam /
T02bsu049_u:2224: yaccātītaṃ tatkṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇatam, yadapyanāgataṃ tadapyasaṃprāptam,
T02bsu049_u:2225: pratyutpannasya sthitirnopalabhyate, yacca nopalabhyate tannaiva nimittaṃ na viṣayaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2228: atha smṛtivaikalyena na nimittīkaroti na samanvāharati na manasi karoti
T02bsu049_u:2229: smṛtivaikalyādanavabodhādvā, evam api na pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:2230: atha tannimitaṃ samanvāharati, na ca nimittīkaroti, evaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2232: evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam - idaṃ tadbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ veditavyam /
T02bsu049_u:2233: yenopāyakauśalena kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati, sa āsannaḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2234: atra copāyakauśalaṃ śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā abhīkṣṇaṃ śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā paripraśnīkartavyā /
T02bsu049_u:2237: tatra ya evaṃ vadet - śakyamanāgamya prajñāpāramitāṃ tatpuṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumiti, sa maivaṃ vocaditi syādvacanīyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2238: tatkasya hetoḥ? niruddhā hi te ātmabhāvāḥ, niruddhā hi te saṃskārāḥ, śāntā viviktā virahitā upalabdhinaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2239: api tu khalu punaḥ sa pudgalo nimittīkṛtya vikalpya ca yathābhūtamayathābhūte yathābhūtasaṃjñī
T02bsu049_u:2240: pariṇāmayet, tasya kuśalamūlaṃ buddhā bhagavanta evaṃ pariṇāmitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau nābhyanujānanti /
T02bsu049_u:2242: eṣa eva hi tasya (Vaidya 77) mahānupalambho bhavati, yatsa parinirvāṇam api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nimittīkaroti vikalpayati ca /
T02bsu049_u:2244: na copalambhasaṃjñinastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pariṇāmanāṃ mahārthakarīṃ vadanti
T02bsu049_u:2247: tadyathāpi nāma praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ saviṣaṃ bhavet, kiṃ cāpi tadvarṇataś ca gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś
T02bsu049_u:2248: ca abhilaṣaṇīyaṃ bhavati, api tu khalu punaḥ saviṣatvātparivarjanīyaṃ bhavati paṇḍitānām, na paribhogāya /
T02bsu049_u:2249: tadeva bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta /
T02bsu049_u:2250: tasya tadbhojanaṃ paribhuñjānasya varṇatasya gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś ca svādeṣu sukhakaraṃ pariṇāme cāsya duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2253: evameva ārya subhūte ihaike durgṛhītena durupalakṣitena duḥsvādhyātena subhāṣitasyārthamajānānā yathābhūtamarthamanavabudhyamānā evamavavadiṣyanti, evamanuśāsiṣyanti -
T02bsu049_u:2254: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham /
T02bsu049_u:2255: teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ yaistatra teṣvatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca, yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito
T02bsu049_u:2256: nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca, etasminnantare teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānām, ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā
T02bsu049_u:2257: mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante
T02bsu049_u:2258: ca, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
T02bsu049_u:2259: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca, ye ca śrāvakayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante
T02bsu049_u:2260: vyākriyante ca śrāvakabodhau, teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca, yāni ca pṛthagjanānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu
T02bsu049_u:2261: lokadhātuṣu atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
T02bsu049_u:2262: evaṃ sa pariṇāmo nimittayogena pariṇāmyamāno viṣatvāya saṃpravartate, tadyathāpi nāma tatsaviṣaṃ bhojanameva /
T02bsu049_u:2268: parigrahītavyam? kathaṃ ca parigṛhītaṃ suparigṛhītaṃ bhavati? kathaṃ ca pariṇāmayitavyam? kathaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? ihānena bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā
T02bsu049_u:2269: tathāgatamanabhyākhyātukāmena evaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamanumoditavyamevaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te (Vaidya 78) tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā
T02bsu049_u:2270: buddhajñānena buddhacakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇam /
T02bsu049_u:2271: yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate tathā anumode tatkuśalamūlam, yathā ca te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhyanujānanti pariṇāmyamānaṃ tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2273: evamanumodamāna evaṃ pariṇāmayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'naparāddho bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2274: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samyaktvānumoditaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ ca bhavati tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye, na ca tāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ
T02bsu049_u:2276: evaṃ cāsya pariṇāmo nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati adhyāśayena adhimuktyā pariṇāmayataḥ //
T02bsu049_u:2277: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyam - yacchīlaṃ yaḥ samādhiryā prajñā yā vimuktiryadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tadyathā aparyāpannaṃ kāmadhātau aparyāpannaṃ rūpadhātau aparyāpannamārūpyadhātau nāpyatītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam tatkasya hetoḥ? tryadhvatraidhātukāparyāpannatvāt /
T02bsu049_u:2281: sacedevamadhimuñcati, evaṃ pariṇāmayatastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinaṣṭaḥ pariṇāmo
T02bsu049_u:2282: bhavatyaparyāpanno nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2285: tatra yo 'yaṃ pariṇāmo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya, anayā dharmadhātupariṇāmanayā yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti, yathā cābhyanujānanti tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitamevaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatīti, tathāhaṃ pariṇāmayāmi ityayaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2287: evaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
T02bsu049_u:2288: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte
T02bsu049_u:2289: / śāstṛkṛtyaṃ tvaṃ subhūte karoṣi, yastvaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2291: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hyayaṃ subhūte pariṇāmaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:2293: asyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti paśyanti, tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate, tathā anumode /

T02bsu049_u:2306: ākhyāyate, praṇīta ākhyāyate, uttama ākhyāyate, anuttama ākhyāyate,
T02bsu049_u:2307: niruttama ākhyāyate, asama ākhyāyate, asamasama ākhyāyate /
T02bsu049_u:2308: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ caturdhyānaniṣpādanasaṃbhūtaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te sarve caturṇāmapramāṇānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuḥ tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu caturapramāṇalābhināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te sarve catasṛṇāmārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2309: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu caturārūpyasamāpattilābhināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te sarve pañcānāmabhijñānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2310: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu pañcābhijñānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
T02bsu049_u:2312: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te sarve sakṛdāgāmino bhaveyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2313: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
T02bsu049_u:2314: trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te sarve anāgāmino bhaveyuḥ /

T02bsu049_u:2317: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāmarhatāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2318: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te sarve pratyekabuddhā bhaveyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2319: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ puṇyaskandhaḥ, ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
T02bsu049_u:2320: trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te sarve anuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2322: ye sarve anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ, tān sarvānekaiko bodhisattvaścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairgaṅgānadīvālukopamān
T02bsu049_u:2325: etena paryāyeṇa tān sarvasattvānekaikaṃ parikalpya tāṃś ca sarvabodhisattvānekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānupatiṣṭheccīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
T02bsu049_u:2327: evamekaikasteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanena paryāyeṇa dānaṃ dadyāt, evaṃ sarve 'pi te dānaṃ dadyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2328: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te bodhisattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ? subhūtirāha - bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata /
T02bsu049_u:2330: saṃkhyāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum, gaṇanāpi upamāpi aupamyam api upanisāpi upaniṣad api bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum /
T02bsu049_u:2331: sacedbhagavan rūpī bhavet, sa puṇyaskandho gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣv api trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu na māyet //
T02bsu049_u:2334: yatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto 'nena dharmadhātupariṇāmena tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet, puṇyaṃ prasavati /
T02bsu049_u:2335: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajasya asau pūrvaka upalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti, sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api
T02bsu049_u:2336: koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti, saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate
T02bsu049_u:2337: / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāmupalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ subahv api dānaṃ dattaṃ subahvity api parisaṃkhyātaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2339: atha khalu cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ viṃśatisahasrāṇi prāñjalīni namasyanti bhagavantametadavocan - mahāpariṇāmo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ kuśalamūlapariṇāmaḥ sarvajñatāyai,
T02bsu049_u:2340: yatra hi nāma teṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāvantaṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāramabhibhavati
T02bsu049_u:2341: atha khalu trāyastriṃśakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇavarṣairdivyai ratnavarṣairdivyaiś ca vastravarṣairbhagavantamabhyavākirannabhiprākiran /
T02bsu049_u:2342: divyaiśchatrairdivyairdhvajairdivyābhirghaṇṭābhirdivyābhiḥ patākābhiḥ samantācca divyadīpamālābhirbahuvidhābhiś ca divyābhiḥ pūjābhirbhagavantaṃ satkurvanti sma, gurukurvanti sma mānayanti sma pūjayanti sma arcayanti sma apacāyanti sma, divyāni ca vādyānyabhipravādayāmāsuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2343: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo 'yaṃ dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ, yatra hi nāma
T02bsu049_u:2344: tatteṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraskandhamabhibhavati yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītatvādasya mahāpariṇāmasya /
T02bsu049_u:2345: evamanyebhyo 'pi devanikāyebhyo devaputrā āgatya (Vaidya 81) bhagavantaṃ parameṇa satkāreṇa parameṇa gurukāreṇa paramayā mānanayā paramayā pūjanayā
T02bsu049_u:2346: paramayā arcanayā paramayā apacāyanayā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā arcayitvā apacāyya evameva śabdamudīrayanti sma,
T02bsu049_u:2349: yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā
T02bsu049_u:2350: asaṃjñisattvā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ, te
