T02bsu049_u:2354: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitānāmanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pratilambhāya dānaṃ dadatāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ anena
T02bsu049_u:2355: paryāyeṇa, ye 'pi te devaputrā anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te 'pi sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā bodhāya cittamutpādya anyeṣvanyeṣu
T02bsu049_u:2356: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sarvaiḥ sukhasparśavihārairekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt, evaṃ sarve 'pi yāvatte copalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2357: etena paryāyeṇa tān sarvasattvānekaikaṃ parikalpya tāṃś ca sarvabodhisattvānekaiko bodhisattvo yāvatsarve te bodhisattvā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhantastān sarvasattvāṃścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sarvaiḥ sukhasparśavihārairupatiṣṭheyuḥ, tacca dānamupalambhasaṃjñino dadyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2358: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2359: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvapratyekabuddhaśrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ yaiś ca tatra anyair api sattvaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitānyavaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
T02bsu049_u:2362: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodanayā anumodate /
T02bsu049_u:2363: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati - anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /
T02bsu049_u:2364: asyānumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastunaḥ so 'pi paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2365: nopaiti, sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api
T02bsu049_u:2366: koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti, saṃkhyām api kalām api
T02bsu049_u:2367: (Vaidya 82) gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam
T02bsu049_u:2369: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te bodhisattvāḥ sarve 'pyupalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadati //
T02bsu049_u:2371: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhisattvapratyekabuddhaśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ yannāma kuśalamūlaṃ tatsarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya
T02bsu049_u:2372: piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate agrayā anumodanayā /
T02bsu049_u:2373: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodate iti /
T02bsu049_u:2374: tatra kiyatā bhagavan agrānumodanā bhavati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadi subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ
T02bsu049_u:2375: pudgalo 'tītāgatapratyutpannān gṛhṇīte na manyate nopalabhate na kalpayati
T02bsu049_u:2376: na vikalpayati na paśyati na samanupaśyati, evaṃ cainān dharmānupaparīkṣate - kalpanāviṭhapitāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, ajātā anirjātā anāgatikā agatikāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2377: nātra kaściddharma utpanno nāpi kaściddharma utpatsyate nāpi kaściddharma utpadyate, nāpi kaściddharmo niruddho nāpi kaściddharmo nirutsyate nāpi kaściddharmo nirudhyate /
T02bsu049_u:2378: ityevametān dharmānupaparīkṣya yathaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathānumodate /
T02bsu049_u:2380: iyatā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya agrā anumodanā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2381: asya subhūte kuśalamūlapariṇāmasya teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāmupalambhasaṃjñināmupalambhadṛṣṭikāṇāṃ taddānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti, sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
T02bsu049_u:2382: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate //
T02bsu049_u:2383: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dānamanumoditukāmena śīlamanumoditukāmena kṣāntimanumoditukāmena vīryamanumoditukāmena dhyānamanumoditukāmena prajñāmanumoditakāmena evamanumoditavyam - yathā vimuktistathā dānam, yathā vimuktistathā śīlaṃ,
T02bsu049_u:2384: yathā vimuktistathā kṣāntiḥ, yathā vimuktistathā vīryam, yathā vimuktistathā dhyānam, yathā vimuktistathā prajñā, yathā vimuktistathā vimuktijñānadarśanam, yathā vimuktistathā anumodanā, yathā vimuktistathā anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, yathā vimuktistathā pariṇāmanā, yathā vimuktistathā buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhāśca, yathā vimuktistathā teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye parinirvṛtāḥ, yathā vimuktistathā te dharmā ye 'tītā
T02bsu049_u:2385: niruddhāḥ, yathā vimuktistathā te dharmā ye 'nāgatā anutpannāḥ, yathā vimuktistathā te dharmā ye etarhi pratyutpannā vartamānāḥ, yathā vimuktistathā te 'tītā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ, yathā vimuktistathā te 'nāgatā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ, yathā vimuktistathā te pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ, ye etarhyaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
T02bsu049_u:2387: evameteṣāṃ dharmāṇāmabaddhānāmamuktānāmasaktānāṃ yā dharmatā, tāmanuttarayā anumodanayā anumode
T02bsu049_u:2388: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyaṃ (Vaidya 83) samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmi
T02bsu049_u:2390: iyatā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya agrā anumodanā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2391: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte te 'pi ye
T02bsu049_u:2393: sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthāya anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpādya sarve 'pyekaiko bodhisattvaḥ ekaikasmai bodhisattvāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyādupalambhasaṃjñī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sarvasukhasparśavihārairupatiṣṭhan, anena paryāyeṇa sarve 'pi te sarvebhya upatiṣṭhantaḥ upalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2394: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:2396: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān kāyasucaritaṃ vāksucaritaṃ manaḥsucaritamupalambhasaṃjñinaḥ śīlaṃ samādāya varteran /
T02bsu049_u:2397: anena paryāyeṇa sarve 'pi te bodhisattvā ekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān kāyasucaritaṃ vāksucaritaṃ manaḥsucaritamupalambhasaṃjñī śīlaṃ samādāya varteta /

T02bsu049_u:2489: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāmupādāya mātā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā /

T02bsu049_u:2497: prajñāpāramitā? kathaṃ bhagavan namaskartavyā prajñāpāramitā? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - yathā śāriputra śāstari, tathā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /
T02bsu049_u:2498: tathaiva manasi kartavyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā yathā śāstā /
T02bsu049_u:2499: tathaiva namaskartavyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā yathā śāstā //
T02bsu049_u:2500: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - kuto nu bateyamāryasya
T02bsu049_u:2501: śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā? kiṃnidānā bateyamāryasya śāriputrasya pṛcchā
T02bsu049_u:2502: jātā? atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kuta iyamāryasya śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā? kiṃnidānā bateyamāryasya śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā? evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'numodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃsteṣāṃ paurvakāṇāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yaś ca (Vaidya
T02bsu049_u:2503: 87) dānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, yaś ca śīlamayo yaś ca kṣāntimayo yaś ca vīryamayo yaś ca dhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, taṃ sarvamabhibhavatīti /
T02bsu049_u:2505: api nu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṃgamā pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvajñatāmārgāvatārāya tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jātyandhānāṃ śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā apariṇāyakamabhavyaṃ mārgāvatārāya, abhavyaṃ grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā gantum, evameva kauśika dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntivīryaṃ dhyānaṃ ca prajñāpāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate /
T02bsu049_u:2508: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvajñatāmanuprāpsyati? yadā punaḥ kauśika dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntirvīyaṃ dhyānaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītaṃ bhavati, tadā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ pāramitāśabdaṃ labhate /
T02bsu049_u:2509: tadā hyāsāṃ cakṣuḥpratilambho bhavati pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvajñatāmārgāvatārāya sarvajñatānuprāptaye atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - rūpasya śāriputra abhinirhāro
T02bsu049_u:2517: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evamabhinirhāreṇa abhinirhṛtā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā katamaṃ dharmamarpayati? bhagavānāha -
T02bsu049_u:2519: yadā sā śāriputra na kaṃciddharmamarpayati, tadā prajñāpāramiteti saṃkhyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2521: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kimiyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatām api nārpayati? bhagavānāha - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - kimiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatām api nārpayatīti? na yathopalambhastathā arpayati, na yathā nāma tathārpayati, na yathābhisaṃskārastathārpayati śakra āha - kathaṃ tarhi bhagavannarpayati? bhagavānāha - yathā kauśika nārpayati tathārpayati
T02bsu049_u:2522: śakra āha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati, na kaṃciddharmaṃ nirodhayati /
T02bsu049_u:2524: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - sacedevam api bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:2525: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo saṃjñāsyate, dūrīkariṣyati imāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
T02bsu049_u:2526: riktīkariṣyati imāṃ prajñāpāramitām, tucchīkariṣyati imāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
T02bsu049_u:2528: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:2529: astyeṣa subhūte paryāyo yena (Vaidya 88) paryāyeṇa dūrīkariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
T02bsu049_u:2530: riktīkariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām, tucchīkariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām, na kariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām
T02bsu049_u:2531: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte paridīpitāyāṃ na rūpaṃ paridīpitaṃ bhavati
T02bsu049_u:2532: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2540: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:2541: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte katamena paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2542: yaduta prajñāpāramitā? sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - na bhagavan rūpaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2543: mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti, na rūpaṃ saṃkṣipati na vikṣipati /
T02bsu049_u:2544: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
T02bsu049_u:2546: nālpīkaroti, na vijñānaṃ saṃkṣipati na vikṣipati /
T02bsu049_u:2547: yāny api tāni tathāgatasya tathāgatabalāni, tāny api na balīkaroti na durbalīkaroti, na saṃkṣipati na vikṣipati /
T02bsu049_u:2548: yāpi sā sarvajñatā, tām api na mahatkaroti
T02bsu049_u:2552: sacedevam api bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃjānīte, carati prajñāpāramitāyām [NOTE:
T02bsu049_u:2555: evamahaṃ sarvajñajñānasamanvāgata sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi, evamimān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti
T02bsu049_u:2556: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hyeṣa prajñāpāramitāniṣyando ya imān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti sattvopalambhaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2567: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu049_u:2568: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan iha
T02bsu049_u:2569: gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhimokṣayiṣyati na kāṅkṣiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati na dhandhāyiṣyati, kutaḥ sa bhagavaṃścyuta
T02bsu049_u:2570: ihopapanno veditavyaḥ, kiyacciracaritāvī ca sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmarthataś ca dharmataś ca
T02bsu049_u:2571: arthanayataś ca dharmanayataś ca anugamiṣyati anubhotsyate 'nubodhayiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:2572: ca? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo lokadhātubhyaścyuto buddhān bhagavataḥ
T02bsu049_u:2574: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaḥ kaścicchāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo lokadhātubhyaścyuto buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchaya (Vaidya 89) ihopapanno bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:2575: sa imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ śṛṇuyāt, imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā
T02bsu049_u:2576: atra śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmutpādayet - śāstā me saṃmukhībhūt iti,
T02bsu049_u:2580: ciracaritāvī sa śāriputra tathārūpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2581: bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ sa śāriputra tathārūpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ //
T02bsu049_u:2582: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - śakyā punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣyayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā? iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā, iha vā sā prajñāpāramitā,
T02bsu049_u:2583: amutra vā sā prajñāpāramitā, anena vā ākāreṇa liṅgena nimitteneti śakyā
T02bsu049_u:2584: nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:2585: neyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā skandhaśo vā dhātuśo vā āyatanaśo vā śakyā nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:2587: atyantaviviktatvātsubhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ na śakyā prajñāpāramitā nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:2589: tatkasya hetoḥ? skandhadhātvāyatanameva hi subhūte śūnyaṃ viviktaṃ śāntam /
T02bsu049_u:2590: iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāraṃ śūnyatvādviviktatvāt
T02bsu049_u:2593: yadā na bhavati saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ, tadā prajñāpāramitetyucyate //
T02bsu049_u:2594: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - kiyacciracaritāvī sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyo ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpatsyate?
T02bsu049_u:2597: syātkhalu punaḥ subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvā bahūni buddhaśatāni bahūni buddhasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhaśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā teṣāmantike brahmacaryaṃ caritvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na śraddadhyurnādhimuñceyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2598: tatkasya hetoḥ? pūrvam api teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikādasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmagauravatā abhūt /
T02bsu049_u:2601: aparipṛcchanatā, aparipṛcchanatayā aśraddadhānatā, aśraddadhānatayā tataḥ parṣaddhyo 'pakrāntāḥ, te tatonidānaṃ dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitena ācitena upacitena etarhy api gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmapakrāmanti agauravatayā aśraddadhānā anadhimuñcanto na kāyena na cittena sāmagrīṃ dadati /
T02bsu049_u:2602: te sāmagrīmadadānā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na jānanti na paśyanti na budhyante na vedayante /
T02bsu049_u:2608: abudhyamānā dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kurvanti, saṃcinvanti ācinvanti upacinvanti /
T02bsu049_u:2609: te tena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitena ācitena upacitena duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmābhisaṃskariṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:2610: tena te duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāṃ pratyākhyāsyanti pratikṣepsyanti pratikrokṣyanti, pratikṣipya ca apakramiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:2611: asyāḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pratyākhyānena pratikṣepeṇa pratikrośena atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā pratyākhyātā bhavati, pratikṣiptā bhavati, pratikruṣṭā bhavati te svasaṃtānānupahatya dagdhāḥ pareṣāmapyalpabuddhikānāmalpaprajñānāmalpapuṇyānāmalpakuśalamūlānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śraddhāmātrakasamanvāgatānāṃ premamātrakasamanvāgatānāṃ prasādamātrakasamanvāgatānāṃ chandamātrakasamanvāgatānāmādikarmikāṇāmabhavyarūpāṇāṃ tad api śraddhāmātrakaṃ premamātrakaṃ prasādamātrakaṃ chandamātrakaṃ vicchandayiṣyanti vivecayiṣyanti vivartayiṣyanti, nātra śikṣitavyamiti vakṣyanti, naitadbuddhavacanamiti vācaṃ bhāṣiṣyante /
T02bsu049_u:2612: evaṃ te ātmasaṃtānānupahatya vivecya parasaṃtānānapyupahatya vivecya prajñāpāramitāmabhyākhyāsyanti
T02bsu049_u:2618: evaṃ teṣāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:2619: te sattvānāṃ hitasukhopacchedakriyayā mahānirayavipākasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma upaceṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:2620: te anenaivaṃrūpeṇa karmābhisaṃskāreṇopasthāpitena samutthāpitena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīśatāni bahūni varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi mahānirayeṣūpapatsyante /
T02bsu049_u:2622: teṣāṃ tathā suciraṃ mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:2626: te tatra vikṣiptāsteṣu mahānirayeṣūpapannāḥ samānāstatrāpi mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:2627: teṣāṃ tatrāpi mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tatrāpi punareva tathaiva tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:2628: te tasyāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanyāṃ prādurbhūtāyāṃ tataścyutāḥ samānāḥ punareva anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayāstatra kṣepsyante /
T02bsu049_u:2631: teṣāṃ tatrāpi suciraṃ mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tatrāpi tathaiva tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:2632: te tasyāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanyāṃ prādurbhūtāyāṃ punareva tataścyutāstenaiva akṣīṇena sāvaśeṣeṇa karmaṇā ihaiva lokadhātau punaḥ kṣepsyante /
T02bsu049_u:2634: te punareva tāni mahānirayeṣu mahānti mahānirayaduḥkhāni (Vaidya 91) pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:2639: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - pañca bhagavan ānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni asya manoduścaritasya vāgduścaritasya
T02bsu049_u:2640: ca na prativarṇikāny api na anurūpāṇy api na pratirūpāṇy api bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:2642: pañcānantaryāṇi śāriputra karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitānyasya manoduścaritasya ca vāgduścaritasya ca na prativarṇikāny api na anurūpāṇy api na pratirūpāṇy api asya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasya saṃcitasya ācitasya upacitasya /
T02bsu049_u:2643: ye kecidimāṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante, pratikṣepsyanti, pratikrokṣyanti, nātra śikṣitavyamiti vakṣyanti, neyaṃ tathāgatabhāṣiteti vācaṃ bhāṣiṣyante, tato
T02bsu049_u:2646: te svasaṃtānān saviṣān kṛtvā parasaṃtānān saviṣān kariṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:2648: svayaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā anavabudhyamānāḥ parān api grāhayiṣyanti,
T02bsu049_u:2650: nāhaṃ śāriputra evaṃrūpāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ darśanamapyabhyanujānāmi, kutastaiḥ saha saṃvāsaṃ kuto vā lābhasatkāraṃ kutaḥ sthānam? tatkasya hetoḥ? dharmadūṣakā hi te śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyā iti /
T02bsu049_u:2652: kṛṣṇānirjātikāḥ kṛṣṇāhijātikāste śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2653: teṣāṃ śāriputra tathārūpāṇāṃ pudgālānāṃ ye śrotavyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2655: ye ca śāriputra prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayanti, ime te śāriputra dharmadūṣakāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:2656: śāriputra āha - na bhagavatā tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamākhyātam /
T02bsu049_u:2657: bhagavānāha - tiṣṭhatu śāriputra tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya
T02bsu049_u:2659: tatkasya hetoḥ? mā tathārūpasya pudgalasya tadātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ śrutvā uṣṇaṃ rūdhiraṃ mukhādāgacchet, maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet,
T02bsu049_u:2660: maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkhamāgāḍhamābādhaṃ spṛśet, dahyeta vā, śokaśalyo vā asyāviśet, mahāprapātaṃ vā prapatet, upaśuṣyeta vā mlāyeta vā /
T02bsu049_u:2661: maiva mahāpratibhayaṃ tasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamaśrauṣīdyasyeme doṣāḥ saṃvidyante
T02bsu049_u:2662: na bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karoti - iyattasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
T02bsu049_u:2663: dvitīyakam api tṛtīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ākhyātu me bhagavāṃstasya pudgalasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam /
T02bsu049_u:2664: paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyatianena vāṅbhanaḥkarmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitenopacitenopacitena evaṃ mahāntaṃ mahānirayeṣvātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇīteti /
T02bsu049_u:2665: bhagavānāha - eṣa eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ
T02bsu049_u:2666: kṛto bhaviṣyati, yadanena vāṅbhanoduścaritena akuśalena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena iyacciraduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti /
T02bsu049_u:2667: yā etasyaiva śāriputra duḥkhasyāprameyatā bahuduḥkhatā (Vaidya 92) vyākhyātā, eṣa eva śuklāṃśikasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā saṃvego bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:2668: tataḥ sa tebhyo dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyebhyaḥ karmabhyo vinivṛtya puṇyābhisaṃskārameva
T02bsu049_u:2669: kuryāt, jīvitahetor api saddharmaṃ na pratikṣepsyati - mā bhūdasmākam api
T02bsu049_u:2672: susaṃvṛtakāyakarmavākkarmamanaskarmaṇā bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bhavitavyam
T02bsu049_u:2673: tatkasya hetoḥ? yatra hi nāma bhagavan evaṃrūpeṇa vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
T02bsu049_u:2674: katamena punarbhagavan karmaṇā iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
T02bsu049_u:2675: bhagavānāha - evaṃrūpeṇa subhūte vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
T02bsu049_u:2676: ihaiva te subhūte mohapuruṣāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitā bhaviṣyanti, ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ maṃsyante, pratikṣeptavyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2678: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca pratibādhitāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhabodhiḥ pratibādhitā bhavati
T02bsu049_u:2679: buddhabodhau pratibādhitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā pratibādhitā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:2683: pratibādhite evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhavati, aprameyāsaṃkhyeyataraś ca mahānakuśalakarmābhisaṃskāraḥ parigṛhīto bhavati //
T02bsu049_u:2684: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ko 'tra bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yatsa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2685: pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate? bhagavānāha - mārādhiṣṭhito vā subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:2686: duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena vā karmaṇā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nāsya śraddhā, nāsya prasādaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2687: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ pāpābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyate /
T02bsu049_u:2688: punaraparaṃ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pāpamitrahastagato vā bhaviṣyati, anabhiyukto vā bhaviṣyati,
T02bsu049_u:2689: skandhābhiniviṣṭo vā bhaviṣyati, ātmotkarṣī pareṣāṃ paṃsako
T02bsu049_u:2691: ebhirapi subhūte caturbhirākāraiḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
T02bsu049_u:2696: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - duradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena kuśalamūlavirahitena pāpamitrahastagatena /
T02bsu049_u:2698: duradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena parīttakuśalamūlena durmedhasā anarthikena alpaśrutena hīnaprajñena pāpamitropastabdhena
T02bsu049_u:2727: subhūtirāha - duradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā, paramaduradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena /
T02bsu049_u:2729: duradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā, paramaduradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:2730: anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena /
T02bsu049_u:2731: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā subhūte rūpaviśuddhiḥ, sā phalaviśuddhiḥ, yā phalaviśuddhiḥ, sā rūpaviśuddhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:2732: iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiś ca phalaviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam
T02bsu049_u:2733: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito rūpaviśuddhī rupaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2735: yā subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiḥ, sā phalaviśuddhiḥ, yā phalaviśuddhiḥ sā
T02bsu049_u:2737: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiś ca phalaviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam
T02bsu049_u:2738: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito vijñānaviśuddhirvijñānaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2739: punaraparaṃ subhūte yā rūpaviśuddhiḥ sā sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ, yā sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ sā
T02bsu049_u:2741: iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam
T02bsu049_u:2742: iti hi subhūte sarvajñatāviśuddhito rūpaviśuddhiḥ, rūpaviśuddhitaḥ sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2746: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam
T02bsu049_u:2747: iti hi subhūte sarvajñatāviśuddhito vijñānaviśuddhiḥ, vijñānaviśuddhitaḥ sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:2748: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:2768: āha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:2771: āha - kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na
T02bsu049_u:2772: saṃjānīte? bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na
T02bsu049_u:2776: vijñānaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
T02bsu049_u:2778: āha - prajñāpāramitā bhagavan sarvajñatāyā nāpakāraṃ karoti, nopakāraṃ karoti? bhagavānāha
T02bsu049_u:2782: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ātmaviśuddhito bhagavan rūpaviśuddhiḥ? bhagavānāha - atyantaviśuddhatvātsubhūte /
T02bsu049_u:2794: āha - ātmāparyantatayā bhagavan rūpāparyatantā? bhagavānāha - atyantaviśuddhatvātsubhūte
T02bsu049_u:2798: āha - ya evamasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhagavan avabodhaḥ, iyamasya prajñāpāramitā?
T02bsu049_u:2800: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - sā khalu punariyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nāpare tīre, na pare tīre,
T02bsu049_u:2804: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evam api bhagavan saṃjñāsyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:2808: tatkasya hetoḥ? nāmato 'pi hi subhūto saṅgo nimittato 'pi saṅgaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2809: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā svākhyātā sunirdiṣṭā supariniṣṭhitā, yatra hi nāma bhagavatā ime 'pi saṅgā ākhyātāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2810: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katame te āyuṣman subhūte saṅgāḥ?
T02bsu049_u:2814: atīteṣu dharmeṣvatītā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2815: anāgateṣu dharmeṣvanāgatā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2816: pratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu pratyutpannā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2817: iyantaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasūyate bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prathamena cittotpādeneti saṃjānīte,
T02bsu049_u:2819: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamena ārya subhūte paryāyeṇa saṅgaḥ? subhūtirāha - sacetkauśika tadbodhicittaṃ saṃjānīte - idaṃ tatprathamaṃ bodhicittamiti, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti pariṇāmayati /
T02bsu049_u:2820: na ca cittaprakṛtiḥ śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā mahāyānasaṃprasthitena
T02bsu049_u:2821: tasmāttarhi kauśika paraṃ saṃdarśayatā samādāpayatā samuttejayatā saṃpraharṣayatā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhūtānugamena saṃdarśayitavyaṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ samuttejayitavyaṃ saṃpraharṣayitavyam evamātmānaṃ ca na kṣiṇoti,
T02bsu049_u:2822: buddhānujñātayā ca samādāpanayā paraṃ samādāpayati sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā /
T02bsu049_u:2824: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte, yastvaṃ bodhisattvān mahāsattvānimāḥ saṅgakoṭīrbodhayasi /
T02bsu049_u:2825: tena hi subhūte anyān api sūkṣmatarān saṅgānākhyāsyāmi, tān śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
T02bsu049_u:2828: bhagavānetadavocat - iha subhūte śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nimittato manasi karoti /
T02bsu049_u:2829: yāvanti khalu punaḥ subhūte nimittāni, tāvantaḥ saṅgāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2830: tatkasya hetoḥ? nimittato hi subhūte saṅgaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2831: iti hi so 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ye anāsravā dharmāstānanumode ityanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti pariṇāmayati /
T02bsu049_u:2832: yā khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā, na sā atītā vā anāgatā vā
T02bsu049_u:2834: yā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā, sā tryadhvanirmuktā /
T02bsu049_u:2835: yā tryadhvanirmuktā, na sā śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ na nimittīkartuṃ
T02bsu049_u:2848: yā ca subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiviviktatā, sā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:2849: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ
T02bsu049_u:2850: subhūtirāha - tasmāttarhi bhagavan sarvadharmā anabhisaṃbuddhāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena?
T02bsu049_u:2851: bhagavānāha - tathāhi subhūte prakṛtyaiva na te dharmāḥ kiṃcit /
T02bsu049_u:2852: yā ca prakṛtiḥ, sā aprakṛtiḥ, yā ca prakṛtiḥ, sā prakṛtiḥ sarvadharmāṇāmekalakṣaṇatvādyaduta alakṣaṇatvāt /
T02bsu049_u:2855: hetoḥ? na hi subhūte dve dharmaprakṛtī /
T02bsu049_u:2857: yā ca subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ, sā aprakṛtiḥ, yā ca aprakṛtiḥ, sā prakṛtiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2858: evametāḥ subhūte sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyo vivarjitā bhavanti //
T02bsu049_u:2864: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate /
T02bsu049_u:2866: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na cittena jñātavyā na cittagamanīyā /
T02bsu049_u:2870: āha - tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kathaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2872: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna rūpe carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2873: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
T02bsu049_u:2882: sacedvijñānaṃ śūnyamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2883: sacedrūpamapratipūrṇaṃ pratipūrṇamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2884: yā ca rūpasyāpratipūrṇatā pratipūrṇatā vā, na tadrūpam /
T02bsu049_u:2888: yā ca vijñānasyāpratipūrṇatā pratipūrṇatā vā, na tadvijñānam /
T02bsu049_u:2889: sacedevam api na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām //
T02bsu049_u:2890: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadevaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sasaṅgatā ca asaṅgatā ca khyātāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2891: bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti subhūte na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2893: vijñānaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti subhūte na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2894: cakṣuḥ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati, (Vaidya 97) carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2895: evaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2896: pṛthivīdhātuḥ sasaṅgo 'saṅga iti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2899: dānapāramitā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2901: prajñāpāramitā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2902: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sasaṅgāsaṅgā iti na carati,
T02bsu049_u:2906: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalamanāgāmiphalamarhattvaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām
T02bsu049_u:2907: pratyekabuddhatvaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2908: buddhatvaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2909: sarvajñatāpi subhūte sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:2910: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe saṅgaṃ janayati, na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
T02bsu049_u:2914: na pṛthivīdhātau saṅgaṃ janayati, yāvanna vijñānadhātau saṅgaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2915: janayati, na dānapāramitāyāṃ saṅgaṃ janayati, na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na
T02bsu049_u:2916: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṅgaṃ janayati, na bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu, na baleṣu, na
T02bsu049_u:2917: vaiśāradyeṣu, na pratisaṃvitsu, nāṣṭādaśasvāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu saṅgaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2918: janayati, na srotaāpattiphale saṅgaṃ janayati, na sakṛdāgāmiphale na
T02bsu049_u:2919: anāgāmiphale na arhattve saṅgaṃ janayati, na pratyekabuddhatve saṅgaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2920: janayati, na buddhatve saṅgaṃ janayati, nāpi sarvajñatāyāṃ saṅga janayati
T02bsu049_u:2921: / tatkasya hetoḥ? asaktā abaddhā amuktā asamatikrāntā hi subhūte
T02bsu049_u:2923: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvasaṅgasamatikramāya bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam
T02bsu049_u:2924: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan, yāvadgambhīro 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ prajñāpāramitā nāma
T02bsu049_u:2925: yā deśyamānāpi na parihīyate, adeśyamānāpi na parihīyate /
T02bsu049_u:2928: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:2931: samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhannākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta, nākāśasya vṛddhirbhavet /
T02bsu049_u:2933: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣo bhāṣyamāṇe 'pi varṇe nānunīyate na
T02bsu049_u:2934: saṃkliśyate, abhāṣyamāṇe 'pi varṇe na pratihanyate, na saṃkliśyate /
T02bsu049_u:2935: evameva subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā, sā deśyamānāpi tāvatyeva,
T02bsu049_u:2937: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na saṃsīdati notplavate /
T02bsu049_u:2938: atra ca nāma yogamāpadyate, na ca pratyudāvartate /
T02bsu049_u:2941: namaskartavyāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, yairayaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2942: tatkasya hetoḥ? ākāśena sārdhaṃ sa bhagavan saṃnaddhukāmo yaḥ
T02bsu049_u:2945: śūro bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhukāmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2948: mahāvīryapāramitāsaṃnāhaprāptaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate //
T02bsu049_u:2949: atha khalvanyatamo bhikṣuryena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai /
T02bsu049_u:2950: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati, na kaṃciddharmaṃ nirodhayati
T02bsu049_u:2951: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya ārya subhūte atra prajñāpāramitāyāmeva yogamāpatsyate, kva sa yogamāpatsyate?
T02bsu049_u:2952: subhūtirāha - ākāśe sa kauśika yogamāpatsyate, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpatsyate /
T02bsu049_u:2953: abhyavakāśe sa kauśika yogamāpatsyate, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yogamāpattavyaṃ maṃsyate
T02bsu049_u:2954: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - ājñāpayatu bhagavān /
T02bsu049_u:2955: tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karomi ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayati
T02bsu049_u:2956: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya
T02bsu049_u:2957: dharmasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyasi? śakra āha - no hīdamārya subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:2958: subhūtirāha - evaṃ kauśika sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyati, saiva tasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptirbhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:2959: atha virahito bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitayā, lapsyante 'sya avatāraprekṣiṇo
T02bsu049_u:2961: api ca kauśika ākāśasya sa rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta, yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2962: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika pratibalastvaṃ pratiśrutkāyā rakṣāvaraṇagupti saṃvidhātum? śakra āha - na hyetadārya subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:2963: subhūtirāha - evameva kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran viharan pratiśrutkopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti parijānāti /
T02bsu049_u:2965: manyate, na samanupaśyati, na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
T02bsu049_u:2966: te ca dharmā na vidyante na saṃdṛśyante na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante iti viharati /
T02bsu049_u:2968: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro
T02bsu049_u:2969: mahārājānaḥ, sarve ca śakrā devendrāḥ, sarve ca mahābrahmāṇaḥ, sahāpatiś ca mahābrahmā, te sarve yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2971: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'tiṣṭhan
T02bsu049_u:2972: ekānte sthitāś ca te mahārājānaḥ, sarve ca śakrā devendrāḥ, sarve ca brahmakāyikā devā mahābrahmāṇaśca, sahāpatiś ca mahābrahmā buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhasahasraṃ
T02bsu049_u:2974: ebhireva nāmabhirebhireva padairebhirevākṣaraiḥ subhūtināmadheyaireva bhikṣubhiriyameva prajñāpāramitopadiṣṭā, ayameva prajñāpāramitāparivartaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:2975: tatrāpi śakrā eva devendrāḥ paripṛcchanti sma,
T02bsu049_u:2976: paripraśnayanti sma - asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe iyameva prajñāpāramitā bhāṣitā /
T02bsu049_u:2978: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe enāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate iti
T02bsu049_u:2982: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - prajñāpāramiteti bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etat /
T02bsu049_u:2989: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya ebhireva nāmabhiḥ ebhireva padaiḥ ebhirevākṣaraiḥ asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe
T02bsu049_u:2991: - tathā hi subhūte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ nityaṃ
T02bsu049_u:2992: nānityaṃ na rūpaṃ baddhaṃ na muktam, atyantaviśuddhamityabhisaṃbhotsyate /
T02bsu049_u:2993: evaṃ nā vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
T02bsu049_u:2994: na vijñānaṃ nityaṃ nānityam, na vijñānaṃ baddhaṃ na muktam, atyantaviśuddhamityabhisaṃbhotsyate
T02bsu049_u:2995: anena subhūte kāraṇena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya ebhireva nāmabhirebhireva padavyañjanairasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate
T02bsu049_u:2996: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - pariśuddhā bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā? bhagavānāha - rūpaviśuddhitaḥ subhūte pariśuddhā
T02bsu049_u:3009: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - sulabdhā bata lābhāsteṣāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3010: bhagavan kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca, yeṣāmiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsamapyāgamiṣyati, prāgeva ya udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3012: bhaviṣyati, na śrotrarogo na ghrāṇarogo na jihvārogo na kāyarogo bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:3013: na dhandhāyitatā bhaviṣyati, na te viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3016: aṣṭamīṃ caturdaśīṃ pañcadaśīṃ ca sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yatra yatra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate, tatra tatra bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:3017: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:3018: bahūni subhūte tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā devatāsahasrāṇi (Vaidya 101) pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3019: bahūni ca devatāsahasrāṇi tatrāgamiṣyanti sarvāṇi dharmaśravaṇārthikāni /
T02bsu049_u:3020: tāni ca rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti tasya dharmabhāṇakasya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇasya
T02bsu049_u:3021: tatkasya hetoḥ? sadevamānuṣāsurasya hi subhūte lokasya prajñāpāramitā anuttaraṃ ratnam
T02bsu049_u:3022: ato 'pi subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ
T02bsu049_u:3024: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bahavo 'ntarāyā
T02bsu049_u:3025: bhaviṣyanti asyā gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā likhyamānāyā udgṛhyamāṇāyā dhāryamāṇāyā vācyamānāyāḥ paryavāpyamānāyāḥ pravartyamānāyā upadiśyamānāyā uddiśyamānāyāḥ svādhyāyyamānāyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3029: anuttaraṃ cedaṃ subhūte mahāratnaṃ lokasya yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:3032: na ca subhūte prajñāpāramitā kaṃciddharmamālīyate, na kaṃciddharmaṃ saṃkliśyate, na kaṃciddharmaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
T02bsu049_u:3033: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte sarve te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /
T02bsu049_u:3036: tathā hi subhūte rūpanirupalepatayā anupalipteyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:3039: sacedevam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:3040: sā khalu punariyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasyāveśikā vā niveśikā vā saṃdarśikā vā nidarśikā vā āvāhikā vā nirvāhikā vā //
T02bsu049_u:3041: atha khalu saṃbahulāni devaputrasahasrāṇi antarīkṣe kilakilāprakṣveḍitena
T02bsu049_u:3042: cailavikṣepānakārṣuḥ, dvitīyaṃ batedaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ jambūdvīpe paśyāma iti cāvocan
T02bsu049_u:3043: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - nedaṃ subhūte dvitīyaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ nāpi kasyaciddharmasya pravartanaṃ vā nivartanaṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:3045: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavaṃstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya, yasyāsaṅgatā sarvadharmeṣu,
T02bsu049_u:3047: kaṃciddharmamabhisaṃbudhyate, dharmacakraṃ ca pravartayiṣyati, na ca kaṃciddharmaṃ saṃdarśayiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:3048: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi kaściddharmo ya
T02bsu049_u:3051: tatkasya hetoḥ? atyantānabhinirvṛttā hi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3053: tatkasya hetoḥ? ādyanabhinirvṛttā hi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ, prakṛtiviviktatvātsarvadharmāṇām
T02bsu049_u:3054: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:3055: na hi subhūte śūnyatā pravartate vā nivartate vā /
T02bsu049_u:3056: nāpi subhūte ānimittaṃ pravartate vā nivartate vā /
T02bsu049_u:3057: nāpi subhūte apraṇihitaṃ pravartate vā nivartate vā /
T02bsu049_u:3058: yā subhūte evaṃ deśanā, iyaṃ sā sarvadharmāṇāṃ deśanā /
T02bsu049_u:3059: (Vaidya 102) naiva ca kenaciddeśitā, nāpi kenacicchrutā, nāpi
T02bsu049_u:3062: nāpyanayā dharmadeśanayā kaścitparinirvṛto nāpi parinirvāsyati nāpi parinirvāti /
T02bsu049_u:3064: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - asatpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan ākāśasattāmupādāya
T02bsu049_u:3122: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:3124: kaḥ punarvādo ya enāmevaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3125: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante /
T02bsu049_u:3126: na te avaramātrakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3128: paripṛṣṭāḥ paripraśnīkṛtāśca te buddhā bhagavanto bhaviṣyanti kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiścaināmeva prajñāpāramitām /
T02bsu049_u:3129: śrutā ceyaṃ paurvakāṇāmapi tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt, ya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmetarhyapi śroṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3130: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
T02bsu049_u:3132: bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca veditavyāḥ, ya etasyāmeva gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ nāvaleṣyante
T02bsu049_u:3133: na saṃleṣyante, na viṣatsyanti na viṣādamāpatsyante, na vipṛṣṭhīkariṣyanti mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhīkariṣyanti, notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante //
T02bsu049_u:3134: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ caitasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan ihaivaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā
T02bsu049_u:3135: abhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati, tathatvāya
T02bsu049_u:3138: tatkasya hetoḥ? gambhīrā bhagavan iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:3139: na hi bhagavan parīttakuśalamūlenāparipṛcchakajātīyena aśrutvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ pūrvamacaritavatā ihaiveyamevaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā adhimoktuṃ śakyā /
T02bsu049_u:3140: ye punaranadhimucya enāmanavabudhyamānāḥ pratikṣeptavyāṃ maṃsyante, pūrvāntato'pi bhagavaṃstaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā /
T02bsu049_u:3142: na hi bhagavan acaritavadbhiḥ pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śakyā adhimoktum /
T02bsu049_u:3143: ye'pi ca pratikṣepsyanti enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇām,
T02bsu049_u:3144: te'pyevaṃ veditavyāḥ - pūrvāntato'pyebhiriyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā
T02bsu049_u:3145: tathā hyeṣāmasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāsti śraddhāḥ, nāsti kṣāntirnāsti rucirnāsti cchando nāsti vīryaṃ (Vaidya 105) nāstyapramādo nāstyadhimuktiḥ, na caibhiḥ pūrvaṃ
T02bsu049_u:3146: buddhā bhagavanto buddhaśrāvakā vā paripṛṣṭāḥ, na ca paripraśnīkṛtā iti //
T02bsu049_u:3147: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - gambhīrā ārya śāriputra prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:3148: kimatrāścaryaṃ syādyadasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pūrvamacaritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nādhimucyeta? atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:3150: sarvajñajñānasya sa bhagavannamaskāraṃ karoti, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyai namaskāraṃ karoti /
T02bsu049_u:3152: sarvajñajñānasya sa kauśika namaskāraṃ karoti yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyai namaskāraṃ karoti /
T02bsu049_u:3154: hetoḥ? atonirjātā hi kauśika buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā /
T02bsu049_u:3160: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito
T02bsu049_u:3161: bhavati? kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate?
T02bsu049_u:3162: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kauśika /
T02bsu049_u:3163: sādhu khalu punastvaṃ kauśika yastvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamenamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase /
T02bsu049_u:3165: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe na tiṣṭhati, rūpamiti na tiṣṭhati /
T02bsu049_u:3166: yataḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
T02bsu049_u:3167: rūpamiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ rūpe yogamāpadyate /
T02bsu049_u:3169: vijñāne na tiṣṭhati, vijñānamiti na tiṣṭhati /
T02bsu049_u:3170: yataḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vijñāne na tiṣṭhati, vijñānamiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ vijñāne yogamāpadyate /
T02bsu049_u:3171: rūpamiti kauśika na yojayati, yataḥ kauśika rūpamiti na yojayati, evaṃ rūpamiti na tiṣṭhati
T02bsu049_u:3173: vijñānamiti kauśika na yojayati, yataḥ kauśika vijñānamiti na yojayati, evaṃ vijñānamiti na tiṣṭhati /
T02bsu049_u:3176: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:3183: yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ rūpe yogamāpadyate /
T02bsu049_u:3186: yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ vijñāne yogamāpadyate /
T02bsu049_u:3188: / yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate, evaṃ rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati
T02bsu049_u:3191: yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate, evaṃ vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati
T02bsu049_u:3192: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā avinivartanīyasya vyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyā /
T02bsu049_u:3193: tatkasya hetoḥ? sa hi bhagavan na kāṅkṣiṣyati, na vicikitsiṣyati na dhaṃdhāyiṣyati na vivadiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:3194: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:3195: sacetpunarārya śāriputra avyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purata iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyeta, ko doṣo bhavet? evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ
T02bsu049_u:3196: śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - dūrataḥ sa kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato veditavyaḥ
T02bsu049_u:3197: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paripakvakuśalamūlaḥ sa kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ, yo'vyākṛta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
T02bsu049_u:3198: śrutvā ca notrasiṣyati na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsamāpatsyate /
T02bsu049_u:3199: na cedānīmasau cireṇa vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3201: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo naikaṃ vā dvau vā trīn vā tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānatikramiṣyati, tato vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:3204: tathāgatadarśanaṃ ca vyākaraṇenāvandhyaṃ kariṣyati, tathāgatadarśanācca tato vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:3205: yāvacca vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, tāvadavandhyaṃ kariṣyati tathāgatadarśanavandanaparyupāsanopasthānaṃ yāvannānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddha iti //
T02bsu049_u:3206: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - dūrataḥ sa bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:3209: paripakvakuśalamūlo hi bhagavan sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ, ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
T02bsu049_u:3210: kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //
T02bsu049_u:3213: dūrataḥ sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato veditavyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3215: paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati, ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
T02bsu049_u:3216: kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //
T02bsu049_u:3217: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - pratibhāti me bhagavan, pratibhāti me sugata aupamyodāharaṇam /
T02bsu049_u:3219: yo'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svapnāntaragato'pi
T02bsu049_u:3222: evameva bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya, kaḥ punarvādaḥ śrutvā codgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayituṃ
T02bsu049_u:3227: vyākariṣyantyenaṃ buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāyeti
T02bsu049_u:3228: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ, yasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upapatsyate'ntaśaḥ śravaṇāyāpi /
T02bsu049_u:3230: bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
T02bsu049_u:3232: hetoḥ? bhūyastvena hi bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaiḥ sattvāḥ karmopacayairavihitāḥ, teṣāṃ bhūyastvena asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cittāni pratikūlāni bhaviṣyanti, cittāni parivellayiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3233: na hyanupacitakuśalamūlāḥ sattvā asyāṃ bhūyastvena bhūtakoṭyāṃ praskandanti prasīdanti /
T02bsu049_u:3234: upacitakuśalamūlāḥ khalu punaste bhagavan sūpacitakuśalamūlāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca veditavyāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:3236: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan puruṣo yojanaśatikādaṭavīkāntārād dviyojanaśatikādvā triyojanaśatikādvā caturyojanaśatikādvā pañcayojanaśatikādvā daśayojanaśatikādvā aṭavīkāntārānniṣkrāmet /
T02bsu049_u:3237: sa niṣkramya paśyetpūrvanimittāni gopālakān vā paśupālakān vā sīmā vā ārāmasaṃpado vā vanasaṃpado vā, tato'nyāpi va nimittāni, yairnimittairgrāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamo va sūcyeta /
T02bsu049_u:3239: yathemāni pūrvanimittāni dṛśyante, tathā āsanno me grāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamo vā iti /
T02bsu049_u:3242: evameva bhagavan yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upavartate, veditavyaṃ tena bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:3243: abhyāsanno'smyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, nacireṇa vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsye'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti
T02bsu049_u:3244: nāpi tenotrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na bhetavyaṃ śrāvakabhūmervā pratyekabuddhabhūmervā
T02bsu049_u:3245: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi asyemāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante yadutemāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3246: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
T02bsu049_u:3252: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan iha kaścideva puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:3254: yathā yathā ca sa gacchenmahāsamudraṃ darśanāya, tathā tathā sacetpaśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā (Vaidya 108) parvatanimittaṃ vā, tenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ dūre tāvadito mahāsamudra iti /
T02bsu049_u:3255: sacenna bhūyaḥ paśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā, tenaivaṃ veditavyam - abhyāsanna ito mahāsamudra iti /
T02bsu049_u:3256: tatkasya hetoḥ? anupūrvanimno hi mahāsamudraḥ, na mahāsamudrasyābhyantare kaścitstambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā parvatanimittaṃ veti /
T02bsu049_u:3257: kiṃcāpi sa na mahāsamudraṃ sākṣātpaśyati cakṣuṣā,
T02bsu049_u:3258: atha ca punaḥ sa niṣṭhāṃ gacchati - abhyāsanno'smi mahāsamudrasya, neto bhūyo dūre mahāsamudra iti /
T02bsu049_u:3259: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvatā veditavyam - kiṃcāpyahaṃ taistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairna saṃmukhaṃ vyākṛtaḥ, atha ca punarabhyāsanno'smyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervyākaraṇasya /
T02bsu049_u:3261: hetoḥ? tathā hyenāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāyeti
T02bsu049_u:3262: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan vasante pratyupasthite śīrṇaparṇapalāśeṣu nānāvṛkṣeṣu nānāpallavāḥ
T02bsu049_u:3263: / pallaveṣu prādurbhūteṣvāttamanaskā bhavanti jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ tāni
T02bsu049_u:3264: pūrvanimittāni vaneṣu dṛṣṭvā nacirādvanapuṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca prādurbhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3265: tatkasya heto? tathā hi imāni pūrvanimittāni stambeṣu dṛśyanta iti /
T02bsu049_u:3266: evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo labhate imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
T02bsu049_u:3268: tadā paripakvakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ - tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlenopanāmiteyaṃ tasmai gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:3272: nacireṇa batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:3274: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan strī gurviṇī gurugarbhā /
T02bsu049_u:3275: tasyā yadā kāyo veṣṭate, adhimātraṃ vā kāyaklamatho jāyate, na ca sā
T02bsu049_u:3284: paurvakeṇāyoniśomanasikāreṇāsevitena niṣevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāyena vedanāṃ pratyanubhavāmīti, tadā veditavyamidaṃ bhagavan - yathāsyāḥ pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante, tathā nacireṇa bateyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:3286: evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upavartate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya, śṛṇvataścaināṃ ramate cittamasyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3287: prajñāpāramitāyām, arthikatayā cotpadyate, tadā veditavyamidaṃ bhagavan -
T02bsu049_u:3288: nacireṇa batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti
T02bsu049_u:3289: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu śāriputra /
T02bsu049_u:3291: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsuparigṛhītāśca
T02bsu049_u:3292: suparīttāśca suparīnditāśca ime bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
T02bsu049_u:3293: bhagavānāha - tathā hi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bahujanahitāya (Vaidya 109) pratipannā bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
T02bsu049_u:3296: subhūtirāha - iha bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati? bhagavānāha -
T02bsu049_u:3297: yadi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasya vṛddhiṃ samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:3298: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu049_u:3299: na vijñānasya vṛddhiṃ samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:3300: na rūpasya parihāṇiṃ samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:3301: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu049_u:3302: na vijñānasya parihāṇiṃ samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:3311: rūpamacintyamityapi subhūte na saṃjānīte, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:3313: vijñānamacintyamityapi subhūte na saṃjānīte, carati prajñāpāramitāyām //
T02bsu049_u:3314: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ko'tra bhagavan adhimokṣayiṣyati evaṃgambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - yaḥ śāriputra caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyām,
T02bsu049_u:3316: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - kathaṃ bhagavan caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati, kathaṃ caritāvīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate? bhagavānāha - iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balāni na kalpayati, vaiśāradyāni na kalpayati, buddhadharmānapi na kalpayati, sarvajñatāmapi na kalpayati /
T02bsu049_u:3317: tatkasya hetoḥ? balāni hi śāriputra acintyāni, vaiśāradyānyapyacintyāni, buddhadharmā apyacintyāḥ sarvajñatāpyacintyā, sarvadharmā apyacintyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3318: evaṃ caritāvī śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kvaciccarati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:3319: evaṃ sa caritāvītyucyate, caritāvīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate //
T02bsu049_u:3320: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:3323: āścaryaṃ bhagavan syādyadenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca bahavo'ntarāyā utpadyeran /
T02bsu049_u:3325: bahavaḥ subhūte antarāyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca (Vaidya 110)
T02bsu049_u:3327: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate'ntarāyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:3329: tatra śīghraṃ likhatā sacenmāsena vā māsadvayena vā māsatrayeṇa vā likhyeta, likhitavyaiva bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:3330: sacetsaṃvatsareṇa tato vāpareṇa likhitā bhavet, tathāpi likhitavyaiva khalu punaḥ subhūte bhavati tena kulaputreṇa kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:3331: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati yanmahāratnānāṃ bahavo'ntarāyā utpadyante //
T02bsu049_u:3332: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - iha bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dhāryamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3333: paryavāpyamānāyāṃ pravartyamānāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyān bahuprakāramautsukyamāpatsyate, antarāyakarmaṇa udyogaṃ ca kariṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:3334: bhagavānāha - kiṃcāpi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānudyogamāpatsyate antarāyakarmaṇaḥ asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dhāryamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamānāyāṃ pravartyamānāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3336: ca, atha ca punarna prasahiṣyate'cchidrasamādānasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyaṃ kartum
T02bsu049_u:3337: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavan imāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3338: prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate antarāyakaraṇāya, tadā kathametarhi bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca? kasya cānubhāvena bhagavaṃste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:3339: deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - buddhānāṃ śāriputra bhagavatāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3340: tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanubhāvena te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
T02bsu049_u:3341: tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante /
T02bsu049_u:3342: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi śāriputra dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā, ye
T02bsu049_u:3344: yāpayanti, te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhariṣyanti parigrahīṣyanti bhāṣyamāṇāmudgṛhyamāṇāṃ dhāryamāṇāṃ vācyamānāṃ paryavāpyamānāṃ pravartyamānāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ svādhyāyyamānāṃ likhyamānāṃ ca /
T02bsu049_u:3345: ye caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraścodgrahīṣyanti (Vaidya 111) dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:3346: svādhyāsyanti ca, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante,
T02bsu049_u:3347: tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante, tāṃśca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāhariṣyanti parigrahīṣyanti ca /
T02bsu049_u:3348: na hi śāriputra buddhasamanvāhṛtānāṃ buddhaparigṛhītānāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca śakyamantarāyaṃ kartum //
T02bsu049_u:3349: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ye'pi te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:3350: udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
T02bsu049_u:3352: yogamāpatsyante, sarve te bhagavan buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhaparigraheṇa ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:3353: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
T02bsu049_u:3354: tathatvāya ca śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya
T02bsu049_u:3358: sarve te śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhaparigraheṇa ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti
T02bsu049_u:3359: likhiṣyanti ca, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante,
T02bsu049_u:3365: ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
T02bsu049_u:3366: tathatvāya ca śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya
T02bsu049_u:3367: yogamāpatsyante, śrutvo udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya
T02bsu049_u:3368: deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya likhitvā tathatvāya śikṣamāṇāstathatvāya pratipadyamānāstathatvāya yogamāpadyamānā āsannībhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:3371: śāriputra enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:3372: likhiṣyanti, na ca tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, na ca tathatvāya
T02bsu049_u:3373: pratipatsyante, na ca tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante, te na tathatvāya
T02bsu049_u:3374: śikṣamāṇā na tathatvāya pratipadyamānā na tathatvāya yogamāpadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ sthāsyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, te'pi śāriputra tathāgatena jñātāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3378: teṣāmapi śāriputra mahārthiko mahānuśaṃso mahāphalo mahāvipākaśca sa pariśramaḥ parispandaśca bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:3379: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā paramārthopasaṃhitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaprativedhāya pratyupasthitā sarvasattvānām /
T02bsu049_u:3380: (Vaidya 112) ime khalu punaḥ śāriputra ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrāntāstathāgatasyātyayena dakṣiṇāpathe pracariṣyanti,
T02bsu049_u:3381: dakṣiṇāpathātpunareva vartanyāṃ pracariṣyanti, vartanyāḥ punaruttarapathe pracariṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:3382: navamaṇḍaprāpte dharmavinaye saddharmasyāntardhānakālasamaye samanvāhṛtāste śāriputra tathāgatena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca /
T02bsu049_u:3383: tasmin kāle ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti, vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti, antaśo likhitvā pustakagatāmapi kṛtvā dhārayiṣyanti, jñātāste śāriputra tathāgatena /
T02bsu049_u:3387: śāriputra āha - iyamapi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā evaṃgambhīrā paścime kāle
T02bsu049_u:3388: paścime samaye vaistārikī bhaviṣyatyuttarasyāṃ diśi uttare digbhāge?
T02bsu049_u:3389: bhagavānāha - ye tatra śāriputra uttarasyāṃ diśyuttare digbhāge imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpatsyante,
T02bsu049_u:3391: cirayānasaṃprasthitāste śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
T02bsu049_u:3393: śāriputra āha - kiyantaste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti uttarasyāṃ diśi uttare digbhāge, bahava utāho alpakāḥ? ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3394: prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya
T02bsu049_u:3395: pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante? bhagavānāha - bahavaste śāriputra subahavaḥ uttarāpathe uttarasyāṃ diśyuttare digbhāge bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3397: bahubhyo'lpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti, ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3398: prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti, tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya
T02bsu049_u:3399: pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāvaleṣyante na saṃleṣyante, na viṣatsyanti na
T02bsu049_u:3406: pūjitāśca taiḥ paurvakāstathāgatā arhanta samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca bodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3408: bahujanasya ca te'rthaṃ kariṣyanti, yaduta imāmevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya /
T02bsu049_u:3410: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca mayaiva sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiva kathā kṛtā /
T02bsu049_u:3411: teṣāṃ jātivyativṛttānāmapi eta eva sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ samudācārā bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3413: kariṣyanti, enāmeva ca kathāmabhinandiṣyanti, yaduta anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya /
T02bsu049_u:3414: teṣu ca susthitāḥ samāhitāśca bhaviṣyanti asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:3415: māreṇāpi te na śakyā bhedayitum, kutaḥ punaranyaiḥ sattvaiḥ, yaduta cchandato vā mantrato vā /
T02bsu049_u:3416: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma taddṛḍhasthāmatvādanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:3417: te ca kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca śrutvā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudāraṃ prītiprāmodyaprasādaṃ pratilapsyante
T02bsu049_u:3418: bahujanasya ca te kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti yadutānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:3420: kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca mamāntike saṃmukhaṃ vāgbhāṣitā - bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi
T02bsu049_u:3421: bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto vayamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmaḥ saṃprabhāvayiṣyāmaḥ saṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti, avinivartanīyān kariṣyāma iti /
T02bsu049_u:3422: tatkasya hetoḥ? anumoditaṃ hi śāriputra mayā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3423: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca cittena cittaṃ vyavalokya yairiyaṃ vāgbhāṣitā - bodhāya caranto vayaṃ bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni
T02bsu049_u:3424: prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmaḥ
T02bsu049_u:3425: saṃprabhāvayiṣyāmaḥ, saṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti, avinivartanīyān kariṣyāma iti /
T02bsu049_u:3426: evaṃ ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca udārādhimuktikā
T02bsu049_u:3428: yatra saṃmukhībhūtāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti, tatra saṃmukhībhūtānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3430: teṣvapi te buddhakṣetreṣu bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:3432: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadidaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu nāsti kiṃcidadṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā avijñātaṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:3433: na sa kaściddharmo yo na jñāto na sa kāciccaryā sattvānāṃ yā na vijñātā,
T02bsu049_u:3434: yatra hi nāma anāgatānāmapi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātā bodhicchandikānāmadhyāśayasaṃpannānāmārabdhavīryāṇām
T02bsu049_u:3435: (Vaidya 114) ye tasmin kāle imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca, ye ca tasmin kāle āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya udyogamāpadya anveṣiṣyante paryeṣiṣyante, gaveṣiṣyante, teṣāṃ ca kulaputrānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3436: kṛladuhitṝṇāṃ ca anveṣamāṇānāṃ paryeṣamāṇānāṃ kecidgaveṣamāṇā bodhisattvā
T02bsu049_u:3437: lapsyante, kecinna lapsyante, kecidagaveṣayanto'pi lapsyante enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām
T02bsu049_u:3438: kimatra bhagavan kāraṇam? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evametacchāriputra, evametat /
T02bsu049_u:3439: nāsti kiṃcittathāgatasya atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣvadṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā avijñātaṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:3440: tasmin khalu punaḥ śāriputra kāle tasmin samaye kecidbodhisattvā mārgayamāṇā paryeṣamāṇā gaveṣamāṇā api lapsyante imāṃ prajñāpāramitām /
T02bsu049_u:3442: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato'pi
T02bsu049_u:3444: te tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlacchandena enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmamārgayanto'pi aparyeṣamāṇā api agaveṣayanto'pi lapsyante /
T02bsu049_u:3445: yānyapi ca tato'nyānyapi sūtrāṇi enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmabhivadanti, tāni caiṣāṃ svayamevopagamiṣyanti upapatsyante upanaṃsyante ca /
T02bsu049_u:3446: tatkasya hetoḥ? evametacchāriputra bhavati - ya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nikṣiptadhuro mārgayati ca paryeṣate ca, sa jātivyativṛtto'pi janmāntaravyativṛtto'pi enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate /
T02bsu049_u:3447: tato'nyāni ca sūtrāṇi prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni tasya svayamevopagamiṣyanti, upapatsyante upanaṃsyante ceti //
T02bsu049_u:3448: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ime eva kevalaṃ
T02bsu049_u:3449: bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrāntā upapatsyante upanaṃsyante, nānye? bhagavānāha - ye cānye'pi
T02bsu049_u:3450: śāriputra gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntā bhaviṣyanti, te'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca svayamevopapatsyante svayamevopanaṃsyante ca
T02bsu049_u:3451: / tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetacchāriputra bhavati - ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti prabhāvayiṣyanti,
T02bsu049_u:3452: saṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti, avinivartanīyān kariṣyanti, svayaṃ ca tatra śikṣiṣyante, teṣāṃ śāriputra jātivyativṛttānāmapi ime gambhīrā gambhīrā anupalambhapratisaṃyuktāḥ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ
T02bsu049_u:3458: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - guṇā ime bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3460: kecitpunarbhagavaṃsteṣāmantarāyā utpatsyante? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - bahūni subhūte teṣāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3462: subhūtirāha - kiyadrūpāṇi bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ bahūni mārakarmāṇyantarāyakarāṇyutpatsyante? bhagavānāha
T02bsu049_u:3463: teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ cireṇa pratibhānamutpatsyate
T02bsu049_u:3465: tad api ca pratibhānaṃ jāyamānameva vikṣepsyate /
T02bsu049_u:3483: na vayamatra gādhaṃ nāsvādaṃ labhāmahe ityutthāyāsanātprakramiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3487: na no 'tra grāmasya vā nagarasya vā nigamasya vā nāmadheyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ yatra no
T02bsu049_u:3488: janma, na no 'tra nāma gotraṃ vā gṛhītam, na mātāpitrornāma gotraṃ vā
T02bsu049_u:3489: gṛhītam, nāpi kulasya yatra no janmeti, te prajñāpāramitāṃ na śrotavyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3492: tairyāvadbhiścittotpādaistathā tathā tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsārasya punaḥ punaḥ
T02bsu049_u:3493: parigrahīṣyanti, yatra taiḥ punareva yogamāpattavyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:3494: tatkasmāt? imāṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāmaśṛṇvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
T02bsu049_u:3496: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
T02bsu049_u:3497: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya ye te sūtrāntā naiva sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāstān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:3498: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
T02bsu049_u:3499: yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte na laukikalokottareṣu śikṣitukāmā na laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu niryātukāmā iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣante /
T02bsu049_u:3501: evaṃ te parīttabuddhayo laukikalokottarāṇāṃ yathābhūtaparijñāyā mūlaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya praśākhāmadhyālambitavyāṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:3502: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kukkuraḥ svāmino 'ntikātpiṇḍāṃśchorayitvā karmakarasyāntikātkavalaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta, evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke
T02bsu049_u:3503: bodhisattvayānikāḥ, pudgalāḥ, ye imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasya mūlaṃ chorayitvā śākhāpatrapalālabhūte śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne (Vaidya
T02bsu049_u:3505: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
T02bsu049_u:3506: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi te 'lpabuddhayo jñāsyanti -
T02bsu049_u:3508: te prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya chorayitvā tato 'nye sūtrāntā ye śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti,
T02bsu049_u:3511: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:3512: yathā śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante /
T02bsu049_u:3513: kathaṃ ca subhūte śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante? teṣāṃ subhūte evaṃ bhavati - ekamātmānaṃ damayiṣyāmaḥ, ekamātmānaṃ śamayiṣyāmaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:3515: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:3516: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam - ātmānaṃ ca tathatāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3519: sarvakuśalamūlābhisaṃskāraprayogā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivamārabdhavyāḥ, na ca tairmantavyam
T02bsu049_u:3520: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo hastinamapaśyan hastino varṇasaṃsthāne paryeṣeta
T02bsu049_u:3525: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ purūṣo bhavet? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:3526: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā aparipṛcchantastāṃ chorayitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti, pratyekabuddhabhūmimabhivadanti, tān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:3527: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
T02bsu049_u:3528: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ratnārthikaḥ puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā
T02bsu049_u:3532: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:3533: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ, ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvāpyanavagāhamānā avijānantastakṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3534: ye ca sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti, pratyekabuddhabhūmimabhivadanti alpotsukavihāritayā tān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:3535: yatra bodhisattvayānaṃ na saṃvarṇyate, kevalamātmadamaśamathaparinirvāṇameva ity api
T02bsu049_u:3539: prāpnuyāmiti, dṛṣṭa eva dharme anupādāya āsravebhyaścittaṃ vimocya
T02bsu049_u:3544: hetoḥ? mahāyānasaṃprasthitā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhā bhavanti
T02bsu049_u:3546: tatkasya hetoḥ? lokapariṇāyakā hi bhavanti te satpuruṣā lokārthakarāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3548: ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte aparipakvakuśalamūlāḥ parīttakubuddhikā mṛdukādhyāśayā bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ, te ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntānajānānā anavabuddhyamānā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ chorayitvā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmimabhivandanti, tān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante idam api subhūte mārakarma veditavyaṃ teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām tadyathāpi nāma subhūte palagaṇḍo vā palagaṇḍāntevāsī vā vaijayantasya prāsādasya pramāṇena prāsādaṃ kartukāmo nirmātukāmaḥ syāt /
T02bsu049_u:3552: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte vaijayantaprāsādapramāṇaṃ prāsādaṃ kartukāmena nirmātukāmena sūryācandramasorvimānātpramāṇaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:3554: evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ, ye prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya
T02bsu049_u:3555: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante, ye te sūtrāntā evamabhivadanti - ekamātmānaṃ
T02bsu049_u:3556: damayiṣyāmaḥ, ekamātmānaṃ śamayiṣyāmaḥ, ekamātmānaṃ parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti
T02bsu049_u:3557: / kevalamātmadamaśamathaparinirvāṇamevopanayanti, tathārūpān sūtrāntān paryeṣyante, tathā ca śikṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:3558: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te paṇḍitajātīyāḥ bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:3559: bhagavānāha - idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
T02bsu049_u:3560: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rājānaṃ ca cakravartinaṃ bhraṣṭukāmo bhavet, sa rājānaṃ cakravartinaṃ paśyet /
T02bsu049_u:3561: dṛṣṭvā ca īdṛśo rājā cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena tejasā ṛddhyā ceti nimittaṃ gṛhītvā koṭṭarājaṃ paśyet /
T02bsu049_u:3562: sa tasya koṭṭarājasya varṇaṃ saṃsthānaṃ teja ṛddhiṃ ca nimittaṃ ca gṛhītvā apratibalo viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ prati evaṃ vadet - īdṛśa eva sa rājā cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena tejasā ṛddhyā ca nimittena ceti /
T02bsu049_u:3563: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyo yaścakravartinaṃ koṭṭarājena samīkartavyaṃ manyeta? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:3564: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya
T02bsu049_u:3566: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
T02bsu049_u:3567: na khalu punarahaṃ subhūte ebhirevaṃrūpaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntairbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ vadāmi /
