T02bsu049_u:3729: vācayiṣyati, na paryavāpsyati, na pravartayiṣyati, na deśayiṣyati,
T02bsu049_u:3730: nopadekṣyati, noddekṣyati, na svādhyāsyati, na lekhayiṣyati, na likhiṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:3731: tasmāttarhi subhūte yāvanto 'ntarāyā visāmagryāṃ saṃvartante, tāni sarvāṇi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarmāṇīti boddhavyāni, buddhvā ca vivarjayitavyānīti //
T02bsu049_u:3732: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kimatra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ
T02bsu049_u:3733: yadiha māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ mahāntamudyogamāpatsyate? tathā tathā copāyena
T02bsu049_u:3734: ceṣṭiṣyate, yathemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ (Vaidya 123) na kaścidudgrahīṣyati na
T02bsu049_u:3735: dhārayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyati na pravartayiṣyati na deśayiṣyati nopadekṣyati noddekṣyati na svādhyāsyati na lekhayiṣyati na likhiṣyati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:3736: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā /
T02bsu049_u:3739: prahīṇakleśānāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate /
T02bsu049_u:3741: ataḥ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyāṃ mahatā saṃvegena mahāntamudyogamāpadyate
T02bsu049_u:3742: sa mahatodyogena tathā tathopāyena ceṣṭate, yathā na kaścidimāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3744: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣepsyati /
T02bsu049_u:3745: evaṃ ca navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrā vivecayiṣyanti naiṣā prajñāpāramitā yāmāyuṣmantaḥ śṛṇvanti /
T02bsu049_u:3748: ityevaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān saṃśayaṃ prakṣepsyati /
T02bsu049_u:3749: evaṃ ca punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣipya navayānasaṃprasthitān bodhisattvānalpabuddhikān mandabuddhikān parīttabuddhikānandhīkṛtānavyākṛtānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃśayaṃ pātayiṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:3750: te saṃśayaprāptā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgrahīṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti na vācayiṣyanti na paryavāpsyanti na pravartayiṣyanti na deśayiṣyanti nopadekṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na lekhayiṣyanti na likhiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3751: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam //
T02bsu049_u:3752: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣūnnirmāya buddhaveṣeṇāgatya evaṃ mārakarmopasaṃhariṣyati - yo bodhisattvo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu carati, sa bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
T02bsu049_u:3753: sa śrāvako bhavati, na bodhisattvo yathāyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:3755: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam //
T02bsu049_u:3756: evaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānevamādikāni subahūni anyāny api mārakarmāṇyutpādayiṣyati asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyām /
T02bsu049_u:3763: yāni tāni bhagavan mahāratnāni, tāni bahupratyarthikāni bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:3767: evameva bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prāyeṇa bahavo 'ntarāyā
T02bsu049_u:3769: tatra ye 'ntarāyavaśena kusīdā bhaviṣyanti, veditavyamidaṃ bhagavan mārādhiṣṭhitāste bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti, navayānasaṃprasthitāś ca te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti, alpabuddhayaś ca te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti,
T02bsu049_u:3770: (Vaidya 124) mandabuddhayaś ca te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti, parīttabuddhayaś ca te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti, viparyastabuddhayaś ca te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3771: nāpi teṣāmudārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ prakramiṣyati, ye imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgrahītavyāṃ maṃsyante, na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ na paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ na deśayitavyāṃ nopadeṣṭavyāṃ noddeṣṭavyāṃ na svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyām api maṃsyante //
T02bsu049_u:3772: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:3774: navayānasaṃprasthitāś ca te subhūte bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti, alpabuddhayaś ca te bhaviṣyanti, mandabuddhayaś ca te bhaviṣyanti, parīttabuddhayaś ca te bhaviṣyanti, viparyastabuddhayaś ca te bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3775: na ca teṣāmudārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ prakramiṣyati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3776: nodgrahītavyāṃ maṃsyante, na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ na paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ nopadeṣṭavyāṃ noddeṣṭavyāṃ na
T02bsu049_u:3777: svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyām api maṃsyante //
T02bsu049_u:3778: kiṃcāpi subhūte imāni mārakarmāṇyutpatsyante, subahavaścātra māradoṣā antarāyakarā utpatsyante
T02bsu049_u:3779: atha ca subhūte ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītavyāṃ maṃsyante dhārayitavyāṃ vācayitavyāṃ paryavāptavyāṃ pravartayitavyāmupadeṣṭavyāmuddeṣṭavyāṃ svādhyātavyāṃ lekhayitavyāmantaśo likhitavyām api maṃsyante, veditavyametatsubhūte buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena te maṃsyante /
T02bsu049_u:3780: buddhaparigraheṇodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti lekhayiṣyantyantaśo likhiṣyantīti /
T02bsu049_u:3781: tatkasya hetoḥ? māro 'pi hyatra pāpīyān mahāntamudyogamāpatsyate antarāyakaraṇāya /
T02bsu049_u:3787: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma -
T02bsu049_u:3788: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte striyā bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ, pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:3789: sarve te māturglānāyā udyogamāpadyeran - kathamasmākaṃ māturjīvitāntarāyo na
T02bsu049_u:3790: bhavediti, kathamasmākaṃ mātā ciraṃ jīvet, kathamasmākaṃ mātuḥ kāyo na
T02bsu049_u:3791: vinaśyet, kathamasmākaṃ mātā cirasthitikā bhavet, kathamasmākaṃ māturnāma avinaṣṭaṃ bhavet, kathamasmākaṃ māturna duḥkhā vedanotpadyeta, na cāsyā asparśavihāraḥ amanaāpaḥ kāye utpadyeta tatkasya hetoḥ? etayā hi vayaṃ
T02bsu049_u:3793: duṣkarakārikaiṣā asmākaṃ jīvitasya dātrī lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrī /
T02bsu049_u:3794: iti te putrāstāṃ mātaraṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sudhṛtāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3795: dhārayeyuḥ, sugopāyitāṃ gopāyeyuḥ, sukelāyitāṃ kelāyeyuḥ - mā khalvasyāḥ kācidduḥkhā vedanā duḥkho vā sparśa utpadyeta, cakṣuṣo vā śrotrato vā ghrāṇato vā jihvāto vā kāyato vā manasto vā vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā daṃśato vā maśakato vā sarīsṛpato vā manuṣyato vā amanuṣyato vā āpātato vā utpātato vā aniṣṭanipātaḥ śarīre nipatet /
T02bsu049_u:3796: evaṃ te putrāstāṃ mātaraṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ samanvāhṛtya kelāyeyurmamāyeyurgopāyeyuḥ - eṣāsmākaṃ mātā janayitrī, duṣkarakārikaiṣā asmākaṃ jīvitasya dātrī, lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrīti /
T02bsu049_u:3797: evameva subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharanti /
T02bsu049_u:3798: ye 'pi te likhanti udgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti paryavāpnuvanti
T02bsu049_u:3799: pravartayanti deśayantyupadiśantyuddiśanti svādhyāyanti, sarve te tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyānubhāvena adhiṣṭhānena samanvāhāreṇa
T02bsu049_u:3800: / ye 'pi te 'nyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya, hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca, sarvasattvānāṃ cānukampakā anukampāmupādāya, te 'pi sarve imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharanti, autsukyamāpadyante - kimitīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā cirasthitikā bhavet, kimityasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā nāma
T02bsu049_u:3801: avinaṣṭaṃ bhavet, kimityasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā likhyamānāyāḥ śikṣyamāṇāyā māraḥ pāyīyān mārakāyikā vā devatā antarāyaṃ na kuryuriti /
T02bsu049_u:3802: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kelāyanti mamāyanti gopāyanti /
T02bsu049_u:3803: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi mātā janayitrī tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
T02bsu049_u:3804: asyāḥ sarvajñatāyā darśayitrī lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrī /
T02bsu049_u:3805: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3806: prajñāpāramitā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya sarvajñajñānasya janayitrī darśayitrī, evamasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī /
T02bsu049_u:3807: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatā /
T02bsu049_u:3812: ye 'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ (Vaidya 126) samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante, te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
T02bsu049_u:3814: te subhūte etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya, hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca, anukampakā anukampāmupādāya anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:3817: aham api subhūte etarhi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3818: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ janayitrī, evamasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī //
T02bsu049_u:3821: saṃdarśayitrīti, kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī? katamaś ca bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:3822: lokastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairākhyātaḥ? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - pañca subhūte skandhāḥ tathāgatena loka ityākhyātāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3823: katame pañca? yaduta rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam /
T02bsu049_u:3824: ime subhūte pañca skandhāstathāgatena loka ityākhyātāḥ //
T02bsu049_u:3825: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitayā pañca skandhā darśitāḥ? kiṃ vā bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā darśitam? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - na lujyante na pralujyante iti subhūte pañca skandhā loka iti tathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitayā darśitāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:3826: tatkasya hetoḥ na lujyante na pralujyante iti darśitāḥ? śūnyatāsvabhāvā hi subhūte pañca skandhāḥ, asvabhāvatvāt /
T02bsu049_u:3827: na ca subhūte śūnyatā lujyate vā pralujyate vā /
T02bsu049_u:3828: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī
T02bsu049_u:3829: na ca subhūte ānimittaṃ vā apraṇihitaṃ vā anabhisaṃskāro vā anutpādo vā abhāvo vā dharmadhāturvā lujyate vā pralujyate vā /
T02bsu049_u:3830: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhata samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī
T02bsu049_u:3831: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:3832: sattvāḥ, asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T02bsu049_u:3833: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ, asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? sattvāsvabhāvatayā subhūte aprameyāḥ sattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T02bsu049_u:3834: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T02bsu049_u:3835: yāny api tāni subhūte aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ cittacaritāni, tāny api subhūte tathāgataḥ sattvāsadbhāvatayaiva prajānāti /
T02bsu049_u:3836: evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitāmāgamya tathāgato 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni cittacaritāni ca
T02bsu049_u:3838: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī
T02bsu049_u:3839: (Vaidya 127) punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni saṃkṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T02bsu049_u:3840: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni saṃkṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? sa saṃkṣepaṃ kṣayataḥ
T02bsu049_u:3842: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni saṃkṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //
T02bsu049_u:3843: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T02bsu049_u:3844: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? dharmatātaḥ subhūte tāni cittāni vikṣiptāni /
T02bsu049_u:3845: alakṣaṇāni hi tāni cittāni akṣīṇānyavikṣīṇānyavikṣiptāni tāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T02bsu049_u:3846: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //
T02bsu049_u:3847: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyākṣayāṇi cittānyaprameyākṣayāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T02bsu049_u:3848: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyākṣayāṇi cittāni aprameyākṣayāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? tasya subhūte tathāgatasyādhiṣṭhitaṃ bhavati taccittam,
T02bsu049_u:3850: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyākṣayāṇi cittānyaprameyākṣayāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //
T02bsu049_u:3851: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkliṣṭāni cittāni saṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T02bsu049_u:3852: / kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkliṣṭāni cittāni saṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?
T02bsu049_u:3854: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkliṣṭāni cittāni saṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //
T02bsu049_u:3855: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānyasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /

T02bsu049_u:4017: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ tānyunmiñjitanimiñjitāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T02bsu049_u:4018: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatastathāgatatathatayā ca skandhatathatayā ca unmiñjitanimiñjitatathatayā ca tathatāṃ prajñapayati /
T02bsu049_u:4021: tatkasya hetoḥ? uktaṃ hyetatsubhūte tathāgatena - pañca skandhā loka iti saṃjñātāḥ iti /
T02bsu049_u:4022: tasmāttarhi subhūte yā skandhatathatā, sā lokatathatā /
T02bsu049_u:4032: iti hi tathāgatatathatā ca skandhatathatā ca sarvadharmatathatā ca sarvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatathatā ca ekaivaiṣā tathatā anekabhāvābhāvāpagatā anekatvādanānātvādakṣayatvādavikāratvādadvayatvādadvaidhīkāratvāt evameṣā subhūte tathatā tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāmāgamya abhisaṃbuddhā /
T02bsu049_u:4033: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī

T02bsu049_u:4036: prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī /
T02bsu049_u:4037: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatastathatāmabhisaṃbudhya lokasya tathatāṃ jānāti, avitathatāṃ jānāti, ananyatathatāṃ jānāti /
T02bsu049_u:4038: evaṃ ca subhūte tathāgatastathatāmabhisaṃbuddhaḥ saṃstathāgata ityucyate //
T02bsu049_u:4040: ato bhagavaṃstathatāto buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ prabhāvyate prakāśyate /
T02bsu049_u:4042: 'tra bhagavan anyo 'dhimokṣyate 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'rhan vā paripūrṇasaṃkalpo dṛṣṭisaṃpanno vā pudgalaḥ? tathā hi bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:4044: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:4046: tathā hi subhūte akṣayaiṣā tathatā, yā tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhā,
T02bsu049_u:4048: atha khalu śakradevendrapramukhāḥ kāmāvacarā rūpāvarāś ca devaputrā brahmakāyikānāṃ ca viṃśatidevaputrasahasrāṇi yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte tasthuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4049: ekāntasthitāś ca te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - gambhīrā bhagavan dharmāḥ prakāśyante /
T02bsu049_u:4051: bhagavānāha - śūnyamiti devaputrā atra lakṣaṇāni sthāpyante /
T02bsu049_u:4052: ānimittamiti apraṇihitamiti devaputrā atra lakṣaṇāni sthāpyante /
T02bsu049_u:4053: anabhisaṃskāra iti anutpāda iti anirodha iti asaṃkleśa iti avyavadānamiti abhāva iti nirvāṇamiti dharmadhāturiti tathateti devaputrā atra lakṣaṇāni sthāpyante
T02bsu049_u:4054: / tatkasya hetoḥ? aniśritāni hi devaputrā etāni lakṣaṇāni /
T02bsu049_u:4061: naitāni lakṣaṇāni devairvā nāgairvā manuṣyairvā amanuṣyairvā sthāpitāni /
T02bsu049_u:4062: naitāni lakṣaṇāni sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena śakyāni cālayitum /
T02bsu049_u:4066: yo devaputrā evaṃ vadet - idamākāśaṃ kenāpi sthāpitamiti, api nu sa devaputrāḥ samyagvadan vadet? evamukte kāmāvacarā rūpāvarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - na bhagavan ākāśaṃ
T02bsu049_u:4070: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān kāmāvacarān rūpāvarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ
T02bsu049_u:4072: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathaitāni hi sthitāni, tathābhūtāni tathāgatenābhisaṃbudhya ākhyātāni /
T02bsu049_u:4074: (Vaidya 136) atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrāṇi bhagavan imāni lakṣaṇāni tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāni /
T02bsu049_u:4079: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī
T02bsu049_u:4080: yathā subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imāṃ dharmaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupaniśritya viharanti, tathaivaite dharmāḥ sadā sthitāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4082: ataste dharmamevopaniśritya viharanti, dharmaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayantyarcayantyapacāyanti
T02bsu049_u:4083: prajñāpāramitaivaiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmateti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayantyarcayantyapacāyanti /
T02bsu049_u:4084: tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi subhūte prajñāpāramitātastathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatāyāḥ prabhāvanā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:4085: kṛtajñāḥ kṛtavedinaś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /

T02bsu049_u:4092: iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā /

T02bsu049_u:4094: iyam api subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā /
T02bsu049_u:4095: prajñāpāramitāṃ hyāgamya subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya evaṃ sarvadharmeṣu jñānaṃ pravṛttam /
T02bsu049_u:4096: anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇa prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī //
T02bsu049_u:4097: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā
T02bsu049_u:4098: ajānakā apaśyakāḥ, tadā kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte, yastvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametamarthaṃ paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase /
T02bsu049_u:4106: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4108: evam api subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī rūpasyādṛṣṭatvāt /
T02bsu049_u:4110: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī bhavati //
T02bsu049_u:4111: (Vaidya 137) subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan rūpasyādṛṣṭatā bhavati? kathaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām? kathaṃ bhagavan vijñānasyādṛṣṭatā
T02bsu049_u:4112: bhavati? bhagavānāha - yadi subhūte na rūpārambaṇaṃ vijñānamutpadyate,
T02bsu049_u:4115: yadi subhūte na vijñānārambaṇaṃ vijñānamutpadyate, evaṃ vijñānasyādṛṣṭatā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:4116: yā ca subhūte rūpasyādṛṣṭatā, yā ca vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām, yā ca subhūte vijñānasyādṛṣṭatā, saiva lokasya dṛṣṭatā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:4117: evaṃ hi subhūte lokastathāgatena dṛṣṭo bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:4118: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī
T02bsu049_u:4119: kathaṃ ca subhūte prajñāpāramitā lokaṃ saṃdarśayati? iti lokaḥ śūnya iti lokaṃ sūcayati, evaṃ prajñāpayati, evaṃ lokaṃ saṃdarśayati /
T02bsu049_u:4121: iti, lokaḥ śānta iti, loko vivikta iti lokaviśuddhyā lokaṃ sūcayati /
T02bsu049_u:4126: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:4133: kathaṃ ca subhūte acintyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? acintyaṃ hi subhūte
T02bsu049_u:4135: evaṃ hi subhūte acintyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu049_u:4137: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi cittaṃ vā cetanā vā caitasiko vā atra
T02bsu049_u:4139: kathaṃ ca subhūte atulyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? na śakyaṃ subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ
T02bsu049_u:4141: evaṃ hi subhūte atulyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu049_u:4142: kathaṃ ca subhūte aprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? aprameyaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam /
T02bsu049_u:4143: evaṃ hi subhūte aprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu049_u:4144: kathaṃ ca subhūte asaṃkhyeyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? asaṃkhyeyaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam /
T02bsu049_u:4145: evaṃ hi subhūte asaṃkhyeyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu049_u:4146: kathaṃ ca subhūte asamasamakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? nāsti subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya svayaṃbhuvaḥ sarvajñasya samaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4147: kutaḥ punaruttaraḥ? evaṃ hi subhūte asamasamakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā //
T02bsu049_u:4153: vijñānamapyacintyamatulyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamasamasamam, utāho sarvadharmā apyacintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:4157: evaṃ sarvadharmā api subhūte acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4159: rūpasya hi subhūte yā dharmatā, na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā na caitasikā dharmā na tulanā /
T02bsu049_u:4161: vijñānasya hi subhūte yā dharmatā, na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā na caitasikā dharmā na
T02bsu049_u:4163: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte yā dharmatā, na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā na caitasikā dharmā na tulanā /
T02bsu049_u:4175: vijñānasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate /
T02bsu049_u:4176: sarvadharmāṇām api hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate /
T02bsu049_u:4177: kena kāraṇena subhūte rūpasya pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate? kena kāraṇena vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām? kena kāraṇena subhūte vijñānasya pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate? kena kāraṇena subhūte sarvadharmāṇām api pramāṇaṃ
T02bsu049_u:4178: na prajñāyate? rūpasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate /
T02bsu049_u:4180: vijñānasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate /
T02bsu049_u:4181: sarvadharmāṇām api hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate /
T02bsu049_u:4182: kena kāraṇena subhūte rūpasya pramāṇaṃ na vidyate? evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām? kena kāraṇena subhūte vijñānasya pramāṇaṃ na vidyate? kena kāreṇena subhūte
T02bsu049_u:4183: sarvadharmāṇām api pramāṇaṃ na vidyate? apramāṇatvātsubhūte sarvadharmāṇām /
T02bsu049_u:4194: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api tu astyākāśasya samo vā gaṇanā vā pramāṇaṃ vā tulyaṃ vā cittaṃ vā caitasikā vā dharmāḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:4196: evameva subhūte anena paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā api acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ
T02bsu049_u:4200: evamaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamā iti subhūte samasaṃkhyāpramāṇoparamatvādaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāstathāgatadharmāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4201: ākāśasamāsaṃkhyeyāprameyatayā asamasamā asaṃkhyeyā aprameyā ete dharmāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4209: asyāṃ khalu punaracintyatāyāmatulyatāyāmaprameyatāyāmasaṃkhyeyatāyāmasamasamatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni, viṃśateś ca bhikṣuṇīśatānām anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittāni
T02bsu049_u:4212: dharmacakṣurviśuddham, viṃśatyā ca bodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt
T02bsu049_u:4213: te ca bhagavatā ihaiva bhadrakalpe vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:4214: ye 'pi te upāsakā upāsikāś ca yeṣāṃ virajo
T02bsu049_u:4215: vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham, te 'pi bhagavatā vyākṛtāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4217: (Vaidya 140) atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:4224: atra hi subhūte sarvajñatā samāyuktā, atra pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ samāyuktā,
T02bsu049_u:4226: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya yāni tāni
T02bsu049_u:4227: rājakṛtyāni, yāni ca nagarakṛtyāni, yāni ca janapadakṛtyāni, sarvāṇi tāni amātyasamāyuktāni bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:4229: evameva subhūte ye kecidbuddhadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā śrāvakadharmā vā, sarve te prajñāpāramitāsamāyuktāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4231: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa mahākṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā rūpasyāparigrahāya anabhiniveśāya
T02bsu049_u:4237: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan sarvajñatāyā aparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte
T02bsu049_u:4238: samanupaśyasi tvamarhattvaṃ yatra parigrahaṃ vā abhiniveśaṃ vā kuryāḥ?
T02bsu049_u:4240: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaṃ parigṛhṇīyāmabhiniveśeyaṃ vā arhattvamiti /
T02bsu049_u:4243: aham api subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
T02bsu049_u:4244: so 'haṃ subhūte tathāgatatvamasamanupaśyan na parigṛhṇāmi nābhiniveśe /
T02bsu049_u:4246: subhūtirāha - sarvajñatāpi bhagavan aparigrahā anabhiniveśeti? mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ parīttakuśalamūlā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante api tu khalu punarbhagavan ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā hetusaṃpannāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā dīrgharātrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti, ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ
T02bsu049_u:4249: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan -
T02bsu049_u:4253: sacedbhagavaṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye sattvāḥ, te sarve śraddhānusāribhūmau kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā careyuḥ yaśceha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmekadivasam api kṣāntiṃ rocayedgaveṣeta cintayettulayedupaparīkṣeta upanidhyāyet, ayameva bhagavaṃstebhyaḥ śreyān
T02bsu049_u:4254: / evamukte bhagavāṃstān kāmāvacarān (Vaidya 141) rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayāmāsa - yadi devaputrāḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāt, yāvadasya devaputrāḥ kṣiprataraṃ nirvāṇaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam, na tveva teṣāṃ śraddhānusāribhūmau kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā caratām /
T02bsu049_u:4255: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta
T02bsu049_u:4257: ityuktvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikād gamiṣyāma ityārocya prakrāntāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4261: prātiṣṭhantaḥ, rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā brahmaloke prātiṣṭhanteti //
T02bsu049_u:4265: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan bodhisattvo
T02bsu049_u:4266: mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimucyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nāvatiṣṭhate na dhandhāyati na vicikitsati na kāṅkṣati, abhinandati ca prajñāpāramitām, sa bhagavan kutaścyutvā kutropapannaḥ? bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
T02bsu049_u:4267: mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimokṣyate nāvaleṣyate na saṃleṣyate nāvasthāsyate na dhandhāyiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati na kāṅkṣiṣyati, abhinandiṣyati ca darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca, dhārayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyatyenāṃ gambhīrāṃ
T02bsu049_u:4269: na vipṛṣṭhīkariṣyati mānasam, chandaṃ janayiṣyatyudgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ
T02bsu049_u:4270: vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayitum, kariṣyatyanubandham, anugamiṣyati dharmabhāṇakaṃ notsrakṣyati
T02bsu049_u:4271: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte taruṇavatsā gaurnotsṛjati vatsam, evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva
T02bsu049_u:4272: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā tāvanna prahāsyati dharmabhāṇakaṃ yāvadasyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kāyagatā vā bhaviṣyati pustakagatā vā, ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyebhya eva cyuto manuṣyeṣvevopapannaḥ //
T02bsu049_u:4273: subhūtirāha - syādbhagavan etaireva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ? bhagavānāha -
T02bsu049_u:4274: syātsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo 'nyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchya paripraśnīkṛtya tebhyaścyuta
T02bsu049_u:4276: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastuṣitebhyo devebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ, so
T02bsu049_u:4278: yena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paryupāsitaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ paripṛcchitaḥ paripraśnīkṛtaḥ
T02bsu049_u:4280: yena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutā, na tu paripṛṣṭā bhavet, na paripṛcchitā na
T02bsu049_u:4281: paripraśnīkṛtā, tasya punar api manuṣyeṣvevopapannasya asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:4283: dhandhāyitatvam, bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā, veditavyametatsubhūte, ayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ pūrvāntato 'pyaparipṛcchakajātīyo 'bhūt /
T02bsu049_u:4285: tathā hi asyāṃ asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam, bhavati dhandhāyitatvam, bhavati cittasyāvalīnateti //
T02bsu049_u:4286: punaraparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato 'pi śrutā bhavati, paryupāsitā paripṛṣṭā paripṛcchitā paripraśnīkṛtā ca bhavati, ekaṃ vā dinaṃ dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā pañca vā dināni, tasya tāvatkālikī śraddhā bhavati, saṃhriyate
T02bsu049_u:4288: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati - yena pūrvaṃ na saṃparipṛṣṭā bhavatīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā, na saṃparipṛcchitā, (Vaidya 143) na saṃparipraśnīkṛtā, na cānuvartitā bhavati, tasya kaṃcitkālaṃ chando 'nuvartate asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śravaṇāya, kaṃcitkālaṃ chando na bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:4294: navena yānenāgataḥ sa bodhisattvastāṃ śraddhāṃ taṃ prasādaṃ taṃ chandaṃ prahāsyati, yadutaināṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
T02bsu049_u:4296: tasya dvayorbhūmyoranyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā
T02bsu049_u:4297: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ te tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā na gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā, mṛtaśarīraṃ vā nādhyālambante, veditavyam etat - aprāptā evaite pāramudake kālaṃ kariṣyantīti /
T02bsu049_u:4298: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā, mṛtaśarīraṃ vā adhyālambante,
T02bsu049_u:4299: veditavyametatsubhūte - naite udake kālaṃ kariṣyanti, svastinā anantarāyeṇa pāramuttariṣyanti, akṣatāścānupahatāś ca sthale sthāsyantīti
T02bsu049_u:4300: / evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvaḥ śraddhāmātrakeṇa prasādamātrakeṇa
T02bsu049_u:4301: premamātrakeṇa chandamātrakeṇa samanvāgataḥ sa ca prajñāpāramitāṃ
T02bsu049_u:4303: vyavasādamāpatsyate, aprāpta eva sarvajñatāṃ śrāvakatve pratyekabuddhatve vā sthāsyatīti
T02bsu049_u:4304: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasti śraddhā, asti kṣāntiḥ, asti ruciḥ, asti chandaḥ, asti
T02bsu049_u:4305: vīryam, astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ, astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti
T02bsu049_u:4306: gauravam, asti prītiḥ, asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema,
T02bsu049_u:4307: astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum, te ca prajñāpāramitāmadhyālambante
T02bsu049_u:4308: evaṃ teṣāṃ sā śraddhā sā kṣāntiḥ sā rūciḥ sa cchandaḥ tadvīryaṃ so 'pramādaḥ sādhimuktiḥ so 'dhyāśayaḥ sa tyāgaḥ tadgauravaṃ sā prītiḥ tatprāmodyaṃ sa prasādaḥ tatprema sā anikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
T02bsu049_u:4309: te ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prāpya sarvajñatāyāṃ sthāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:4310: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī va puruṣo vā aparipakvena ghaṭenodakaṃ parivahet,
T02bsu049_u:4313: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma tadaparipakvatvāddhaṭasya, sa bhūmiparyavasāna eva bhaviṣyatīti
T02bsu049_u:4314: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti rūciḥ asti chandaḥ asti vīryam astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ astyadhyāśayaḥ asti
T02bsu049_u:4316: asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti
T02bsu049_u:4318: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca aparigṛhīto bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:4319: veditavyametatsubhūte ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyata iti /
T02bsu049_u:4320: kaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasyāntarā vyadhvani vyavasādaḥ - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā? tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā suparipakvena ghaṭena nadīto vā sarasto vā taḍāgato vā udapānādvā tato 'nyebhyo vā udakādhārebhya udakaṃ parivahet,
T02bsu049_u:4324: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4325: astyadhimuktiḥ astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti premaḥ astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
T02bsu049_u:4326: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:4330: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvamanākoṭitāmaparikarmakṛtāṃ cirabandhanabaddhāmudake 'vatārya
T02bsu049_u:4332: veditavyametatsubhūte - evaṃdharmeyaṃ naurbhaviṣyati, yaduta udake 'saṃtīrṇabhāṇḍaiva saṃsatsyatīti
T02bsu049_u:4333: tasyānyena bhāṇḍaṃ bhaviṣyati, anyena sā naurvipatsyate iti /
T02bsu049_u:4334: evaṃ sa sārthavāho 'nupāyakuśalo dauṣprajñena mahatā arthaviyogena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati, mahataś ca ratnākarātparihīṇo
T02bsu049_u:4336: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti
T02bsu049_u:4337: kṣāntiḥ, asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4338: astyadhimuktiḥ astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4339: asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema, astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum, sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati, veditavyametatsubhūte aprāpta evāyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāratnākaramantarā saṃsatsyati, vyavasādamāpatsyate, mahataḥ svārthātparihīṇo bhaviṣyati, mahataś ca parārtharatnarāśeḥ parihīṇo
T02bsu049_u:4341: kā punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya antarā vyadhvani saṃsīdanā? yaduta śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā
T02bsu049_u:4342: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paṇḍitajātīyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvaṃ subaddhāṃ bandhayitvā svākoṭitāmākoṭayitvā suparikarmakṛtāṃ kṛtvā udake 'vatārya bhāṇḍamāropya pūrṇāṃ kṛtvā samaṃ yojayitvā yuktena vātenābhipretāṃ diśamanupūrveṇa gacchet,
T02bsu049_u:4345: mahālābhena cāyaṃ sārthavāhaḥ saṃyokṣyate yaduta laukikai ratnairiti /
T02bsu049_u:4346: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruci chandaḥ asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ astyadhimuktiḥ, astyādhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4347: asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema,
T02bsu049_u:4348: astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum, sa ca prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena cāvirahito bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:4350: saṃsatsyati, na vyavasādamāpatsyate, sthāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:4353: yato 'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā, asti kṣāntiḥ, asti
T02bsu049_u:4354: ruciḥ, asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ
T02bsu049_u:4355: astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti (Vaidya 145) asti prītiḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4356: asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema, astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum
T02bsu049_u:4357: ete cāsya dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena cāvirahitā na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pratipatsyante /
T02bsu049_u:4358: api tu yena sarvajñatā, tenaite dharmā abhimukhāḥ saṃprasthitāḥ tato 'syā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāya bhaviṣyantīti /
T02bsu049_u:4359: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā
T02bsu049_u:4360: bhavet, tasya kaścideva śarīre vyādhirutpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā /
T02bsu049_u:4361: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣo
T02bsu049_u:4364: - sacetpunaḥ subhūte sa puruṣo mañcāduttiṣṭhet, atha ca punarna pratibalo
T02bsu049_u:4366: sa tayā jarayā tena ca vyādhinā kṣapito yady api mañcāduttiṣṭhet, tathāpi punarapratibalaḥ sa puruṣaḥ prakramaṇāya /
T02bsu049_u:4367: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā, asti kṣāntiḥ, asti
T02bsu049_u:4368: ruciḥ, asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4369: astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ, asti prāmodyam,

T02bsu049_u:4598: bhagavānāha - ākāśanimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā ākāśapravaṇayā ākāśaprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā sarvajñatānimnā saṃtatirvyavacāritā
T02bsu049_u:4600: yā khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvajñatānimnayā saṃtatyā vyavacāraṇā,
T02bsu049_u:4605: aprameyamapramāṇam, na tadrūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na
T02bsu049_u:4606: vijñānaṃ na prāptirnābhisamayo nādhigamo na mārgo na mārgaphalaṃ na jñānaṃ na vijñānaṃ notpattirna vināśo notpādo na vyayo na nirodho na bhāvanā na
T02bsu049_u:4607: vibhāvanā, nāpi kenacitkṛtaṃ nāpi kutaścidāgataṃ nāpi kvacid gacchati nāpi kvaciddeśe nāpi kvacitpradeśe sthitam, api tu aprameyapramāṇamityevaṃ
T02bsu049_u:4610: yā ca aprameyatā, na sā śakyā kenacidabhisaṃboddhum /
T02bsu049_u:4611: na rūpeṇa na vedanayā na saṃjñayā na saṃskārairna vijñānena na dānapāramitayā na śīlapāramitayā na kṣāntipāramitayā na vīryapāramitayā na dhyānapāramitayā na prajñāpāramitayā śakyā abhisaṃboddhum tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpameva hi subhūte sarvajñatā /
T02bsu049_u:4615: śīlapāramitaiva kṣāntipāramitaiva vīryapāramitaiva dhyānapāramitaiva prajñāpāramitaiva hi subhūte sarvajñatā //
T02bsu049_u:4616: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarairdevaputrairbrahmāpi sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ rūpāvacarairdevaputrairyena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4617: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthau
T02bsu049_u:4618: ekānte sthitaś ca śakro devendraḥ kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:4622: idamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhamātrasya bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya alpotsukatāyāṃ cittamavanataṃ na dharmadeśanāyām //
T02bsu049_u:4623: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ kāmāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān brahmāṇaṃ ca sahāpatiṃ rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma -
T02bsu049_u:4630: 152) anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhamātrasya bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya alpotsukatāyāṃ cittamavanataṃ na dharmadeśanāyām - gambhīro batāyaṃ mayā
T02bsu049_u:4631: dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti, yatra na kaścidabhisaṃbuddho na kaścidabhisaṃbhotsyate na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate
T02bsu049_u:4637: evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ kāmāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
T02bsu049_u:4640: anugrahāya ca bhagavan dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmo deśyate /
T02bsu049_u:4645: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - sarvadharmānupalambho batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmo deśyate /
T02bsu049_u:4647: apratihatalakṣaṇo batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ ākāśasamatayā sarvapadānupalabdhitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4653: atha khalu devānāmindro brahmā sahāpatiste ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - anujāto batāyaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ śrāvaka āryasubhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4654: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan yaṃ yameva ayamāryasubhūtiḥ sthaviro dharmaṃ deśayati, taṃ tameva dharmaṃ
T02bsu049_u:4656: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca sahāpatiṃ tāṃś ca kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma -
T02bsu049_u:4657: yaddevaputrā evaṃ vadatha - anujāto 'yaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatasyeti /
T02bsu049_u:4664: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā hi tathāgatatathatā, sā sarvadharmatathatā /
T02bsu049_u:4666: yā ca tathāgatatathatā, yā ca sarvadharmatathatā, saiva subhūteḥ sthavirasya tathatā /
T02bsu049_u:4672: tathāgatasya yā sā tathatāyāḥ sthititā, tayā sthititayā subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ
T02bsu049_u:4673: / yathā tathāgatatathatā avikārā nirvikārā, avikalpā nirvikalpā, evaṃ hi subhūtitathatā avikārā nirvikārā, avikalpā nirvikalpā /
T02bsu049_u:4674: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastayā tathatayā avikāro nirvikāro 'vikalpo
T02bsu049_u:4676: yathā ca tathāgatatathatā avikārā nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā, na kvacitpratihanyate, evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā avikārā nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā, na kvacitpratihanyate /
T02bsu049_u:4677: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā ca tathāgatatathatā, yā ca sarvadharmatathatā, ekaivaiṣā tathatā advayādvaidhīkārā advayatathatā /
T02bsu049_u:4681: kasyacittathatā, tataḥ sā tathatā advayādvaidhīkārā advayatathatā /
T02bsu049_u:4683: yā ca akṛtatathatā, na sā kadācinna tathatā /
T02bsu049_u:4684: yataś ca (Vaidya 154) sā na kadācinna tathatā, tataḥ sā tathatā advayādvaidhīkārā advayatathatā
T02bsu049_u:4686: yathā tathāgatatathatā sarvatra sarvadharmeṣvavikalpā nirvikalpā, evaṃ subhūtitathatā sarvatra
T02bsu049_u:4688: evameva ca tathāgatatathatayābhinirmitaḥ subhūtiśceti dvayamapyaluptametadabhinnaṃ bhedakānupalabdhitaḥ
T02bsu049_u:4690: yathā tathāgatatathatā nānyatra sarvadharmatathatāyāḥ, evaṃ hi subhūtitathatā nānyatra sarvadharmatathatāyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4691: yā nānyatra sarvadharmatathatāyāḥ, na sā kasyacinna tathatā /
T02bsu049_u:4697: yathā tathāgatatathatā nātītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā, evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā /
T02bsu049_u:4698: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastāṃ tathatāmanujātastathāgatamanujāta ityucyate /
T02bsu049_u:4707: iti hi subhūtitathatā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannatathatā ca tathāgatatathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram
T02bsu049_u:4708: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā ca subhūtitathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
T02bsu049_u:4711: iyaṃ sā tathatā, yayā tathatayā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:4712: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ san tathāgata iti nāmadheyaṃ labhate /
T02bsu049_u:4713: asyāṃ khalu punastathātagatathatāyāṃ nirdiśyamānāyāmiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ ṣaḍvikāramaṣṭādaśamahānimittamakampat, prākampat, saṃprākampat,
T02bsu049_u:4714: acalat prācalat saṃprācalat, avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat, araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat, akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat, agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat tathāgatasyaivānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyamānasyeti /
T02bsu049_u:4715: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - evaṃ hi devaputrāḥ subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ //
T02bsu049_u:4716: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro na rūpamanujāto na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānamanujāto na srotaāpattiphalamanujāto na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ na anāgāmiphalaṃ na arhattvaphalamanujāto na pratyekabuddhatvamanujāto na buddhatvamanujātaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4717: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante yairanujāyeta, ye cānujāyeran
T02bsu049_u:4719: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīracaryeyaṃ bhagavan yaduta tathatā
T02bsu049_u:4723: asmin khalu punastathatānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne trayāṇāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni, pañcānāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham,
T02bsu049_u:4724: pañcabhiś ca devaputrasahasraiḥ pūrvaparikarmakṛtairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā, ṣaṣṭeś ca bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni
T02bsu049_u:4726: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrasteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni viditvā bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadeteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni? bhagavānāha
T02bsu049_u:4727: - etaiḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaiḥ pañcabuddhaśatāni paryupāsitāni, sarvatra ca dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣityaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryamārabdhaṃ
T02bsu049_u:4729: te khalu punarime prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena ca virahitā abhūvan /
T02bsu049_u:4730: kiṃcāpi śāriputra eteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmasti mārgaḥ śūnyatā vā ānimittacaryā vā apraṇihitamanasikāratā vā, atha ca punaretairupāyakauśalyavikalatvādbhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkṛtā, śrāvakabhūmau
T02bsu049_u:4732: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra pakṣiṇaḥ śakuneryojanaśatiko vā dviyojanaśatiko vā triyojanaśatiko vā caturyojanaśatiko vā pañcayojanaśatiko vā ātmabhāvo bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:4733: sa trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu vartamāno jambūdvīpamāgantavyaṃ manyeta /
T02bsu049_u:4734: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra pakṣī śakunirajātapakṣo vā bhavet, śīrṇapakṣo vā bhavet,
T02bsu049_u:4736: sa trāyastriṃśato devanikāyādātmānamutsṛjet - iha jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti manyeta /
T02bsu049_u:4737: atha tasya pakṣiṇaḥ śakunestataḥ patataḥ ākāśe antarīkṣe sthitasya antarā cittasyaivaṃ bhavet - aho batāhaṃ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratiṣṭheyamiti /
T02bsu049_u:4738: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakuniḥ pratibalaḥ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu
T02bsu049_u:4739: pratiṣṭhātum? āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:4741: sacetpunarevaṃ cintayet - aho batāhamakṛto 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭheyamiti /
T02bsu049_u:4742: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakunirakṛto 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhet? śāriputra āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:4743: kṛtaś ca sa bhagavan upahataś ca bhavejjambūdvīpe ca patitaḥ san maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham /
T02bsu049_u:4744: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetadbhagavan bhavati - yadasya mahāṃścātmabhāvo bhavati, pakṣau cāsya na bhavataḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4749: samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt, śīlaṃ rakṣet, kṣāntyā saṃpādayet, vīryamārabheta, dhyānāni,
T02bsu049_u:4750: samāpadyeta, mahaccāsya prasthānaṃ bhavet, mahāṃścāsya cittotpādo bhavedanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum
T02bsu049_u:4751: sacedayaṃ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavet, evaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ
T02bsu049_u:4754: 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tacchīlaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ tāṃ
T02bsu049_u:4755: prajñāṃ tāṃ vimuktiṃ tadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ samanvāharati, ādhārayati
T02bsu049_u:4756: nimittayogena, na sa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śīlaṃ na
T02bsu049_u:4758: na samādhiṃ na prajñāṃ na vimuktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ jānāti, na paśyati /
T02bsu049_u:4761: taṃ śabdaṃ nimittīkṛtya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumicchati /
T02bsu049_u:4762: tato veditavyam etat - sthāsyatyayaṃ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau veti /
T02bsu049_u:4763: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetacchāriputra bhavati - yatprajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati //
T02bsu049_u:4764: śāriputra āha - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi - yo bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahitaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4765: kiṃcāpi sa bahunāpi puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaś ca
T02bsu049_u:4767: tasmāttarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
T02bsu049_u:4769: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evametacchāriputra, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:4770: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ, upāyakauśalyena ca virahitaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4771: kiṃcāpi sa bahunā puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaś ca bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:4773: tasmāttarhi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā, upāyakuśalena ca bhavitavyam //
T02bsu049_u:4774: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ, brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā, durabhisaṃbhavā bhagavan anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:4776: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān sahāpatimahābrahmapramukhān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma -
T02bsu049_u:4783: paramadurabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhumiti, kathaṃ bhagavan durabhisaṃbhavā
T02bsu049_u:4784: samyaksaṃbodhiḥ? paramadurabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhum, yatra na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate? tatkasya
T02bsu049_u:4786: na sa kaściddharmaḥ saṃvidyate yo dharmaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum /
T02bsu049_u:4788: yasyāpi bhagavan dharmasya prahāṇāya dharmo deśyate, so 'pi dharmo na saṃvidyate /
T02bsu049_u:4790: yaccābhisaṃboddhavyam, yaś ca jānīyāt, yacca jñātavyam, (Vaidya 157) sarva ete dharmāḥ śūnyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:4793: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - asaṃbhavatvātsubhūte durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4799: śūnyamityanenāpyāyuṣman subhūte paryāyeṇa durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4803: evaṃ ca āyuṣman subhūte ime dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4806: yadi cāyuṣman subhūte svabhisaṃbhavā bhavedanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ, na tvevaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivarterannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4807: yasmāttarhyāyuṣman subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivartante 'nuttarayāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, tasmādāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vijñāyate -
T02bsu049_u:4810: evamukte āyuṣman subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
T02bsu049_u:4812: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ, yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:4814: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4816: kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo
T02bsu049_u:4817: 'nyatra vijñānāt sa dharmaḥ, yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha
T02bsu049_u:4820: rūpatathatā, sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4821: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā, yā vijñānatathatā, sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4822: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa
T02bsu049_u:4823: dharmaḥ, yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4824: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ, anyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ, yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
T02bsu049_u:4827: rūpamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4828: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā
T02bsu049_u:4829: vijñānamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4830: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman (Vaidya 158) śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ, yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4831: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ, anyatra vijñānātsa dharmaḥ, yo
T02bsu049_u:4833: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā anuttarāṃ saṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4835: kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4836: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ, yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
T02bsu049_u:4839: anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ, anyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ, yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
T02bsu049_u:4842: rūpaṃ boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte
T02bsu049_u:4843: / subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4844: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ, yo boddhavyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4845: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:4846: saṃskārebhyaḥ, anyatra vijñānātsa dharmaḥ yo boddhavyo 'nuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:4848: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā boddhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
T02bsu049_u:4851: vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā boddhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4853: kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ, yo boddhavyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4855: kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:4856: saṃskāratathatāyāḥ, anyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ, yo boddhavyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4858: tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatā vivartate anuttarāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:4860: subhūtirāha - tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatāyāṃ sa dharmaḥ, yo vivartate anuttarāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:4862: subhūtirāha - tatkatamaḥ punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa dharmo yo vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
T02bsu049_u:4863: yastasyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ sthitaḥ sarvadharmāsthānayogena? katamo vā punaḥ
T02bsu049_u:4864: sa śāriputra dharmo yā tathatā? kaccidvā punarāyuṣman śāriputra tathatā
T02bsu049_u:4866: subhūtirāha - evamāyuṣman śāriputra satyataḥ sthitito 'nupalabhyamānānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ
T02bsu049_u:4867: dharmaḥ, yo vivartiṣyate anuttarayāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ (Vaidya 159) subhūtimetadavocat - yayā dharmanayajātyā āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro nirdiśati, tayā na sa
T02bsu049_u:4869: ye ca khalu punarime āyuṣman subhūte trayo bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāstathāgatenākhyātāḥ, eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ na bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:4870: ekameva hi yānaṃ bhavati yaduta buddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānaṃ yathā āyuṣmataḥ subhūternirdeśaḥ
T02bsu049_u:4871: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:4872: kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ ekam api bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchati śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:4874: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punastvamāyuṣman subhūte ekam api bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchasi śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā? subhūtirāha -
T02bsu049_u:4875: kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā tathatāyāstathatā, tatra tathatāyāmekam api
T02bsu049_u:4876: bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyasi śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā? śāriputra āha - na hyetadāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4878: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra tathatā ekenāpyākāreṇopalabhyate? āha - na hyetadāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4879: subhūtirāha - kaccitpunastvamāyuṣman śāriputra tathatāyāmekam api bodhisattvadharmaṃ samanupaśyasi? āha - na hyetadāyuṣman subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4882: - ayaṃ śrāvakayānikaḥ, ayaṃ pratyekabuddhayānikaḥ, ayaṃ mahāyānika iti?
T02bsu049_u:4883: evameteṣāmāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathatāyāṃ pravibhāvyamānānāmaviśeṣatāṃ nirviśeṣatāṃ nirnānākaraṇatāṃ śrutvā yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na
T02bsu049_u:4884: pṛṣṭhībhavati, veditavyam etat - niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:4886: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:4888: pratibhāti te subhūte yathāpi nāma tathāgatānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānenedaṃ vadasi /
T02bsu049_u:4889: evameteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathatāyāṃ pravibhāvyamānānāmaviśeṣatāṃ nirviśeṣatāṃ nirnānākaraṇatāṃ śrutvā yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na pṛṣṭhībhavati, veditavyam etat - niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:4891: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - katamayā bhagavan bodhyā niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ? bhagavānāha -
T02bsu049_u:4892: anuttarayā śāriputra samyaksaṃbodhyā niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ //
T02bsu049_u:4893: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - anuttarāyāṃ bhagavan samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ sthātavyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:4894: kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? bhagavānāha - anuttarāyāṃ subhūte samyaksaṃbodhau
T02bsu049_u:4895: niryātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattveṣu samaṃ sthātavyam /
T02bsu049_u:4905: sarvasattveṣu mātṛsaṃjñāmupasthāya pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ copasthāpya pare ālambitavyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:4906: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmantike sthātavyam, evaṃ śikṣitavyam - sarvasattvānāmahaṃ nātha iti /
T02bsu049_u:4908: dānaṃ dātavyaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayitavyaṃ vīryamārabdhavyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpattavyaṃ prajñāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaṃ,
T02bsu049_u:4911: evaṃ satyeṣu yāvadbodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntau sattvaparipācane ca sthitvā anyeṣām api tatra samādāpakena tadvarṇavādinā tatsamanujñena ca bhavitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:4912: tasyaivaṃ spṛhayata evaṃ śikṣamāṇasya anāvaraṇaṃ rūpaṃ yāvaddharmasthitiranāvaraṇā bhaviṣyatīti
T02bsu049_u:4916: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - avinivartanīyasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ke ākārāḥ, kāni liṅgāni, kāni
T02bsu049_u:4917: nimittāni? kathaṃ vā bhagavan vayaṃ jānīyāma ayamavinivartanīyo
T02bsu049_u:4918: bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti? bhagavānāha - yā ca subhūte pṛthagjanabhūmiḥ,
T02bsu049_u:4919: yā ca śrāvakabhūmiḥ, yā ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ, yā ca buddhabhūmiḥ, iyaṃ tathatābhūmirityucyate
T02bsu049_u:4920: sarvāścaitāstathatāyā advayā advaidhīkārā avikalpā nirvikalpā iti tāṃ tathatāṃ tāṃ dharmatāmavataranti
T02bsu049_u:4921: tathatāyāṃ sthitastathatāṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati, evamavatarati /
T02bsu049_u:4922: evamavatīrṇo yathātathatāṃ śrutvāpi tato 'pi cāpakramya na kāṅkṣati na vimatiṃ karoti,
T02bsu049_u:4923: na vicikitsati, naivamiti na dhandhāyati, api tu evametattathataivetyadhimuñcatyavagāhate, na ca yatkiṃcanapralāpī bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:4924: arthasaṃhitāmeva vācaṃ bhāṣate nānarthasaṃhitām, na ca pareṣāṃ kṛtākṛtāni vyavalokayati /
T02bsu049_u:4925: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo
T02bsu049_u:4927: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nānyeṣāṃ śramaṇānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vā mukhamullokayati - ime bhagavantaḥ śramaṇā
T02bsu049_u:4928: brāhmaṇā vā jñeyaṃ jānanti, dṛśyaṃ paśyantīti /
T02bsu049_u:4929: na cānyān devānnamaskaroti, na cānyebhyo devebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā
T02bsu049_u:4930: mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭāṃ vā patākāṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dātavyaṃ manyate, na cānyaṃ devaṃ vyapāśrayate /
T02bsu049_u:4931: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo
T02bsu049_u:4933: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāpāyeṣūpapadyate, na ca strībhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti //
T02bsu049_u:4934: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate /
T02bsu049_u:4936: bhavati, parān api ca prāṇātipātaviramaṇāya samādāpayati /
T02bsu049_u:4937: ātmanā ca adattādānātprativirato bhavati, parān api ca adattādānaviramaṇāya samādāpayati /
T02bsu049_u:4938: ātmanā ca kāmamithyācārātprativirato bhavati, parān api ca
T02bsu049_u:4940: ātmanā ca surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānātprativirato bhavati, parān api surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānaviramaṇāya samādāpayati /
T02bsu049_u:4941: ātmanā ca anṛtavacanātprativirato bhavati, parān api ca anṛtavacanaviramaṇāya samādāpayati
T02bsu049_u:4942: ātmanā ca piśunavacanātprativirato bhavati, parān api ca
T02bsu049_u:4945: bhavati, parān api ca paruṣavacanaviramaṇāya samādāpayati /
T02bsu049_u:4946: ātmanā ca saṃbhinnapralāpātprativirato bhavati, parān api ca
T02bsu049_u:4948: ātmanā ca abhidhyātaḥ prativirato bhavati, parān api ca abhidhyānaviramaṇāya samādāpayati
T02bsu049_u:4949: (Vaidya 162) ātmanā ca vyāpādātprativirato bhavati, parān api ca
T02bsu049_u:4952: bhavati, parān api ca mithyādarśanaviramaṇāya samādāpayati /
T02bsu049_u:4953: evaṃ khalu subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svayaṃ ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate, parān api ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dṛḍhīkaroti /
T02bsu049_u:4955: bāhulyato vā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ nādhyāpadyate, cittenāpi na samudācarati /
T02bsu049_u:4956: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svapnāntaragatasyāpi daśakuśalāḥ karmapathā āmukhībhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:4957: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo
T02bsu049_u:4959: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaṃ yaṃ dharmaṃ paryavāpnoti, dadāti ca, taṃ taṃ evaṃcittaḥ paryavāpnoti, dadāti ca -
T02bsu049_u:4960: imamahaṃ dharmaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya paryavāpnomi dadāmi ca, hitāya sukhāya ca /
T02bsu049_u:4961: iti caiṣa bhavatu, anayā dharmadeśanayā dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ paripūryantāmiti
T02bsu049_u:4963: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo
T02bsu049_u:4965: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu na kāṅkṣati, na vimatiṃ karoti, na vicikitsati na
T02bsu049_u:4966: dhandhāyati, hitavacanaś ca bhavati, mitavacanaś ca bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:4967: snigdhavacanaś ca bhavati, alpastyānamiddhaś ca bhavati, niranuśayaś ca bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:4968: so 'bhikrāman vā pratikrāman vā na bhrāntacitto 'bhikrāmati vā,
T02bsu049_u:4971: na vilambitaṃ pādaṃ bhūmerutkṣipati, na vilambitaṃ pādaṃ bhūmau nikṣipati /
T02bsu049_u:4974: bhūmerutkṣipati, na ca sahasā pādaṃ bhūmau nikṣipati, paśyannaiva bhūmipradeśamākrāmati /
T02bsu049_u:4975: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre cīvaraparibhogo na yūkilo bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:4979: yāni khalu punaranyeṣāṃ sattvānāmaśītiḥ kṛmikulasahasrāṇi kāye
T02bsu049_u:4980: saṃbhavanti, tāni tasya kāye sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃbhavanti
T02bsu049_u:4981: / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasya tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvalokābhyudgatāni
T02bsu049_u:4983: yathā yathā ca tasya tāni kuśalamūlāni vivardhante, tathā tathā sa
T02bsu049_u:4984: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyapariśuddhiṃ ca parigṛhṇīte, vākpariśuddhiṃ ca parigṛhṇīte, cittapariśuddhiṃ ca parigṛhṇīte /
T02bsu049_u:4987: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni vivardhante, tathā tathā sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścittālpakṛtyatāṃ ca parigṛhṇīte,
T02bsu049_u:4988: cittāśāṭhyatāṃ ca cittāmāyāvitāṃ ca cittākuṭilatāṃ cittāvaṅkatāṃ ca
T02bsu049_u:4989: parigṛhṇīte, yayā ca subhūte cittapariśuddhyā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmimatikrānto bhavati
T02bsu049_u:4990: iyaṃ subhūte tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittapariśuddhirveditavyā /
T02bsu049_u:4991: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:4993: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na lābhasatkāraślokaguruko bhavati, na cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraguruko bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:4995: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu saṃsīdati /
T02bsu049_u:4996: sthirabuddhiś ca bhavati, gambhīrabuddhiś ca bhavati, satkṛtya ca parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
T02bsu049_u:4997: yaṃ ca satkṛtya parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti, taṃ sarvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃsyandayati /
T02bsu049_u:4999: śilpasthānakarmasthānāni, tāni sarvāṇi prajñāpāramitāmāgamya dharmatayā saṃsyandayati /
T02bsu049_u:5000: na ca kaṃciddharma samanupaśyati, yaṃ na dharmadhātunā
T02bsu049_u:5003: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //
T02bsu049_u:5004: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānaṣṭau mahānirayānabhinirmāya tatra ekaikasmin mahāniraye bahūni bodhisattvaśatāni bahūni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇyabhinirmāya avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vadet - ye tathāgatena avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtāḥ, te eteṣu mahānirayeṣūpapannāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5007: kiṃ te buddhatvena? evaṃ tvaṃ na nirayeṣūpapatsyase /
T02bsu049_u:5009: sacedevam api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati, na calati,
T02bsu049_u:5010: evaṃ jānāti - asthānametadanavakāśaḥ, yadavinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pāyeṣūpapadyate iti /
T02bsu049_u:5011: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:5013: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇa avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati - yadetattvayā pūrvaṃ śrutaṃ tatpratideśaya, yattvayā pūrvaṃ parigṛhītaṃ tatpratiniḥsṛja sacettvamevaṃ pratideśayiṣyasi, sacettvamevaṃ pratiniḥsrakṣyasi, evaṃ vayaṃ tvāṃ punaḥ punarupasaṃkramiṣyāmaḥ
T02bsu049_u:5019: etacchrutvā sacedbodhisattvaḥ kṣubhyati calati, veditavyametatsubhūte - nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvastathāgataiḥ
T02bsu049_u:5023: sacetpunaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kṣubhyati na calati, śrutvāpi cemāṃ vācaṃ mārasya pāpīyasaḥ dharmatāmeva pratisarati,
T02bsu049_u:5026: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte arhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāsravo na parasya śraddhayā gacchati dharmatāyāṃ pratyakṣakārī /
T02bsu049_u:5028: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'navamardanīyaḥ śrāvakayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ pratyekabuddhayānikaiś ca /
T02bsu049_u:5029: apratyudāvartanīyadharmā bhavati, śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā niyato bhavati sarvajñatāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5030: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā avinivartanīyadhātau sthito bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:5032: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:5034: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya kaścidevaṃ vakṣyatisaṃsāracārikaiṣā, naiṣā bodhisattvacārikā /
T02bsu049_u:5040: sacedevam api na kṣubhyati na calati, tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān svayamevaṃ vakṣyati - icchasi tvaṃ draṣṭuṃ tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān yairgaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyupasthitāścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ,
T02bsu049_u:5042: gaṅgānadīvālukopamā eva buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitāḥ paripṛṣṭāḥ paripraśnīkṛtāś ca asyaiva bodhisattvayānasyārthāya kathaṃ bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sthātavyamiti? yathā ca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sthātavyam, tathā ca taistathāgatairevākhyātam /
T02bsu049_u:5043: tathāpi sthitvā tathā caritvā tathaiva yogamāpadya adyāpi taireva tāvanna anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā
T02bsu049_u:5044: tathā avavādānuśāsanyāṃ sthitaistathā śikṣamāṇaiḥ sarvajñatā nānuprāptā /
T02bsu049_u:5045: kutaḥ punastvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimanuprāpsyasīti? sacedevam api na kṣubhyati na calati, taṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃstasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe bhikṣūnabhinirmāyaivaṃ vakṣyati -
T02bsu049_u:5046: ete bhikṣavo 'rhantaḥ kṣīṇāsravāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ, ye bodhaye saṃprasthitā
T02bsu049_u:5047: abhūvan, tatra tarhi arhattvamanuprāptā arhattve sthitāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5048: kutaḥ punastvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimanuprāpsyatīti? sacetkhalu punarevam api
T02bsu049_u:5049: bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ nirdiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati na calati, ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo
T02bsu049_u:5051: sacedbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ parataḥ śrutvaivaṃ vivekapadāni dharmatāyā na parihīyate, na pratyudāvartate 'sya mānasam, na cānyathābhāvaścittasya bhavati, tāni ca sarvāṇi mārakarmāṇi tathā saṃjānāti - asthānaṃ subhūte anavakāśaḥ, yatsa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā caran pāramitāsu na
T02bsu049_u:5052: sarvajñatāmanuprāpnuyāt -(Vaidya 165) asthānametadanavakāśo yattathā caratastathā śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yathā tathāgatairākhyātaṃ tayā caryayā avirahitasya ebhiḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairviharato māraḥ pāpīyānnāvatāraṃ
T02bsu049_u:5054: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo mārakarmāṇi budhyate, parataś ca śrutvā vivekapadāni na parihīyate, na pratyudāvartate 'sya mānasam, na cāsya cittamanyathā bhavati, tāni ca mārakarmāṇi tathā saṃjānāti /
T02bsu049_u:5055: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //
T02bsu049_u:5056: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na
T02bsu049_u:5058: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāṃ na saṃjñāsaṃjñāṃ na saṃskārasaṃjñām /
T02bsu049_u:5062: hetoḥ? tathā hi avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyairdharmairbodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntaḥ
T02bsu049_u:5063: tam api dharmaṃ nopalabhate nābhisaṃskāroti notpādayati /
T02bsu049_u:5064: tata ucyate anutpādajñānakṣāntiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya iti /
T02bsu049_u:5065: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //
T02bsu049_u:5066: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vicchandayiṣyati - ākāśasamaiṣā yaduta sarvajñatā /
T02bsu049_u:5069: ko 'trājñāsyati, ko 'trābhisaṃbhotsyate? naitena kaścinniryāsyati - yaścābhisaṃbudhyeta, yaccābhisaṃboddhavyam, yaś ca ājānīyāt, yacca ājñātavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5074: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ jñātavyamevaṃ samanvāhartavyamevaṃ veditavyam - mārakarmaivaitat, yeyaṃ vivecanatā /
T02bsu049_u:5075: evaṃ cintayitvā tatra dṛḍhacittena bhavitavyam, aprakampyacittenāsaṃhāryacittena bhavitavyam
T02bsu049_u:5076: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo
T02bsu049_u:5078: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūminirvṛttaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pravṛtto bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:5080: tathā dvitīyaṃ tathā tṛtīyaṃ tathā caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
T02bsu049_u:5082: dhyānaparijayaṃ ca karoti, dhyānāni ca samāpadyate, na ca dhyānavaśenopapadyate /
T02bsu049_u:5084: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam
T02bsu049_u:5085: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nāmaguruko
T02bsu049_u:5086: bhavati, na kīrtiśabdaślokaguruko bhavati, na nāmni sajjate /
T02bsu049_u:5096: tadyathāpi subhūte caurakāntāramadhyagataḥ puruṣaḥ āhārakṛtyaṃ kurvannutrastasaṃjñyevāhāraṃ
T02bsu049_u:5097: kuryāt, gamanasaṃjñyevāhāraṃ kuryāt, kadā nu khalu nāma ahamitaścaurakāntārādatikrānto bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃsaṃjñī
T02bsu049_u:5099: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā agāramadhyāvasanto yān yāneva kāmān
T02bsu049_u:5100: tāṃstānanarthikā eva agṛddhā eva asaktā eva kāmān paribhuñjate /
T02bsu049_u:5101: anarthikā eva ca te bhavanti priyarūpasātarūpaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5107: satpuruṣairmahāpuruṣairatipuruṣaiḥ puruṣapravaraiḥ puruṣaśobhanaiḥ puruṣarṣabhaiḥ puruṣodāraiḥ puruṣaśauṭīraiḥ puruṣapuṃgavaiḥ puruṣadhuryaiḥ puruṣapadmaiḥ puruṣapuṇḍarīkaiḥ puruṣājāneyaiḥ puruṣanāgaiḥ puruṣasiṃhaiḥ puruṣadamyasārathibhiḥ sarvasattvāḥ paramasukhe niyojayitavyāḥ evaṃ hi subhūte agāramadhyāvasanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitābalādhānaprāptatvāt
T02bsu049_u:5108: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyāḥ //
T02bsu049_u:5109: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajrapāṇirmahāyakṣo nityānubaddho bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:5111: anatikramaṇīyaś ca bhavati manuṣyairvā amanuṣyairvā, durāsadaḥ sarvasattvānām /
T02bsu049_u:5112: sa na vikṣiptacitto bhavati, na vikalendriyo bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:5115: sa yānīmāni strīṇāṃ vaśīkaraṇāni mantrajāpyauṣadhividyābhaiṣajyādīni, tāni sarvāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ na prayojayati /
T02bsu049_u:5120: / sa ebhiścānyaiś ca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:5121: sa na striyaṃ na ca puruṣaṃ vyākaroti - putro vā te bhaviṣyati, duhitā vā te bhaviṣyatīti
T02bsu049_u:5123: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:5125: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni yairākārairyairliṅgairyairnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo veditavyo 'nuttarāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:5126: samyaksaṃbodheḥ, tānākārāṃstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni deśayiṣyāmi /
T02bsu049_u:5127: te punaḥ katame? tadyathā - na te skandhāyatanadhātupratītyasamutpādayogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na saṃgaṇikārāmakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na rājakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na caurakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na senākathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā (Vaidya 167) viharanti, na yuddhakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīkathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, nātmakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti,
T02bsu049_u:5128: nāmātyamahāmātrakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na strīpuruṣanapuṃsakakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na yānodyānavihāraprāsādahradasarastaḍāgapuṣkariṇīvanārāmaśailakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na yakṣarākṣasapretapiśācakaṭapūtanakumbhāṇḍakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti,
T02bsu049_u:5130: viharanti, na vīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakaviśikhāpaṇaśibikākuṭumbakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na gītanṛtyākhyāyikānaṭanartakacāraṇakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na sāgaranadīdvīpakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na dharmaviruddhakathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, na pṛthagjanaratikathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti, api tu prajñāpāramitākathāyogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti /
T02bsu049_u:5133: dharmakāmā eva ca te bhavanti, nādharmakāmāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5134: abhedavarṇavādinaś ca te bhavanti, na bhedavarṇavādinaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5137: te tathāgatadarśanamevākāṅkṣanta ākāṅkṣanti anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, teṣāmantike upapattaye cittamutpādayanti /
T02bsu049_u:5139: evaṃ te avirahitā bhavanti tathāgatadarśanena tathāgataparyupāsanena tathāgataparyupasthānena ca //
T02bsu049_u:5140: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kāmāvacarebhyo devebhyaścyutā rūpāvacarebhya ārūpyāvacarebhyo vā devebhyaścyutāḥ santaḥ ihaiva madhyadeśe jambūdvīpe pratyājāyante /
T02bsu049_u:5142: kāvyeṣu kovidāḥ, mantreṣu kovidāḥ, vidyāsu kovidāḥ, śāstreṣu kovidāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:5144: alpakāḥ pratyantajanapadeṣu pratyājāyante, yadbhūyastvena madhyadeśe pratyājāyante /
T02bsu049_u:5146: pratyanteṣu janapadeṣu pratyājāyante, te 'pi mahānagareṣu pratyājāyante /
T02bsu049_u:5148: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:5150: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - avinivartanīyo vāham, na vāhamavinivartanīya iti /
T02bsu049_u:5152: vicikitsotpadyate, na cāsya saṃśayo bhavati, svasyāṃ bhūmau nāpyasya
T02bsu049_u:5154: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpattiphale svakāyāṃ bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati
T02bsu049_u:5159: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakārī ānantaryacittena avirahito
T02bsu049_u:5160: bhavati, yāvanmaraṇāvasthāyām, na taccittaṃ śaknoti prativinodayituṃ
T02bsu049_u:5163: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyacittaṃ sthitaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5165: sadevamānuṣāsureṇāpi lokena na śakyaṃ cālayituṃ vā kampayituṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:5168: tasya svasyāṃ bhūmau niṣkāṅkṣasya nirvicikitsasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittaṃ votpadyate /
T02bsu049_u:5170: abhisaṃbhotsye evāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ svasyāṃ bhūmau sthitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5172: bhavati, anavamardanīyaś ca bhavati svasyāṃ bhūmau /
T02bsu049_u:5173: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa sthito 'saṃhāryeṇa cittena asaṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati
T02bsu049_u:5174: sacetkhalu punarmāraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkrāmet, tamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadet - ihaiva tvamarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuru /
T02bsu049_u:5177: na tava te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni vā saṃvidyante, yairākārairyairliṅgairyairnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo
T02bsu049_u:5180: carasīti? sacetpunarbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyathā cittaṃ bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:5181: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
T02bsu049_u:5186: sacedevaṃ pratyavekṣate, evaṃ samanvāharati - māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā māṃ vivecayitukāmo 'nuttarāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:5188: sacenmāraḥ pratyudāvartate, veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5190: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ime ākārā imāni liṅgāni imāni nimittāni
T02bsu049_u:5192: addhā batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ
T02bsu049_u:5195: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hyasya te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante, yāni avinivartanīyasya
T02bsu049_u:5197: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo
T02bsu049_u:5199: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśaḥ ātmaparityāgam api karoti, jīvitaparityāgam api karoti /
T02bsu049_u:5201: saddharmaparigrahāya paramudyogamāpadyate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ premṇā ca gauraveṇa ca /
T02bsu049_u:5202: dharmakāyā buddhā bhagavanta iti dharme prema ca gauravaṃ copādāya (Vaidya 169) saddharmaparigrahaṃ karoti /
T02bsu049_u:5204: saddharmaparigrahaḥ, pratyutpannānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva saddharmaparigrahaḥ, anāgatānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva saddharmaparigrahaḥ - aham api tatra teṣāmanāgatānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5205: saṃkhyāṃ gaṇanāṃ praviṣṭa iti, aham api tatra vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5207: sa imamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśa ātmaparityāgam api karoti, jīvitaparityāgam api karoti /
T02bsu049_u:5208: na ca tatra saṃsīdati, na ca kausīdyamāpadyate /
T02bsu049_u:5209: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo
T02bsu049_u:5211: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na
T02bsu049_u:5214: dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati, na śrāvakasya? bhagavānāha -
T02bsu049_u:5215: śrāvakasyāpi subhūte dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati /
T02bsu049_u:5216: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anutpattikeṣu
T02bsu049_u:5219: śṛṇvaṃś ca na kāṅkṣati, na vicikitsati /
T02bsu049_u:5220: ebhiḥ subhūte guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:5221: imāny api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ākāraliṅganimittāni veditavyānyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //
T02bsu049_u:5225: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan mahāguṇasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5231: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anantamaparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdhamasaṃhāryaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ
T02bsu049_u:5232: subhūtirāha - pratibalo bhagavan avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānākārān liṅgāni nimittāni
T02bsu049_u:5234: ata eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni sūcayitavyāni /
T02bsu049_u:5235: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte yastvaṃ gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānānyārabhya nigamayitukāmaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5237: ānimittasya apraṇihitasya anabhisaṃskārasya anutpādasya ajāterabhāvasya virāgasya nirodhasya nirvāṇasya vigamasyaitatsubhūte adhivacanaṃ yaduta gambhīramiti //
T02bsu049_u:5238: subhūtirāha - eteṣāmeva bhagavan kevalametaddharmāṇāmadhivacanaṃ na punaḥ sarvadharmāṇām? bhagavānāha - sarvadharmāṇāmapyetatsubhūte adhivacanaṃ yaduta gambhīramiti /
T02bsu049_u:5239: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte gambhīram /
T02bsu049_u:5242: kathaṃ ca subhūte rūpaṃ gambhīram? kathaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ? kathaṃ ca subhūte
T02bsu049_u:5243: vijñānaṃ gambhīram? yathā subhūte tathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ rūpam /
T02bsu049_u:5245: yathā subhūte tathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ vijñānam
T02bsu049_u:5246: / tatra subhūte yathā rūpatathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ rūpam /
T02bsu049_u:5250: yatra subhūte na rūpam, iyaṃ rūpasya gambhīratā /
T02bsu049_u:5251: yatra subhūte na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na
T02bsu049_u:5252: vijñānam, iyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāṇām, iyaṃ vijñānasya gambhīratā //
T02bsu049_u:5253: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena rūpataś ca nivārito
T02bsu049_u:5256: yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena vijñānataś ca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam /
T02bsu049_u:5257: bhagavānāha - imāni subhūte gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni yaścintayiṣyanti tulayiṣyati upanidhyāsyati - evaṃ mayā sthātavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyāmājñaptam evaṃ mayā śikṣitavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyāmākhyātam /
T02bsu049_u:5259: tathā saṃpādayamānastathopanidhyāyaṃstathopaparīkṣamāṇastathā prayujyamānastathā ghaṭamānastathā vyāyacchamāna ekadivasamapyatra yogamāpadyate /
T02bsu049_u:5260: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenaikadivasena kiyatkarma karoti? tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritaḥ /
