T02bsu049_u:5261: tasya puruṣasya rāgacaritasya vitarkacaritasya striyā abhirūpayā prāsādikayā darśanīyayā saha saṃketaḥ kṛto bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:5265: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte kiṃpratisaṃyuktāstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran?
T02bsu049_u:5266: subhūtirāha - strīpratisaṃyuktā eva bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran - iyamāgacchati, iyamāgatā /
T02bsu049_u:5269: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya kiyanto vitarkā utpadyeran? subhūtirāha - bahavo bhagavan divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya vitarkā utpadyeran /
T02bsu049_u:5270: bhagavānāha - yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya divasasyātyayena vitarkā utpadyeran, iyataḥ subhūte kalpān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaśchorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti saṃsārādvyantīkaroti, ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathājñaptaṃ yathākhyātaṃ yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ tiṣṭhati śikṣate pratipadyate upanidhyāyati yogamāpadyate,
T02bsu049_u:5271: tāṃś ca doṣān vivarjayati, yairdoṣairbodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivartate
T02bsu049_u:5273: evaṃ hi subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyogamanuyuktaḥ, anena vihāreṇa viharan yaduta
T02bsu049_u:5275: yaś ca prajñāpāramitāvirahito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt, ayameva tato viśiṣyate yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamekadivasam api prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate //
T02bsu049_u:5276: punaraparaṃ subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpannebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, pratiṣṭhāpayet, evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiṣvanāgāmiṣvarhatsu dānaṃ dadyāt, pratiṣṭhāpayet pratyekabuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet /
T02bsu049_u:5277: tathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet, virahitaś ca prajñāpāramitāyā
T02bsu049_u:5278: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathaiva yogamāpadyeta ekadivasam api /
T02bsu049_u:5279: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvadbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
T02bsu049_u:5280: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet, śīleṣu ca paripūrṇakārī bhavet, virahitaś ca prajñāpāramitayā bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:5281: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikārādvyutthāya dharmaṃ deśayet, ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet, śīleṣu ca paripūrṇakārī bhavet, kṣāntyā ca samanvāgato bhavet, virahitaś ca prajñāpāramitayā /
T02bsu049_u:5282: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikāradvyutthāya dharmadānaṃ dadyāt, ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo
T02bsu049_u:5284: (Vaidya 172) punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet, śīleṣu paripūrṇakārī kṣāntyā ca samanvāgataḥ,
T02bsu049_u:5285: ārabdhavīryaḥ san dhyāneṣu bodhipakṣeṣu ca dharmeṣu yogamāpadyeta,
T02bsu049_u:5287: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet, ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
T02bsu049_u:5288: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
T02bsu049_u:5290: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
T02bsu049_u:5291: pariṇāmya ca pratisaṃlāne na punareva yogamāpadyeta /
T02bsu049_u:5292: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānameva dadyāt, na punaḥ pratisaṃlāne yogamāpadyeta, sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tāvatpuṇyaṃ prasavati, yāvadya evaṃ dharmadānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
T02bsu049_u:5293: pratisaṃlāne ca punareva yogamāpadyamānaḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītastatpratisaṃlānamavirahitaṃ karoti prajñāpāramitayā, ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
T02bsu049_u:5294: subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan abhisaṃskāro vikalpa ityuktaṃ bhagavatā, tadā kathaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatītyucyate? bhagavānāha - so 'pīdānīṃ
T02bsu049_u:5295: subhūte puṇyābhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śūnyaka ityevākhyāyate, riktaka ityevākhyāyate, tucchaka
T02bsu049_u:5297: yathā yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmān pratyavekṣate, tathā tathā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā /
T02bsu049_u:5298: yathā yathā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati
T02bsu049_u:5299: prajñāpāramitayā, tathā tathā aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
T02bsu049_u:5300: subhūtirāha - aprameyasya ca bhagavan asaṃkhyeyasya ca kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā,
T02bsu049_u:5301: kaḥ prativiśeṣo vā? bhagavānāha - aprameyamiti subhūte yatra
T02bsu049_u:5303: asaṃkhyeyamiti subhūte yanna śakyaṃ saṃkhyayāpi kṣapayitum //
T02bsu049_u:5304: subhūtirāha - syādbhagavan paryāyo yadrūpamaprameyaṃ bhavet, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ
T02bsu049_u:5310: bhavet, evaṃ vedanaiva saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva /
T02bsu049_u:5312: subhūtirāha - kasya punarbhagavan etadadhivacanamaprameyamiti? bhagavānāha - śūnyatāyāḥ subhūte etadadhivacanamaprameyamiti /
T02bsu049_u:5316: kevalametadadhivacanamaprameyamiti, ānimittasyaiva apraṇihitasyaiva bhagavan kevalametadadhivacanamaprameyamiti, nānyeṣāṃ dharmāṇām?
T02bsu049_u:5317: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte nanu mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā
T02bsu049_u:5323: tasmāttarhi subhūte eṣāṃ dharmāṇāmarthato viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate /
T02bsu049_u:5324: abhilāpā ete subhūte tathāgatenākhyātāḥ abhilapitāḥ - aprameyamiti vā, asaṃkhyeyamiti
T02bsu049_u:5325: vā, akṣayamiti vā, śūnyamiti vā, ānimittamiti vā, apraṇihitamiti vā,
T02bsu049_u:5326: anabhisaṃskāra iti vā, anutpāda iti vā, ajātiriti vā abhāva iti vā, virāga iti vā, nirodha iti vā, nirvāṇamiti vā /
T02bsu049_u:5328: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadiyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā deśitā, sā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5335: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā ca subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā, na sā śakyā
T02bsu049_u:5338: vṛddhirvāsti, parihāṇirvā vidyate? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:5340: dānapāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:5341: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyā api, kṣāntipāramitāyā api, vīryapāramitāyā api,
T02bsu049_u:5342: dhyānapāramitāyā api, prajñāpāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:5343: sacedbhagavan āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhirna
T02bsu049_u:5344: parihāṇiḥ, kathaṃ bhagavan vivardhamānānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ balena
T02bsu049_u:5345: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? kathaṃ ca anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhyāsannībhavati? na ca bhagavan apratipūrayan pāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:5348: na khalu punaḥ subhūte pāramitārthasya kācidvṛddhirvāsti parihāṇirvā vidyate /
T02bsu049_u:5349: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ dānapāramitā vivardhate, iyaṃ dānapāramitā parihīyate iti /
T02bsu049_u:5350: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dānapāramiteti /
T02bsu049_u:5351: sa dānaṃ dadat tān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
T02bsu049_u:5353: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ śīlapāramitā vivardhate, iyaṃ śīlapāramitā (Vaidya 174) parihīyate iti /
T02bsu049_u:5354: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta śīlapāramiteti /
T02bsu049_u:5355: sa śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
T02bsu049_u:5357: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā vivardhate, iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā parihīyate iti /
T02bsu049_u:5358: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta kṣāntipāramiteti /
T02bsu049_u:5359: sa kṣāntyā saṃpādayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
T02bsu049_u:5361: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ vīryapāramitā vivardhate, iyaṃ vīryapāramitā parihīyate iti /
T02bsu049_u:5362: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta vīryapāramiteti /
T02bsu049_u:5363: sa vīryamārabhamāṇastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati /
T02bsu049_u:5365: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā vivardhate, iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā parihīyate iti /
T02bsu049_u:5366: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dhyānapāramiteti /
T02bsu049_u:5367: sa dhyānāni samāpadyamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
T02bsu049_u:5369: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vivardhate, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā parihīyate iti /
T02bsu049_u:5370: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta prajñāpāramiteti /
T02bsu049_u:5371: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
T02bsu049_u:5373: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kā punareṣā bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:5374: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ? bhagavānāha - tathataiṣā subhūte anuttarā
T02bsu049_u:5376: na ca subhūte tathatā vivardhate, vā, parihīyate vā /
T02bsu049_u:5377: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvastatpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairabhīkṣṇaṃ bahūlaṃ viharati, evaṃ sa āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, taiś ca manasikārairna parihīyate /
T02bsu049_u:5378: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /
T02bsu049_u:5380: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇām api subhūte na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /
T02bsu049_u:5381: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhirevaṃrūpairmanasikārairviharan āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //
T02bsu049_u:5385: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ punarbhagavan prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5387: mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? paurvako bhagavaṃścittotpādaḥ paścimakena cittotpādena asamavahitaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:5389: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlānāmupacayo bhavati?
T02bsu049_u:5390: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte
T02bsu049_u:5391: tailapradyotasya jvalato 'rciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā, utāho paścimābhinipātenārciṣā sā vartirdagdhā? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5392: na hi bhagavan arciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā /
T02bsu049_u:5393: na ca prathamābhinipātamanāgamya arciṣā sā vartirdagdhā /
T02bsu049_u:5394: na ca bhagavan paścimābhinipātenārciṣā sā vartirdagdhā, na ca paścimābhinipātamanāgamya
T02bsu049_u:5396: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sā
T02bsu049_u:5397: vartirdagdhā? subhūtirāha - dagdhā bhagavan, dagdhā sugata /
T02bsu049_u:5399: evameva subhūte na ca prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:5400: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate, na ca prathamacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
T02bsu049_u:5401: na ca paścimacittotpādena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate, na ca paścimacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
T02bsu049_u:5404: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīro 'yaṃ bhagavan pratītyasamutpādaḥ
T02bsu049_u:5405: na ca nāma bhagavan prathamacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate, na ca nāma prathamacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
T02bsu049_u:5406: / na ca nāma paścimacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5407: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate, na ca nāma paścimacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate, na ca nāma taiścittotpādairna cānyatra tebhyaścittotpādebhyo 'bhisaṃbudhyate /
T02bsu049_u:5409: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte
T02bsu049_u:5410: yaccittaṃ niruddham, api nu tatpunarutpatsyate? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5411: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittamanutpannam, api nu tannirodhadharmi? āha - nirodhadharmi bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5412: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yannirodhadharmi, api nu tannirotsyate? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5413: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittamanutpannam, api nu tannirodhadharmi? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5414: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yannirodhadharmi, api nu tannirotsyate? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5418: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvaniruddha eva, sa dharmo nirotsyate? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5419: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā
T02bsu049_u:5422: tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā? āha - tathaiva bhagavan sthāsyati yathā tathatā /
T02bsu049_u:5423: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yadi tathaiva sthāsyati
T02bsu049_u:5424: yathā tathatā, tadā mā kuṭasthā bhūt? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5425: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte gambhīrā tathatā? āha - gambhīrā bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5426: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase tathatāyāṃ cittam? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5427: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte cittaṃ tathatā? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5431: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tathatām? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5433: - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ya evaṃ carati sa gambhīre carati? āha - yo bhagavan evaṃ carati, sa na kvaciccarati /
T02bsu049_u:5436: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ carati, sa kva carati? āha -
T02bsu049_u:5438: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramārthe carati, sa nimitte carati? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5439: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tasya
T02bsu049_u:5441: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato nimittaṃ vibhāvitaṃ bhavati? subhūtirāha - na sa bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:5442: bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ prayujyate - kathamahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ carannihaiva nimittaprahāṇamanuprāpnuyāmiti
T02bsu049_u:5445: etattadbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yat, tacca nimittaṃ jānāti,
T02bsu049_u:5447: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragatastrīṇi vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayati - śūnyatāmānimittamapraṇihitaṃ ca, api nu tasya prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:5451: avikalpo hi āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaś ca divasaścokto bhagavatā /
T02bsu049_u:5452: sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitālābhī divase divase prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, tato 'sya prajñāpāramitābhyāsataḥ svapnāntaragatasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāvaipulyena bhavitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5453: śāriputra āha - yatpunarāyuṣman subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā
T02bsu049_u:5454: svapnāntaragataḥ karma śubhamaśubhaṃ vā karoti, kiṃ bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā? subhūtirāha - yathā svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā uktā
T02bsu049_u:5455: bhagavatā, tathā na tasya karmaṇo bhavatyācayo vā upacayo vā /
T02bsu049_u:5456: atha punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati, (Vaidya 177) bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo
T02bsu049_u:5458: kathaṃ ca āyuṣman śāriputra vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati?
T02bsu049_u:5459: sacetsvapnāntaragataḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kṛtvā prativibuddhaḥ sannevaṃ vikalpayati - aho hataḥ, sādhu hataḥ, suṣṭhu hataḥ, mayā hataḥ, ityevaṃ vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
T02bsu049_u:5461: puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati - aho hataḥ,
T02bsu049_u:5462: sādhu hataḥ, suṣṭhu hataḥ, mayā hata iti, bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā? buddho bhagavān api vikalpayan kṣayasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
T02bsu049_u:5463: tasyāpi karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā bhavet? subhūtirāha - no hīdamāyuṣman śāriputra /
T02bsu049_u:5465: tadyathāpi nāma ākāśameva āyuṣman śāriputra nānārambaṇaṃ karmotpadyate,
T02bsu049_u:5473: tasmāttarhi āyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā, sārambaṇameva karmotpadyate
T02bsu049_u:5475: śāriputra āha - yadāyuṣman subhūte sarvārambaṇāni viviktāni ākhyātāni bhagavatā, tadā kasmādāyuṣman subhūte sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā? subhūtirāha - nimittīkṛtya āyuṣman śāriputra
T02bsu049_u:5477: cetanāpyāyuṣman śāriputra viviktā, nimittam api viviktam /
T02bsu049_u:5478: evamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā api viviktāḥ, saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānamapi,
T02bsu049_u:5482: śāriputra āha - yadāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato dānaṃ dadyāt, tacca dānamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
T02bsu049_u:5483: pariṇāmitaṃ kiṃ taddānaṃ vaktavyam? subhūtirāha - ayamāyuṣman śāriputra maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5489: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ayamāyuṣman maitreya
T02bsu049_u:5490: sthavira evamāha - mayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5493: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadāyuṣmān subhūtirevamāha - ayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5495: kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yadetannāmadheyaṃ maitreya iti? etadenamarthaṃ visarjayiṣyati, uta rūpaṃ visarjayiṣyati, uta vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, atha vijñānaṃ visarjayiṣyati, utāho varṇo visarjayiṣyati, atha saṃsthānaṃ visarjayiṣyati, utāho yā rūpasya śūnyatā,
T02bsu049_u:5496: sā visarjayiṣyati? evaṃ yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām, (Vaidya 178)
T02bsu049_u:5497: yā vijñānasya śūnyatā, sā visarjayiṣyati? yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte rūpasya śūnyatā, na sā pratibalā visarjayitum /
T02bsu049_u:5499: yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte vijñānasya śūnyatā, na sā pratibalā visarjayitum /
T02bsu049_u:5504: tamapyahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi, yena dharmeṇa visarjayet /
T02bsu049_u:5505: tamapyahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi, yo dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
T02bsu049_u:5506: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:5507: kaccitpunarāyuṣman maitreya tvayā ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtāḥ, yathainān vācā bhāṣase? maitreya āha - na mayā āyuṣman śāriputra ete dharmā evaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5509: evamapyahamenānāyuṣman śāriputra dharmānna vedmi, nopalabhe, na samanupaśyāmi, yathā vācā bhāṣe, cittena vā cintayāmi /
T02bsu049_u:5510: api tu khalu punarāyuṣman śāriputra na kāyena spṛśyeta, na vācā bhāṣyeta, na manasā samanvāhriyeta
T02bsu049_u:5512: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ
T02bsu049_u:5514: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma - kutaste śāriputra etadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti? samanupaśyasi tvaṃ śāriputra taṃ dharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa samanvāgato 'rhanniti prabhāvyate? śāriputra āha - na hyetadbhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:5515: bhagavānāha - evameva śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5517: ayaṃ dharmo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, ayaṃ dharmo 'nuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5520: sa carannotrasyati, na saṃtrasyati, na saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
T02bsu049_u:5523: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyālakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam, na saṃtrasitavyam, na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5525: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaṃ parityaktavyaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya /
T02bsu049_u:5527: bhakṣayeyuḥ, tebhya eva taddānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
T02bsu049_u:5530: tathā ca kariṣyāmi, yathā me anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5531: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ tiryagyonigatāḥ sattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra me buddhakṣetre na bhaviṣyanti, na
T02bsu049_u:5533: punaraparaṃ śāriputra corakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam, na saṃtrasitavyam, na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5536: utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktasarvapariṣkāropakaraṇena
T02bsu049_u:5538: sacenmama sattvāḥ sarvapariṣkāropakaraṇāni hareyuḥ, tebhya eva taddānaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5540: yadi cenmāṃ kecijjīvitādvyaparopayeyuḥ, tatra na mayā
T02bsu049_u:5542: teṣām api ca mayā na kāyena na vācā na manasā aparāddhavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5543: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:5545: tathā ca kariṣyāmi, tathā ca pratipatsye, yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya
T02bsu049_u:5546: sataścorakāntārāṇy api tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante /
T02bsu049_u:5548: vyāpatsye, yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na
T02bsu049_u:5550: punaraparaṃ śāriputraṃ pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5551: tatkasya hetoḥ? asaṃtrastānutrastadharmāṇo hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:5552: evaṃ cānena cittamutpādayitavyam - sarvasattvānāṃ mayā sarvatṛṣṇācchedāya śikṣitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5555: sacedahaṃ tṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kariṣyāmi, pretaloke mamopapattirbhaviṣyatīti /
T02bsu049_u:5556: api tu khalu punaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike mahākaruṇācittamutpādayitavyam -
T02bsu049_u:5557: aho bata alpapuṇyā amī sattvāḥ, yadeteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante /
T02bsu049_u:5558: tathā punarahaṃ kariṣyāmi, tathā pratipatsye, yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante /
T02bsu049_u:5559: tathā ca sarvasattvān puṇyaiḥ saṃniyokṣye, yathā aṣṭāṅgopetapānīyalābhino 'mī bhaviṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:5560: tathā ca dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:5561: yathā vīryapāramitā ca me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti //
T02bsu049_u:5562: punaraparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5563: evaṃ cānena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ - tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye, tathā ca svaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5565: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante /
T02bsu049_u:5566: sukhitā eva te sattvā bhaviṣyanti sukhasamaṅginaḥ sarvasukhasamarpitāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5567: tathā ca kariṣyāmi, yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yo ya evābhiprāyo bhaviṣyati, yadyadevākāṅkṣiṣyanti manasā, tattadeva prādurbhaviṣyati tadyathāpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasaiva
T02bsu049_u:5568: sarvamutpadyate, yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ manasaiva sarvaṃ prādurbhaviṣyati,
T02bsu049_u:5570: yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti, avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ (Vaidya 180) bhaviṣyati sarvathā sarvataḥ
T02bsu049_u:5571: sarvadā, tathā ca svacittapariśuddhaye vyāyaṃsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:5572: yathā dhyānapāramitā ca me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti //
T02bsu049_u:5573: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyādhikāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5574: evaṃ cānenopaparīkṣitavyaṃ cintayitavyaṃ tulayitavyam - neha sa kaściddharmo yo vyādhyā bādhyate, nāpi sa kaściddharmo yo vyādhirnāma /
T02bsu049_u:5576: na cotrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5577: na ca śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye
T02bsu049_u:5580: yo hi cittakṣaṇaḥ, iyatī saiṣā apūrvā koṭiryaduta akoṭiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5581: evaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na duṣkarasaṃjñotpādayitavyā - bahvī dīrghā caiṣā apūrvā koṭiriti, ekacittakṣaṇasamāyuktā hyeṣā apūrvā koṭiryaduta akoṭiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5582: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5583: yaḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhyaścānyebhyaś ca dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, jñātavyamidaṃ śāriputra bhavyo 'yaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5584: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhumiti /
T02bsu049_u:5585: evaṃ ca śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ -
T02bsu049_u:5586: tathā kariṣyāmi, tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye, yathā me anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5587: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarvasattvānāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvavyādhayo na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante /
T02bsu049_u:5588: tathā kariṣyāmi, yathā tathāgatānāmuktavādī yathoktakārī ca bhaviṣyāmi /
T02bsu049_u:5589: tathā ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parijayaṃ kariṣyāmi sarvasattvānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5590: kṛtaśaḥ, yathā prajñāpāramitāpi me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti //
T02bsu049_u:5591: atha khalu tatra parṣadi anyatarā strī saṃnipatitā saṃniṣaṇṇābhūt /
T02bsu049_u:5592: sā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:5593: ahaṃ bhagavan atra sthāne notrasiṣyāmi, na saṃtrasiṣyāmi, na saṃtrāsamāpatsye /
T02bsu049_u:5594: anutrastā ca asaṃtrastā ca sarvasattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti /
T02bsu049_u:5595: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ suvarṇavarṇasmitaṃ prādurakarot /
T02bsu049_u:5596: tadanantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā spharitvā yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata eva mūrdhni antaradhīyata /
T02bsu049_u:5597: samanantaraṃ prāduṣkṛte ca bhagavatā tasmin smite atha khalu sā strī suvarṇapuṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ suvarṇapuṣpairabhyavākiradabhiprākirat /
T02bsu049_u:5598: atha khalu tāni suvarṇapuṣpāṇyasaktāni antarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitānyabhūvan //
T02bsu049_u:5599: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ, (Vaidya 181) kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya? nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti /
T02bsu049_u:5600: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - iyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī anāgate
T02bsu049_u:5601: 'dhvani suvarṇapuṣpo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddho
T02bsu049_u:5602: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
T02bsu049_u:5603: buddho bhagavāṃlloka utpatsyate, tārakopame kalpe 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate
T02bsu049_u:5604: seyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī strībhāvaṃ vivartya puruṣabhāvaṃ pratilabhya itaścyutvā akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre abhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate /
T02bsu049_u:5605: tatra copapannā akṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati
T02bsu049_u:5606: tataścyutā satī buddhakṣetrādbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati avirahitā tathāgatadarśanena /
T02bsu049_u:5609: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda rājā cakravartīṃ prāsādātprāsādaṃ saṃkrāmet, sa yāvajjīvaṃ pādatalābhyāṃ dharaṇītalaṃ nākrāmet, sa yāvanmaraṇāvasthāyāṃ bhūmitalaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5610: pabhdyāmanākramya kālaṃ kuryāt, evameva ānanda iyaṃ gaṅgadevā bhaginī buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:5611: tatra ca avirahitā bhaviṣyati buddhairbhagavadbhiryāvannānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
T02bsu049_u:5612: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhūt - ye tatrākṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
T02bsu049_u:5614: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmata ānandasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - evametadānanda, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:5615: uttīrṇapaṅkāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, ye akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
T02bsu049_u:5618: tasya khalu punarānanda suvarṇapuṣpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na pramāṇabaddhaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:5620: hetoḥ? tāvanto hyānanda tatra śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti yeṣāṃ nāsti pramāṇam /
T02bsu049_u:5621: api tvaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā ityevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gamiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:5622: tena khalu punarānanda kālena tena samayena tasmin buddhakṣetre na vyālakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti, na caurakāntārāṇi na pānīyakāntārāṇi na vyādhikāntārāṇi na durbhikṣakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti etāni cānyāni ca ānanda asātakāntārāṇi tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante /
T02bsu049_u:5623: suvarṇapuṣpasya khalu punarānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya imānyevaṃrūpāṇi bhayabhairavakāntārāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ tadānīṃ na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante //
T02bsu049_u:5624: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - anayā bhagavan gaṅgadevayā
T02bsu049_u:5632: samyaksaṃbuddho 'vakīrṇaḥ, anutpattikeṣu ca mayā dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā, tato 'haṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
T02bsu049_u:5633: vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavaka anāgate
T02bsu049_u:5634: 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02bsu049_u:5635: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti /
T02bsu049_u:5636: tadā etasyā bhaginyā mama vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā evaṃ cittamudapādi - aho bata ahamapyevaṃ vyākriyeya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yathāyaṃ māṇavako vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5638: evaṃ ca ānanda etasyā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamabhūdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:5639: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ bhagavan kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5642: evametadānanda, evam etat yathā vadasi - kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti //
T02bsu049_u:5646: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃścaratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaḥ
T02bsu049_u:5647: kartavyaḥ, kathaṃ vā śūnyatāsamādhiḥ samāpattavyaḥ? bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti pratyavekṣitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5650: tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyamavikṣiptayā cittasaṃtatyā yathā pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpamiti tāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na samanupaśyet /
T02bsu049_u:5651: tāṃ ca asamanupaśyan dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkuryādbhūtakoṭim /
T02bsu049_u:5652: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā sākṣātkartavyeti /
T02bsu049_u:5653: kathaṃ bhagavan tasmin samādhau sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāṃ na sākṣātkaroti?
T02bsu049_u:5654: bhagavānāha - yataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākāravaropetāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratyavekṣate, na ca sākṣātkariṣyāmīti pratyavekṣate, na ca sākṣātkartavyeti pratyavekṣate, parijayaṃ kariṣyāmīti pratyavekṣate,
T02bsu049_u:5655: parijayasyāyaṃ kālaḥ, nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti pratyavekṣate,
T02bsu049_u:5656: asamāhita evārambaṇe cittamupanibadhnāti - prajñāpāramitā ca me parigṛhītā
T02bsu049_u:5658: atrāntarā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate bodhipakṣairdharmaiḥ, na ca āsravakṣayaṃ karoti, atra ca parijayaṃ karoti /
T02bsu049_u:5659: yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati, tasmin samaye
T02bsu049_u:5660: mahāsattvena ānimittena ca samādhinā vihartavyam, na ca ānimittaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5662: tatkasya hetoḥ? evamārūḍhakuśalamūladharmasamanvāgato hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ - paripākasyāyaṃ kālaḥ, nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā
T02bsu049_u:5664: prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti /
T02bsu049_u:5665: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ paramaśūraś ca
T02bsu049_u:5666: bhavet, paramavīryasamanvāgataś ca bhavet, dṛḍhapratiṣṭhānaś ca bhavet,
T02bsu049_u:5667: abhirūpaś ca bhavet, prāsādikaś ca bhavet, paramadarśanīyaś ca bhavet,
T02bsu049_u:5668: bahuguṇasamanvāgataś ca bhavet, paramaguṇasamanvāgataś ca bhavet,
T02bsu049_u:5669: paramaiśvaryaśīlaśrutatyāgādiguṇaiś ca samanvāgato bhavet, medhāvī ca bhavet, vacanasamarthaś ca bhavet, pratibhānasaṃpannaś ca bhavet,
T02bsu049_u:5670: pratipattisaṃpannaś ca bhavet, kālajñaś ca bhavet, deśajñaś ca bhavet,
T02bsu049_u:5671: sthānajñaś ca bhavet, iṣvastre ca paramagatiṃ gato bhavet,
T02bsu049_u:5672: bahupraharaṇāvaraṇaś ca bhavet, sarvāsu ca kalāsu paramakuśalo bhavet,
T02bsu049_u:5673: supariniṣpannatayā sarveṣveva ca śilpasthāneṣu paramagatiko bhavet,
T02bsu049_u:5674: smṛtimāṃś ca bhavet, matimāṃś ca bhavet, gatimāṃś ca bhavet, dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavet, nītimāṃś ca bhavet, sarvaśāstraviśāradaś ca bhavet, mitravāṃś ca bhavet, arthavāṃś ca bhavet, balavāṃś ca bhavet, ahīnāṅgaś ca bhavet,
T02bsu049_u:5675: paripūrṇendriyaś ca bhavet, sarvopakaraṇasaṃpannaś ca bhavet, bahujanasya ca priyo manaāpaś ca bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:5676: sa yadyadeva kiṃcitkāryamārabheta, tatra tatra sarvatra nistaraṇasamartho bhavet, nayena ca vyavaharet, sarvatra cāsya mahālābho bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:5677: tena mahālābhena samanvāgataḥ san bahujanaṃ saṃvibhajet, satkartavyaṃ ca satkuryāt, gurukartavyaṃ ca gurukuryāt,
T02bsu049_u:5678: mānayitavyaṃ ca mānayet, (Vaidya 184) pūjayitavyaṃ ca pūjayet /
T02bsu049_u:5679: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣastatonidānaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā āttamanasko
T02bsu049_u:5680: bhavet, pramuditaś ca bhavet, prītisaumanasyajātaś ca bhavet? subhūtirāha
T02bsu049_u:5682: bhagavānāha - sa khalu punaḥ subhūte puruṣastayā mahāsaṃpattyā samanvāgato mātāpitṛputradārān
T02bsu049_u:5683: kenacideva kāraṇasāmagrīyogena mahāṭavīkāntāraṃ pratipanno bhavet mahāpratibhayaṃ bālānāṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam /
T02bsu049_u:5684: sa tatra praviṣṭaḥ saṃstān mātāpitṛputradārānabhayenābhinimantrayet - mā bhaiṣṭa, mā bhaiṣṭa, ahamito yuṣmān mahābhayabhairavādaṭavīkāntārātkṣemeṇa svastinā
T02bsu049_u:5686: tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte aṭavīkāntāre tasya puruṣasya bahavaḥ pratyarthikāḥ bahavaḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5687: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa śūraḥ puruṣastaiḥ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrairabhyutthitairavinivartyo dṛḍhavīryabalasamanvāgataḥ prajñāvānatisnigdhaḥ sānukrośo dhīro mahāsaṃbhārasamanvāgatastān mātāpitṛputradārān parityajya tato mahābhayabhairavādaṭavīkāntārādātmānamekamapakrāmayitavyaṃ manyeta?
T02bsu049_u:5690: puruṣasya tanmātāpitṛputradāramaparityaktam, ādhyātmikaś ca bāhyaś ca balavān saṃbhāraḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5691: tasya tatra aṭavīkāntāre bahutarakāś ca śūratarakarāś ca dṛḍhapraharaṇatarakarāś ca teṣāṃ pratyarthikānāṃ pratyamitrāṇāmanye udāratarakāḥ pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāstiṣṭhanti rakṣanti te tasya pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ na lapsyante /
T02bsu049_u:5694: śīghramapakrāmayituṃ yāvadgrāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā anuprāptaḥ syāt
T02bsu049_u:5695: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvahitānukampī maitrīvihārī karuṇāvihārī muditāvihārī upekṣāvihārī upāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ
T02bsu049_u:5696: kuśalamūlāni samyagbuddhānujñātayā pariṇāmanayā pariṇāmya kiṃcāpi śūnyatāmānimittamapraṇihitaṃ ca samādhivimokṣamukhānyavatarati, na tveva bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti, yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā /
T02bsu049_u:5697: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hyasya balavattamā dṛḍhatamāś ca parigrāhakāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:5699: tena asyāparityaktāḥ sarvasattvāḥ, tenaiṣa pratibalaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum
T02bsu049_u:5700: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike maitrīcittamārambaṇīkṛtya tān paramayā maitryā paribadhnāti, atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kleśapakṣaṃ mārapakṣaṃ cātikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya tatra samādhāvavatiṣṭhate /
T02bsu049_u:5701: aprāptaś ca sa subhūte āsravakṣayaṃ paramapāramitāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoti /
T02bsu049_u:5702: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati, atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na cedānīṃ nānimittena samādhinā viharati /
T02bsu049_u:5703: na cānena ānimittaḥ samādhiḥ sākṣātkṛto (Vaidya 185) bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:5704: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte pakṣī śakunirākāśe 'ntarīkṣe carati, na ca bhūmau patati, na ca kaṃcinniśrayaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, ākāśa evāntarīkṣe viharati, na ca tatrāpi niśrito na pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5705: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāvihāreṇa viharati, śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoti, ānimittavihāreṇa ca viharati, ānimitte ca parijayaṃ karoti, apraṇihitavihāreṇa ca viharati,
T02bsu049_u:5707: na ca śūnyatāyāṃ vā ānimitte vā apraṇihite vā patatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5708: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte balavāniṣvastrācārya iṣvastraśikṣāyāṃ suśikṣitaḥ supariniṣṭhitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5710: ūrdhvaṃ kāṇḍaṃ kṣiptvā tadanyaiḥ kāṇḍaistatkāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patat pratinivārayet, vārayet, tasya paurvakasya kāṇḍasya
T02bsu049_u:5711: kāṇḍaparaṃparayā bhūmau patanaṃ na dadyāt, tāvattatkāṇḍaṃ bhūmau na patat,
T02bsu049_u:5712: yāvannākāṅkṣet - aho batedaṃ kāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patediti /
T02bsu049_u:5713: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran upāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ tāvattāṃ paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti, yāvanna tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni suparipakvāni /
T02bsu049_u:5714: yadā tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni bhavanti
T02bsu049_u:5715: suparipakvāni, tadā tāṃ paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
T02bsu049_u:5716: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evameteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gambhīradharmatā pratyavekṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā, na ca sākṣātkartavyā evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
T02bsu049_u:5718: mahāsattvaḥ, yaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati, śūnyatayā ca viharati, śūnyatāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate, na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
T02bsu049_u:5721: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:5723: paramaduṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati, śūnyatāyāṃ ca viharati, śūnyatāṃ ca samādhiṃ
T02bsu049_u:5725: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ
T02bsu049_u:5726: tasyeme evaṃrūpāḥ praṇidhānaviśeṣā bhavanti - mayaite sarvasattvāḥ parimocayitavyā
T02bsu049_u:5728: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittamabhinirharati - sarvasattvā
T02bsu049_u:5729: mamāparityaktāḥ, mayaite parimocayitavyā iti, śūnyatāṃ ca samādhivimokṣamukhamabhinirharati, ānimittaṃ ca samādhivimokṣamukhamabhinirharati, apraṇihitaṃ ca samādhivimokṣamukhamabhinirharati, tadā upāyakauśalyasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ - nāyamantarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5730: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi asyopāyakauśalyaṃ rakṣāṃ karoti /
T02bsu049_u:5731: sa caivāsya cittotpādo yattasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5732: sa evamanena cittotpādenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato 'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti //
T02bsu049_u:5733: punaraparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāni gambhīrāṇi sthānāni pratyavekṣate, pratyavekṣitukāmo vā bhavati - tadyathā śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukham, ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukham, (Vaidya 186)
T02bsu049_u:5737: iti saṃcintya śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate, na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
T02bsu049_u:5738: ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate, na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti
T02bsu049_u:5739: / apraṇihitaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate, na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ
T02bsu049_u:5741: evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena cittotpādena anena copāyakauśalyena samanvāgato nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti, na ca parihīyate maitrīsamādhito na karuṇāmuditopekṣāsamādhitaḥ tatkasya
T02bsu049_u:5742: hetoḥ? upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā
T02bsu049_u:5749: so 'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5754: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ
T02bsu049_u:5759: teṣāṃ nimittasaṃjñāprahāṇāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti
T02bsu049_u:5760: sa ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5761: so 'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate, na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti
T02bsu049_u:5762: / na ca parihīyate maitryāḥ karuṇāyā muditāyā upekṣāyāḥ sarvasamādhitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5763: tatkasya hetoḥ? upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5767: dīrgharātramamī sattvā nityasaṃjñayā sukhasaṃjñayā ātmasaṃjñayā śubhasaṃjñayā ca viparyastāḥ
T02bsu049_u:5768: tathā kariṣyāmi yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya nityasaṃjñāyāḥ sukhasaṃjñāyāḥ ātmasaṃjñāyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā viparyāsasya prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi -
T02bsu049_u:5773: so 'nena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti (Vaidya
T02bsu049_u:5777: na ca parihīyate maitrīto vā karuṇāto vā muditāto vā upekṣāto vā /
T02bsu049_u:5778: tatkasya hetoḥ? upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5781: yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ cittotpādamutpādayati,
T02bsu049_u:5782: ityapīme sattvā dīrgharātramupalambhe caritāvinaḥ etarhyupalambhe caranti
T02bsu049_u:5783: / nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /

T02bsu049_u:5785: piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
T02bsu049_u:5786: abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
T02bsu049_u:5787: mithyādṛṣṭau caritāvinaḥ etarhy api mithyādṛṣṭau caranti /
T02bsu049_u:5788: tathā kariṣyāmi yathaiṣāmete doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante
T02bsu049_u:5791: smṛtisamanvāhāreṇa anena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ evameteṣāṃ gambhīrāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ śūnyatāto vā ānimittato vā apraṇihitato vā anabhisaṃskārato vā anutpādato vā ajātito vā abhāvato vā /
T02bsu049_u:5792: asthānametatsubhūte 'navakāśaḥ, yatsa bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jñānasamanvāgato 'nabhisaṃskāre vā patet, traidhātukena vā sārdhaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5794: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripraṣṭavyo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena - katameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ? kiyadrūpāṇi ca cittānyabhinirhartavyāni?
T02bsu049_u:5795: yāni cittānyabhinirharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śūnyatāṃ sākṣātkaroti,
T02bsu049_u:5796: na ānimittaṃ sākṣātkaroti, na apraṇihitaṃ sākṣātkaroti, na anabhisaṃskāraṃ sākṣātkaroti, na anutpādaṃ sākṣātkaroti, na ajātiṃ sākṣātkaroti, na abhāvaṃ sākṣātkaroti, prajñāpāramitāṃ ca bhāvayati /
T02bsu049_u:5797: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākaroti - śūnyataiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavyā /
T02bsu049_u:5798: ānimittameva apraṇihitameva anabhisaṃskāra eva anutpāda eva ajātireva abhāva eva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavya iti /
T02bsu049_u:5799: sacettaṃ sarvasattvāparityāgacittotpādaṃ nopadarśayet, upāyakauśalyaṃ vā na
T02bsu049_u:5800: vyākuryāt, veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5801: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hyasāvavinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāveṇiko dharmaḥ, taṃ dharmaṃ na sūcayati, na prabhāvayati, nopadarśayati, na prajānāti,
T02bsu049_u:5802: paripṛṣṭo na vyākaroti, na visarjayati, na tāṃ bhūmimavakrāmayati, yo
T02bsu049_u:5804: subhūtirāha - syātpunarbhagavan paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo (Vaidya 188) bhavet? bhagavānāha - syātsubhūte sa paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo bhavet
T02bsu049_u:5805: / sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā vā aśrutvā va evaṃ pratipadyeta, evaṃ visarjayet - avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:5807: subhūtirāha - tena hi bhagavan bahavo bodhāya caranti /
T02bsu049_u:5810: alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye vyākṛtā avinivartanīyāyāṃ jñānabhūmau
T02bsu049_u:5811: / ye punaste vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti, te evaṃ visarjayiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:5812: te te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā uttaptāvaropitakuśalamūlā veditavyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5813: te te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃhāryāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena /
T02bsu049_u:5814: sacetpunaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti vyavalokayati, na ca sākṣātkaroti, idam api subhūte
T02bsu049_u:5817: śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā traidhātukāya ca spṛhāmanuśaṃsācittaṃ notpādayati, idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pyanekaśatāyāḥ parṣado 'nekasahasrāyā yāvadanekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāyāḥ parṣado madhyagataṃ maṇḍalamāle niṣaṇṇaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5818: bodhisattvasaṃghapuraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamātmānaṃ paśyati /
T02bsu049_u:5819: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam
T02bsu049_u:5821: vaihāyasamabhyudgamya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati, tāṃ ca vyāmaprabhāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5822: saṃjānīte, tāṃś ca bhikṣūnabhinirmimīte, ye 'nyāsu dikṣu gatvā anyeṣu
T02bsu049_u:5823: lokadhātuṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti, dharmaṃ ca deśayanti /
T02bsu049_u:5826: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam
T02bsu049_u:5827: punaraparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo notrasyati, na
T02bsu049_u:5829: grāmaghāte vā nagaraghāte vā nigamaghāte vā janapadaghāte vā rāṣṭraghāte vā agnidāhe vā vartamāne vyālamṛgān vā tato 'nyān api vā kṣudramṛgajātīn dṛṣṭvā śiraśchede vā
T02bsu049_u:5830: pratyupasthite tato 'nyāny api vā mahābhayabhairavāṇi duḥkhadaurmanasyāni vā prāpya tato 'nyeṣām api vā sattvānāṃ mahābhayabhairavāṇi duḥkhāni dṛṣṭvā nāsya bhayabhairavamutpadyate, notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
T02bsu049_u:5831: tataś ca svapnāntarātprativibuddhasya samanantaravyutthitasyaivaṃ bhavati - svapnopamamidaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukam
T02bsu049_u:5832: / evaṃ ca mayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya samyagdeśayatā
T02bsu049_u:5834: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam
T02bsu049_u:5835: (Vaidya 189) punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svapnāntaragatasya nairayikān sattvān dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati -
T02bsu049_u:5836: tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve 'pyapāyā na bhaviṣyantīti /
T02bsu049_u:5837: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya apāyapariśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam
T02bsu049_u:5838: tatra subhūte kathaṃ vijñāyeta asyāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve 'pyapāyā na bhaviṣyantīti?
T02bsu049_u:5840: nirayagatāṃstiryakpretagatān vā sattvān dṛṣṭvā smṛtiṃ pratilabhate /

T02bsu049_u:5842: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve 'pyapāyā na bhaviṣyantīti /
T02bsu049_u:5843: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya apāyapariśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5844: idam api subhūte avivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam
T02bsu049_u:5845: punaraparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nagaradāhe vā grāmadāhe vā vartamāne prativibuddhaḥ saṃstataḥ svapnādevaṃ samanvāharati yathā - mayā svapnāntaragatena ye ākārāḥ yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni dṛṣṭāni, yairākārairyairliṅgairyairnimittairavivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhārayitavyaḥ, te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni mama
T02bsu049_u:5847: etena satyena satyavacanena ayaṃ nagaradāho vā grāmadāho vā vartamāna upaśāmyatu, śītibhavatu, astaṃ gacchatu /
T02bsu049_u:5848: sacetsubhūte grāmadāho vā nagaradāho vā upaśāmyati, śītībhavati, astaṃ gacchati,
T02bsu049_u:5849: veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairavinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:5854: sacetpunaḥ subhūte so 'gnidāho 'tikramya gṛhādgṛhaṃ rathyāyā rathyāmanyatarānyatarāṃ rathyāṃ vā gṛhaṃ vā gacchati, dahati,
T02bsu049_u:5855: nopaśāmyati, na śītībhavati, nāstaṃ gacchati, veditavyametatsubhūte dharmapratyākhyānaṃ duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
T02bsu049_u:5859: ityayaṃ subhūte heturayaṃ pratyayo 'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇatāyā iti /
T02bsu049_u:5860: ayam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ
T02bsu049_u:5861: punaraparaṃ subhūte yairākārairyairliṅgairyairnimittairavinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhārayitavyaḥ, tānākārāṃstāni liṅgāni tāni
T02bsu049_u:5863: tatsādhu ca suṣṭhu ca śṛṇu, manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye
T02bsu049_u:5866: bhagavānetadavocat - sacetsubhūte kaścideva puruṣo vā strī vā dārako vā dārikā vā (Vaidya 190) amanuṣyeṇa gṛhīto bhavedāviṣṭaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5867: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena upasaṃkramya evamadhiṣṭhānaṃ samanvāhartavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5873: apagataṃ me śrāvakacittaṃ pratyekabuddhacittaṃ ca, tena mayā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhavyā
T02bsu049_u:5876: ye 'pi te aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, na teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5877: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ kiṃcidajñātaṃ vā adṛṣṭaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā asākṣātkṛtaṃ vā anabhisaṃbuddhaṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:5878: yathā te buddhā bhagavanto jānanto mamādhyāśayam -
T02bsu049_u:5880: anena satyena satyavacanena iyaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā yena amanuṣyagraheṇa gṛhīto vā āviṣṭo vā, so 'pakrāmatu /
T02bsu049_u:5883: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
T02bsu049_u:5884: sacetpunaḥ subhūte evaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya so 'manuṣyo 'pakrāmati, veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5889: tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ bhāṣiṣyate - yena satyena satyavacanena ahaṃ vyākṛtaḥ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, tena satyena satyavacena
T02bsu049_u:5891: tatra subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate tasya amanuṣyasyāpakramaṇāya /
T02bsu049_u:5893: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cirayānasaṃprasthitasyāntike balavattaraṃ tejovattaraṃ codyogamāpatsyate - kathamayamamanuṣyo 'pakrāmediti /
T02bsu049_u:5895: evaṃ ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati - mamaiṣo 'nubhāvena amanuṣyo 'pakrānta iti /
T02bsu049_u:5896: na punaḥ sa evaṃ jñāsyati - mārasyaiṣo 'nubhāvena amanuṣyo 'pakrānta iti /
T02bsu049_u:5899: bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate uccagdhayiṣyati ullāpayiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati - ahaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti sa tena tāvanmātrakeṇa bhūyo mānaṃ janayiṣyati, mānaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5900: saṃjanayiṣyati, mānaṃ vardhayiṣyati, mānaṃ saṃvardhayiṣyati, mānaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5903: sa tena mānena atimānena mānātimānena mithyāmānena abhimānena dūrīkariṣyati sarvajñatām,
T02bsu049_u:5906: sa tathārūpāṇi kalyāṇamitrāṇi kalyāṇadharmaṇa udārādhimuktikānadhyāśayasaṃpannānupāyakuśalānavinivartanīyadharmasamanvāgatāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān dṛṣṭvā abhimānamutpādya avamanyamānastathārūpāṇi kalyāṇamitrāṇi na seviṣyate, na bhajiṣyate, na
T02bsu049_u:5909: tasya dve bhūmī pratikāṅkṣitavye - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
T02bsu049_u:5910: evaṃ subhūte satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyānacirayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya alpaśraddhasya alpaśrutasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītasya upāyakauśalyavirahitasya antarāyaṃ kariṣyatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5911: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārakarma veditavyam //
T02bsu049_u:5912: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:5913: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpedeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati? iha subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ nāmāpadeśenāpi nāmādhiṣṭhānenāpi māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramiṣyati anyatarānyatareṇa veṣeṇopasaṃkramya evaṃ vakṣyati - tairvyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:5922: - amuṣyāṃ diśi tvaṃ jātaḥ, amuṣmin janapade amuṣmin grāme vā nagare vā

T02bsu049_u:5931: sacetraicīvariko bhaviṣyati, sacet śmaśāniko bhaviṣyati, sacedvṛkṣamūliko
T02bsu049_u:5933: sacennāmantiko bhaviṣyati, sacedalpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto bhaviṣyati,
T02bsu049_u:5935: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃstena tena dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇa guṇenādekṣyati - pūrvam api tvamanena cānena ca guṇena samanvāgato 'bhūḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5936: niyatastaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau /
T02bsu049_u:5938: tathā hi te amī evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante /
T02bsu049_u:5940: evaṃ sa tena paurvakeṇa nāmāpadeśena nāmādhiṣṭhānena pratyutpannadhutaguṇasaṃlekhena ca manyanāmutpādayiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:5941: tasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati - vyākṛto 'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5942: samyaksaṃbodhau, yathā me amī guṇāḥ saṃvidyante /
T02bsu049_u:5943: taṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ vakṣyati - avinivartanīyastvaṃ vyākṛtastathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
T02bsu049_u:5945: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tava ete evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇā saṃvidyante /
T02bsu049_u:5946: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāyīyān
T02bsu049_u:5952: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati - vyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5954: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante, ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ guṇāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5955: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ guṇā ākhyātāḥ ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni cākhyātāni, tāni tasya na
T02bsu049_u:5959: tatkasya hetoḥ? ye ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām, tāni tasya na bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:5960: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena nāmādhiṣṭhānena abhimānamutpādayiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:5961: abhimānamutpādya mānābhibhūtaḥ stambhābhibhūto mārādhiṣṭhānenābhibhūtastadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate uccagghayiṣyati ullāpayiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:5962: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmādhiṣṭhānena mārakarma veditavyam //
T02bsu049_u:5963: (Vaidya 193) punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena mārakarma veditavyam /
T02bsu049_u:5964: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena mārakarma veditavyam? iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vyākariṣyati - tavānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti yadeva tena cittenānuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritaṃ bhavati - aho bata me 'nuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5967: tatra duṣprajñajātīyasya anupāyakuśalasya bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati - yathā mayā nāmadheyamanuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritam, aho bata me 'nuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5968: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhavediti, tathā tena bhikṣuṇā nirdiṣṭamiti
T02bsu049_u:5970: yacca tena māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhinirmitena mārādhiṣṭhitena vā bhikṣuṇā nāmadheyamudīritam, tadubhayaṃ tulayitvā yathā
T02bsu049_u:5971: ca mama cittotpāda utpannaḥ, yathā ca anena bhikṣuṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ mama
T02bsu049_u:5972: nāmadheyaṃ sameti nāmnā, nāmavyākṛto 'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:5974: yāni ca mayā subhūte avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmākārā liṅgāni nimittāni ākhyātāni, tāni tasya na bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:5976: sa manyanāmutpādya tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate - ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, naite vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
T02bsu049_u:5977: evaṃ sa tena mānena atimānena mānātimānena abhimānena mithyāmānena ca tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamanyamāno dūrīkariṣyati sarvajñatām, dūrīkariṣyati buddhajñānam /
T02bsu049_u:5978: tasya prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītasya upāyakauśalyavirahitasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya pāpamitraparigṛhītasya dvayorbhūmyoranyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
T02bsu049_u:5979: sacetpunaściraṃ suciraṃ saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmo bhavet, yadi cāsāvupasarpet kalyāṇamitrāṇi, abhīkṣṇaṃ ca tānyupasaṃkramiṣyati, tenaiva cātmabhāvapratilambhena tāvatpūrvakāṃścittotpādān vigarhiṣyati, vāntīkariṣyati, jugupsiṣyati,
T02bsu049_u:5980: pratiniḥ - srakṣyati, pratideśayiṣyati, tathāpi buddhabhūmistasya durlabhā
T02bsu049_u:5982: tatkasya hetoḥ? tāvadgurutaraṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mananāpattisthānam
T02bsu049_u:5983: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bhikṣoḥ śrāvakayānikasya śrāvakabhūmau catasro mūlāpattayo gurvyo bhavanti, yato
T02bsu049_u:5985: iyameva tābhyaścatasṛbhya āpattibhyo gurutarā āpattiḥ, yo 'yaṃ
T02bsu049_u:5990: pañcabhyo 'pi subhūte ānantaryebhyaḥ (Vaidya 194) karmabhyo gurutaro 'yaṃ cittotpādaḥ, yo
T02bsu049_u:5992: ayaṃ tebhyaḥ pañcabhya ānantaryebhyaḥ karmabhyo gurutaraścittotpādo veditavyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:5993: iti hi subhūte anenāpi nāmāpadeśena sūkṣmasūkṣmāṇi mārakarmāṇyutpatsyante /
T02bsu049_u:5996: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati smārayiṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:5997: kathaṃ ca subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:5998: smārayiṣyati? iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramiṣyati, upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati - vivekasya tathāgato varṇavādī araṇyavanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādiṣu vihartavyamiti na cāhaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃvidhaṃ vivekaṃ vadāmi, yaduta āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni, vividhāni vanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādīni subhūtirāha - katamaḥ punaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyo viveko yadi vā āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni
T02bsu049_u:5999: vividhāni vanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādīni? yadi tāni nādhyāvasati, kiyadrūpaḥ punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānyo
T02bsu049_u:6000: vivekaḥ? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto bhavati śrāvakapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ,
T02bsu049_u:6001: vivikto bhavati pratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ, evaṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto viharati /
T02bsu049_u:6002: grāmānte 'pi hi viharan prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ sarvasattvamaitrīmahākaruṇāvihāreṇa viharet /
T02bsu049_u:6003: anena vihāreṇa viharan vivikta eva sa viharati /
T02bsu049_u:6004: ayaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktamanasikāraviveko 'nujñātaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6005: anena vivekena viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdivānyatināmayati, vivikto viharati /
T02bsu049_u:6008: yaṃ punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekamupadekṣyati
T02bsu049_u:6010: śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ saṃkīrṇa eva san prajñāpāramitāyāmanabhiyujyamāno na sarvajñajñānaṃ paripūrayati /
T02bsu049_u:6011: evaṃ sa saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa viharan so 'pariśuddhena manasikāreṇa viharan apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ eva bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6012: apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmānta eva saṃstato 'nyān api bodhisattvān mahāsattvān grāmāntavihāriṇo
T02bsu049_u:6014: araṇye 'pi viharan so 'pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ san saṃkīrṇavihāryeva bhavati, na viviktavihārī /
T02bsu049_u:6019: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi so 'nupāyakuśalo bhavati
T02bsu049_u:6020: kiṃcāpi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yojanaśatikeṣvaṭavīkāntāreṣu viharedapagatavyālamṛgapakṣisaṃgheṣu apagatakṣudramṛgavyālayakṣarākṣasānuvicariteṣu apagatacaurakāntārabhayabhairavopadraveṣu saṃtiṣṭhet, varṣaṃ vā varṣaśataṃ
T02bsu049_u:6021: vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīṃ vā varṣakoṭīśataṃ vā varṣakoṭīsahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā, tato vā upari /
T02bsu049_u:6022: imaṃ ca vivekaṃ mayopadiṣṭaṃ na jānīyāt, yena vivekena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyāśayasaṃprasthito 'dhyāśayasaṃpanno viharati /
T02bsu049_u:6025: naiva me subhūte etāvatā sa bodhisattvaścittamārādhayati /
T02bsu049_u:6026: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaḥ subhūte viveko bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mayā ākhyātaḥ, tena vivekena viharannasmin viveke na saṃdṛśyate /
T02bsu049_u:6027: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramya uparyantarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitvā evaṃ vakṣyati - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, eṣa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatena viveka ākhyātaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6030: sa tato vivekātpunareva araṇyādgrāmāntamavatīrya tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān bhikṣūn sabrahmacāriṇaḥ kalyāṇadharmaṇo 'saṃkīrṇān
T02bsu049_u:6033: saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa bateme āyuṣmanto viharanti, na viviktavihāreṇa /
T02bsu049_u:6034: ākīrṇavihāreṇa bateme āyuṣmanto viharanti, na viviktavihāreṇa viharantīti
T02bsu049_u:6035: / ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā viviktavihāreṇa viharanti, tān saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa codayiṣyati, ākīrṇavihāreṇa codayiṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6036: ye ca te saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa viharanti, tān sa viviktavihāreṇa samudācariṣyati, tatra gauravamutpādayiṣyati
T02bsu049_u:6039: eṣa subhūte vihāro yenāhaṃ vihāreṇa viharāmi /
T02bsu049_u:6043: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvacaṇḍālo veditavyaḥ, bodhisattvadūṣī veditavyaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:6045: bodhisattvakāraṇḍavako veditavyaḥ, cauraḥ śramaṇaveṣeṇa, cauro bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām, cauraḥ sadevakasya lokasya /
T02bsu049_u:6046: tajjātīyaḥ khaluḥ punaḥ subhūte pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6047: tatkasya hetoḥ? abhimānapatitā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6048: anyeṣām api tathārūpāṇāmalpa (Vaidya 196) sthāmānācirayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ saṃdūṣaṇaṃ kuryuḥ
T02bsu049_u:6049: aviśuddhadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalāḥ veditavyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:6050: / anāryā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6051: anāryadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6052: yasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparityaktāḥ sarvasattvāḥ, aparityaktā
T02bsu049_u:6053: aparityaktā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ, tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
T02bsu049_u:6054: adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmarthaṃ kartukāmena tajjātīyāḥ pudgalā na sevitavyāḥ, na
T02bsu049_u:6056: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvasattvānāmarthāya abhyutthitena eteṣāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ ca mārakarmaṇāmavabodhāya nityamevodvignacittena bhavitavyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ mārgamapratilabhamānānāmupadeṣṭumutrastamānasena asaṃsṛṣṭena traidhātukena
T02bsu049_u:6057: / tatrāpi tāvanmaitrāyamāṇena karuṇāyamānena mahākaruṇāmutpādya anukampāmupādāya samyakpratipanneṣu sattveṣu muditacittenānupalabdhidharmatayā dharmāṇāmupekṣakeṇa evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - tathā kariṣyāmi yathā sarve mārakarmadoṣāḥ sarveṇa
T02bsu049_u:6058: sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadā ca na bhaviṣyanti, notpatsyante /
T02bsu049_u:6059: sacedutpatsyante, kṣiprameva pratigamiṣyanti, evaṃ śikṣiṣye iti /
T02bsu049_u:6060: ayam api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svayamabhijñāya parākramo veditavyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6061: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vivekaguṇena mārakarma veditavyamiti //
T02bsu049_u:6065: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayasaṃprasthitena anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6066: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ādita evaṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni
T02bsu049_u:6068: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni, yāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayasaṃprasthitena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ādita eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - buddhā eva subhūte bhagavantaḥ, ye ca te
T02bsu049_u:6069: 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvacaryākuśalāḥ, ya enaṃ pāramitāsvavavadanti anuśāsati, ye 'smai prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayantyupadiśanti /
T02bsu049_u:6070: imāni tāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
T02bsu049_u:6071: prajñāpāramitaiva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ veditavyam /
T02bsu049_u:6072: sarvā eva ca subhūte ṣaṭ pāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni
T02bsu049_u:6073: ṣaḍeva pāramitāḥ śāstā, ṣaṭ pāramitā mārgaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā ālokaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā ulkā, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ avabhāsaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitāstrāṇam, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ śaraṇam, ṣaṭ pāramitā layanam, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parāyaṇam, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ dvīpaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā mātā, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ pitā, ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃvartante /
T02bsu049_u:6076: ye 'pi te subhūte atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya parinirvṛtāḥ, teṣām api buddhānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6079: te subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā
T02bsu049_u:6083: te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvaparimāṇeṣvacintyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti, dhriyante, yāpayanti, dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmitonirjātaiva sarvajñatā, yaduta ṣaḍbhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ aham api subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ
T02bsu049_u:6084: mamāpi hi subhūte itonirjātaiva sarvajñatā, yaduta ṣaḍbhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6086: āsu hi subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā antargatāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:6090: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭ pāramitā eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni, ṣaḍeva pāramitāḥ śāstā, ṣaṭ pāramitā mārgaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā ālokaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā ulkā, ṣaṭ pāramitā avabhāsaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitāstrāṇam,
T02bsu049_u:6091: ṣaṭ (Vaidya 198) pāramitāḥ śaraṇam, ṣaṭ pāramitā layanam, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parāyaṇam, ṣaṭ pāramitā dvīpaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā mātā, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ pitā, ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya sarvajñatāyai anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhiprāptaye
T02bsu049_u:6095: āsu khalu punaḥ subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā, arthataś ca dharmataś ca nayataścopaparīkṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā paripraṣṭavyā paripraśnayitavyā /
T02bsu049_u:6096: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyikā saṃdarśikā avadarśikā janayitrī dhatrī /
T02bsu049_u:6097: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāvirahitā hi pañca pāramitā na prajñāyante, nāpi pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante /
T02bsu049_u:6098: tasmāttarhi subhūte aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam //
T02bsu049_u:6099: subhūtirāha - kiṃlakṣaṇā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - asaṅgalakṣaṇā subhūte prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:6100: subhūtirāha - syādbhagavan paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa yenaivāsaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate, tenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyeran? bhagavānāha - evametatsubhūte, evam etat syātsubhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa yenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:6105: tasmāttarhi subhūte yenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā viviktā śūnyā,
T02bsu049_u:6107: subhūtirāha - yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā viviktāḥ, sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ, kathaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaḥ prajñāyate, kathaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6108: prajñāyate? na ca bhagavan viviktaṃ saṃkliśyate, na bhagavan viviktaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6110: na ca bhagavan śūnyaṃ saṃkliśyate, na ca bhagavan śūnyaṃ vyavadāyati /
T02bsu049_u:6111: na ca bhagavan viviktaṃ vā śūnyaṃ vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
T02bsu049_u:6115: kathaṃ vā vayaṃ bhagavan asya bhāṣitasyārthamājānīmaḥ? deśayatu bhagavan, deśayatu sugata
T02bsu049_u:6116: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase dīrgharātraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāre mamakāre caranti? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan, evametatsugata
T02bsu049_u:6118: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu ahaṃkāramamakārau śūnyau? subhūtirāha - śūnyau
T02bsu049_u:6120: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ahaṃkāreṇa mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan,
T02bsu049_u:6122: ahaṃkāreṇa mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti /
T02bsu049_u:6123: bhagavānāha - evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaḥ prajñāyate /
T02bsu049_u:6127: yathā ca subhūte anudgaho 'nabhiniveśaḥ, tathā nāhaṃkāramamakārau prajñāyete /
T02bsu049_u:6128: evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvasattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate /
T02bsu049_u:6131: evaṃ khalu subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:6132: evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate /
T02bsu049_u:6134: sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate
T02bsu049_u:6135: evaṃ ca bhagavaṃścaran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:6136: evaṃ hi caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati, na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu, na vijñāne carati
T02bsu049_u:6137: / evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'navamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena
T02bsu049_u:6138: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ caryāmabhibhavati, anabhibhūtaṃ ca sthānaṃ pratilabhate /
T02bsu049_u:6140: anabhibhūtaṃ hi bhagavan buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam /
T02bsu049_u:6141: anenāpi bhagavan manasikāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdinānyatināmayet, āsannaḥ syādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:6142: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:6143: evaṃ hi caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati, na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu, na vijñāne carati /
T02bsu049_u:6144: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'navamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena
T02bsu049_u:6145: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ caryāmabhibhavati, anabhibhūtaṃ ca sthānaṃ pratilabhate /
T02bsu049_u:6146: tatkasya hetoḥ? anabhibhūtaṃ hi subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam
T02bsu049_u:6147: anenāpi subhūte manasikāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdinānyatināmayet, āsannaḥ syādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, kṣipraṃ ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta sacetkhalu punaḥ subhūte ye jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ, te sarve 'pūrvācaramaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6148: mānuṣyakamātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheran, mānuṣyakamātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayeran, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭheyuḥ, yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhanto yāvajjīvaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6150: evaṃ sarvasattvebhyo 'pi dānaṃ dadyuḥ, tacca dānamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayeyuḥ
T02bsu049_u:6151: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ? subhūtirāha -
T02bsu049_u:6153: bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati, yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntataḥ ekadivasam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairviharati (Vaidya 200) tatkasya
T02bsu049_u:6154: hetoḥ? yathā yathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
T02bsu049_u:6155: prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai rātriṃdivaṃ viharati, tathā tathā sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati /
T02bsu049_u:6157: nāsti tadanyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tādṛśaṃ maitrīsahagataṃ cittam, yathā tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya, sthāpayitvā buddhān bhagavataḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6161: acintyadharmasamanvāgatā hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ //
T02bsu049_u:6162: kathaṃ ca subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tāvattatpuṇyamabhinirharati? tādṛśyā subhūte prajñayā samanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavati, yādṛśyā prajñayā samanvāgato
T02bsu049_u:6165: sa divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokayan aprameyānasaṃkhyeyānaparimeyānaparimāṇān sattvānānantaryakarmasamanvāgatān
T02bsu049_u:6166: paśyati, akṣaṇaprāptāṃś ca vihanyamānāṃś ca dṛṣṭijālapraticchannāṃś ca
T02bsu049_u:6168: aparāṃś ca kṣaṇaprāptān paśyati, kṣaṇāṃś ca virāgayataḥ paśyati /
T02bsu049_u:6169: tasya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahān saṃvega utpadyate /
T02bsu049_u:6170: te cāsya sarvasattvāstayā mahāmaitryā tayā ca mahākaruṇayā sphāritvā manasikṛtā bhavanti - ahameteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyāmi,
T02bsu049_u:6172: na ca tena vā anyena vā nimittena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati /
T02bsu049_u:6173: ayam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahān prajñāloko 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum
T02bsu049_u:6174: anena hi subhūte vihāreṇa viharanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvalokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ parigṛhṇanti, na ca vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6175: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca paribhuñjate
T02bsu049_u:6176: cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān, asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sūpasthitacittāḥ, teṣāṃ dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca dānadakṣiṇāṃ viśodhayanti /
T02bsu049_u:6178: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena amoghaṃ rāṣṭraṃ piṇḍaṃ paribhoktukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ mārgamupadeṣṭukāmena vipulamavabhāsaṃ kartukāmena saṃsāragatān sattvān saṃsārātparimocayitukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ cakṣurviśodhayitukāmena anena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena manasikāreṇa vihartavyam /
T02bsu049_u:6179: sacedanena manasikāreṇa vihartumicchati, tena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktā manasikārāḥ samanvāhartavyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:6181: yo hyenān samanvāhartavyān maṃsyate, sa evāsya manasikāro bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6183: tathā ca kartavyaṃ yathāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai rātriṃdivāni kṣapayet
T02bsu049_u:6184: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kenacideva puruṣeṇa maṇiratnajñāne vartamānena maṇiratnajātijñena apratilabdhapūrvaṃ mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:6185: sa tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabhya mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:6188: tasya satatasamitaṃ tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ prati saṃyuktā eva manasikārāḥ pravarteran - aho batāhaṃ tena (Vaidya 201) mahāmaṇiratnena viprayukta iti
T02bsu049_u:6189: hi sa puruṣastasya mahāmaṇiratnasya na vismaret yāvat tadvā anyadvā tadguṇaṃ tajjātikaṃ tena mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:6190: evameva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāmahāmaṇiratnaparibhraṣṭena mahāmaṇiratnaparibhraṣṭeneva mahāmaṇiratnena ratnasaṃjñinā prajñāpāramitāmanasikārāviprayuktena prajñāpāramitāmanasikārāvirahitasarvajñatācittena tāvadanveṣṭavyā, yāvatsā vā anyā vā pratilabdhā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:6192: subhūtirāha - yatpunarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ sarvamanasikārāḥ svabhāvena virahitāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā, tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairavirahito bhavati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ manasi karoti - sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena viviktāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:6193: sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā iti, evametanmanasi kurvan prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairavirahito bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:6196: sā naiva vivardhate, na ca parihīyate /
T02bsu049_u:6197: subhūtirāha - sacedbhagavan prajñāpāramitā śūnyā, sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate, kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vivardhamānayā
T02bsu049_u:6198: prajñāpāramitayā bodhaye samudāgacchati, kathaṃ ca anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6199: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
T02bsu049_u:6200: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate vā parihīyate vā /
T02bsu049_u:6201: yathaiva subhūte prajñāpāramitā śūnyā, sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate, evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6202: sa naiva vivardhate, na ca parihīyate /
T02bsu049_u:6203: yataḥ subhūte yathaiva prajñāpāramitā śūnyā, sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate, evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6204: sa naiva vivardhate, na ca parihīyate /
T02bsu049_u:6205: tato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye samudāgacchati, evaṃ ca anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6207: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate na saṃsīdati,
T02bsu049_u:6209: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitā carati prajñāpāramitāyām?
T02bsu049_u:6212: śūnyatā, sā carati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:6214: - kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra prajñāpāramitāśūnyatāyāḥ sa kaściddharma
T02bsu049_u:6215: upalabhyate, yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:6216: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatā carati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /

T02bsu049_u:6218: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatā carati śūnyatāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /

T02bsu049_u:6222: saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, kiṃ punarbhagavan vijñānaṃ carati prajñāpāramitāyām?
T02bsu049_u:6224: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ kaścidupalabhyate, yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:6225: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ, anyatra vijñānātsa dharmaḥ kaścidupalabhyate, yaścarati
T02bsu049_u:6227: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ punarbhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām? evamukte
T02bsu049_u:6228: bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:6229: bhagavānāha - samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yatra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:6230: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmo 'nupalambhaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:6231: taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi? api nu sa eva dharma utpanno vā utpatsyate vā
T02bsu049_u:6232: utpadyate vā, niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:6233: bhagavānāha - evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntirevaṃrūpā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:6234: evaṃrūpayā ca subhūte kṣāntyā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6236: iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya vaiśāradyapratipad yāṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ caran evaṃ ghaṭamānaḥ evaṃ vyāyacchamāno 'nuttaraṃ buddhajñānaṃ sarvajñajñānaṃ mahāsārthavāhajñānaṃ
