T02bsu049_u:6238: subhūtirāha - yā bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāmanutpattikadharmatā, sā vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:6240: - kathamasyedānīṃ bhagavan dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? bhagavānāha - kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ
T02bsu049_u:6241: dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
T02bsu049_u:6243: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo vyākṛto vyākariṣyate vyākriyate vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02bsu049_u:6244: tamapyahaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi, yo dharmo 'bhisaṃbudhyate,
T02bsu049_u:6247: hetoḥ? sarvadharmeṣu bhagavan anupalabhyamāneṣu na me evaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ dharmo 'bhisaṃbudhyate, ayaṃ dharmo 'bhisaṃboddhavyaḥ, anena vā dharmeṇābhisaṃbudhyate iti //
T02bsu049_u:6251: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt
T02bsu049_u:6252: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:6254: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:6260: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena
T02bsu049_u:6261: samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6262: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6265: na te kauśika sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti, ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6266: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6267: yāvantaḥ kauśika jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ, te sarve daśakuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ, tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu te
T02bsu049_u:6268: sattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ? śakra āha - bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata /
T02bsu049_u:6269: bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6270: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6271: asya kauśika puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakāṇāṃ jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ śīlamayaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
T02bsu049_u:6272: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
T02bsu049_u:6273: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate, yena kuśalamūlena sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhavati, ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6274: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati //
T02bsu049_u:6275: atha khalvanyataro bhikṣuḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - abhibhūto 'si
T02bsu049_u:6276: kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6277: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6278: evamukte śakro devānāmindrastaṃ bhikṣumetadavocat - ekacittotpādenaiva ahamārya tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā abhibhūtaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6279: kaḥ punarvādo ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6280: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati (Vaidya 204)
T02bsu049_u:6282: kaḥ punarvādo ye śrutvā udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya likhitvā tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
T02bsu049_u:6284: te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6285: na kevalaṃ te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti, ye 'pi te srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, tān api te
T02bsu049_u:6288: gamiṣyanti, ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahādānapatayaḥ
T02bsu049_u:6289: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ, tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6290: na kevalaṃ tān mahādānapatīn bodhisattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti, ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
T02bsu049_u:6291: pariśuddhaśīlā akhaṇḍena śīlaskandhenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ, tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6292: na kevalamakhaṇḍenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti, ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
T02bsu049_u:6293: kṣāntisaṃpannā upaśamasaṃpannā apratihatacittā antato dagdhasthūṇāyāmapyāghātacittaṃ notpādayanti
T02bsu049_u:6294: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ, tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6295: na kevalaṃ kṣāntisaṃpannānupaśamasaṃpannānapratihatacittān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti, ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
T02bsu049_u:6297: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ, tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6298: na kevalamārabdhavīryānanikṣiptadhurānakusīdānanavalīnakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti, ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānārāmā dhyānaratā dhyānabalino dhyānabalavanto dhyānapratiṣṭhitā dhyānavaśinaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ, tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6299: yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuralokaṃ sarvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānanupāyakuśalāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavati, teṣāṃ cānabhibhūto bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:6300: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, prajñāpāramitāmanuvartate, ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñavaṃśasyānupacchedāya sthito bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:6302: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ pratipadyamāno nacirādgamiṣyati bodhimaṇḍam /
T02bsu049_u:6303: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sattvān kleśapaṅke saṃsīdamānānuddhariṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6304: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate, na śrāvakaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate, na pratyekabuddhaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:6305: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ (Vaidya 205)
T02bsu049_u:6306: catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣasva, laghu śikṣasva /
T02bsu049_u:6307: imāni te catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena pratigrahītavyānīti /
T02bsu049_u:6308: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kevalaṃ catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante, aham api bhagavaṃstaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramiṣyāmi, kaḥ punarvādastadanye devaputrāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6311: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yāni kānicillaukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramikāṇi vā anyāni vā utpadyeran,
T02bsu049_u:6312: tānyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ notpatsyante /
T02bsu049_u:6313: ayam api bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhavati //
T02bsu049_u:6314: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhavat - kimayaṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ
T02bsu049_u:6315: svakena pratibhānena bhāṣate, utāho buddhānubhāveneti? atha khalu buddhānubhāvena śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasaiva
T02bsu049_u:6319: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - evametadānanda, evam etat yathā śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa bhāṣitam /
T02bsu049_u:6325: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - yasmin khalu punarānanda samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6327: tasmin ānanda samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:6328: te sarve saṃśayitā bhavanti - kimayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā
T02bsu049_u:6329: bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā, utāho anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate iti /
T02bsu049_u:6330: punaraparamānanda tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ śokaśalyaviddhā bhavanti yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati /
T02bsu049_u:6331: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6332: yogamāpadyate, prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya viheṭhāmupasaṃharanti, bhayaṃ saṃjanayanti,
T02bsu049_u:6333: ulkāpātān diśi diśyutsṛjanti, digdāhānupadarśayanti - apyeva nāma ayaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6334: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valīyeta vā romaharṣo vā asya bhavet,
T02bsu049_u:6336: tatra ānanda na sarvasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ, api tu kasyacidupasaṃkrāmati, kasyacinnopasaṃkrāmati
T02bsu049_u:6337: ānanda āha - kiyadrūpasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upasaṃkrāmati māraḥ pāpīyān viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ? bhagavānāha - yena ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmadhimukticittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati, asya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati
T02bsu049_u:6339: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ saṃśayaprāpto bhavati, vimatimutpādayati - syādveyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6340: prajñāpāramitā, evaṃ na vā syāditi, asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ, avatāraṃ cāsya labhate //
T02bsu049_u:6341: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:6342: pāpamitraparigṛhītaś ca bhavati, sa gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na śṛṇoti, aśṛṇvanna jānāti, ajānanna paripṛcchati - kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyeti, asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ, avatāraṃ cāsya labhate //
T02bsu049_u:6344: bhavati - eṣa mama sahāyakaḥ, sarvārtheṣu māṃ na parityajati, bahavo 'pi
T02bsu049_u:6347: ayaṃ tu mayā pratirūpaḥ sahāyo labdhaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6349: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ, avatāraṃ cāsya labhate //
T02bsu049_u:6350: (Vaidya 207) punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmanyaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ vadet - gambhīrā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:6351: kiṃ tavainayā śrutayā? na hyevamatra yujyamānamanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitam
T02bsu049_u:6354: veti? evamanyān api bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vivecayate /
T02bsu049_u:6355: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ, avatāraṃ cāsya labhate //
T02bsu049_u:6357: bodhisattvānavamanyate - ahaṃ vivekavihāreṇa viharāmi, nānye vivekavihāreṇa viharanti, nānyeṣāṃ vivekavihārāḥ saṃvidyante iti /
T02bsu049_u:6358: tasminnānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati, saṃharṣajāto harṣitacittaḥ prītiprāmodyajāto
T02bsu049_u:6361: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā dhutaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ vā bhavati, evaṃ sa tāvanmātrakeṇa tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān kalyāṇadharmaṇo
T02bsu049_u:6363: te ca tasya guṇā na saṃvidyante, ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6364: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ guṇāḥ, te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tasya na saṃvidyante /
T02bsu049_u:6367: ātmānamutkrośayati, parān paṃsayati - na khalvete teṣu dharmeṣu
T02bsu049_u:6370: na śūnyāni mārabhavanāni bhaviṣyanti, utsadāni bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6371: mahānirayāstiryañcaḥ pretaviṣayā āsurāś ca kāyā utsadā bhaviṣyantīti /
T02bsu049_u:6372: tathā ca māraḥ pāpīyānadhiṣṭhāsyati, yathā te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ pravṛttā adhyākrāntā lābhasatkāreṇa bhaviṣyanti, ādeyavacanāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6374: teṣāṃ ca sa mahājanaḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyate /
T02bsu049_u:6377: śikṣiṣyante, na tathatvāya pratipatsyante, na tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante /
T02bsu049_u:6378: evaṃ te na tathatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā na tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānāḥ saṃkleśaṃ vivardhayiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6379: evaṃ te viparyastayā cittasaṃtatyā yadyadeva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
T02bsu049_u:6381: evaṃ te mahānirayā utsadā bhaviṣyanti, tiryañcaḥ pretaviṣayā āsurāś ca
T02bsu049_u:6383: imamapyānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati //
T02bsu049_u:6384: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayati, tasmin (Vaidya 208) samaye mārasya pāpīyasa
T02bsu049_u:6385: evaṃ bhavati - dūrīkariṣyati batāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvajñatām, atidūre sthāsyati sarvajñatāyāḥ sacetpunarbodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'nyena
T02bsu049_u:6386: bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośati paribhāṣate vyāpadyate doṣamutpādayati, tatra māraḥ pāpīyān
T02bsu049_u:6387: bhūyasyā mātrayā tuṣṭo bhavati, udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ
T02bsu049_u:6389: evaṃ cāsya bhavati - ubhāvapyetau bodhisattvau dūre sthāsyataḥ sarvajñatāyā iti //
T02bsu049_u:6391: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ kalahāyet vivadet vigṛhṇīyāt ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayet, cittaṃ cāghātayet, tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittotpāde tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ, sacedasyāparityaktā sarvajñatā //
T02bsu049_u:6392: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ kiṃcinniḥsaraṇam, utāho tāvata eva kalpānavaśyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ? bhagavānāha saniḥsaraṇamānanda mayā dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānām /
T02bsu049_u:6393: tatra ānanda yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya na pratideśayati, nāyatyāṃ saṃbarāya pratipadyate, anuśayaṃ vahati,
T02bsu049_u:6394: anuśayabaddho viharati, nāhamānanda tasya pudgalasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmi /
T02bsu049_u:6395: avaśyaṃ tena ānanda pudgalena punareva tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6396: yaḥ punarānanda bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya pratideśayati, pratideśya āyatyāṃ saṃvarāya
T02bsu049_u:6397: pratipadyate, evaṃ ca cittamutpādayati - yena mayā sarvasattvānāṃ vigrahā vivādā virodhā utsārayitavyā nidhyāpayitavyāḥ praśamayitavyāḥ, so 'haṃ
T02bsu049_u:6399: lābhā me durlabdhā na sulabdhāḥ, yo 'haṃ jalpite pratijalpāmi /
T02bsu049_u:6400: yena mayā sarvasattvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyam, so
T02bsu049_u:6401: 'haṃ pareṣu tvamity api vācaṃ bhāṣe, paruṣaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vā prativaco dadāmi /
T02bsu049_u:6403: jaḍasadṛśena eḍamūkasamena mayā kalahavigrahavivādeṣu bhavitavyam, parato duruktāni durāgatāni
T02bsu049_u:6405: pareṣāmantike na mamaitatsādhu, na caitanmamāṃ pratirūpam, yo 'haṃ parasya doṣāntaraṃ saṃjāne
T02bsu049_u:6406: etad api me na pratirūpam, yadahaṃ pareṣa doṣāntaram api śrotavyaṃ manye /
T02bsu049_u:6407: tatkasya hetoḥ? na mayā adhyāśayo vikopayitavyaḥ, yena mayā sarvasattvāḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sukhayitavyāḥ, parinirvāpayitavyāś ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya, sa nāmāhaṃ vyāpadye na ca mayā svaparāddheṣv api pareṣu vyāpattavyam /
T02bsu049_u:6411: na ca mayā jīvitāntarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ, na bhrukuṭirmukhe utpādayitavyeti
T02bsu049_u:6413: evaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikānām api pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam, yathā na kasyacitsattvasyāntike kṣubhyeta, evameva ca sarvasattvānāmantike
T02bsu049_u:6415: kathaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena apareṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam? tadyathāpi nāma ānanda
T02bsu049_u:6417: ete mama bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śāstāra ityevaṃ sthātavyam /
T02bsu049_u:6418: ekayānasamārūḍhā bateme mama bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, ekamārgasamārūḍhā bateme mama bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, samānābhiprāyā bateme mama
T02bsu049_u:6419: bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, samayānasaṃprasthitā bateme mama bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6421: yathaiva caibhiḥ śikṣitavyam, tathaiva mayā śikṣitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:6422: sacetpunareṣāṃ kaścidvyavakīrṇavihāreṇa vihariṣyati, na mayā vyavakīrṇavihāreṇa
T02bsu049_u:6426: evaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyo na bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, kṣipraṃ ca anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6431: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kva punarbhagavan śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate? bhagavānāha -
T02bsu049_u:6432: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣate, sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:6433: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau /
T02bsu049_u:6434: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirvāṇe śikṣate, sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:6435: subhūtirāha - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye
T02bsu049_u:6436: śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām, evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām?
T02bsu049_u:6437: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi -
T02bsu049_u:6438: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām /
T02bsu049_u:6439: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāmiti? tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
T02bsu049_u:6440: api nu sā kṣīyate? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:6441: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan kṣayaḥ kṣīyate /
T02bsu049_u:6443: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata
T02bsu049_u:6444: iti prabhāvyate, api nu sā utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā jāyate vā bhavati vā vibhavati vā vivicyate vā rajyate vā virajyate vā ākāśībhavati vā dharmībhavati vā? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate, api nu sā nirvāti? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T02bsu049_u:6446: tasmāttarhi subhūte evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ na tathatā kṣīyate ityevaṃ śikṣate
T02bsu049_u:6447: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām /
T02bsu049_u:6449: buddhabhūmau, śikṣate baleṣu, śikṣate vaiśāradyeṣu, śikṣate
T02bsu049_u:6451: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāmanuprāpsyati /
T02bsu049_u:6452: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyo māreṇa vā māraparṣadā vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhimarditum /
T02bsu049_u:6454: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣatsyati /
T02bsu049_u:6455: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake gocare carati /
T02bsu049_u:6456: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate nāthakarakeṣu dharmeṣu,
T02bsu049_u:6457: śikṣate mahāmaitryām, mahākaruṇāyāṃ śikṣate, mahāmuditāyāṃ śikṣate,
T02bsu049_u:6459: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate triparivartasya dvādaśākārasya dharmacakrasya pravartanāya /
T02bsu049_u:6460: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadhātuṃ nonīkariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:6461: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatavaṃśasyānupacchedāya śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:6462: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'mṛtadhātudvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
T02bsu049_u:6463: neyaṃ subhūte udārā (Vaidya 211) śikṣā śakyā hīnasattvena śikṣitum /
T02bsu049_u:6464: na hi alpasthāmnā śakyamasyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitum /
T02bsu049_u:6466: sarvasattvasārā hi te subhūte, sarvasattvanāthakāmā hi te subhūte, ye
T02bsu049_u:6469: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na
T02bsu049_u:6473: niṣādadhīvaraurabhrikakuleṣūpapadyate, nāpyanyeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu hīnajātikeṣu hīnakarmaseviṣu vā kuleṣūpapadyate /
T02bsu049_u:6474: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāndho bhavati, na badhiro bhavati, na kāṇo bhavati, na kuṇṭho bhavati, na kubjo bhavati, na kuṇirbhavati, na laṅgo bhavati, na khañjo bhavati, na jaḍo bhavati, na lolo bhavati, na lollo bhavati, na kallo bhavati, na hīnāṅgo bhavati, na vikalāṅgo bhavati, na vikṛtāṅgo bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:6475: na durbalo bhavati, na durvarṇo bhavati, na duḥsaṃsthāno bhavati, na hīnendriyo bhavati, na vikalendriyo bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:6478: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prāṇātipātī bhavati, nādattādāyī bhavati, na kāmamithyācārī bhavati, na mṛṣāvādī bhavati, na piśunavāgbhavati, na paruṣavāgbhavati, na saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati, nābhidhyālurbhavati, na vyāpannacitto bhavati,
T02bsu049_u:6479: na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati, na mithyājīvena jīvikāṃ kalpayati /
T02bsu049_u:6480: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu
T02bsu049_u:6483: tatkasya hetoḥ? asti hi tasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
T02bsu049_u:6484: tatpunaḥ subhūte upāyakauśalyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya katamat? yaduta iyameva prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:6485: tathā ca atropāyakauśalye yogamāpadyate, yathā anyenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate, na ca dhyānavaśenopapadyate /
T02bsu049_u:6486: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati, vaiśāradyapariśuddhiṃ
T02bsu049_u:6488: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā evaṃ prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:6489: tatkatamasya bhagavan dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ
T02bsu049_u:6495: evaṃ subhūte prakṛtipariśuddheṣu sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya yā asaṃsīdanatā anavalīnatā, iyaṃ sā subhūte prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:6496: evaṃ subhūte bālapṛthagjanā enān dharmānajānanto 'paśyanto dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ na
T02bsu049_u:6498: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ (Vaidya 212) kṛtaśaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyāyacchante, vīryamārabhante - vayamevamajānakān sattvān jānayiṣyāmaḥ, vayamevamapaśyakān sattvān paśyayiṣyāmaḥ ityatra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante /
T02bsu049_u:6499: atra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā balānyanuprāpnuvanti, vaiśāradyānyanuprāpnuvanti
T02bsu049_u:6501: evaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cittacaritavispanditāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti /
T02bsu049_u:6503: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakāste mahāpṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpradeśāḥ ye 'pagatapāṣāṇāḥ, yatra suvarṇaṃ vā jātarūpaṃ vā rajataṃ
T02bsu049_u:6507: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye 'syāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6509: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye śrāvakapratyekabuddhaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣante //
T02bsu049_u:6510: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye
T02bsu049_u:6511: saṃvidyante, ye cakravartirājyasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma samādāya vartante /
T02bsu049_u:6512: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye koṭṭarājyasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma samādāya vartante /
T02bsu049_u:6513: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye imaṃ mārgamārūḍhā yaduta prajñāpāramitāmārgam, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmahe iti /
T02bsu049_u:6514: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye śrāvakapratyekabuddhamārgamārūḍhāḥ
T02bsu049_u:6515: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye
T02bsu049_u:6516: saṃvidyante, ye śakrasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma samādāya vartante /
T02bsu049_u:6517: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye devalokasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma samādāya vartante /
T02bsu049_u:6518: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣāyāṃ śikṣante /
T02bsu049_u:6519: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye
T02bsu049_u:6521: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye
T02bsu049_u:6522: saṃvidyante, ye brahmasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma samādāya vartante /
T02bsu049_u:6523: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye brahmapārṣadyasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma samādāya vartante /
T02bsu049_u:6524: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye
T02bsu049_u:6526: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6527: tasmāttarhi subhūte alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6528: tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpebhyo 'lpatarakāste sattvāḥ, ye tathatvāya pratipadyante /
T02bsu049_u:6529: (Vaidya 213) tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpatarakebhyastathatvāya pratipadyamānebhyo 'lpatamāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyante /
T02bsu049_u:6532: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ya ete
T02bsu049_u:6533: 'lpatamebhyo 'lpatamā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, teṣu gaṇanāṃ gantukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, yogamāpattavyam //
T02bsu049_u:6534: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya na khilasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate, na vicikitsāsahagataṃ cittamutpadyate, nerṣyāmātsaryasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate, na dauḥśīlyasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate, na vyāpādasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate,
T02bsu049_u:6535: na kausīdyasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate, na vikṣepasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate,
T02bsu049_u:6537: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitā saṃgṛhītā
T02bsu049_u:6538: sarvāḥ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti, sarvāḥ pāramitā anugatā bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:6540: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭau dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatānyantargatāni bhavanti, evameva subhūte
T02bsu049_u:6541: śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasyāṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:6542: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye pravartamāne sarvāṇīndriyāṇyantargatāni bhavanti, evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya
T02bsu049_u:6543: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya sarvakuśalā dharmā antargatā bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:6544: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvāṇīndriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti, evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya
T02bsu049_u:6545: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ajñāne niruddhe sarve 'kuśalā
T02bsu049_u:6546: dharmā niruddhā bhavanti, sarvāś ca tadanyāḥ pāramitā antargatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:6547: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:6548: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmagratāyāṃ śikṣate
T02bsu049_u:6550: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhyamāṇāḥ, api nu te bahavo bhavanti? subhūtirāha -
T02bsu049_u:6551: jāmbūdvīpakā eva tāvadbhagavan bahavaḥ sattvā bhavanti, kaḥ punarvādo ye
T02bsu049_u:6555: sarvasukhopadhānaiścopatiṣṭhet, tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa
T02bsu049_u:6556: bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati? subhūtirāha
T02bsu049_u:6558: bhagavānāha - ataḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api bhāvayet /
T02bsu049_u:6560: hetoḥ? evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya
T02bsu049_u:6562: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmanuttaratāṃ gantukāmena sarvasattvānāmanāthānāṃ nāthena bhavitukāmena (Vaidya 214) buddhaviṣayamanuprāptukāmena buddhavṛṣabhitāmanugantukāmena buddhavikrīḍitaṃ vikrīḍitukāmena buddhasiṃhanādaṃ naditukāmena buddhasaṃpattimanuprāptukāmena trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:6563: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāhaṃ tāṃ saṃpattiṃ samanupaśyāmi, yā tena na śikṣitā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:6565: kiṃ punarbhagavan śrāvakasaṃpattir api tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati? bhagavānāha - śrāvakasaṃpattir api subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:6566: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakasaṃpatyāṃ sthāsyāmīti śikṣate,
T02bsu049_u:6568: ye 'pi te subhūte śrāvakagaṇāḥ, tān api sa jānāti, na ca tatrāvatiṣṭhate /
T02bsu049_u:6569: evaṃ ca vyavacārayati, na ca prativahati - mayāpyete śrāvakaguṇā deśayitavyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:6571: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati
T02bsu049_u:6572: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāṃstato 'nyān dakṣiṇīyān śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān
T02bsu049_u:6574: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati, prajñāpāramitāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāyāmavirahitaḥ
T02bsu049_u:6576: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'parihāṇadharmā aparihāṇadharmeti veditavyaḥ
T02bsu049_u:6577: sarvajñatāyā dūrīkaroti śrāvakabhūmim, pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ ca, āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6578: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā imāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6580: atha tām api prajñāpāramitāṃ na saṃjānīte - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā, asya vā prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatāmāhariṣyatīti vā, evam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte, na samanupaśyati sacedevaṃ carati bodhisattvo
T02bsu049_u:6585: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - caranneva tāvadayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānabhibhavati, kaḥ punarvādo yadā
T02bsu049_u:6587: lābhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sulabdhāḥ, sujīvitaṃ ca te sattvā jīvanti, yeṣāṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ cittaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6590: spṛhaṇīyāste sattvā ye sattvasārā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante //
T02bsu049_u:6591: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya puṣpāṇāmañjaliṃ kṛtvā tathāgatamarhantaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6592: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - yairbodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam - anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6594: saṃsārārṇavenohyamānān same pārime tīre pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
T02bsu049_u:6595: samṛdhyantāṃ teṣāmabhīpsitāḥ paricintitāḥ, parigṛhītāścittotpādāḥ eteṣāmeva buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūraṇāya bhavantu, eteṣāmeva sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paripūraṇāya bhavantu, eteṣāmeva svayaṃbhūdharmāṇāṃ paripūraṇāya bhavantu, eteṣāmeva asaṃhāryadharmāṇāṃ paripūraṇāya bhavantu /
T02bsu049_u:6596: na me bhagavan ekacittotpādo 'pyutpadyate, yatte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahākaruṇayā samanvāgatā vivarteran anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
T02bsu049_u:6597: na me bhagavan ekacittotpādo 'pyutpadyate yatte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ, tato vivarteran /
T02bsu049_u:6598: iti yadbhūyasyā mātrayā praṇidhiṃ janayiṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6600: hitakāmā hi te sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyānukampakāḥ, ye imairevaṃrūpaiścittotpādaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kimiti vayaṃ tīrṇāḥ
T02bsu049_u:6601: sattvāṃstārayema, muktā mocayema, āśvastā āśvāsayema, parinirvṛtāḥ
T02bsu049_u:6607: mahāsattvānāmekajātipratibaddhadharmatāmanumodate, kiyatsa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sumeroḥ parvatarājasya palāgreṇa tulyamānasya pramāṇaṃ grahītum, na tveva kauśika
T02bsu049_u:6608: tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
T02bsu049_u:6609: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum, na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
T02bsu049_u:6610: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum, na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
T02bsu049_u:6611: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta (Vaidya 216) dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum, na tveva kauśika
T02bsu049_u:6613: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum, na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum //
T02bsu049_u:6614: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mārādhiṣṭhitāste bhagavan sattvā veditavyāḥ, ye bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6615: prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāmevamaprameyamanumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyamiti na śṛṇvanti, na jānanti, na paśyanti,
T02bsu049_u:6619: / mārabhavanebhyaś ca te bhagavan sattvāścyutā bhaviṣyanti, ya imāṃścittotpādāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nānumodiṣyante /
T02bsu049_u:6620: tatkasya hetoḥ? mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi tairbhagavan ime cittotpādā abhinirhṛtāḥ, yairamī cittotpādā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:6622: anumoditavyā bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmamī cittotpādāḥ, yairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
T02bsu049_u:6624: dharmo 'parityaktaḥ, saṃgho 'parityaktaḥ, taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditavyāḥ //
T02bsu049_u:6625: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:6628: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittopādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā, te kṣipraṃ tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānārāgayiṣyanti, na virāgayiṣyanti evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - evametadbhagavan,
T02bsu049_u:6630: yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā, te kṣipraṃ tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānārāgayiṣyanti, na virāgayiṣyanti evaṃ tairanumodanāsahagataiścittotpādakuśalamūlairyatra yatropapatsyante, tatra tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti, gurukṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti, mānitāś ca bhaviṣyanti, pūjitāś ca bhaviṣyanti, arcitāś ca bhaviṣyanti, apacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6631: na ca te amanaāpāni rūpāṇi drakṣyanti [NOTE: Conze translates "nor hear any unpleasant sounds"]
T02bsu049_u:6632: na ca te amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6633: na ca te amanaāpān rasān paribhokṣyante /
T02bsu049_u:6634: na ca te amanaāpāni spraṣṭavyāni sprakṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6637: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā sarvasattvasukhāvahānyaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni yair api bhagavaṃśchandamutpādya bodhaye
T02bsu049_u:6638: bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ, teṣāṃ te cittotpādā (Vaidya 217) vivardhamānā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakā
T02bsu049_u:6644: yena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ, anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ tāṃścittotpādānanumodya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni bhavanti, avaropitāni abhinirhṛtāni ca
T02bsu049_u:6646: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ ca bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyopamaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6648: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyām? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:6649: nāhaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ nāpi māyāṃ samanupaśyāmi /
T02bsu049_u:6650: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yanna māyāṃ nāpi māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi, tatkiṃ tvamanyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo
T02bsu049_u:6652: nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi, yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
T02bsu049_u:6653: so 'haṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmasamanuśyan katamaṃ dharmamupadekṣyāmi astīti vā nāstīti vā? yaś ca atyantavivikto dharmaḥ, na so 'stīti vā nāstīti vā upaiti /
T02bsu049_u:6661: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tyantaviviktāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? anuttarāpi nāma bhagavan
T02bsu049_u:6664: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan viviktena viviktamabhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:6668: yata eva subhūte atyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā, ata eva atyantaviviktā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbudhyate
T02bsu049_u:6669: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmatyantaviviktāmiti saṃjānīte, na sā prajñāpāramitā syāt /
T02bsu049_u:6670: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6678: bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, tathā gambhīre bhagavan arthe carati bodhisattvo
T02bsu049_u:6683: duṣkarakārakaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, yo gambhīre 'rthe carati, taṃ cārthaṃ na
T02bsu049_u:6684: sākṣātkaroti yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā //
T02bsu049_u:6685: subhūtirāha - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, tathā na kaścidduṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6686: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan sa eva dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt, so 'pi dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkriyate, so 'pi dharmo nopalabhyate yena
T02bsu049_u:6688: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na
T02bsu049_u:6689: saṃsīdati, nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate, na vipṛṣṭhībhavati, notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:6692: samyaksaṃbodhiriti sacedevamati na samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:6693: dūrīkṛtā me śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmirveti sacedasyaivam api na
T02bsu049_u:6695: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya naivaṃ bhavati - kasyacidahamāsannaḥ, kasyacidvā dūra iti
T02bsu049_u:6698: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6699: samyaksabodhirmamāsannā, śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
T02bsu049_u:6701: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati - māyākāro
T02bsu049_u:6702: mamāsannaḥ, yaḥ punaranyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūra iti /
T02bsu049_u:6704: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati -
T02bsu049_u:6708: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati - yenārambaṇena pratibhāsa utpadyate tanmamāsanne, ye tu khalu punaratra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūra iti /
T02bsu049_u:6711: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā
T02bsu049_u:6712: samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā, śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
T02bsu049_u:6714: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatasya kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā na saṃvidyate,
T02bsu049_u:6715: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvakalpavikalpaprahīṇatvāttathāgatasya, evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate /
T02bsu049_u:6720: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena yo nirmitako nirmitaḥ, na tasyaivaṃ bhavati -
T02bsu049_u:6721: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre, anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsanneti /
T02bsu049_u:6724: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre, anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsanneti /
T02bsu049_u:6726: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ, tatkṛtyaṃ karoti /
T02bsu049_u:6729: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti, sā ca prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:6732: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā dārumayī strī vā puruṣo vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛto bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:6733: sa yasya kṛtyasyārthāya kṛtaḥ, tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti /
T02bsu049_u:6736: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6737: bhāvayati, tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti, sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā /
T02bsu049_u:6739: hetoḥ? avikalpatvādeva bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā iti //
T02bsu049_u:6743: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
T02bsu049_u:6744: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo
T02bsu049_u:6747: namaskartavyāste sattvāḥ, yairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni abhinirhṛtāni
T02bsu049_u:6749: caranti, tathā caranto bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkurvanti, yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyakabuddhabhūmau vā /
T02bsu049_u:6750: anenāpi paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ, ye dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāyāṃ caranti, na ca tāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6752: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtisteṣāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tāni saṃbahulāni kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇyāmantrayante sma - nedaṃ devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaram, yatte tāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkurvanti /
T02bsu049_u:6753: idaṃ tu devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaraṃ caiva paramaduṣkaraṃ caiva,
T02bsu049_u:6754: yadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyānapramāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante /
T02bsu049_u:6755: te ca sattvā atyantatayā na saṃvidyante, asaṃvidyamānā
T02bsu049_u:6758: evaṃ ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ sattvān vineṣyāma iti, ākāśaṃ sa devaputrā vinetavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ sattvān vinetavyān manyeta /
T02bsu049_u:6760: hetoḥ? ākāśaviviktatayā hi devaputrāḥ sattvaviviktatā veditavyā /
T02bsu049_u:6761: anena devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, ye
T02bsu049_u:6763: / ākāśena na sa devaputrāḥ sārdhaṃ veditavyaṃ manyeta, yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhavyaṃ manyeta /
T02bsu049_u:6764: ayaṃ ca saṃnāho bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6766: sā ca sattvaviviktatayaiva veditavyā, vainayikavivaktatayā ca sattvaviviktatā
T02bsu049_u:6768: sacedatraivaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
T02bsu049_u:6777: evaṃ devaputrāḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati
T02bsu049_u:6780: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6782: anena bhagavan kāranena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati
T02bsu049_u:6784: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan kaściddharma upalabhyate, yaḥ saṃsīdet /
T02bsu049_u:6786: 'pi bhagavan dharmo nopalabhyeta, yena dharmeṇa yo dharmaḥ saṃsīdet /
T02bsu049_u:6788: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne nirdiśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate, nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate, na vipṛṣṭhīkaroti mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhīkaroti, notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:6791: sacedbhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:6792: evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6793: bhagavānāha - na kevalaṃ subhūte evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti, ye
T02bsu049_u:6794: 'pi te subhūte brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā
T02bsu049_u:6795: mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ, te 'pi
T02bsu049_u:6796: subhūte taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ evaṃ carantaṃ namasyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6797: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
T02bsu049_u:6798: te 'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmevaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā paśyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6799: te ca subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamanugṛhṇanti, samanvāharanti
T02bsu049_u:6800: ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanugṛhyante samanvāhriyante,
T02bsu049_u:6801: te te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:6802: na ca teṣāmantarāyā utpatsyante mārato vā anyato vā /
T02bsu049_u:6803: tatkasya hetoḥ? ye subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
T02bsu049_u:6804: sattvāḥ, te sarve mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bhaveyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6805: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte /
T02bsu049_u:6806: te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6807: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvā mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ, yāvanta subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ, te 'pi
T02bsu049_u:6808: sarve mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bhaveyuḥ, ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte, te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya
T02bsu049_u:6809: buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6810: dvābhyāṃ subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6811: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām? yaduta sarvasattvāścāsya aparityaktā bhavanti,
T02bsu049_u:6812: sarvadharmāś ca anena śūnyatāto vyavalokitā bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:6813: (Vaidya 222) ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6814: aparābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6816: yaduta yathāvādī tathākārī ca bhavati, buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:6818: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā
T02bsu049_u:6819: / evaṃ carataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya devā
T02bsu049_u:6822: paripraśnīkartavyaṃ maṃsyante, paryupāsitavyaṃ maṃsyante, utsāhaṃ cāsya vardhayiṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /
T02bsu049_u:6823: tasmāttarhi kulaputra anenaiva vihāreṇa vihara yaduta prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
T02bsu049_u:6825: kulaputra vihāreṇa viharan anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasi, atrāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ trātā bhaviṣyasi, aśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ śaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyasi,
T02bsu049_u:6826: alayanānāṃ sattvānāṃ layanaṃ bhaviṣyasi, aparāyaṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ parāyaṇaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6827: bhaviṣyasi, advīpānāṃ sattvānāṃ dvīpo bhaviṣyasi, andhānāṃ sattvānāmāloko bhaviṣyasi, apariṇāyakānāṃ sattvānāṃ pariṇāyako bhaviṣyasi, agatikānāṃ sattvānāṃ gatirbhaviṣyasi, mārgapranaṣṭānāṃ sattvānāmapratiśaraṇānāṃ mārgapraṇetā pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyasi /
T02bsu049_u:6828: evaṃ te devaputrāstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyotsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6829: tatkasya hetoḥ? etena hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye te 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti
T02bsu049_u:6830: dhriyante yāpayanti, te 'pi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharatastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatasya yaduta prajñāpāramitāviharaṇaguṇaiḥ,
T02bsu049_u:6831: buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
T02bsu049_u:6832: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ahametarhi ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
T02bsu049_u:6833: śikhino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmi, udānaṃ codānayāmi apareṣāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6834: ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām, ya etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
T02bsu049_u:6836: buddhā bhagavanto ye etarhi iha mama buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti, anena ca prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharanti, teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca
T02bsu049_u:6838: subhūtirāha - kiṃ sarveṣāmeva bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma
T02bsu049_u:6839: ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
T02bsu049_u:6840: na subhūte sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ (Vaidya 223) deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti, kiṃ tarhi subhūte ye te 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasaṅgavigatāḥ, teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca
T02bsu049_u:6842: subhūtirāha - santi bhagavan avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā tato 'nye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6843: deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti? bhagavānāha - santi subhūte pratipakṣabalino bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā, yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti /
T02bsu049_u:6844: te punaḥ katame? ye etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā
T02bsu049_u:6845: caranti, anuśikṣamāṇarūpā viharanti, ime te subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca
T02bsu049_u:6847: ye 'pi te subhūte ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti, anuśikṣamāṇā
T02bsu049_u:6848: viharanti, ime 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca
T02bsu049_u:6849: gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6851: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvadharmā anutpattikā ityadhimuñcanti, na ca tāvadanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhā bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:6854: anenāpi subhūte vihāreṇa viharatāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti /
T02bsu049_u:6855: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6856: deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti, prahīṇā teṣāṃ śrāvakabhūmiḥ
T02bsu049_u:6861: tatkasya hetoḥ? yeṣāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ na rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti, udānaṃ codānayanti, te
T02bsu049_u:6863: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti, na dhandhāyiṣyanti, na
T02bsu049_u:6864: kāṅkṣiṣyanti, na vicikitsiṣyanti, evametadyathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitamityadhimucya vistareṇa śroṣyanti, evaṃ ca cittamutpādayiṣyanti - (Vaidya 224) imāṃ vayaṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣobhyasya
T02bsu049_u:6865: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādvistareṇa śṛṇuyāmeti, teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ ye cāsya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6866: caranti, teṣāṃ cāntikādimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti, te
T02bsu049_u:6867: 'pyenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmadhimucyamānā yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitā tathā cādhimokṣyante, tathā cādhimucyamānā avinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6868: evaṃ subhūte bahukaraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇam api vadāmi, kaḥ punarvādo ya
T02bsu049_u:6872: tathatvāya sthitvā tathatvāya pratipadya tiṣṭhanti tathatāyām /
T02bsu049_u:6873: tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhantaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti //
T02bsu049_u:6875: upalabhyate, tadā ko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ sthāsyati tathatāyām, ko vā ayamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate, ko vā ayamimaṃ dharmaṃ
T02bsu049_u:6876: deśayiṣyati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi - yadā tathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate, tadā ko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmastathatāyāṃ sthāsyati, ko vācamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate, ko vāyamimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti na subhūte tathatāvinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate, yo dharmastathatāyāṃ sthāsyati
T02bsu049_u:6877: tathataiva tāvatsubhūte nopalabhyate, kaḥ punarvādo yastathatāyāṃ sthāsyati /
T02bsu049_u:6883: so 'pi subhūte nopalabhyate, yo dharmo deśyeta //
T02bsu049_u:6884: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:6892: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, yeṣāmevaṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu na bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:6894: sarvadharmeṣu kauśika śūnyeṣu kasyātra kāṅkṣāyitatā vā bhavati dhandhāyitatā vā bhavati? śakra āha - yadyadeva āryasubhūtirnirdiśati,
T02bsu049_u:6895: tattadeva śūnyatāmārabhya nirdiśati, na ca kvacitsajjati /
T02bsu049_u:6896: tadyathāpi nāma antarīkṣe iṣuḥ kṣipto naiva kvacitsajjati, evameva āryasubhūterdharmadeśanā na kvacitsajjati //
T02bsu049_u:6897: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kaccidahaṃ bhagavan subhūtiṃ sthaviramārabhya evaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ evaṃ nirdiśaṃstathāgatasyoktavādī bhavāmi dharmavādī ca, dharmasya cānudharmaṃ vyākurvan vyākaromi? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:6898: yatkhalu (Vaidya 225) tvaṃ kauśika evaṃ bhāṣase - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
T02bsu049_u:6899: evaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ evaṃ nirdiśaṃstathāgatasyoktavādī bhavasi dharmavādī ca, dharmasya cānudharmaṃ vyākurvan vyākaroṣi /
T02bsu049_u:6901: yadyadeva hi kauśika subhūteḥ sthavirasya pratibhāti, tattadeva kauśika śūnyatāmārabhya pratibhāti /
T02bsu049_u:6903: prajñāpāramitām api tāvanna samanupaśyati, nopalabhate, kutaḥ punaryaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
T02bsu049_u:6909: balānyeva tāvannopalabhate, kutaḥ punaryo balasamaṅgī bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6910: vaiśāradyānyeva tāvannopalabhate, kutaḥ punaryo viśārado bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6913: sarvadharmaviviktavihāreṇa sarvadharmānupalambhavihāreṇa hi kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviro viharati
T02bsu049_u:6914: yaḥ khalu punarayaṃ kauśika subhūteḥ sthavirasya sarvadharmaviviktavihāraḥ sarvadharmānupalambhavihāraśca, eṣa kauśika vihāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharataḥ śatatamīm api kalaṃ nopaiti /
T02bsu049_u:6915: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
T02bsu049_u:6916: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
T02bsu049_u:6917: tathāgatavihāraṃ hi kauśika sthāpayitvā tato 'nyān sarvān vihārānabhibhavatyayaṃ vihāraḥ, yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharato vihāraḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6918: ayaṃ kauśika teṣāṃ sarvavihārāṇāmagra ākhyāyate, śreṣṭha ākhyāyate, jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate,
T02bsu049_u:6919: vara ākhyāyate, pravara ākhyāyate, praṇīta ākhyāyate, uttama ākhyāyate,
T02bsu049_u:6920: anuttama ākhyāyate, niruttara ākhyāyate, asama ākhyāyate, asamasama ākhyāyate /
T02bsu049_u:6922: 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharato vihāraḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6923: tasmāttarhi kauśika sarvasattvānāmagratāṃ gantukāmena śreṣṭhatāṃ gantukāmena jyeṣṭhatāṃ gantukāmena varatāṃ gantukāmena pravaratāṃ gantukāmena praṇītatāṃ gantukāmena uttamatāṃ gantukāmena anuttamatāṃ gantukāmena niruttaratāṃ gantukāmena asamatāṃ gantukāmena asamasamatāṃ gantukāmena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā anena vihāreṇa vihartavyam, yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6928: atha khalu tasmin samaye 'nyataro devaputrastrāyastriṃśairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ māndāravāṇi mahāmāndāravāṇi ca puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6929: ṣaṣṭhaṃ śataṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ tasminneva samaye tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaṃ cābhūt
T02bsu049_u:6930: te utthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsānyuttarāsaṅgāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayāmāsuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6931: teṣā bhikṣūṇāṃ buddhānubhāvena te 'ñjalipragrahā māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ paripūrṇā abhūvan /
T02bsu049_u:6933: samyaksaṃbuddhamavākiran, abhyavākiran, abhiprākiran, evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - vayaṃ bhagavan asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmaḥ, vayaṃ bhagavan anena anuttareṇa prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihāriṣyāma iti //
T02bsu049_u:6934: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarot /
T02bsu049_u:6935: dharmatā khalu punareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām - yadā smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti, atha tadā nānāvarṇā anekavarṇā raśmayo bhagavato mukhadvārānniścaranti - tadyathā nīlapītalohitāvadātamāñjiṣṭhasphaṭikarajatasuvarṇavarṇāḥ te niścarya anantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā avabhāsya yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhanyantardhīyante //
T02bsu049_u:6936: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocat - nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti /
T02bsu049_u:6937: ko bhagavan hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat
T02bsu049_u:6938: idamānanda bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ śatamanāgate 'dhvani tārakopame kalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate, abhisaṃbudhya ca sattvebhyo
T02bsu049_u:6941: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ śāstāro loke bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6942: teṣāṃ khalu punarānanda avakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ samaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:6943: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmavakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ samamevāyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati viṃśatikalpasahasrāṇi /
T02bsu049_u:6944: sarveṣāmeva caikaikasya vaistārikaṃ pravacanaṃ bhaviṣyati pṛthuvaipulyaprāptaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu
T02bsu049_u:6947: sarve ca te yato yata eva grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīto 'bhiniṣkramiṣyanti,
T02bsu049_u:6948: abhiniṣkramya yatra yatra dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyanti, pravartya ca yatra yatra ca vihariṣyanti, yato yataś ca yatra yatraiva ca pravekṣanti,
T02bsu049_u:6949: yena yena ca yato yata eva cābhiniṣkramiṣyanti, tatastatastatra tatra teṣāṃ praviśatāmabhiniṣkrāmatāṃ viharatāṃ ca pañcavarṇikānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ
T02bsu049_u:6951: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvairmahāsattvairuttamena vihāreṇa vihartukāmaiḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa (Vaidya 227) vihartavyam /
T02bsu049_u:6953: ye hi kecidānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti, niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - manuṣyebhya evaite cyutā bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6954: te ihopapannāstuṣitebhya eva vā devanikāyebhyaścyutā bhaviṣyanti manuṣyeṣvevopapannāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6956: hetoḥ? tathā hi manuṣyeṣu tuṣiteṣu ca deveṣu iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa
T02bsu049_u:6958: tathāgatāvalokitāḥ khalu punarānanda te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ, ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti, dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
T02bsu049_u:6960: likhiṣyanti, udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya antaśo likhitvā bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavavadiṣyanti anuśāsiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti /
T02bsu049_u:6961: avaropitakuśalamūlāste ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāstathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu
T02bsu049_u:6962: na kevalaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmantike taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum, niḥsaṃśayaṃ khalu punarānanda
T02bsu049_u:6964: bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ, ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣante, na cotrāsamāpadyante /
T02bsu049_u:6965: ye ca ānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca, arthataś ca dharmataś ca nayataścānugamiṣyanti, niṣṭhā ānanda tatra gantavyā -
T02bsu049_u:6967: ye caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na pratikrośanti, na
T02bsu049_u:6968: prativahanti, na pratikopayanti, na pratisaṃharanti, na pratiṣedhayanti,
T02bsu049_u:6969: na pratikṣipanti, na pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante, te 'pyānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā veditavyāḥ //
T02bsu049_u:6970: kiṃcāpyānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike kuśalamūlamavaropitam, evaṃ hi tanna
T02bsu049_u:6972: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na visaṃvādayiṣyati praṇidhānam, api tu khalu
T02bsu049_u:6973: punarānanda prāyeṇa tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṛtajñena bhavitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatā /
T02bsu049_u:6974: tasmāttarhi te ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā akṣarasaṃnipātādudgrahaṇāya dhāraṇāya vācanāya paryavāptaye pravartanāya cirasthitaye yatheyaṃ nāntardhīyeta /
T02bsu049_u:6975: sacettvamānanda yo mayā te dharmo deśitaḥ sākṣāt sthāpayitvā prajñāpāramitām, tāṃ sarvāṃ dharmadeśanāmudgṛhya punareva vipraṇāśayeḥ, punarevotsṛjeḥ vismārayeḥ, na me tvamānanda etāvatā aparāddhaḥ syāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6976: yatkhalu punastvamānanda prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ vā padasāmantakaṃ vā nāśayeḥ,
T02bsu049_u:6977: vismārayeḥ, tāvatā tvamānanda mamāparāddhaḥ syāḥ, na ca me tvaṃ cittamārādhayeḥ /
T02bsu049_u:6979: nāśayeḥ, punarevotsṛjeḥ, vismārayeḥ, na tvayāhaṃ satkṛto gurukṛtaḥ syām,
T02bsu049_u:6980: na mānito na pūjito nārcito nāpacāyitaḥ syām /
T02bsu049_u:6981: ye 'pi (Vaidya 228) te ānanda atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ, te 'pi tvayā ānanda
T02bsu049_u:6982: satkṛtā na gurukṛtā na mānitā na pūjitā nārcitā nāpacāyitā bhavanti /
T02bsu049_u:6984: punarevotsṛjeḥ, vismārayeḥ, tāvatā tvamānanda mamāparāddhaḥ syāḥ, na ca me
T02bsu049_u:6987: prajñāpāramitā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī sarvajñatāyā āhāriketi /
T02bsu049_u:6988: tasmāttarhi ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi te imāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
T02bsu049_u:6996: sumanasikṛtā ca sudhṛtā ca suparyavāptā ca supravartitā ca tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kartavyā /
T02bsu049_u:6999: hetoḥ? atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ hi ānanda tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmakāyateti tāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya /
T02bsu049_u:7000: yathā tattvamānanda etarhi me tathāgatasya tiṣṭhato dhriyamāṇasya yāpayato hitaiṣitayā premato vā gauravato vā kalyāṇato vā sparśavihārato vā kartavyaṃ vā dātavyaṃ vā samanvāhartavyaṃ vā manyase, tathaiva tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā
T02bsu049_u:7001: paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā bhāvayitavyā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā, tayā hitaiṣitayā tena premṇā tena gauraveṇa tayā guṇavattayā /
T02bsu049_u:7002: evaṃ tvayā ānanda ahaṃ pūjito bhavāmi, te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7003: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike prema ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ cotpāditaṃ bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:7004: yadi te ānanda ahaṃ priyo manaāpo 'parityaktastathāgataḥ, tataste ānanda iyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:7005: prajñāpāramitā priyā manaāpā aparityajanīyā bhavatu, yathā te ekapadam api na praṇaśyet, yathā nāntardhīyeta /
T02bsu049_u:7006: bahv api te ānanda ahaṃ bhāṣeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parīndanāmāramya kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīṃ vā kalpakoṭīśataṃ vā kalpakoṭīsahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā upari /
T02bsu049_u:7007: saṃkṣepeṇa ānanda yādṛśastavāhaṃ śāstā, tādṛśī te prajñāpāramitā śāstā /
T02bsu049_u:7008: yādṛśāste atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya
T02bsu049_u:7009: śāstāraḥ, tādṛśī prajñāpāramitā sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya śāstā /
T02bsu049_u:7011: aparimāṇayā parīndanayā prajñāpāramitāṃ te parīndāmyanuparīndāmi sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya hitāya sukhāya /
T02bsu049_u:7012: yasya ānanda tathāgato na parityaktaḥ, dharmo na parityaktaḥ, saṃgho na parityaktaḥ, atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhirna parityaktā, tasya prajñāpāramitā aparityaktā bhavatu /
T02bsu049_u:7015: likhedbhāvayet, atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavet
T02bsu049_u:7016: yo hi kaścidānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pralujyamānāmanuparigṛhṇīte, atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:7018: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7019: ye 'pi te ānanda abhūvannatīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:7020: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhūt
T02bsu049_u:7021: te 'pi te ānanda anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7023: ye 'pi te ānanda aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7025: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyopadeṣṭavyoddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7027: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi ānanda prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī
T02bsu049_u:7028: ye 'pi kecidānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā
T02bsu049_u:7029: niryātāḥ, niryāsyanti niryānti ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, sarve te ānanda prajñāpāramitāmāgamya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7030: te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu nirjātāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7032: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi ānanda sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ āhārikā bhavantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ
T02bsu049_u:7033: tasmāttarhi ānanda bhūyasyā mātrayā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dvitīyakam api tṛtīyakam api parīndāmyanuparīndāmi te, yatheyaṃ nāntardhīyeta /
T02bsu049_u:7034: eṣā hi ānanda tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmakṣayo dharmakoṣaḥ, yaduta prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu049_u:7036: hetoḥ? yo hi ānanda atīte 'dhvani anavarāgre saṃsāre sattvānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7037: buddhairbhagavadbhirdharmo deśitaḥ, sarvaḥ sa ita eva dharmakoṣāt, yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ
T02bsu049_u:7038: ye 'pi te ānanda anāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavanto 'parimite saṃsāre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ
T02bsu049_u:7039: deśayiṣyanti, te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta ita eva dharmakoṣāt, yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7040: ye 'pi te ānanda etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmita eva dharmakoṣātprabhāvanā bhavati, yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7041: tasmāttarhi ānanda akṣaya eṣa dharmakoṣo yaduta prajñāpāramitākoṣaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7042: sacettvamānanda śrāvakayāni śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśayes tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve arhatvaṃ sākṣāt kuryus tathāpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa dharmacakrapravartanānupravartanato dharmadeśayatā śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt sacet punas tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya ekam api
T02bsu049_u:7043: prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeḥ saṃprakāśayeḥ evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇa dharmacakrapravartanānuvartanato dharmaṃ deśayanato ārādhitaḥ
T02bsu049_u:7044: syān. na tu tayā paurvikayā dharmadeśanayā yayā te trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasatvā arhatvaṃ prāpitās. teṣāṃ cārhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tat kiṃ manyase ānandāpi nu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ?" /
T02bsu049_u:7048: "tata sa ānanda! śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati. ato 'pi sa ānanda!
T02bsu049_u:7049: bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'parasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T02bsu049_u:7050: antaśa ekadivasam api tiṣṭhatv ānandaikadivasam antaśaḥ purobhaktam api. tiṣṭhatv
T02bsu049_u:7051: ānanda! purobhaktam api. tiṣṭhatv ānanda! purobhaktaṃ deśitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7052: antaśa ekanālikām api ekanālikāntaram api vā tiṣṭhatv ānanda! ekanālikāntaram antaśo muhūrtam api tiṣṭhatv ānanda! muhūrtam antaśa ekalavam api tiṣṭhatv ānanda! ekalavam antaśa ekakṣaṇasaṃnipātam api yo hy ānanda! bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ aparasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya ekakṣaṇalavam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanty ayaṃ tato 'tibahutaraṃ
T02bsu049_u:7054: idaṃ hy ānanda! tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya
T02bsu049_u:7055: dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlāny abhibhavati // evam ānanda! kuśalamūlasamanvāgato bodhisatvo mahāsatva
T02bsu049_u:7056: evam etat kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam etad ānandānavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher naitat sthānaṃ
T02bsu049_u:7057: vidyate" // atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpam
T02bsu049_u:7058: ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yathārūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskṛtena tāś catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikādevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā vā sarve te buddhānubhāvenākṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyanti sma bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaṃ (Vaidya 230) dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ sāgaropamāyāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7059: gambhīrāyāmakṣobhyāyāṃ parṣadi bodhisattvairmahāsattvairacintyaguṇasamanvāgataiḥ parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ sarvaiścārhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravairniḥkleśairvaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñairājāneyairmahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyairapahṛtabhārairanuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacitaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptaiḥ //
T02bsu049_u:7060: atha khalu bhagavāṃstamṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ punareva pratisaṃharati sma /
T02bsu049_u:7061: pratisaṃhṛte ca bhagavatā tasmin ṛddhyabhisaṃskāre na bhūyaḥ sa bhagavānakṣobhyastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
T02bsu049_u:7062: te ca sarve bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ, tacca buddhakṣetraṃ tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ gandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ manuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāṃ ca na cakṣuṣa ābhāsaṃ bhūya āgacchanti sma /
T02bsu049_u:7063: tatkasya hetoḥ? pratisaṃhṛto hi tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraḥ
T02bsu049_u:7064: tena te sarve sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ na bhūyaścakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti sma //
T02bsu049_u:7065: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - evamānanda sarvadharmā na cakṣuṣo 'pyābhāsamāgacchanti,
T02bsu049_u:7066: dharmādharmāṇāmābhāsamāgacchanti, na dharmādharmān paśyanti, na dharmādharmān jānanti /
T02bsu049_u:7067: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi ānanda ajānakā
T02bsu049_u:7073: evaṃ caranta ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāścaranti prajñāpāramitāyam /
T02bsu049_u:7075: evaṃ śikṣamāṇā ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śikṣante prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:7076: sarvaśikṣāparamapāramitāṃ mahābodhiṃ prāptukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:7077: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hyānanda śikṣā sarvaśikṣāṇāmagrā ākhyāyate, śreṣṭhā
T02bsu049_u:7078: ākhyāyate, jyeṣṭhā ākhyāyate, varā ākhyāyate, pravarā ākhyāyate, praṇītā
T02bsu049_u:7079: ākhyāyate, uttamā ākhyāyate, anuttamā ākhyāyate, niruttarā ākhyāyate,
T02bsu049_u:7080: asamā ākhyāyate, asamasamā ākhyāyate, sarvalokahitāvahā sarvalokasukhāvahā anāthānāṃ nāthakarī buddhānujñātā buddhapraśastā /
T02bsu049_u:7081: asyāmānanda prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atra śikṣāyāṃ sthitvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumekena padāṅguṣṭhenotkṣipya punareva nikṣipeyuḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7082: na ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmevaṃ syāt - utkṣipto vāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ nikṣipto veti /
T02bsu049_u:7084: asyāmānanda prajñāpāramitāśikṣāyāṃ śikṣitvā buddhā bhagavanto 'tītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣvasaṅgatāmanuprāptāḥ
T02bsu049_u:7085: yāvatya ānanda kāścicchikṣāḥ atītānāgatapratyutpanne 'dhvani, sarvāsāṃ tāsāmānanda śikṣāṇāmiyameva prajñāpāramitāśikṣā agrā ākhyāyate, śreṣṭhā ākhyāyate,
T02bsu049_u:7086: jyeṣṭhā ākhyāyate, varā ākhyāyate, pravarā ākhyāyate, praṇītā ākhyāyate,
T02bsu049_u:7087: uttamā ākhyāyate, anuttamā ākhyāyate, niruttarā ākhyāyate, asamā
T02bsu049_u:7093: ākāśasya hi sa ānanda pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā grahītavyaṃ manyetaḥ, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā grahītavyaṃ manyeta /
T02bsu049_u:7097: na mayā ānanda prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayo vā paryanto vā ākhyātaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7100: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hyānanda nāmakāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:7103: ānanda āha - kena punaḥ kāraṇena bhagavan bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:7104: pramāṇaṃ nākhyātam ? bhagavānāha - akṣayatvādānanda prajñāpāramitāyāstathāgataḥ pramāṇaṃ na nirdiśati /
T02bsu049_u:7106: na hyānanda viviktasya dharmasya viviktatāpyupalabhyate, kutaḥ punarasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati?
T02bsu049_u:7108: ye 'pi te ānanda atīte 'dhvanyabhūvaṃstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, te
T02bsu049_u:7110: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā vā parikṣīṇā vā /
T02bsu049_u:7112: bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, te 'pyānanda ita eva prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāvayiṣyante /
T02bsu049_u:7113: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣeṣyate vā parikṣeṣyate vā /
T02bsu049_u:7114: ye 'pi te ānanda etarhyaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, te 'pyānanda ita eva prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāvyante /
T02bsu049_u:7115: na ceyamānanda prajñāpāramitā kṣīyate vā parikṣīyate vā /
T02bsu049_u:7118: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣīyate vā parikṣīyate vā /
T02bsu049_u:7120: ānanda kṣayayitavyaṃ manyeta, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ kṣayayitavyāṃ manyeta /
T02bsu049_u:7122: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteretadabhavat - gambhīramidaṃ sthānaṃ tathāgatena bhāṣitam /
T02bsu049_u:7124: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - akṣayā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā? bhagavānāha - akṣayā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā yaduta ākāśākṣayatvātsarvadharmānutpādataḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7125: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā? bhagavānāha -
T02bsu049_u:7126: rūpākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7128: vijñānākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7129: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7130: avidyākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7131: evaṃ saṃskārākṣayatvena vijñānākṣayatvena nāmarūpākṣayatvena ṣaḍāyatanākṣayatvena sparśākṣayatvena (Vaidya 232)
T02bsu049_u:7132: vedanākṣayatvena tṛṣṇākṣayatvena upādānākṣayatvena bhavākṣayatvena jātyakṣayatvena jarāmaraṇākṣayatvena śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7133: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antadvayavivarjitā pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā
T02bsu049_u:7134: evaṃ vyavalokayan subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyanutpādamanādyantamadhyaṃ taṃ vyavalokayati
T02bsu049_u:7135: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāveṇiko dharmo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya, yadevaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati /
T02bsu049_u:7136: evaṃ vyavalokayataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ sarvajñajñānapratilambho bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:7137: yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
T02bsu049_u:7138: vyavalokayati, sa na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā sthāsyati,
T02bsu049_u:7140: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, sacet imān
T02bsu049_u:7141: copāyakauśalyamanāgamya na jānanti - kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā
T02bsu049_u:7143: abhinirhartavyā, kathaṃ ca akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavya iti /
T02bsu049_u:7144: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivṛttā vivartante, vivartsyante ca anuttarāyāḥ
T02bsu049_u:7145: samyaksaṃbodheḥ, sarve te idamupāyakauśalyamanāgamya vivṛttā vivartante vivartsyante ca
T02bsu049_u:7146: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā na vivṛttā na vivartante na vivartsyante ca, sarve te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya na vivṛttā na vivartante na vivartsyante ca anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7147: evaṃ ca akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7148: evaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayan na kaṃciddharmamahetukamutpadyamānaṃ samanupaśyati, na kaṃciddharmaṃ nityaṃ vā dhruvaṃ vā śāśvataṃ vā avipariṇāmadharmakaṃ vā samanupaśyati na kaṃciddharmaṃ kārakaṃ vā vedakaṃ vā samanupaśyati /
T02bsu049_u:7149: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharato 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā /
T02bsu049_u:7150: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharan pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati, tasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ samanupaśyati, na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān, na vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati, nāvidyāṃ samanupaśyati /
T02bsu049_u:7151: evaṃ na saṃskārānna vijñānaṃ na nāmarūpaṃ na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sparśaṃ na vedanāṃ na tṛṣṇāṃ nopādānaṃ na bhavaṃ na jātiṃ na jarāmaraṇaṃ na śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsān samanupaśyati idaṃ buddhakṣetramiti na samanupaśyati, anyadbuddhakṣetramiti na samanupaśyati /
T02bsu049_u:7152: tam api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati, yena dharmeṇa idaṃ vā anyadvā buddhakṣetraṃ samanupaśyet
T02bsu049_u:7153: / iyaṃ sā subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu049_u:7154: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati /
T02bsu049_u:7156: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo mātāpitṛṣu kālagateṣu paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati, evameva subhūte yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, tasmin samaye māraḥ
T02bsu049_u:7158: subhūtirāha - kimeka eva bhagavan māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito
T02bsu049_u:7159: bhavati, utāho bahavo mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti,
T02bsu049_u:7160: utāho ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ te 'pi sarve tasmin samaye paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati, tasmin samaye ye
