T02bsu049_u:7161: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāṃ pāpīyāṃsaḥ te sarve paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti, svakasvakeṣvāsaneṣu na ramante /
T02bsu049_u:7162: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa hi viharato 'sya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuro loko 'vatāraṃ na labhate grahaṇāya, gādhaṃ na labhate, yatrainaṃ gṛhītvā viheṭhayedvā vivartayedvā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7163: tasmāttarhiḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
T02bsu049_u:7164: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā
T02bsu049_u:7165: gacchati, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati /
T02bsu049_u:7166: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ
T02bsu049_u:7168: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni
T02bsu049_u:7171: sarvopāyakauśalyāni subhūte parigrahītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam, prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7172: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, prajñāpāramitāmabhinirharati, tasmin samaye subhūte na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu
T02bsu049_u:7173: lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, te samanvāhartavyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7174: teṣām api itonirjātaiva sarvajñatā yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7175: evaṃ samanvāhṛtya tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena punarevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - ahamapyetān dharmānanuprāpsyāmi ye
T02bsu049_u:7177: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā ime cittotpādā utpādayitavyā abhinirhartavyā divasasyātyayena, antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api /
T02bsu049_u:7178: yaś ca subhūte aupalambhiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyāt, ayameva tata aupalambhikādbodhisattvānmahāsattvādbahutaraṃ
T02bsu049_u:7179: puṇyaṃ prasavati, yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divasasyātyayena imāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7182: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ, yo 'syāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7186: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā?
T02bsu049_u:7187: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nānyā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7190: tatrāpi tathāgatairavirahito bhaviṣyati, tathāgatāvirahiteṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyate, sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:7195: divasamanuvarteran, tadyathāpi nāma subhūte gandhahastino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ya etarhyakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caratīti //
T02bsu049_u:7199: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā - sarvadharmāsaṅgataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7204: sarvadharmāś ca nāmamātreṇa vyavahāramātreṇābhilapyante iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7205: vyavahāraś ca na kvacinna kutaścinna kaścidvyavahāraḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7206: sarvadharmā avyavahārā avyāhārā avyavahṛtā avyāhṛtā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7217: / sarvadharmā nāgacchanti, na gacchanti, ajānānā ajātā atyantājātita iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā
T02bsu049_u:7219: / sarvadharmā āryārhantaḥ prakṛtipariśuddhā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā
T02bsu049_u:7225: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte adeśamapradeśaṃ prakṛītisvabhāvataḥ sarvadharmanirodhaprahlādanatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7228: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate /
T02bsu049_u:7230: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate prakṛtipariśuddhatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7231: sarvadharmā asaktāḥ saṅgāsaṅgavigatā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7235: sarvadharmā maitrīvihāriṇaḥ karuṇāvihāriṇo muditāvihāriṇa upekṣāvihāriṇa iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7236: sarvadharmā brahmabhūtā doṣānutpādanataḥ sarvadoṣānutpādanata iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā
T02bsu049_u:7340: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā //
T02bsu049_u:7341: yadāyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmanugamiṣyati, vyavacārayiṣyati avatariṣyati avabhotsyate
T02bsu049_u:7350: tadā nāsya durlabhā bhaviṣyati sarvaguṇānāṃ paripūriḥ,
T02bsu049_u:7355: punaraparaṃ subhūte tatheyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣṭavyā, yathā sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paryeṣitā, ya etarhi bhīṣmagarjitanirghoṣasvarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike
T02bsu049_u:7358: kathaṃ bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat -
T02bsu049_u:7359: sadāpraruditena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa lābhasatkāraślokeṣvaniśritena paryeṣamāṇena paryeṣitā /
T02bsu049_u:7360: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto 'bhūt
T02bsu049_u:7363: tathā ca gaccha, yathā na kāyaklamathamanasikāramutpādayasi, na
T02bsu049_u:7368: mā ca kvaciccittaṃ praṇidhāḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā /
T02bsu049_u:7369: mā ca kulaputra vāmenālokayan gāḥ, mā dakṣiṇena, mā pūrveṇa,
T02bsu049_u:7370: mā paścimena, mottareṇa, mordhvam, mādhaḥ, mā ca anuvidiśamavalokayan gāḥ
T02bsu049_u:7371: / tathā ca kulaputra gaccha, yathā nātmato na satkāyataścalasi /
T02bsu049_u:7372: yathā na rūpataścalasi, yathā na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārataḥ, yathā na vijñānataścalasi
T02bsu049_u:7376: yo buddhadharmebhyo vitiṣṭhate, sa saṃsāre carati /
T02bsu049_u:7377: yaḥ saṃsāre carati, sa na carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu049_u:7383: evamukte sa nirghoṣaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra
T02bsu049_u:7385: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar api śabdamaśrauṣīt /
T02bsu049_u:7386: evaṃ cāśrauṣīt - śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu ca tvayā kulaputra sarvadharmeṣvadhimuktimutpādya prajñāpāramitā paryeṣṭavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7387: nimittaparivarjitena bhāvaparivarjitena sattvadṛṣṭiparivarjitena ca tvayā bhavitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:7389: kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca tvayā sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni, yāni ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānutpādājātāniruddhābhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti /
T02bsu049_u:7390: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra pratipadyamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi pustakagatāṃ vā dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ kāyagatām /
T02bsu049_u:7391: yasya ca tvaṃ kulaputra antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāḥ śāstṛsaṃjñā tvayā tatrotpādayitavyā
T02bsu049_u:7392: kṛtajñena ca tvayā bhavitavyaṃ kṛtavedinā ca - eṣa mama kalyāṇamitraṃ yasyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantikācchṛṇomi
T02bsu049_u:7394: samyaksaṃbodheḥ, āsannaś ca bhaviṣyāmi tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
T02bsu049_u:7398: imāstvayā kulaputra anuśaṃsāḥ paritulayamānena dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau śāstṛsaṃjñotpādayitavyā
T02bsu049_u:7399: na ca tvayā kulaputra lokāmiṣapratisaṃyuktayā cittasaṃtatyā dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ
T02bsu049_u:7400: dharmārthikena ca tvayā dharmagauraveṇa dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7402: asti hi kulaputra māraḥ pāpīyān dharmabhāṇakasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpaśabdagandharasasparśānupasaṃharati sevituṃ bhaktuṃ paryupāsitum /
T02bsu049_u:7404: tatra ca tvayā kulaputra dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau nāprasādacittamutpādayitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:7405: api tvevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - nāhaṃ tadupāyakauśalyaṃ jāne, yadeṣa upāyakauśalyaṃ prajānāti
T02bsu049_u:7406: eṣa sattvavinayena sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlaparigrahamupādāya enān dharmān pratisevate bhajate paryupāste /
T02bsu049_u:7407: na hi kvacidbodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṅgo vā ārambaṇaṃ vā saṃvidyate /
T02bsu049_u:7408: tatkṣaṇaṃ ca tvayā kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7411: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi svabhāvena śūnyāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7412: sarvadharmā hi niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7413: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmabhāṇakamanubadhnan nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niryāsyasi /
T02bsu049_u:7414: aparam api tvaṃ kulaputra mārakarma samanvāhareḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7415: sacetkulaputra dharmabhāṇakaḥ prajñāpāramitārthikaṃ kulaputramavasādayati, na samanvāharati, tatra tvayā kulaputra na prativāṇiḥ kartavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7416: api tu dharmārthikenaiva dharmagauraveṇaiva anirviṇṇamānasena dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ
T02bsu049_u:7417: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya nirghoṣasyāntikādimāmanuśāsanīṃ pratigṛhya yena pūrvā dik tena pratikrāmati sma /
T02bsu049_u:7418: aciraprakrāntasya cāsyaitadabhūt - na mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyamiti
T02bsu049_u:7420: tatra rudan krandan śocan paridevamānaḥ evaṃ cintayati sma - asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe ekaṃ vā rātriṃdivamatināmayiṣyāmi, dve vā,
T02bsu049_u:7421: trīṇi vā, catvāri vā, pañca vā, ṣaḍ vā, sapta vā rātriṃdivānyatināmayiṣyāmi /
T02bsu049_u:7430: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ ekaputrake kālagate mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena samanvāgato 'bhavat, tasya putraśokena nānyaḥ
T02bsu049_u:7431: kaścinmanasikāraḥ pravartate, api tvekaputrakamanasikāra eva pravartate /
T02bsu049_u:7432: evameva subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasmin
T02bsu049_u:7433: (Vaidya 240) samaye nānyaḥ kaścinmanasikāraḥ pravartate sma, api tu kadā
T02bsu049_u:7435: atha khalu subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathotkaṇṭhitasya tathāgatavigrahaḥ purataḥ sthitvā sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yastvamenāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣase /
T02bsu049_u:7436: evaṃ hi kulaputra paurvakair api tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā, yathā tvametarhi paryeṣase /
T02bsu049_u:7437: tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra etenaiva vīryeṇa etenaivotsāhenaṃ etayaivārthikatayā etayaiva cchandikatayā anubadhya pūrvāmeva diśaṃ gaccha /
T02bsu049_u:7438: asti kulaputra itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairgandhavatī nāma nagarī saptaratnamayī, saptabhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:7439: prākārairanuparikṣiptā, saptabhiḥ parikhābhiḥ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiranuparikṣiptā, dvādaśa yojanāni āyāmena, dvādaśa yojanāni vistāreṇa, ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca pañcabhirantarāpaṇavīthiśatairālekhyavicitrasadṛśairdarśanīyairnirviddhā asamasamairanutpīḍajanayugyayānasaṃkramaṇasthānasthāpitaiḥ sumāpitā /
T02bsu049_u:7440: samantataḥ prākārāś ca tasyā nagaryāḥ saptaratnamayāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7441: teṣāṃ ca saptaratnamayānāṃ prākārāṇāṃ jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya khoḍakaśīrṣāṇi pramāṇavantyupodgatāni
T02bsu049_u:7442: sarvasmiṃś ca khoḍakaśīrṣe saptaratnamayo vṛkṣo jāto nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ phalaiḥ phalavān
T02bsu049_u:7443: sarvataś ca khoḍakavṛkṣādratnamayaṃ sūtraṃ dvitīyaṃ khoḍakavṛkṣāntaramavasaktam /
T02bsu049_u:7444: sarvāvatī ca sā nagarī sauvarṇena kiṅkiṇījālena praticchannā /
T02bsu049_u:7445: tasya ca kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteneritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyaḥ śabdo niścarati /
T02bsu049_u:7446: tadyathāpi nāma pañcāṅgikasya tūryasya sametya saṃgītyāṃ kuśalairgandharvaiḥ saṃpravāditasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati, evameva tasya kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati /
T02bsu049_u:7447: tena ca śabdena te sattvāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
T02bsu049_u:7448: samantācca tasyā nagaryāḥ parikhā vāriparipūrṇā anusārivārivāhinyo vāriṇo nātiśītasya nātyuṣṇasya pūrṇāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7449: tasmiṃś ca vāriṇi nāvaḥ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ vicitrā darśanīyāsteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7450: pūrvakarmavipākenābhinirvṛttāḥ, yāsu te sattvā abhiruhya krīḍanti ramante
T02bsu049_u:7453: anyaiś ca abhijātābhijātaiḥ sugandhagandhibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ saṃchāditam /
T02bsu049_u:7454: nāsti sā kācittrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau puṣpajātiryā tatra nāsti /
T02bsu049_u:7459: sarvāsu tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu saptaratnamayāni vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇi
T02bsu049_u:7461: sarvāṇi ca tānyutpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāni śakaṭacakrapramāṇapariṇāhāni sugandhāni nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni, pītāni pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni, lohitāni lohitavarṇāni lohitanidarśanāni
T02bsu049_u:7465: sarvāni ca tānyudyānāni amamānyaparigrahāṇi, teṣāmeva sattvānāṃ pūrvakarmavipākenābhinirvṛttāni, yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ
T02bsu049_u:7466: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatāṃ buddhanetrīcitrīkārānugatasugataśrutacittānāṃ sattvānāṃ dīrgharātraṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktānām /
T02bsu049_u:7467: tatra ca kulaputra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ madhyeśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gṛhaṃ yojanaṃ samantāt /
T02bsu049_u:7472: aśokaṃ ca nāma śokavigataṃ ca nāma puṣpacitraṃ ca nāmodyānam
T02bsu049_u:7473: / ekaikasmiṃścodyāne 'ṣṭāvaṣṭau puṣkariṇyo yaduta bhadrā ca nāma,
T02bsu049_u:7474: bhadrottamā ca nāma, nandā ca nāma, nandottamā ca nāma, kṣamā ca nāma,
T02bsu049_u:7475: kṣamottamā ca nāma, niyatā ca nāma, avivāhā ca nāma /
T02bsu049_u:7476: tāsāṃ ca khalu puṣkariṇīnāmekaṃ pārśvaṃ sauvarṇamayaṃ dvitīyaṃ pārśvaṃ rūpyamayaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pārśvaṃ vaidūryamayaṃ caturthaṃ pārśvaṃ sphaṭikamayam /
T02bsu049_u:7479: ekaikasyāṃ ca puṣkariṇyāmaṣṭāvaṣṭau sopānāni nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ sopānaphalakaiḥ pratimaṇḍitāni
T02bsu049_u:7480: sarvasmiṃś ca sopānaphalakavivarāntare jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya kadalīvṛkṣo jātaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7482: samantācca tāsāṃ puṣkariṇīnāṃ nānācitrāḥ puṣpavṛkṣā jātāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7483: teṣāṃ puṣpavṛkṣāṇāṃ vāteneritāni puṣpāṇi puṣkariṇīṣu patanti /
T02bsu049_u:7484: sarvāsu ca tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu candanagandhikaṃ vāri, varṇopetaṃ rasopetaṃ sparśopetam /
T02bsu049_u:7485: tatra ca dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saparivāro 'ṣṭaṣaṣṭayā strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
T02bsu049_u:7486: ye 'pi tatra nagare anye sattvā vāstavyāḥ, striyaś ca puruṣāśca, te 'pi sarve nityapramuditā udyāneṣu puṣkariṇīṣu ca pañcabhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:7487: kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
T02bsu049_u:7488: sa khalu punardharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa tāvatkālaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati, tatastrikālaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayati /
T02bsu049_u:7489: ye 'pi te sattvāstatra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ vāstavyāḥ te 'pi
T02bsu049_u:7490: madhyenagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya āsanaṃ prajñapayanti, suvarṇapādakaṃ vā rūpyapādakaṃ vā vaiḍūryapādakaṃ vā
T02bsu049_u:7491: sphaṭikapādakaṃ vā, tūlikāstīrṇaṃ vā, goṇikāstīrṇaṃ vā, uparigarbholikaṃ
T02bsu049_u:7493: upariṣṭāccāntarīkṣe cailavitānaṃ muktāvicitritaṃ samaṃ sahitā niratāḥ kimayaṃ saṃsthita iti susaṃsthitavicitravipākatayā dhārayanti /
T02bsu049_u:7494: samantācca taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ pañcavarṇikaiḥ kusumairabhyavakiranti saṃpravikiranti
T02bsu049_u:7495: / nānāgandhadhūpadhūpitaṃ ca taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ kurvanti, yathāpīdaṃ dharmāśayaviśuddhyā tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
T02bsu049_u:7497: tatra dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niṣaṇṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayati /
T02bsu049_u:7498: evaṃrūpeṇa kulaputra dharmagauraveṇa dharmāṇāṃ saṃniśrayatayā (Vaidya 242) śraddheyaśraddadhānatayā śraddhotpādanena te
T02bsu049_u:7500: tatra ca bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ śṛṇvanti /
T02bsu049_u:7504: sarvaṃ ca te sattvā avinipātadharmāṇo 'vinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7505: tasya tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ gaccha /
T02bsu049_u:7507: sa hi tava kulaputra dīrgharātraṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃdarśakaḥ samādāpakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣako
T02bsu049_u:7511: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra rātriṃdivamadhiṣṭhitamanasikāramutpādayamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi //
T02bsu049_u:7512: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ idaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt /
T02bsu049_u:7513: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣaḥ saviṣeṇa śalyena viddho nānyaṃ manasikāramutpādayati, api tu kadā
T02bsu049_u:7514: nāmāhaṃ śalyahartāraṃ vaidyaṃ lapsye yo mamedaṃ śalyamuddhariṣyati, yo māmito duḥkhānmocayiṣyatīti
T02bsu049_u:7515: evameva sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye nānyaṃ kaṃciddharmaṃ manasi karoti, api tu kadā
T02bsu049_u:7516: nāmāhaṃ taṃ kulaputraṃ drakṣyāmi yo māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrāvayiṣyati,
T02bsu049_u:7517: yanmama dharmaṃ śrutvā upalambhamanasikārāḥ prahāsyanta iti //
T02bsu049_u:7518: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe sthitaḥ tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayataḥ śṛṇoti sma /
T02bsu049_u:7583: sa eṣu samādhiṣu sthitaḥ san daśadiśi loke buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ prakāśayato bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7584: te ca tathāgatāḥ sādhukāraṃ dadati sma, svāsanaṃ cāsya kurvanti sma /
T02bsu049_u:7585: evaṃ cāvocan - asmābhir api kulaputra pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhirevameva
T02bsu049_u:7587: parigaveṣamāṇaiś ca ete eva samādhayaḥ pratilabdhāḥ, ye tvayaitarhi pratilabdhāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7588: enāṃś ca samādhīn pratilabhya gatiṃgatāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ, prajñāpāramitāyāmavinivartanīyeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7589: te vayameteṣāmeva samādhīnāṃ prakṛtiṃ svabhāvaṃ vyavalokayantastaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmo yaḥ samāpadyate vā vyuttiṣṭhate vā, yo bodhāya caret, yo vā anuttarāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7591: iyaṃ sā kulaputra prajñāpāramitā, yā na kenaciddharmeṇa manyamānatā /
T02bsu049_u:7596: acintyaṃ ca anuttaraṃ buddhajñānaṃ buddhaprajñā, anuttaraś ca buddhasamādhiḥ,
T02bsu049_u:7597: sarvabuddhadharmaguṇapāramitā ca anuprāptā yasyā guṇapāramitāyā na śakyaṃ tathāgataireva tāvatpramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ paryanto vā nidarśayitum, kiṃ punaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ? tasmāttarhi kulaputra eteṣveva tvayā dharmeṣu gauravamutpādayitavyaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā arthikatayā chandikatayā ca /
T02bsu049_u:7598: arthikasya hi kulaputra chandikasya ca na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7599: kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ gauravamutpādayitavyam, prema ca karaṇīyam, prasādaś ca karaṇīyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7600: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣiprameva anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante
T02bsu049_u:7602: ko 'smākaṃ kalyāṇamitramiti? ta enametadavocan - dīrgharātraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitaḥ parigṛhītaś ca /
T02bsu049_u:7604: sa tava kulaputra parigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
T02bsu049_u:7605: tattvayā kṛtajñatayā kṛtaveditayā ca satkṛtya tatkṛtaṃ dhārayitavyam /
T02bsu049_u:7606: sacettvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ (Vaidya 244) mahāsattvamekaṃ vā kalpaṃ dvau vā kalpau trīn vā kalpān kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā uttare cailoṇḍukamiva śirasā parikarṣeḥ, sarvasattvasukhopasthānaṃ
T02bsu049_u:7607: cāsyopasthāpayeḥ, yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau rūpaśabdagandharasasparśāḥ, tān sarvānupanāmayeḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7608: evam api tvayā kulaputra tasya kulaputrasya naiva kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ bhavet /
T02bsu049_u:7610: hetoḥ? tasya hi kulaputra kulaputrasya anubhāvena tavaiṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7613: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samāśvāsya antarhitā abhūvan
T02bsu049_u:7615: vyutthitasya cāsya etadabhūt - kutaste tathāgatāḥ, kva vā te
T02bsu049_u:7618: tasyaitadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ mama saṃparigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
T02bsu049_u:7620: yannvahametamarthaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhigamyopasaṃkramya paripṛccheyam - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
T02bsu049_u:7621: kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti //
T02bsu049_u:7622: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgate bodhisattve mahāsattve prema ca prasādaṃ ca citrīkāraṃ ca gauravaṃ ca upasthāpayati /
T02bsu049_u:7623: upasthāpya evaṃ prācintayat - kiyadrūpayā nu khalvahaṃ satkriyayā taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam? daridraścāsmi /
T02bsu049_u:7624: na ca me kiṃcittathārūpaṃ vastraṃ vā ratnaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā maṇayo vā muktā vā vaidūryaṃ vā śaṅkhaśilā vā pravālaṃ vā rajataṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpo vā gandho vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭā vā patākā vā saṃvidyate /
T02bsu049_u:7625: kenāhaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāṃ gurukuryām? na ca mamaitatpratirūpaṃ
T02bsu049_u:7628: na ca me prītirvā prāmodhaṃ votpadyate //
T02bsu049_u:7629: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃrūpairguṇairgauravamanasikārairgacchan anupūrveṇa anyataraṃ nagaramanuprāpto 'bhūt /
T02bsu049_u:7631: yannvahamimamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya tena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kuryām /
T02bsu049_u:7632: dīrgharātraṃ hi mamātmabhāvasahasrāṇi bhagnāni kṣīṇāni niruddhāni vikrītāni /
T02bsu049_u:7633: punaḥ punaraparimāṇe saṃsāre aparimāṇāni ca nirayaduḥkhāni mayā kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānamanubhūtāni
T02bsu049_u:7634: na punarevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśa evaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā sattvānāṃ satkārāyeti /
T02bsu049_u:7635: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvontarāpaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdamanuśrāvayāmāsa, ghoṣamudīrayati sma - kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ, kaḥ
T02bsu049_u:7637: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhūt - ayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo
T02bsu049_u:7638: mahāsattvo dharmakāmatayā yadyātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kariṣyati, (Vaidya 245)
T02bsu049_u:7639: prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca pariprakṣyati - kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣipramanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariniṣpatsyate iti, tadā śrutasāgaratāṃ cānuprāpsyati, adhṛṣyaś ca bhaviṣyati māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ, sarvaguṇapāramitāṃ cānuprāpsyati tatra ca bahūnāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kariṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:7640: tāṃś ca mama viṣayādatikrāmayiṣyati anyāṃś ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya /
T02bsu049_u:7642: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃstān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃstathā pratyutthāpayāmāsa,
T02bsu049_u:7643: yathā te taṃ ghoṣaṃ nāśrauṣuḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya - kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ, kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ, kaḥ puruṣaṃ kretumicchatīti /
T02bsu049_u:7644: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā ātmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate, tadā ekāntaṃ gatvā prārodīt, aśrūṇi prāvartayat /
T02bsu049_u:7645: evaṃ cāvocat - aho batāsmākaṃ durlabdhā lābhāḥ, ye vayamātmabhāvasyāpi krāyakaṃ na labhāmahe - yadvayamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmeti //
T02bsu049_u:7646: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - yannvahaṃ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ tulayeyam - kiṃ nvayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyāśayapratipanna ātmabhāvaparityāgaṃ prati dharmakāmatayā,
T02bsu049_u:7648: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamabhinirmāya yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, tenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
T02bsu049_u:7649: upasaṃkramya sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra
T02bsu049_u:7653: taṃ māṇavakarūpī śakra āha - kasya punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāya ātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ? sadāpraruditastamāha
T02bsu049_u:7654: ahaṃ māṇavaka dharmakāmatayā imamātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmapūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:7659: batāhamatyalpapuṇyaḥ, yo 'hamasyātmabhāvasyāpi krāyakaṃ na labhe, yena taṃ vikrīya prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjāṃ kuryām, āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmiti /
T02bsu049_u:7660: atha khalu māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na khalu mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam /
T02bsu049_u:7661: api tu khalu punaḥ piturbhe yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7662: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena kṛtyam, lohitena ca asthimajjayā ca /
T02bsu049_u:7664: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ, pariniṣpannaṃ cātmabhāvaṃ jāne
T02bsu049_u:7665: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalye buddhadharmeṣu ca, yanmayāyaṃ māṇavakaḥ krāyako
T02bsu049_u:7667: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittastaṃ māṇavakametadavocat - dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena
T02bsu049_u:7670: mūlyaṃ dadāmi? sa tametadavocat - yatte māṇavaka parityaktam, taddehīti /
T02bsu049_u:7671: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvayati sma /
T02bsu049_u:7672: dakṣiṇaṃ coruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāmati sma /
T02bsu049_u:7675: sā adrākṣītsadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā rudhiraṃ niḥsrāvya ūruṃ nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntam /
T02bsu049_u:7676: tasyā etadabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ kulaputra ātmanaivātmanaḥ īdṛśīṃ
T02bsu049_u:7678: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntā /
T02bsu049_u:7679: upasaṃkramya sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputra
T02bsu049_u:7680: prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayasi? kiṃ cānena rudhireṇa kariṣyasi tvamasthimajjābhyāṃ ca? sadāprarudita āha - asya dārike māṇavakasyāntike
T02bsu049_u:7681: idaṃ vikrīya prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi, āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ
T02bsu049_u:7683: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvatadavocat - kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirniṣpatsyate guṇaviśeṣo vā, yattvamātmano hṛdayaṃ rudhiraṃ cāsthimajjānaṃ ca vikrīya
T02bsu049_u:7684: taṃ kulaputraṃ satkartukāmaḥ? sa tāṃ dārikāmetadavocat - sa dārike kulaputro 'smākaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ copadekṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:7686: tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7687: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya suvarṇavarṇaṃ ca kāyaṃ pratilapsyāmahe /
T02bsu049_u:7688: dvātriṃśacca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītiṃ cānuvyañjanāni vyāmaprabhatāṃ ca anantaraśmitāṃ ca mahāmaitrī ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca mahāmuditāṃ ca mahopekṣāṃ ca /
T02bsu049_u:7689: catvāri vaiśāradyāni pratilapsyāmahe, catasraś ca pratisaṃvidaḥ pratilapsyāmahe, aṣṭādaśa ca āveṇikabuddhadharmān pratilapsyāmahe, pañca ca abhijñāḥ, acintyāṃ ca śīlaviśuddhim, acintyāṃ ca samādhiviśuddhim, acintyāṃ ca prajñāviśuddhim,
T02bsu049_u:7693: pratilapsyāmahe, yena ca sarvasattvānāṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāma iti //
T02bsu049_u:7694: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - āścaryaṃ kulaputra yāvadudārāḥ praṇītāścāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrtitāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7695: ekaikasyāpi tāvatkulaputra evaṃrūpasya dharmasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān api kalpānātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā bhaveyuḥ, prāgeva bahūnāmarthāya ekaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7696: tathodārāḥ praṇītāścāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrtitāḥ, yathā mamāpyete rocante kṣamante ca /
T02bsu049_u:7697: api nu khalu punaḥ kulaputra yena yenaivārthena te kṛtyam, tattatte dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā maṇīn vā muktāṃ vā rajataṃ vā vaidūryaṃ vā musāragalvaṃ vā lohitārkaṃ vā sphāṭikaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā mālyaṃ va vilepanaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭāṃ vā patākāṃ vā dīpaṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:7698: tena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi /
T02bsu049_u:7699: mā ca ātmana imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7705: (Vaidya 247) atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamantardhāpayitvā svakenātmabhāvena sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato 'sthāt, idaṃ cāvocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yasya te iyamevaṃrūpā
T02bsu049_u:7707: evaṃrūpayā ca dharmārthikatayā pūrvakair api tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paripṛcchadbhiranuttarā ca
T02bsu049_u:7709: tanna mama kulaputra hṛdayena kāryam, na rudhireṇa, nāsthimajjābhyām, api tu khalu
T02bsu049_u:7712: kiyadrūpaṃ te varaṃ dāsyāmīti? sa tāmāha - anuttarān me śakra
T02bsu049_u:7714: devendra āha - na mamātra kulaputra viṣaye viṣayitā /
T02bsu049_u:7717: sadāprarudita āha - alpotsukastvaṃ devendra bhava atra sthāne mamātmabhāvaparipūrimupādāya
T02bsu049_u:7721: jñātaścāsmyaśāṭhyenādhyāśayena, tena devendra satyena satyavacanena mama yathāpaurāṇo 'yamātmabhāvo bhavatu /
T02bsu049_u:7722: atha khalu tatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhānubhāvena āśayapariśuddhyā ca yathāpaurāṇo 'sya kāyaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt, arogo nirupadravaś ca /
T02bsu049_u:7723: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māraś ca pāpīyān niṣpratibhānaḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyottare pratibhānamapratipadyamānastatraivāntarhito 'bhūt //
T02bsu049_u:7724: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra
T02bsu049_u:7727: ahaṃ te mātāpitṝṇāmantikāttaddhanaṃ dāpayiṣyāmi, yena tvaṃ tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyasi, taṃ cāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi, yaduta dharmakāmatayā /
T02bsu049_u:7728: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ tayā śreṣṭhadārikayā yenāsyāḥ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
T02bsu049_u:7730: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā svakaṃ niveśanaṃ praviśya svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caitadavocat - amba tāta daddhvaṃ hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇaṃ ratnāni maṇīn vastrāṇi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāḥ nānāvidhāś ca divyā vādyaprakṛtīrutsṛjata, mām api sārdhamebhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:7732: gamiṣyāmyaham api sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ tasya pūjārthaṃ ca /
T02bsu049_u:7735: atha khalu tau tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ dārikāmetadavocatām - kaḥ punareṣa dārike
T02bsu049_u:7736: sadāprarudito nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, kva vā sa etarhi tiṣṭhati?
T02bsu049_u:7738: eṣa ca kulaputro 'dhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ, yaduta sarvasattvānaparimāṇataḥ saṃsāraduḥkhānmocayitukāmaḥ, sarvadharmakāmatayātmānaṃ (Vaidya vikrīya prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayitukāmaḥ, āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartukāmaḥ
T02bsu049_u:7740: alabhamānaḥ san duḥkhito durmanāḥ pradhyāyan dīnamanā aśrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7741: sa śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāyoktaḥ - kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra duḥkhī durmanāḥ pradhyāyan dīnamānaso 'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthita iti? sa tamāha -
T02bsu049_u:7744: māṇavakarūpī śakrastamāha - kasya punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāyātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ?
T02bsu049_u:7745: sadāpraruditenoktaḥ - prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi, āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ
T02bsu049_u:7747: tatra pratibaddhāś ca me buddhadharmā iti /
T02bsu049_u:7748: māṇavakarūpī śakrastamāha - na mama kulaputra tvayārthaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7749: api tu khalu punaḥ piturme yajño bhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:7750: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena rūdhireṇa asthimajjābhyāṃ ca kṛtyamiti /
T02bsu049_u:7752: sa tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā ātmano bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvya ūruṃ ca nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntaḥ ekānte sthitvā asthi bhittvā majjānaṃ ca dāsyāmīti ahaṃ cainaṃ kulaputramupariṣṭātprāsādatalagatā kṣaradrudhiramadrākṣam /
T02bsu049_u:7753: tasyā mamaitadabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ puruṣa ātmanaivātmana evaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayatīti?
T02bsu049_u:7755: ātmanaivātmana evaṃ kṣaradrūdhiraṃ śarīraṃ vikṛtaṃ kṛtam? tata eṣa māmevamāha - asya dārike māṇavakasya lohitaṃ hṛdayamasthi majjānaṃ ca dāsyāmīti /
T02bsu049_u:7759: tamenamahamevamavocam - kiṃ punastvaṃ tena dhanena kariṣyasīti?
T02bsu049_u:7760: sa eṣa māmetadavocat - prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi, taṃ cāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi yaduta dharmakāmatayeti
T02bsu049_u:7761: / tamenamahamevamavocam - kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirbhaviṣyati guṇaviśeṣo veti? tataḥ so 'cintyān me buddhaguṇān varṇayati
T02bsu049_u:7762: saṃprakāśayati, aprameyāṃś ca buddhadharmān - eṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ me tata āgamo bhaviṣyatīti /
T02bsu049_u:7763: tasya me mahattaraṃ prītiprāmodyamutpannaṃ tānacintyān buddhaguṇān śrutvā /
T02bsu049_u:7767: ayaṃ hi nāma kulaputro dharmakāmatayā ātmānaṃ parityajati /
T02bsu049_u:7768: kasmādasmābhirdharmo na pūjayitavyaḥ? evaṃrūpeṣu ca sthāneṣu praṇidhānaṃ na kartavyaṃ syāt,
T02bsu049_u:7769: yeṣāmasmākaṃ prabhūtā vipulāś ca bhogāḥ saṃvidyante iti /
T02bsu049_u:7770: sāhamenaṃ kulaputrametadavocam - mā mā tvaṃ kulaputra imāmevaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7771: ahaṃ te prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ dhanamanupradāpayiṣyāmi yena tavārthaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7772: tena tvaṃ tamāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi gurukariṣyasi /
T02bsu049_u:7773: aham api tvayaiva sārdhaṃ yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramiṣyāmi /
T02bsu049_u:7774: aham api tasya kulaputrasya pūjāṃ kariṣyāmi /
T02bsu049_u:7775: vayamapyevaṃrūpān dharmānniṣpādayiṣyāmo yaduta anuttarān buddhadharmān ye tvayā parikīrtitā iti /
T02bsu049_u:7778: daddhvam, yenāhametenaiva kulaputreṇa sārdhaṃ gatvā āryaṃ dharmodgataṃ
T02bsu049_u:7780: (Vaidya 249) atha khalu tau tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ dārikāmetadavocatām - āścaryaṃ yāvadduṣkaraṃ ca tvametasya kulaputrasya sthānamācakṣe /
T02bsu049_u:7782: sarvasattvasukhāvahāśca, yeṣāmeṣa kṛtaśaḥ kulaputro duṣkaraṃ sthānamevamutsahate /
T02bsu049_u:7785: yadāvām api gacchāvastvayaiva sārdhaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ pūjayituṃ ca //
T02bsu049_u:7786: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjārthaṃ satkārārthaṃ ca prasthitāṃ svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca viditvā etadavocat - amba tāta evaṃ kuruta, yathā vadata nāhaṃ kasyacitkuśalapakṣasyāntarāyaṃ karomi /
T02bsu049_u:7787: ityuktvā evaṃ sā śreṣṭhidārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjārthaṃ satkārārthaṃ ca prasthitā babhūva //
T02bsu049_u:7788: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkārayāmāsa /
T02bsu049_u:7790: alaṃkṛtya nānāvarṇāni vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā nānāraṅgāṇi vastrāṇi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś ca gṛhītvā nānāratnāni ca vicitrāṇi nānāratnamayāni ca vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ svādanīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā ekaṃ rathaṃ sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhamabhiruhya taiḥ
T02bsu049_u:7791: pañcabhī rathaśataiḥ pañcadārikāśatābhirūḍhaiḥ parivṛttā puraskṛtā mahatā ca parivāreṇa mātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamā yena pūrvā dik tena prakrāntā /
T02bsu049_u:7792: anupūrveṇa ca gacchan sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:7793: 'drākṣīddūrādeva tāṃ gandhavatīṃ nagarīṃ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ citrāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7794: darśanīyāṃ saptabhiḥ prākāraiḥ saptaratnamayairanuparikṣiptāṃ saptabhistoraṇaiḥ saptabhiḥ parikhābhiḥ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiranuparikṣiptāṃ dvādaśa yojanāni vistāreṇa dvādaśa yojanānyāyāmena ṛddhāṃ sphītāṃ ca kṣemāṃ ca subhikṣāṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṃ ca pañcabhirantarāpaṇavīthīśatairālekhyavicitracitrasadṛśairdarśanīyairnirviddhāṃ samasamairanutpīḍajanayugyayānasaṃkramaṇasthānasthāpitaiḥ sumāpitāṃ ca /
T02bsu049_u:7795: madhye ca nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya adrākṣīddharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmāsanagatamanekaśatayā parṣadā anekasahasrayā anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛttaṃ puraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam sahadarśanenaiva ca tasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ saṃpratilabhate sma tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpanno bhikṣurekāgreṇa manasikāreṇa /
T02bsu049_u:7796: dṛṣṭvā cāsya etadabhūt - na mama pratirūpametadbhavet, yadahaṃ rathagata eva
T02bsu049_u:7800: tāny api pañca dārikāśatāni śreṣṭhidārikayā saha rathebhyo 'vateruḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7801: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto 'parimāṇapūjāvyūhena yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo
T02bsu049_u:7803: tena khalu punaḥ samayena dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ saptaratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kāritamabhūt lohitacandanālaṃkṛtaṃ muktājālaparikṣiptam /
T02bsu049_u:7804: caturṣu kūṭāgārakoṇeṣu maṇiratnāni sthāpitāni, yāni pradīpakṛtyaṃ kurvanti sma /
T02bsu049_u:7805: catasraś ca dhūpaghaṭikā (Vaidya 250) rūpamayyaścaturdiśamavasaktāḥ, yatra śuddhaṃ kṛṣṇāguru dhūpyate sma yaduta prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjārtham /
T02bsu049_u:7806: tasya ca kūṭāgārasya madhye saptaratnamayaḥ paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto 'bhūt /
T02bsu049_u:7807: caturṇāṃ ratnānāṃ peḍā kṛtā, yatra prajñāpāramitā prakṣiptā suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu likhitā vilīnena vaidūryeṇa /
T02bsu049_u:7809: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcadārikāśataiḥ taṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīdaparimāṇena pūjāvyūhena pratimaṇḍitam /
T02bsu049_u:7814: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kimarthaṃ tvaṃ devendra
T02bsu049_u:7815: anekairdevatāsahasraiḥ sārdhamidaṃ ratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ divyairmāndāravaiḥ puṣpairdivyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiḥ suvarṇacūrṇairdivyaiś ca rūpyacūrṇairavakirasi abhyavakirasi abhiprakirasi? imāni ca divyāni
T02bsu049_u:7816: vādyāni devairuparyantarīkṣe pravāditāni? evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ
T02bsu049_u:7817: sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na tvaṃ kulaputra
T02bsu049_u:7818: jānīṣe? eṣā hi sā prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā
T02bsu049_u:7819: pariṇāyikā, yatra śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvaguṇapāramitānugatān sarvabuddhadharmān sarvākārajñatāṃ ca kṣipramanuprāpnuvantīti /
T02bsu049_u:7820: evamukte sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kvāsau kauśika prajñāpāramitā, yā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā pariṇāyikā? śakra āha - eṣā kulaputra asya kūṭāgārasya madhye suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu vilīnena vaidūryeṇa likhitvā āryeṇa dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saptabhirmudrābhirmudrayitvā sthāpitā /
T02bsu049_u:7822: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhai pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ samagrībhūtaiḥ, yānyanena puṣpāṇi gṛhītāni
T02bsu049_u:7823: mālyadāmāni ca vastraratnāni ca dhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś ca suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi, taiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjāmakārṣuḥ,
T02bsu049_u:7824: anyatarānyataraṃ ca tataḥ pratyaṃśaṃ sthāpayāmāsuḥ yaduta dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkārāya //
T02bsu049_u:7825: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni puṣpadhūpamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiḥ suvarṇarūpyamayaiś ca puṣpairdivyaiś ca vādyaiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūrvaṃ pūjayitvā yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkramya dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
T02bsu049_u:7826: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiścandanacūrṇaiḥ suvarṇarūpyamayaiś ca puṣpairavākiran abhyavākiran abhiprākiran, divyāni ca vādyāni saṃpravādayati sma dharmapūjāmevopādāya atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopariṣṭānmūrdhni puṣpakūṭāgāraṃ prātiṣṭhan /
T02bsu049_u:7827: tāni ca nānāvarṇāni puṣpāṇi suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi (Vaidya 251) vihāyasi vitānamiva sthitāni /
T02bsu049_u:7828: tāny api cīvarāṇi vastraratnāni ca antarīkṣe nānāratnamayo 'bhramaṇḍapa iva saṃsthito 'bhūt
T02bsu049_u:7829: adrākṣītkhalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyedamevaṃrūpamṛddhiprātihāryam /
T02bsu049_u:7831: āścaryaṃ yāvanmaharddhikaścāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvanmahānubhāvo yāvanmahaujaskaḥ
T02bsu049_u:7833: kulaputrasyaivaṃrūpā ṛddhivikurvaṇā, kiṃ punaryadāyamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyatīti //
T02bsu049_u:7834: atha khalu tāni śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamāni pañca dārikāśatāni dharmodgate bodhisattve mahāsattve spṛhāmutpādya sarvāstāḥ samagrībhūtā adhyāśayena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayāmāsuḥ, evaṃ cāvocan - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā
T02bsu049_u:7836: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca vayaṃ carantya eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo
T02bsu049_u:7837: bhavema, yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lābhī /
T02bsu049_u:7838: evameva ca prajñāpāramitāṃ satkuryāma gurukuryāma, yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkaroti gurukaroti /
T02bsu049_u:7839: bahujanasya ca saṃprakāśayema yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃprakāśayati
T02bsu049_u:7840: / evameva ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgatā bhavema /
T02bsu049_u:7841: pariniṣpadyemahi ca yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ pariniṣpannaś ca //
T02bsu049_u:7842: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayitvā dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkṛtya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sagauravāḥ sapratīkṣāḥ prāñjalīn kṛtvātiṣṭhan /
T02bsu049_u:7843: ekānte sthitaś ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat
T02bsu049_u:7848: samyak taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yena pūrvā dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7849: tasya me etadabhūt - samyak ca mayā nirghoṣaḥ śrutaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7850: na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam, kasya vā antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7853: so 'haṃ tena daurmanasyena mahatīmutkaṇṭhāṃ paritapanaṃ cāpanno 'bhūvam /
T02bsu049_u:7857: kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam, kuto vā prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsye śravaṇāya? na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ iti /
T02bsu049_u:7861: tatra drakṣyasi dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayantaṃ prakāśayantamiti
T02bsu049_u:7863: so 'haṃ tenaiva mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena sphuṭastataḥ pṛthivīpradeśānna calitaḥ, tava ca prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayataḥ śṛṇomi /
T02bsu049_u:7864: tasya me śṛṇvato bahūni samādhimukhāni prādurbhūtāni /
T02bsu049_u:7865: (Vaidya 252) tatra sthitaṃ māṃ daśadiglokadhātusthitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samāśvāsayanti,
T02bsu049_u:7866: sādhukāraṃ ca dadati - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, ete samādhayaḥ prajñāpāramitānirjātāḥ, yatra sthitairasmābhiḥ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ
T02bsu049_u:7868: te māṃ tathāgatāḥ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya antarhitāḥ
T02bsu049_u:7870: tasya me etadabhūt - kuto nu te tathāgatā āgatāḥ, kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti? tasya ca me etadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinākṛtādhikāro 'varopitakuśalamūlaḥ, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ upāyakauśalye ca suśikṣitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7871: sa me enamarthaṃ yathāvadvicariṣyati, yataste tathāgatā āgatā yatra vā te tathāgatā gatā iti /
T02bsu049_u:7872: so 'haṃ tasya tathāgatavigrahasya nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yathānuśiṣṭaṃ yena pūrvāṃ dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ
T02bsu049_u:7874: sahadarśanācca mamedṛśaṃ sukhaṃ prādurabhūt, tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpannasya
T02bsu049_u:7876: so 'haṃ tvāṃ kulaputra pṛcchāmi - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ, kutra te tathāgatā gatā iti? deśaya me kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca /
T02bsu049_u:7877: yathā vayaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca jānīma, avirahitāś ca bhavema tathāgatadarśaneneti
T02bsu049_u:7881: evamukte dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattva mahāsattvametadavocat - na khalu kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kutaścidāgacchanti vā gacchanti vā /
T02bsu049_u:7884: na hi kulaputra anutpāda āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
T02bsu049_u:7886: na hi kulaputra bhūtakoṭyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate
T02bsu049_u:7888: na hi kulaputra śūnyatāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
T02bsu049_u:7890: na hi kulaputra yathāvattāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
T02bsu049_u:7892: na hi kulaputra virāgasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
T02bsu049_u:7894: na hi kulaputra nirodhasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
T02bsu049_u:7896: na hi kulaputra ākāśadhātorāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
T02bsu049_u:7898: na hi kulaputra anyatra ebhyo dharmebhyastathāgataḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7899: yā ca kulaputra eṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ tathatā, yā ca sarvadharmatathatā, yā ca tathāgatatathatā, ekaivaiṣā tathatā /
T02bsu049_u:7904: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse 'bhigate
T02bsu049_u:7908: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kuta etadudakamāgataṃ kva vā tadudakaṃ gacchati, pūrvaṃ vā mahāsamudraṃ
T02bsu049_u:7909: dakṣiṇaṃ vā paścimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā? sadāprarudita āha - na hi kulaputra
T02bsu049_u:7911: kiṃ punarasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate? sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyo marīcikāṃ dṛṣṭvā anudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
T02bsu049_u:7915: evameva kulaputra ye kecittathāgatarūpeṇa vā ghoṣeṇa vā abhiniviṣṭāḥ, te tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti /
T02bsu049_u:7916: ye ca tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti, sarve te bālajātīyā duṣprajñajātīyā iti vaktavyāḥ, tadyathāpi nāma sa eva puruṣo yo
T02bsu049_u:7921: na ca kulaputra dharmatā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
T02bsu049_u:7922: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:7923: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra māyākāranirmitasya hastikāyasya vā aśvakāyasya vā rathakāyasya vā pattikāyasya vā nāstyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ
T02bsu049_u:7924: vā, evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
T02bsu049_u:7925: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragata ekaṃ vā tathāgataṃ paśyet, dvau vā trīn vā caturo vā pañca vā ṣaḍvā sapta vā aṣṭau
T02bsu049_u:7926: vā nava vā daśa vā viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā, tato vā uttare /
T02bsu049_u:7927: sa prativibuddhaḥ san ekam api tathāgataṃ na paśyet /
T02bsu049_u:7928: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti? sadāprarudita āha - na khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapne kasyaciddharmasya (Vaidya 254) pariniṣpattiḥ prajñāyate mṛṣāvādo hi svapno 'bhūt /
T02bsu049_u:7929: dharmodgata āha - evameva kulaputra sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamā uktā bhagavatā /
T02bsu049_u:7930: ye kecitkulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmāṃstathāgatena nirdeśitān yathābhūtaṃ na prajānanti, te tathāgatān nāmakāyena vā rūpakāyena vā abhiniviśya tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti yathāpi nāma dharmatāmaprajānanto ye ca tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā
T02bsu049_u:7932: sarve te ṣaḍgatikaṃ saṃsāraṃ gatāḥ, gacchanti gamiṣyanti ca /
T02bsu049_u:7935: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmān svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti tathāgatena deśitān yathābhūtaṃ
T02bsu049_u:7936: prajānanti, na te kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
T02bsu049_u:7938: ye ca na kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā
T02bsu049_u:7939: kalpayanti, utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā, te dharmatayā tathāgataṃ prajānanti /
T02bsu049_u:7940: ye ca tathāgataṃ dharmatayā prajānanti, na te tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti
T02bsu049_u:7941: ye ca tathāgatasyedṛśīṃ dharmatāṃ prajānanti, te āsannā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheścaranti
T02bsu049_u:7943: te ca bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ amoghaṃ rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjate /
T02bsu049_u:7945: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra mahāsamudre ratnāni na pūrvasyā diśa āgacchanti, na dakṣiṇasyāḥ, na paścimāyāḥ, nottarasyāḥ, na vidigbhyo nādhastānnopariṣṭānna kutaściddeśebhyo digbhya āgacchanti, api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyupādāya mahāsamudre ratnānyutpadyante /
T02bsu049_u:7948: nirudhyamānāni ca tāni ratnāni ca kvaciddaśadiśi loke saṃkrāmanti /
T02bsu049_u:7949: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ tāni ratnāni prabhāvyante, teṣāṃ pratyayānāmasatāṃ na teṣāṃ ratnānāṃ prabhāvanā bhavati
T02bsu049_u:7950: / evameva kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kāyapariniṣpattirna kutaściddaśadiśi lokādāgatā, nāpi kvaciddaśadiśi loke gacchati /
T02bsu049_u:7951: na ca ahetuko buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7954: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7957: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vīṇāyāḥ śabda utpadyamāno na
T02bsu049_u:7959: kvacitsaṃkrāmati, pratītya ca hetupratyayasāmagrīmutpadyate hetvadhīnaḥ pratyayādhīnaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7960: tadyathāpi nāma droṇīṃ ca pratītya carma ca pratītya tantrīś ca pratītya daṇḍaṃ ca pratītya upadhānīś ca pratītya koṇaṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya ca tajjavyāyāmaṃ pratītya evamayaṃ vīṇāyāḥ śabdo niścarati hetvadhīnaḥ pratyayādhīnaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7961: sa ca śabdo na droṇyā niścarati, na carmaṇo na tantrībhyo na daṇḍānnopadhānībhyo na koṇānna
T02bsu049_u:7962: tajjavyāyāmataḥ śabdo niścarati, api tu khalu punaḥ sarveṣāṃ samāyogācchabdaḥ prajñapyate
T02bsu049_u:7964: evameva kulaputra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaniṣpattirhetvadhīnā pratyayādhīnā anekakuśalamūlaprayogapariniṣpannā ca /
T02bsu049_u:7965: na caikato hetuto na caikataḥ pratyayato na caikataḥ kuśalamūlato buddhakāyaprabhāvanā /
T02bsu049_u:7969: evaṃ tvayā kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
T02bsu049_u:7970: sarvadharmāṇām api kulaputra tvayā iyameva dharmatā anugantavyā /
T02bsu049_u:7971: yataḥ kulaputra tvamevaṃ tathāgatāṃś ca sarvadharmāṃś ca anutpannānaniruddhāṃś ca saṃprajñāsyasi, tatastvaṃ niyato bhaviṣyasyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T02bsu049_u:7973: asmin khalu punastathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe mahān bhūmicālo 'bhūt /
T02bsu049_u:7974: sarvaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāramahādaśamahānimittaṃ kampate prakampate saṃprakampate, calati pracalati saṃpracalati, vedhate pravedhate saṃpravedhate, raṇati praraṇati saṃpraraṇati, kṣubhyati prakṣubhyati saṃprakṣubhyati, garjati pragarjati saṃpragarjati sma /
T02bsu049_u:7975: sarvāṇi ca mārabhavanāni saṃkṣobhitāni jihmībhūtāni cābhūvan /
T02bsu049_u:7977: tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ, te sarve yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena praṇatā abhūvan /
T02bsu049_u:7980: śakraś ca devānāmindraścatvāraś ca mahārājāno dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ divyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca puṣpairavākiran abhyavākiran abhiprākiran /
T02bsu049_u:7981: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
T02bsu049_u:7982: tava kulaputra anubhāvena adyāsmābhiḥ paramārthanirjātā kathā deśyamānā śrutā
T02bsu049_u:7984: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kaḥ punaḥ kulaputra atra hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayo 'sya
T02bsu049_u:7985: mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya? dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva āha - imaṃ kulaputra tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ tava ca pṛcchato mama ca nirdiśato 'ṣṭānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:7987: aśīteś ca prāṇiniyutānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni, catuḥṣaṣṭeś ca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajāṃsi vigatamalāni dharmeṣu dharmacakṣūṃṣi viśuddhāni
T02bsu049_u:7988: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato 'bhūt - lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ, yasya me prajñāpāramitāmimaṃ ca tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ paripṛcchataḥ iyatāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7989: etadevāsmākaṃ paryāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavedanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pariniṣpattaye /
T02bsu049_u:7990: na ca me bhūyo vicikitsā pravartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7992: sa tenaiva prītiprāmodyena samanvāgataḥ saptatālaṃ vihāyasamabhyudgamya saptatāle sthitvā evaṃ cintayati sma - kenāhametarhi antarīkṣe sthitaḥ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmiti? atha khalu śakro devānāmindra sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhyudgataṃ dṛṣṭvā cetasaiva cāsya cittamājñāya
T02bsu049_u:7993: divyāni cāsmai māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyupanāmayati sma, evaṃ cāvocat -
T02bsu049_u:7997: tava hi kulaputra anubhāvena adya bahūnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:7998: durlabhāḥ kulaputra evaṃrūpāḥ sattvāḥ, ye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśo
T02bsu049_u:7999: 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān kalpānutsahante mahāntaṃ bhāramudvoḍhuṃ yathā tvayā utsoḍham //
T02bsu049_u:8000: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasyāntikānmāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamavākirat, abhyavākirat, abhiprākirat svakena ca kāyena dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhicchādayati sma /
T02bsu049_u:8001: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - eṣo 'haṃ kulaputra adyāgreṇa tavātmānaṃ niryātayāmi upasthānaparicaryāyai
T02bsu049_u:8002: sa ātmānaṃ niryātya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvāsthāt
T02bsu049_u:8003: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā tāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - etā vayam api kulaputra tavātmānaṃ niryātayāmaḥ, vayamapyanena kuśalamūlena eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo bhavema, tvayaiva ca sārdhaṃ punaḥ punarbuddhāṃś ca bhagavato bodhisattvāṃś ca satkuryāma gurukuryāma /
T02bsu049_u:8005: / atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāṃ tāni ca pañca dārikāśatānyetadavocat - yadi me yūyaṃ dārikā
T02bsu049_u:8008: dārikā āhuḥ - anuvartiṣyāmahe tava vayamāśayenādhyāśayena ca /
T02bsu049_u:8010: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāni kṛtvā tāni ca pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkṛtya sarvāṇi ca tāni dharmodgatāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya niryātayati sma
T02bsu049_u:8011: upasthānaparicaryāyaiḥ - imāḥ kulaputra ahaṃ tavopasthāyikā niryātayāmi,
T02bsu049_u:8012: imāni ca pañca rathaśatāni niryātayāmi paribhogāyeti //
T02bsu049_u:8013: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasmai kulaputrāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
T02bsu049_u:8015: evaṃrūpeṇa ca tyāgacittena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
T02bsu049_u:8016: evaṃ ca dharmabhāṇakāṇāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śakyaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca śrotum /
T02bsu049_u:8017: tair api kulaputra paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhirevaṃrūpa eva tyāge sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paripraśnayadbhiriti //
T02bsu049_u:8018: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni pañca rathaśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalaparipūrimupādāya pratigṛhṇīte sma /
T02bsu049_u:8020: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanāt svakaṃ gṛhaṃ prāvikṣat sūryasya cāstaṃgamanakālo 'bhūt //
T02bsu049_u:8022: naitanmama sādhu pratirūpaṃ bhavet, yadahaṃ dharmakāmatayā āgatya
T02bsu049_u:8025: īryāpathābhyāṃ sthitvā sthānena caṃkrameṇa ca kālamatināmayeyam,
T02bsu049_u:8026: yāvaddharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakādgṛhānnirgato bhaviṣyati yaduta dharmasaṃprakāśanāyeti
T02bsu049_u:8027: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sapta varṣāṇyekasamādhisamāpanna evābhūt /
T02bsu049_u:8030: bodhisattvo mahāsattva sapta varṣāṇi dvābhyāmeva īryāpathābhyāṃ kālamatināmayan na styānamiddhamavakrāmayāmāsa
T02bsu049_u:8034: api tu kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:8035: 'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati, yannu vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattva mahāsattvasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñapayiṣyāmaḥ, yatrāsau kulaputro niṣadya
T02bsu049_u:8037: taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ susiktaṃ sumṛṣṭaṃ ca kariṣyāmo nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇam, yatra pṛthivīpradeśe dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca saṃprakāśayiṣyatīti cintayāmāsa /
T02bsu049_u:8038: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni dvābhyāmeva īryāpathābhyāṃ kālamatināmayāmāsuḥ sarvāḥ kriyāstasyānuvartamānāḥ //
T02bsu049_u:8039: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyaṃ nirghoṣamaśrauṣīt -
T02bsu049_u:8040: itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:8041: 'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati, vyutthāya ca madhyenagarasya niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti /
T02bsu049_u:8042: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ divyaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayāmāsa sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhaiḥ pañcadārikāśataiḥ, dharmāsanaṃ ca prajñapayāmāsa saptaratnamayam, svakaṃ cottarāsaṅgaṃ kāyādavatārya tasyāsanasyopari prajñapayati sma /
T02bsu049_u:8043: atha khalu tā dārikāḥ svakasvakānuttarāsaṅgān kāyādavatārya pañcottarāsaṅgaśatāni tatrāsane prajñapayāmāsuḥ atrāsane dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T02bsu049_u:8045: evaṃ tāś ca sarvā dārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanamāstīrya tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasya jātā abhūvan //
T02bsu049_u:8046: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:8047: na codakaṃ samantātparyeṣamāṇo 'pi labhate, yena taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siñcet /
T02bsu049_u:8049: tatsarvamudakamantardhāpitamabhūt, apyeva nāma asya sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyodakamalabhamānasya cittaṃ khidyeta,
T02bsu049_u:8050: duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ ca bhavet, cittasya vā anyathātvaṃ bhavet, yenāsya kuśalamūlasyāntardhānaṃ bhavet, na vā pūjā bhrājeran //
T02bsu049_u:8052: yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvā imaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam /
T02bsu049_u:8053: tatkasya hetoḥ? ayaṃ hi pṛthivīpradeśa uddhatarajaskaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:8054: mā rajodhāturito bhūpradeśāddharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāye nipatet /
T02bsu049_u:8055: kiṃ vā anenātmabhāvenāvaśyaṃ bhedanadharmiṇā kuryām? varaṃ khalu punarmamāyaṃ
T02bsu049_u:8056: kāya (Vaidya 258) evaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu, na tu niḥsāmarthyakriyayā
T02bsu049_u:8057: / api ca kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bahūni me ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi punaḥ punaḥ
T02bsu049_u:8058: saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni, na punarevaṃrūpeṣu sthāneṣu
T02bsu049_u:8061: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvamasiñcat /
T02bsu049_u:8062: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañcadārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni sarvāṇi tāni tīkṣṇāni śastrāṇi gṛhītvā svakasvakāni śarīrāṇi viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakasvakairlohitaiḥ sarvamasiñcan /
T02bsu049_u:8063: na ca sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāsāṃ vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyānyathātvamabhūt, yatra sa māraḥ
T02bsu049_u:8065: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvaddharmakāmaścāyaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
T02bsu049_u:8066: yāvaddṛḍhasamādānaś ca yāvanmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaś ca anapekṣaḥ kāye jīviteṣu bhogeṣu ca, anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheradhigamāya adhyāśayasaṃprasthitaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:8068: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastatsarvaṃ lohitodakaṃ divyaṃ candanodakamadhyatiṣṭhat,
T02bsu049_u:8069: samantācca tasya pṛthivīpradeśasya acintyaṃ paramodāraṃ gandhaṃ yasya divyasya candanodakasya paripūrṇam /
T02bsu049_u:8071: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat
T02bsu049_u:8073: sādhu te kulaputra acintyaṃ vīryam, sādhvī ca te
T02bsu049_u:8075: evaṃrūpeṇa kulaputra adhyāśayena evaṃrūpeṇa vīryeṇa evaṃrūpayā ca dharmakāmatayā taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā //
T02bsu049_u:8077: prajñaptaṃ mayā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanam /
T02bsu049_u:8078: ayaṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaḥ susiktaḥ susaṃmṛṣṭaś ca kṛtaḥ /
T02bsu049_u:8079: kuto nu khalvahaṃ puṣpāṇi labheyam, yairahamimaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇaṃ kuryām,
T02bsu049_u:8080: dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane
T02bsu049_u:8081: niṣaṇṇamabhyavakireyam? atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - imāni te kulaputra pratigṛhāṇa divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi /
T02bsu049_u:8083: kuru, dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ
T02bsu049_u:8085: sa tasmai divyaṃ khārīsahasraṃ divyānāṃ māndāravapuṣpāṇāmupanāmayati sma /
T02bsu049_u:8086: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā anyataraiḥ puṣpaistaṃ
T02bsu049_u:8087: puṣpābhikīrṇamakārṣīt, anyataraiś ca puṣpairdharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhyavākirat
T02bsu049_u:8088: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāmatyayena tataḥ samādhervyutthāya yena dharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat, anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayāmāsa //
T02bsu049_u:8089: (Vaidya 259) atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanenaiva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratilabhate sma, tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpanna
T02bsu049_u:8091: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanāyaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā /
T02bsu049_u:8116: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāniṣaṇṇasyaiva tasyāṃ belāyāṃ sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhirājo jātaḥ
T02bsu049_u:8117: / yataḥ sarvadharmaviviktaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmācalanaś ca nāma
T02bsu049_u:8118: samādhiḥ, sarvadharmāmananaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmāstambhitaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmaikarasaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmāparyantaś ca nāma samādhi, sarvadharmānutpādaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmānirodhaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, gaganāparyataś ca nāma samādhiḥ, samudrāparyantaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, meruvicitraś ca nāma samādhiḥ, gaganākalpaś ca nāma
T02bsu049_u:8121: vijñānāparyantaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, pṛthivīdhātvaparyantaśva nāma samādhiḥ,
T02bsu049_u:8123: vijñānadhātvaparyantaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, vajropamaś ca nāma samādhiḥ,
T02bsu049_u:8124: sarvadharmāsaṃbhedaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmānupalabdhiś ca nāma
T02bsu049_u:8126: sarvadharmaniśceṣṭaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmācintyaś ca nāma samādhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:8127: / evaṃpramukhāni ṣaṣṭiḥ samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇi sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratilabdhānyabhūvanniti //
T02bsu049_u:8131: sahapratilabdhānāṃ ca subhūte ṣaṣṭyāḥ samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi, dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāṃ diśi, vidikṣu adha ūrdhvaṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtān bodhisattvaguṇapuraskṛtān etaireva nayairebhireva nāmabhiretairevākṣarairimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇān /
T02bsu049_u:8132: tadyathāpi nāma ahametarhi asminneva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau dharmaṃ deśayāmi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛto bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaḥ, ebhireva nayairebhireva nāmabhirebhirevākṣarairimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe /
T02bsu049_u:8134: 'cintyena bāhuśrutyena śrutasāgaratayā ca samanvāgato 'bhūt, sarvāsu ca jātiṣu na jātu buddhavirahito 'bhūt /
T02bsu049_u:8135: yatra yatra buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃmukhībhūtā bhavanti, tatra tatropapadyate sma /
T02bsu049_u:8136: avirahitaś ca bhavati sma buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ, antataḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi /
T02bsu049_u:8137: sarve ca anena akṣaṇā vivarjitāḥ, kṣaṇasaṃpaccārāgitā //
T02bsu049_u:8138: tatra khalu punarbhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - tadanenāpi te ānanda paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyam - ityapīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ
T02bsu049_u:8140: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ pratilabdhukāmairasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
T02bsu049_u:8141: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyopadeṣṭavyoddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā /
T02bsu049_u:8142: tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena mahāpustake pravyaktapravyaktairakṣaraiḥ sulikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇaiścīvarairvādyairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ
T02bsu049_u:8143: patākābhiḥ, samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ /
T02bsu049_u:8145: tatkasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvajñajñānapariniṣpattirbhaviṣyati /
T02bsu049_u:8146: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda śāstā te tathāgataḥ? ānanda āha - śāstā me bhagavan, śāstā me sugata
T02bsu049_u:8150: maitreṇa vākkarmaṇā manaāpena, maitreṇa manaḥkarmaṇā manaāpena /
T02bsu049_u:8151: tasmāttarhi ānanda yathaiva tvayā mamaitarhi tiṣṭhato dhriyamāṇasya yāpayato 'smin samucchraye prema ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ ca kṛtam,
T02bsu049_u:8152: tathaiva tvayā ānanda mamātyayādasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kartavyam /
T02bsu049_u:8153: dvir api trir api te ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi enāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
T02bsu049_u:8154: yatheyaṃ nāntardhīyeta, yathā nāsyāṃ tvamanyaḥ puruṣaḥ syāḥ /
T02bsu049_u:8155: yāvadānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā loke pracariṣyati, tāvattathāgatastiṣṭhatīti veditavyam /
T02bsu049_u:8157: avirahitāste ānanda sattvā buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena saṃghopasthānena ca veditavyam
T02bsu049_u:8158: tathāgatāntikāvacarāste ānanda sattvā veditavyāḥ, ya enāṃ prajñāpāramita (Vaidya 261) śroṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti
T02bsu049_u:8164: te ca maitreyapramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ āyuṣmāṃś ca subhūtirāyuṣmāṃś ca śāriputraḥ āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ śakraś ca devānāmindraḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
T02bsu049_u:8166: samāptā ceyaṃ bhagavatyā āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā sarvatathāgatajananī bodhisattvapratyekajinaśrāvakāṇāṃ mātā, dharmamudrā dharmolkā dharmanābhirdharmabherī dharmanetrī dharmaratnanidhānam akṣayo
T02bsu049_u:8168: prajñāpāramitāṃ samyagudgṛhya paryavāpya ca dhārayitvā pravartya enāṃ viharantu sadārthina iti //
T02bsu049_u:8169: ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
T02bsu049_u:8170: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
